Ken kong cih in ah numei pasal mawhna hang longal thu dang hangin a zi ma‑a numei dang khat a teenpihpa in angkawm ahi hi. A kimasa numei a teenpihpa zong angkawm mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Nupa vai tua bang ding ahih leh zi neilo a om ding hoih zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Mi khempeuh in hih thu a sangkim zo kei uh hi. Pasian in a tuam vilvel a a piakte bekin a sangzo uh hi.
A nu gilsung panin gehsa banga a suak pawl a om hi. A kiget tawm pawl zong oma pawl khatte ahih leh vantung kumpigam thu hangin geh bangin a om uh hi. Hih thu a sang zote in sang un,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in naupangte tungah a khut nga‑a thu a ngetsak theih nadingin mite in naupangte hong paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin nungzuite in amaute na taiigawp uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Naupangte ka kiangah a hong pai ding kham kei unla hong paisak zaw un. Vantung kumpigam in naupang tawh a kibangte aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin naupangte tungah a khut nga‑a tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
Tu in, en in, ama kiangah mi khat hong pai a, “Sia hoih aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah theih nadingin a pha bang ka bawl ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Banghang in mihoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian longal a hoih kuamah a om kei hi. Ahi zongin, nuntakna sungah na lutnop leh thupiakte na zui in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Bang thukham teng zui ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin Zeisu in, “Mi that kei in. Angkawm kei in. Guta kei in. A maanlopi in teci pang kei in.
Na nu le na pa zahtak in. Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa it in,” a ci hi.
Tangvalpa in, “Tuate khempeuh ka neu tunga kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi. Bang kisam lai ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “A hoihkim a ut taktak na hih leh pai inla na neihsa teng zuak in mizawngte pia leteh vantung ah sum na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tangvalpa in tua thu a zak ciangin maikhingsa in a paikhia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah mihau mahmah khat ahi hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mihaute vantung kumpigam sung a lut nading uh haksa mahmah hi.
Khatvei kong cihkik in ah mihau khat Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding sangin kala‑oh khat phimbilvang sungah khum ding baih zaw hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Tua bang ahih mawk leh kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute en in a gen in ah, “Hih thu bel mihing tawh a piang theilo mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian tawh na khempeuh a piang thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in ama kiangah, “En in, kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang hong zui ka hih manun bang ngah ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, bawlthak hun ah Mihing Tapa in ama minthanna kumpi tokhom tungah a hong tut hun ciangin kei hong zui note in kumpi tokhom sawm le nih tungah tu in Israel nam sawm le nam nihte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi.
Keima min hangin a inn, a sanggampa, a sanggamnu, a pa, a nu, a zi, a tate le a lote khat peuhpeuh a nusia mi in a zah 100 ngah dinga, nuntak tawntungna zong a luah ding hi.
Ahi zongin a masa mi tampite nunung ding uh a, a nunung mi tampite a masa ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
“Banghang hiam cihleh vantung kumpigam in ama lenggah huan a nasem ding mi a cial dingin zingsang tunga a kuankhia loneipa tawh kibang hi.
Tu in, nitha denariusɠ khat piak dingin nasemte tawh kithukim uha lenggah huanah amaute a kuansak hi.
“Nai thum pawl ciangin loneipa a paikhiat leh vanzuakna phual ah sepmel nei loin a mawk om mi pawlkhat a mu hi.
Amaute kiangah zong, ‘Ka lenggah huanah va kuan un. Thaman a kilawm zah kong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin amaute zong a kuan uh hi.
Nai guk le nai kua pawlin khatvei, paikhiakik a tuamah bangin a va cial hi.
Nai sawm le nai khat pawlin zong paikhia a, a mawk om mi pawlkhat a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Banghang in hihlai ah sun thapai in mawk om na hi uh hiam?’ a ci hi.
“Amaute in, ‘Kuamah in hong cial lo hi,’ a cih uh ciangin amah in, ‘Note zong ka lenggah huanah va kuan un. Thaman a kilawm zah kong pia ding hi,’ a ci hi.
“Nitak ciangin lenggah loneipa in nasem ukpa kiangah, ‘Nasemte sam inla, a kuan nunung pen pan a kuan masa pen dongin a thaman uh pia in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ciangin nai sawm leh nai khat pawla a cialte hong pai uh a, denariusɠ khat ciat a ngah uh hi.
A kuan masate hong pai uh ciangin a tam zaw ngah dingin kilamen uha ahi zongin amaute in zong denariusɠ khat ciat bek mah a ngah uh hi.
Tua banga a ngah uh ciangin loneipa phunsan uh a,
‘Hih a kuan nunungte in nai khat sung bek nasem man uh hi napi in sun thapai nisa thuakin a gim mahmah kote tawh thaman a kikim na ngahsak veve hi,’ a ci uh hi.
“Ahih hangin loneipa in amaute laka khatpa kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nang tungah ka khial kei hi. Denariusɠ khat piak ding mah a thukim hilo na hi hiam?
Na thaman ding la inla ciah in. Hih a kuan nunung penpa zong nang aa zah mah ka pia nuam hi.
Keima neihsa ka ut bangbang a ka zek theih hi lello ahi hiam? Ka cit, ka siam manin nang heh laizang ding na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
“Tua ahih manin a nunungte masa ding uh a, a masate a nunung ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kisam mi a tam hangin a kiteel mi a tawm hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a paitoh kawmin lampi ah sawm le nihte tuam tonpih in thu a hilh hi.
Amah in, “En un, Jerusalem khuapi ah i paito ding hi. Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate tungah Mihing Tapa kilehhek dinga, amaute in thah dingin thu a khen ding uh hi.
Amaute in Gentile‑te zahko ding, sat ding le khailup dingin amah pia ding uha a ni thum ni in a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zebedee tapate nu in ngetnop khat nei ahih manin a tapate tawh Zeisu kiangah pai in, a mai ah a khukdin uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in nupinu kiangah, “Bang deih na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Tua nu in, “Na kumpigam sungah hih ka tapa nihte na taklam ah khat na veilam ah khat na tutsak ding ka deih hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Nong na nget uh bang hiam cih na thei kei uh hi. A sawtlo a ka dawn ding hai dawn zo ding na hi uh hiam? Ka kibaptize na ah kibaptize zo ding na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute in, “Hi zo mah nung,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka dawn ding hai na dawn takpi ding uh a, ka kibaptize na ah zong na kibaptize takpi ding uh hi. Ahih hangin ka taklam le ka veilam a tut theih nading thu pen kei hong piak theih hilo in ka Pa in a sehkholhsa mite aa ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
A dang sawmte in tua thu a zak uh ciangin tua unau nihte tungah a lungkim kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute samkhawm a, “Gentile‑te sungah ukna neite in a mipite uh ukcip uh a, a miliante un a mipite tungah thuneihna zang uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
Ahi zongin note sungah tua bang ding hilo hi. Note lakah a lian a suak nuam mite in note nasem hi tahen.
Note lakah a masa pen a suak nuamte in note sila hi tahen.
Mihing Tapa nangawn ama na a kisepsak dinga hong pai hilo hi. Midangte na a sepsak ding le a nuntakna pia in mi tampi a tankhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jericho khua pan a paikhiat uh ciangin mihonpi in Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
Tua ciangin lamgei a tu mittaw nihin amaute lamah Zeisu hong pai hi cih a zak uh ciangin, “David Tapa, Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Amaute a daih nadingun mihonpi in a taiihuan uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in, “David Tapa, Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci in nakpi in a kiko semsem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu a dinsa in khawla amaute sam in, “Bang kong hihsak ding ut na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Topa aw, khua nong muhsak ding ka ut uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute hehpihhuai sa in a mit uh a lawnsak leh thakhat in khua mu pah uh a, ama nung a zui uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi tun kuan, Tanluan mual kianga om Bethphage khua a tun uh ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite nih sawl a,
“Note mai‑a khua ah va lut un. Laapi khat kikhih a om na mu pah ding uha a no zong a kiangah na om ding hi. Suut unla hong kai un.
Mi khatpeuh in hong paupih leh, ‘Topa in amaute zang nuam hi, hong puakkik pah ding hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Hih thute khempeuh in kamsangpa gensa thute a tangtun nadinga piang ahi hi.
Amah in, “ ‘En in, laapi ta laano tungah tuangin, Na Kumpipa lungnemtak in, Nang kiangah hong pai hi,’ ci in, Zion tanu kiangah gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite gel zong pai uh a, Zeisu thupiak bangin ahih uh hi.
Laapi le laano hong kai uha tuate tungah a puante uh phahin Zeisu a tuangsak uh hi.
Mihon tampitak in a puante uh lampi ah phah uh hi. Pawlkhatte in singhiangte satin phah uh hi.
A nung le a mai‑a a pai mihonpite kiko uh a, “David Tapa tungah Hosannaɠ! Topa min tawh a hong paipa in, Thupha ngah tahen! A sangbel munah Hosanna!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi sung a lut ciangin khuapi sunga om mi khempeuh ciak ngeingai uh a, “Hihpa kua ahi hiam?” ci in khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
Mihonpi in, “Galilee gam Nazareth khua mi kamsangpa Zeisu ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Pasian biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu lut a, biakinnpi huang sungah vanlei, vanzuak a om mi khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhekteɠ sabuaite le vakhu zuakte tutphahte zong a lumletsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “ ‘Ka inn in thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ahih hangin note in ‘gutate phualpi’ na suaksak uh hi ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
Biakinnpi huang sunga a om laitak in ama kiangah mittawte le khebaite hong pai uh a, amah in amaute a damsak hi.
Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in ama bawl nalamdangte mu in, “David Tapa tungah Hosannaɠ!” ci in biakinnpi huang sunga a om naupangnote kikona aw a zak uh ciangin a heh mahmah uh hi.

Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Hih naupangte kikona aw na za hiam?” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka za hi, ‘Naupangnote le nawine naungekte kam panin phatna kicing na gingkhiasak hi,’ a cihna thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute nusia in khuapi sung pan Bethany khualam zuanin paikhia a, tua khua ah a giak hi.
Zingsang tungin khuapi lam zuanin Zeisu hong paikik a, lamkal ah a gilkial hi.

Lamgei ah theikung khat mu in a phungah a va pai leh a teh longal bangmah a mu kei hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Tu a kipan gah ngei nawn peuhmah kei in,” a cih ciangin tua theikung thakhat in a keugaw hi.
Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin, lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Banghang in hih theikung keugaw pah zawzen ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, lunghiang loin um taktak le uh teh hih theikung tunga thupiang bang bek hilo in hih mualpi kiangah zong, ‘Kihemkhia inla tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le uh cin tua bangin a piang ding hi.
Upna tawh na nget uh leh na nget peuhpeuh uh a vekpi in na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Biakinnpi huang sungah Zeisu lutin thu a hilh laitak in siampi liante le Judah mite makaite ama kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih bang nate na sep theih nadingin kua kiang panin thu ngah na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua in nang hong pia ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Ken zong note thukhat kong dong ding hi. Nong dawn theih uh leh hih nate kua thuneihna tawh hih ka hi hiam cih kong gen pan ding hi.

John tuiphumna thu vantung pana thuneihna tawh ahi hiam, mihing pana thuneihna tawh ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute kikum uh a, “ ‘Vantung pana thuneihna tawh hi,’ ci lehang, ‘Tua ahih leh banghang in amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
‘Mihing thuneihna tawh hi,’ ci lehang lah mi khempeuh in John pen kamsangpa a a san khitsa uh ahih manin mihonte kihtakhuai hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tua ahih manin, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Ken zong hih nate kua thuneihna tawh sem ka hi hiam cih kong gen kei ding hi.
“Ahi zongin hih kong gen ding thu bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam? Mi khatin tapa nih a nei hi. A ta uzawpa kiangah va pai a, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni in ka lenggah lo ah va kuan in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua a tapa in, ‘Ka kuan nuam kei hi,’ a cih hangin a nung ciangin kisikkik in a kuan hi.
“Tua khit ciangin a nauzawpa kiangah pai a, tuamah bangin a gen hi. A tapa in, ‘Pa aw, ka kuan ding hi,’ ci in dawng napi a kuan kei hi.

“Tua ta nihte kua zaw in a pa deihna mang ahi hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute in, “A upapen in a mang zaw hi,” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, siahdongte le numei kizuakte in Pasian kumpigam sungah note ma in a lut uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh John hong pai in thuman lampi hong lah hangin amah na um kei uh hi. Ahi zongin siahdongte le numei kizuakte in amah a um uh hi. Note in hih thu na muh khit nangawn un kisik in amah na um tuan kei uh hi.

“A dang thugentehna khat na ngai un. Leitang neipa khatin lenggah lo khat bawl in a kim ah phung ciangin um a, lenggah cilna phual khat bawl in buuktau khat zong a dawh hi. Tua khit ciangin lenggah lo kho dingin mi cial a, khual gamlapi khatah a zinkhia hi.
Tu in lenggah lak hun hong naita a, lenggahte a kaikhawm dingin lokhawh thalawhte kiangah a nasemte a sawl hi.
“Lokhawh thalawhte in a nasemte man uh a, khat vuagawp in khat that uh a, a dang khat pen suang tawh a denglum uh hi.
Tua ciangin loneipa in a sawl masakte sangin a tam zaw a nasemte pawlkhat sawlkik leuleu a, tuate zong a masate a bawl mah bangun a bawl veve uh hi.
A tawpna ah loneipa in, ‘Ka tapa zahtak kha ding uh hi,’ ci in a tapa a paisak hi.
“Ahih hangin lokhawh thalawhte in a tapa a muh uh ciangin kikum uh a, ‘Hihpa innluah ding pa ahi hi. Pai dih un, amah thatin a luah ding teng sut ni,’ a kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah man uh a, lenggah lo pua lamah kaikhia in a that uh hi.
“Tua hi a, lenggah loneipa a hong pai ciangin tua lokhawh thalawhte bang a ci bawl ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Amah in tua migilote nasiatak in a susia ding hi. Lenggah lak hun ciangin loneipa tungah lenggah a ngah zah ding a pia ding a dang lokhawh thalawhte a khosak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “ ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang, Innkiusuang bulpi a suak hi. Hih in Topa sep hi a, Eite muhna ah lamdang hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
“Tua ahih manin note kianga kong gen in ah, note tung panin Pasian kumpigam kilakhia dinga, a gahsak ding minamdangte khat tungah kipia ding hi.
Hih suang tungah mi khatpeuh a kiat leh kitamkham dinga, hih suangin mi khatpeuh a den leh a zanciim ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte in ama thugentehnate a zak uh ciangin amaute a cihna ahihlam a thei uh hi.
Zeisu mat a sawm uh hangin mihonpi in kamsangpa hi ci in um khin uh ahih manin mihonpi a kihta zel uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute dawngin thugentehna tawh thu a gen inah,
“Vantung kumpigam in a tapa aa ding mopawi a bawl kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
Amah in mopawi sim dinga a khohsate sam dingin a nasemte a sawl ciangin tua a khohsate a pai nuam kei uh hi.

“Amah in nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsate kiangah hih bangin va gen un. “En un, nitak an min khin ta hi. Bawngtalte le ganthaute kigo zo a, na khempeuh a baihsa in om khin hi. Mopawi ah hong paita un,” va ci un,’ a ci hi.
“Ahih hangin amaute in thusim loin, amau utna ciat ah a pai uh hi. Khat in lo kuansan a, a dang khatin sum bawl dingin a zinkhiatsan hi.
A dangte in a nasemte manin bawlsia in a that uh hi.
Kumpipa in tua thu a zak ciangin heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansak in tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua uh zong a haltumsak hi.
“Tua khit ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi ankuang kilui khinzo hi. Ahih hangin ka khohsate tua pawi an ne dingin a kilawm kei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lam lianpite ah va pai kawikawi unla mi na muh peuhpeuh uh mopawi ah hong sam un,’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nasemte zong lam lianpite ah va pai in mi a muh khempeuh uh misia, mipha a kaihkhop uh ciangin mopawi inn sungah mi a dim hi.
“Tua pawisimte en dingin kumpipa a lut ciangin mopuan a silhlo mi khat a mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Lawm aw, mopuan silh lopi in banghang in hih mun hong tung thei na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua pa in a dawng thei kei hi.
“Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Hihpa a khut le a khe hen unla kaikhia in pualam khuamial lakah lawnkhia un. Tualai ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.’
“A kisam mi a tam hangin a kiteel mi a tawm hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Pharisee pawlte paikhia uh a, ama kampau mah tawh Zeisu a awksak theih nadingun a kikum uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin amau nungzuite le Herod pawlte Zeisu kiangah a sawl uh hi. Amaute in, “Sia aw, nang mi thuman khat na hi hi. Maitang zahtak tuam neilo na hih manin angvan tuam zong na nei kei‑a a maantak in Pasian thu na hilh hi cih kong thei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Caesar kumpipa tungah mimal siah piakhuai hiam piakhuai lo hiam na ngaihsutna hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin, Zeisu in amaute gitloh gelna thei ahih manin, “A kineihkhem mite aw, banghang in hong ze‑et na hi uh hiam?
Mimal siah dinga na piak uh dangkatang khat hong lak un,” a cih ciangin denariusɠ tang khat a pia uh hi.
Amah in, “Hih in kua lim le kua min ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Caesar kumpipa min le lim ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Caesar kumpipa neihsate Caesar kumpipa pia unla Pasian neihsate Pasian pia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uha amah nusia in a paikhia uh hi.
Tua ni mahin thawhkikna om lo hi a ci Sadducee pawlte hong pai in thu a dong uh hi.
Amaute in, “Sia aw, mi khatin ta nei loin a sih leh a naupa in a zi luah henla, a upa aa dingin suan leh khak tawisak hen ci in Moses in thu hong pia hi.
Tu in ko kiangah unau pasal sagih a om hi. A upapen in zi nei a, ta nei loin a si hi. Tua ciangin a naupa in a zi a luah hi.
A nihna le a thumna pa a kipan a sagihna dongin tua bangin a piang hi.
A tawpna ah tua numei zong a si hi.
Tua ahih teh thawhkik ni ciangin tua numei in unau pasal sagihte sung panin kua pen zi in a om ding hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh a vekpi un tua numei a teenpih khin uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho ahi a, Pasian vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na sangkhial uh hi.
Thawhkik ni ciangin kipi kiteenna om nawnlo dinga, vana om Pasian vantungmite tawh a kibang ding uh hi.
Misite thawhkikna thu Pasian hong genna sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
Amah in, ‘Keimah in Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian ka hi hi,’ a ci hi. Pasian in misite Pasian hilo in, a nungta mite Pasian ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Mihonpi in hih thu a zak uh ciangin ama thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Zeisu in Sadducee pawlte cih nading thei loin a koih lam Pharisee pawlte in a zak uh ciangin a kikhawm uh hi.
Amaute lak panin thukhamhilh sia khatin, Zeisu a ze‑etna in thu dong a,
“Sia aw, thukham sung panin a lianpen thupiak bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “ ‘Na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, le na ngaihsutna khempeuh tawh Topa na Pasian it in.’
Hih in a masa le a lianpen thupiak ahi hi.
A nihna in a masa mah tawh a kibang hi a, ‘Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,’ cih thu ahi hi.
“Thukham le Kamsangte laibu‑te khempeuh in hih thupiak nihte pana a hong mengkhia ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Pharisee‑te a kikaihkhop laitak un Zeisu in,
“Khazih bang na cih ngaihsut uh hiam? Amah kua tapa ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “David Tapa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Tua ahih leh banghang in David in Kha theihsakna tawh amah Topa ci thei ahi hiam?
David in a genna ah, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah, “Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ a ci hi.
“David in amah Topa ci ahih leh banghang in ama tapa hi thei zel ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Kuamah in kam khat beek dawng theilo uh ahih manin tua ni a kipan kuamah in thu a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mihonpite le a nungzuite thu a hilh hi.
Amah in, “Thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte in Moses tutna a luah uh hi.
Tua ahih manin zuih dinga hong gen khempeuh uh zui unla sem un. Ahi zongin amaute in a gen bangun gamta lo uh ahih manin amaute gamtat bangin gamta kei un.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in midangte liangko tungah a puak hak theithei ding vangik suan napi uh amaute in tuate a khutme dawn nangawn uh tawh a lawng nuam kei uh hi.
“A sep a bawl khempeuh uh mite muh theihtheih dingin ahih uh hi. Thunget cianga a zat uh talsuante le banbulhteɠ a gol theithei zangin a puanmongtepte uh a sau theithei in a bawl uh hi.
Pawi annekna ah mun hoih penpen ngah nuam uha kikhopna innte ah tutna thupi tata a deih uh hi.
Sumbuuk ah mite in, ‘Rabbi aw, Rabbi aw,’ ci in a hopih ding uh a ut uh hi.
“Khazih khat bek note Siapa hi a, note khempeuh unau khat na hih manun kuamah ‘Rabbi,’ kicisak kei un.
Vantung a om Pa khat bek nei na hih manun leitung ah kuamah pa ci kei un.
Khazih khat bek na Siapa uh ahih manin kuamah sia kicisak kei un.
Note laka a lianpenpa in note nasem ahi ding hi.
Amah le amah a kilamsang mi peuhmah in niamkhiatna thuak dinga a kiniamkhiat mi peuhmah a kilamsang ding hi.
“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh vantung kumpigam kong na khak uh a, note lah lut loin a lut nuamte zong na lutsak kei uh hi.

A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Meigongte neihsa teng na nektumsak uh a, kineih tawmin thu sau pipi ngen na hih manun a nasia zaw thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi.

“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat na ngah nadingun leitung tuitung tengah na zin kawikawi uh a, na ngah khit uh ciangin note sanga a zah nihin a sia zaw hellɠ tapa na suaksak uh hi.
“Lamhilh mittawte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! ‘Mi khatpeuh biakinnpi tawh a kiciam leh phamawh loin a sunga kham tawh a kiciam leh a kiciamna in a khih hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mihai le mittawte aw! Tua kham le tua kham a siangthosak biakinnpi, koi thupi zaw ahi hiam?
‘Mi khatpeuh biaknatau tawh a kiciam leh phamawh loin tua tau tunga Pasian a kipia nate tawh a kiciam leh a kiciamna in a khih hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mihai le 23:15 mi khat na ngah: Upna hanga Judah mi a kisuaksakte genna ahi hi. mittawte aw! Pasian a kipia na le tua nate a siangthosak biaknatau koi thupi zaw ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin biaknatau tawh a kiciam mi in, biaknatau le a tunga om na khempeuh tawh a kiciam ahi hi.
Biakinnpi tawh a kiciam mi in biakinnpi le a sunga a teengpa tawh a kiciam ahi hi.
Vantung tawh a kiciam mi in Pasian tokhom le tua tunga a tupa tawh a kiciam ahi hi.

“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh lengmasel, samong sapa teh le cummin‑te sawm a khat na piak uh hangin thukham sunga a thupi zaw ahi maantak a thukhenna, hehpihna le upnate na thudon kei uh hi. A dangte thudon lo tuanlo in hih nate na hih veve ding uh ahi hi.
Lamhilh mittawte aw, thosi thovaite na valh khakloh nadingun tui na khaih uh hangin kala‑oh na nawmvalh zel uh hi!

A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh hai le kuangte a pualam na silsiang uh a, ahi zongin a sunglam huaihamna le uangtat nopna lungsim tawh a kidim hi.
Mittaw Pharisee pawlte aw! Hai le kuangte a pualam a sian theih nadingin a sunglam silsiang masa un.

“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a pualam leikang a kizut han tawh na kibang uh hi. Tua hante a pualam a etlawm hangin a sungah misi guh le a kihhuai na khempeuh a dim hi.
Tuamah bangin note zong na puatham uh midik tawh na kibat uh hangin note sungah kineihna le siatna a dimtak in a om hi.
“A kineih thukhamhilh siate le Pharisee pawlte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh kamsangte hante na bawl uh a, midikte hante na zem uh hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘I pu i pate khanlai in a om kha hi lehang, kamsangte a thatte lakah i kihel kei ding hi,’ na ci tazen uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kamsangte a that mite tu le tate na hihlam uh no le no in teci na pang uh hi.
Tua hi in, na pu na pate uh mawhna zah mah no zong mawhvet un.
“A gupha gul suante le gul hangsante aw! Hellɠ thukhenna tawh bangci kipelh theih ding na hi uh hiam?

Note kiangah kamsangte, mipilte le thukhamhilh siate kong sawl hi. Tuate pawlkhat thatin pawlkhat na khailum ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte na kikhopna innte uhah na sat ding uh a, khua khat pan khua khatah na bawlsia ding uh hi.

Tua banga na bawl manun midikpa Abel sisan a kipan biakinnpi le biaknatau kikal a na thah uh Berechiah tapa Zechariah sisan dongin leitung a na luansak uh midikte sisan khempeuh note tungah hong kisik ding hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih thu khempeuh tulai khang mite tungah a hong tung ding hi.
“Kamsangte that a, no kianga hong kisawl mite a denglum den Jerusalem khuapi, Jerusalem khuapi aw, aakpi in a note a khanuai ah a huai bangin na tate ka huainop hangin na ut kei hi.
En un, na innte uh kilawi dinga, gamkhing a suak ding hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, ‘Topa min tawh hong paipa in thupha ngah tahen,’ na cih mateng in tu a kipan in kei nong mu nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin biakinnpi huang sung pan Zeisu a paikhiat laitak biakinnpi innte a lak dingin a nungzuite a hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih na khempeuh mu hilo na hi uh hiam? Aman takpi kong cih in ah, suang khat tungah suang khat nangawn kiciang nawnlo in kiphelkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tanluan mualtung ah Zeisu a tut laitak in, a nungzuite kia hong pai uh a, “Hih thute cik ciangin hong piang dinga, nong pai nading le hun bei nading theihsakna bang lim tawh hong kilang ding ahi hiam hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Kuamah in a hong khem loh nadingin na kidawm un.
Keima minin mi tampi hong pai dinga, ‘Keimah in Khazih ka hi hi,’ ci in mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.

Gal kidona thu le gal hong tung ding hi cih thuthangte na za ding uh hi. Tua ciangin patau kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu khempeuh a pian loh a phamawh hi a, ahi zongin beina a tung nai kei ding hi.
Minam khat le minam khat, kumpigam khat le kumpigam khat hong kido ding uh hi. Kialpi le pulnatnate hong tung ding hi. Mun tuamtuam ah zin hong ling ding hi.
Hihte khempeuh in nausuah kuana natna tawh a kibang haksatna kipatna ahi hi.
“Tua ciangin bawlsiatna thuak dingin note hong ap ding uh a, hong that ding uh hi. Keima min hangin minam khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi tampi lungkia ding uh a, khat le khat kilehhek in a kimudah ding uh hi.
Kamsangzuau tampi hong piang dinga, mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
Siatna hong khang dinga, mi tampi in ki‑itna a nei nawn kei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin a tawp donga a kipte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
Minam khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian kumpigam lungdamna thu leitung khempeuh ah kitangko dinga, tua khit ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
“Kamsangpa Daniel in, ‘a lipkhaphuai siatna,’ thu tawh kisai gen khin hi. Tua mipa in biakinnpi a Mun Siangtho ah a din hun na muh uh ciangin (a sim mi in thei tahen),
Judea gam sunga om mite mualtung ah tai uh hen.
Innkhum zanga om mite zong na khatpeuh a la dingin inn sungah kumsuk kei uh hen.
Lokuante zong puan la dingin inn ah ciahkik kei uh hen.
Tua hun ciangin naupaaite le nawine lai naungek a nei nupite a genthei mahmah ding uh hi!
Na tai hun uh phalbi laitak le Sabbath ni ahih khakloh nadingin thungen un.
Banghang hiam cihleh leitung piancil a kipan tudong in a piang ngei nailo tunung ciangin zong a piang ngei nawnlo ding gimna lianpi tua hun ciangin a piang ding hi.
Pasian in tua nite a tomsak kei leh kuamah a suakta zo kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a teelsa mite a khualna in tua nite a tomsak ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin mi khatpeuh in, ‘En in, hihlai ah Khazih a om hi. Hualai ah Khazih a om hi,’ a hong cih uh hangin um kei un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih maanlote le kamsangzuaute a hong piang ding hi. Amaute in hi thei hi leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khem zawh nadingun limlamdang le nalamdang lianpite a piangsak ding uh hi.
Theita un, a hun hong tunma in kong genkhol zo hi.
“Amaute in, ‘En un, amah gamlak ah om hi!’ a hong cih uh hangin zui kei un. ‘En un, amah inndeite sungah om hi!’ a hong cih uh hangin um kei un.
Banghang hiam cihleh nisuahna lam panin khua hong phia a, nitumna dong a tansuak bangin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin tua bangin a piang ding hi.
Misi luang omna peuh ah musanete a kikhawm ding uh hi.
“Tua gimna lianpi hun a bei khit phetin, Ni hong mial dinga, Kha a tang nawn kei ding hi. Van panin aksite hong kia dinga, Vantung nate kiling ding hi.

“Tua laitak in vantung ah Mihing Tapa tawh kisai limlamdang hong kilang dinga, leitung minam khempeuh a kap ding uh hi. Mihing Tapa vantung panin vangliatna le minthanna lianpi tawh meiitung tuanga hong pai a mu ding uh hi.
Amah in a ngaih mahmah pengkul aw tawh ama vantungmite sawl dinga, amaute in lei kiuli le van mong khat pan mong khat donga om a teelsa mite a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
“Theikung tawh kong gentehna panin hih thu na thei un. Theikung a hiangte dawn a, a tehte hong sel ciangin khuakhal hong naita hi ci in na thei uh hi.
Tuamah bangin hih thu khempeuh a hong piang na muh uh ciangin tua hun nai mahmah ta‑a kongbiang dong a hong tungta hi ci in na thei un.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tulai khang mite a beima teitei in hih thu khempeuh a hong piang ding hi.
Van le lei mangthang dinga, ahi zongin ka thute a mangthang peuhmah kei ding hi.
“A ni le a nai ding kuamah in a thei kei hi. Vana om vantungmite in zong a thei kei uh hi. Ka Pa bekin a thei hi.
Noah hun lai bangin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin zong tua bang hi ding hi.
Tuiciin tunma a mite in Noah tembaw sungah a lut ni ciangdong, zukham ankham, kipi kiteeng in a om uh hi.
Tuiciin tunga amaute khempeuh a tupmang dongin khuaphawk loin a om uh hi. Mihing Tapa a hong pai ciangin zong tuamah bangin a piang ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin lokuan mi nih khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
An sukhawm numei nih khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
“Na Topa uh hong pai ding hun thei lo na hih manun kiging den un.
Inn neipa in gutapa hong pai ding hun thei leh na pangkhol dinga, a inn luhsak lo ding hi cih thei un.
Tua ahih ciangin na lamet loh laitak un Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahih manin note zong kigingsa in om un.
“Innsung vai khempeuh hawm a, annek huna innsung mite an manman in a pia dinga a topa in a koih, a muanhuai le a pil nasem kua ahi hiam?
A topa hong pai ciangin nasem in a om a muh tua nasempa in thupha ngah ahi hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, amah in a neihsa khempeuh tua nasempa a uksak ding hi.
Ahih hangin a hoihlo nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong zekai lai ding hi,’ ci in ngaihsun henla,
a naseppih a lawmte satgawp in, zukhamte tawh nekhawm dawnkhawm in na om leh,
a lametloh ni le a theihloh kalin a topa hong tung vat ding hi.
A topa in amah tumnih suahin a kineihkhem mite tawh a thuakkhawmsak ding hi. Tualai ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi,” a ci hi.
“Tua banah, vantung kumpigam in zipipa dawn dinga a kuankhia meivak a tawi nungak siangtho sawmte tawh kibang hi.
Tuate lakah ngate pil uh a, a dang ngate a hai uh hi.
A hai ngate in meivak a ken uh hangin meitui a keng kei uh hi.
A pil ngate in ahih leh meivak a ken mah bangun meitui zong thawl sungah a keng uh hi.
Ahih hangin zipipa hong tung hak ahih manin amaute khempeuh lusu in a ihmu uh hi.
“Zankim laitak in kikona aw khat hong ging a, ‘Ngai un, zipipa hong paikhia ta hi. Amah dawn dingin hong pai un,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ciangin tua nungak siangthote a vekpi un tho in a meivak ciat uh vak dingin a kipan uh hi.
A haite in a pilte kiangah, ‘Ka meitui uh bei ahih manin na meitui uh hong hawm un,’ a ci uh hi.
“A pilte in, ‘Kong hawm zo kei ding uh hi. Ko aa ding le no aa ding kicing lo ding ahih manin meitui zuakte kiangah pai in va lei un,’ a ci uh hi.
“Amaute meitui lei dingin a pai kal un zipipa hong tung hi. Kigingsa a om mite zipipa tawh mopawi bawlna sungah lutkhawm uha tua ciangin kong a kikhak hi.
“Tua khit ciangin nungak siangtho dangteng hong tungkik uh a, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw, kong hong hon in,’ a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, ‘Aman takpi kong cih in ah, note kong thei kei hi,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin, Mihing Tapa hong pai ding a ni le a nai thei lo na hih manun kigingkhol tawntung un,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Vantung kumpigam in a nasemte sama a neihsa teng a ap khit ciangin khual gamlapi ah a zinkhia mipa tawh kibang hi.
Amah in amaute siamna zui in khatpa talentɠ nga, khatpa talent nih, a dang khatpa talent khat a piak khit ciangin a zinkhia hi.
Talentɠ nga a sangpa in a metbawl ciangin a met talent nga a ngah hi.
Tuamah bangin talentɠ nih a sangpa in zong a met talent nih a ngah hi.
Ahih hangin talentɠ khat a sangpa in leito in a topa sum a phum hi.
“Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte topa hong ciah a, a sum sazian a sit hi.
Talentɠ nga a sangpa in a dang talent nga hong tawi a, ‘Topa aw, sum talent nga nong ap hi. En in, a met talent nga ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
“A topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi. A muanhuai nasem hoihpa aw, a tawmno khat tungah citak na hih manin na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Na topa tawh hong lungdamkhawm in,’ a ci hi.
“Talentɠ nih a sangpa zong hong pai a, ‘Topa aw, sum talent nih nong ap hi. En in, a met talent nih ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
“A topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi. A muanhuai nasem hoihpa aw, a tawmno khat tungah citak na hih manin na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Na topa tawh hong lungdamkhawm in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua khit ciangin talentɠ khat a sangpa hong pai a, ‘Topa aw, khaici na tuh lohna munah an na la a, khaici na theh lohna munah an a kaikhawm, migenhak na hih lam kong thei hi.
Tua ahih manin kong kihta a, lei sungah na sum ka phum hi. En in, na sum hihlai ah a om hi,’ a ci hi.
“A topa in, ‘A gilo le a thadah nasempa aw, khaici ka tuh lohna munah an la in, ka theh lohna munah an ka kaihkhop lam hong thei na hih leh,
summet bawlte kiangah ka sum na ap beek leteh kong tun ciangin ka sum le a met ka ngahkhawm thei ding hi.
‘Tua ahih ciangin ama tunga om talentɠ khat pen la unla talent sawm a neipa pia un.
Banghang hiam cihleh a neite kipiak beh dinga, kicingtak in a nei ding uh hi. A neilote ahih leh a neih sunsun nangawn uh a kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
Tua ahih manin kimanna a neilo tua nasempa a pualam khuamial sungah paikhia un. Tualai ah kahna le hagawina om ding hi,’ a ci hi.
“Mihing Tapa in a minthanna le ama vantungmi siangthote khempeuh tawh hong pai ciangin ama minthanna kumpi tokhom tungah a hong tu ding hi.
Tua ciangin ama mai ah minam khempeuh kikhawmsak dinga, tuucingpa in tuu le kel a khen bangin amaute a khen ding hi.
Tuute a taklam ah kelte a veilam ah a koih ding hi.
“Tua khit ciangin Kumpipa in a taklam a omte kiangah, ‘Ka Pa thupha piakte aw, hong pai unla leitung piancil a kipan note aa dingin a kibawlkholsa kumpigam hong luah un.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial lai in an nong pia uh hi. Ka dangtak lai in ka dawn ding tui nong pia uh a, khualzin mi ka hihlai in zin nong do uh hi.
Puan neilo a ka omlai in puansilh nong pia uh hi. Ka cinat lai in nong veh uha thong ka kiat lai in nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
“Tua ciangin midikte in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial lam cik in hong mu a, an hong pia ka hi uh hiam? Na dangtak lam cik in hong mu a, na dawn ding tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
Khualzin mi na hih lam cik in hong mu a, zin hong do ka hi uh hiam? Puan na neih loh lam cik in hong mu a, puansilh hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
Na cinat, na thongkiat cik in hong mu a, hong veh ka hi uh hiam?’ ci in a dawng ding uh hi.
“Tua ciangin Kumpipa in, ‘Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat tunga na bawl peuhmah uh kei tunga hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci in a dawng ding hi.
“Tua khit ciangin a veilam a omte kiangah, ‘Samsiatna a ngah mite aw, ka kiang panin paikhia un. Dawimangpa le a pawlte aa dingin a kibawlkholsa, a kuang tawntung meilipi sungah pai un.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial lai in an nong pia kei uha ka dangtak lai in dawn ding tui nong pia kei uh hi.
Khualzin mi ka hihlai in zin nong do kei uha, puan neilo a ka omlai in puansilh nong pia kei uh hi. Ka cinat lai le thong ka kiat lai in zong nong veh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.

“Tua ciangin amaute in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial lai, na dangtak lai, khualzin mi na hihlai, puan neilo a na omlai, na cinat lai le na thongkiat laitak cik in hong mu a, hong don kha lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
“Tua ciangin Kumpipa in, ‘Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih mite a neupen khat tungah na bawlloh khempeuh uh, kei tungah zong a hong bawl lo na hi uh hi,’ ci in a dawng ding hi.
“Tua ciangin a tawntung daantatna a thuak dingin amaute paikhia ding uha midikte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna munah a pai ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in hih thute khempeuh a gen khit ciangin, a nungzuite kiangah,
“Ni nih khit ciangin Paisan Pawi hong tung ding hi cih na thei uh hi. Tua ni ciangin khailup dingin Mihing Tapa a kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le Judah mite makaite, Siampi Ukpa Caiaphas inntual ah a kikhawm uh hi.
Amaute in thukawi, thuzuau tawh Zeisu manin thah ding a sawm uh hi.
Ahi zongin, “Mihonpi hong lungso kha ding uh ahih manin pawi hun sungin hih kei ni,” a kici uh hi.
Tu in, Bethany khua‑a teeng Simon miphakpa a kici pa inn ah Zeisu an ne in a tut laitak,
numei khatin a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangkang thawl khat tawi in hong pai a, Zeisu lutung ah a buak hi.
Ahih hangin a nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin lungkim lo uh a, “Banghang in hih sathau namtui tuaci thangbawl ahi hiam?
Sum tampi tawh zuak in mizawngte kipia zaw leh,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in tua thu a theih ciangin amaute kiangah, “Numeinu bang nopmawh laizang na hi uh hiam? Amah in kei tungah na hoih khat hong bawl khin hi.
Mizawngte note tawh omden uh a, kei ka hih leh note tawh ka omkhawm den kei ding hi.
Amah in ka pumpi hih sathau namtui hong buah pen a kivui ding ka pumpi hong puahkhol ahi hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih lungdamna thu a kitangkona leitung mun khempeuh ah hih numeinu a kiphawk nadingin kei tungah a hong bawlna zong a kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin sawltak sawm le nihte lakah Judas Iscariot kici pa siampi liante kiangah va pai a,
“Note khutah amah hong pia hi leng kei bang hong pia ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in nguntang 30 piak dingin a kithukim uh hi.
Tua huna kipan in Judas in Zeisu a lehhek nading hun hoih a zong hi.
Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi a kipat ni in nungzuite Zeisu kiangah hong pai uh a, “Paisan Pawi an na nek nading koilai ah hong bawlkholhsak le ung na ut hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Khua sungah va pai unla, kong gensa mipa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka hun hong naita ahih manin ka nungzuite tawh na inn ah Paisan Pawi ka bawl ding hi,” ci hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in Zeisu cih bangin hih uha Paisan Pawi an a baihsa in a koih uh hi.
Nitak hong tun ciangin sawm le nihte tawh Zeisu a tukhawm hi.
Amaute in an a nek laitak un amah in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, note lakah khatin kei nong lehhek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute dah mahmah uh a, ama kiangah, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” ci in a dong ciat uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Ankuang ka sawkkhoppih pa in kei a hong lehhek ding hi.

Lai Siangtho sungah ama thu a kigelhsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi! Tua pa mihing in a piangkhia lo hivet leh ama aa dingin hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah a lehhekpa Judas in, “Rabbi aw, kei ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin amah in, “Na cih bangin na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in an a nek laitak un, Zeisu in anlum la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkham in, “La unla, ne un. Hih in ka pumpi ahi hi,” ci in nungzuite a pia hi.
Hai zong la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin, “Na vekpi un dawn un.
Hih in mi tampi mawhna a mai nadinga a luangkhia, kiciamna thak ka sisan ahi hi.
Note kong gen in ah ka Pa kumpigam sungah note tawh lenggahtui a thak ka dawn ni mateng in tu a kipan ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” ci in a pia hi.
Amaute in la khat a sak khit uh ciangin Tanluan mual zuanin a paikhia uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Tu zan ciangin keima hangin na vekpi un na puk ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Tuucingpa ka satlum dinga, Tuuhonte a kithehthang ding uh hi,’ ci in a kigelh hi.
“Ahih hangin ka thawhkik khit ciangin Galilee gamah note ma in ka na paikhol ding hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Nangma hangin mi khempeuh a puk zongin kei ka puk ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tuzan aak a khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm nading ahi zongin kong nial peuhmah kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Nungzui khempeuh in zong tua bangin a ci ciat uh hi.
Gethsemane kici munkhat ah Zeisu a tun ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Hua pam lamah thu ka va nget sungin hihlai ah na tu un,” a ci hi.
Amah in Peter le Zebedee tapa nihte tonpih a, nakpitak a dahna le lunggim a hong kipan hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “A si zo ding zahin ka lunggim lua mahmah hi. Hihlai ah om unla kei hong ngak un,” a ci hi.
Amah a gamla zawdeuh ah pai in boksuk a, “Ka Pa aw, hih hai tawh ka kipelh theih ding leh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin, kei deihna bang hilo in, nang deihna bang hizaw tahen,” ci in thu a ngen hi.
Nungzuite kiangah a va pai ciangin amaute ihmu a om a mu hi. Amah in Peter kiangah, “Nai khat sung nangawn hong ngak zolo na hi uh hiam?
Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun thungen unla kiging un. Lungsim a ut mahmah hangin pumpi a thanem hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nihveina thungen dingin va paikhiakik a, “Pa aw, hih hai kei tawh kipelh theilo a, ka dawn loh a phamawh ahih leh nangma deihna bang hi tahen,” a ci hi.
Amah a hong paikik ciangin nungzuite hak zo mahmah lo uh ahih manin ihmu in a om uh a mukik hi.
Tua ciangin amaute nusia in va paikhiakik a, a nget ngeiteng mah a thumveina a va ngen leuleu hi.
Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah hong pai a, “Note ihmumu lai, tawlnganga lai na hi uh hiam? En in, Mihing Tapa mawhneite khut sungah a kipiak ding hun hong tungta hi.
Tho unla pai ni. En un, kei hong lehhekpa a hong nai mahmah ta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua banga a gengen laitak in sawm le nihte lakah khat ahi Judas in siampi liante le Judah mite makaite in a sawl mihonkhat hong tonpih a, tua mite in namsau le molhtumte a tawi uh hi.
Amah a lehhekpa in mihonte kiangah, “Ka nap penpa amah ahi hi man pah un,” ci in a theihsak kholhsa ahi hi.
Amah in thakhat in Zeisu kiang hong naih a, “Rabbi aw, na dam hiam!” ci in a nam hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Lawm aw, bang hih dinga hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin mihonpi hong pai uha Zeisu manin a paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu tawh a omkhawmte khatin thakhat in a namsau dokin Siampi Ukpa nasempa a sat leh a bil a satkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua pa kiangah, “Na namsau a paai ah siatkik in. Namsau tawi peuhmah namsau mah tawh a si ding uh hi.
Tu mahmah in ka Pa kiangah a ngen theilo hong sa na hi uh hiam? Ngen leng vantungmi legionɠ sawm le nih sanga a tam zaw hong pia pah ding hi.
Tua bangin a ngen hi leng hih banga a piang dingin Lai Siangtho sunga kigensa thute koici tangtun thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua hun mahin Zeisu in mihonpite kiangah, “Guta buluh khat man ding bangin namsau le molhtum tawi in kei man dingin hong kuan na hi uh hiam? Biakinnpi huang sungah thuhilh in nisim in note tawh ka omkhawm a, ahih hangin nong man kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin kamsangte gelhsa Lai Siangtho a tangtun nadingin hihte khempeuh a sem na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin nungzuite khempeuh in amah nusia in a taikek uh hi.
Zeisu a mante in thukhamhilh siate le makaite kituahkhopna Siampi Ukpa Caiaphas kiangah amah a paipih uh hi.
Peter in Siampi Ukpa inntual dong a galzuih khit ciangin bang thu hong piang peuhmah hiam cih a en dingin huang sungah va lutin biakinn cingte tawh a tukhawm hi.
Siampi liante, makaite le thukhenteɠ khempeuh in Zeisu a thah theih nadingun zuauthu tawh thu a kawi zonzon uh hangin a mu zo kei uh hi.
A maanlo tecipang mitampi a hong pai uh hangin amah thah theih nading thu kician a mu zo kei uh hi. A tawpna ah a maanlo teci a pang mi nih hong pai uh a,
“Hihpa in, ‘Pasian biakinnpi susia in ni thum sungin ka lamkik zo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa dingto in Zeisu kiangah, “Bangmah dawng lo ding na hi hiam? Hih mite in nang hong mawhsak uh a, na langah hi zahta a teci a panna uh bang thu ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu a pau tuan kei hi. Siampi Ukpa in ama kiangah, “Pasian Tapa Khazih na hih leh na hih loh nong gen nadingin a nungta Pasian min tawh kong sawl hi!” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Na gen bangin ka hi hi. Ahi zongin, nang tungah kong genin Mihing Tapa in Vangliatna taklam ah tukawmsa in vana meii tungah a hong pai tunung ciangin na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa in a puan balkek a, “Hihpa Pasian tungah a pausia zo hi! Teci dang kisam lai ahi hiam? En un, Pasian tunga a pausiatna na za zo uh hi.
Bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A si dingin a kilawm hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin a maitang cilphih in a tumgawp uh hi. A dangte in a khutpek uh tawh a pang beng uh a,
“Tu‑a hong beng kua ahi hiam? Kamsanna tawh hong gen dih in, Khazih aw!” a ci uh hi.
Tua laitak in a pualam inntual ah Peter tu in a om hi. Nasem numeino khat ama kiangah va pai a, “Nang zong Galilee mi Zeisu tawh a kithuahpa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in, “Na thugen ka thei kei hi,” ci in amaute khempeuh mai ah a nial hi.
Amah paikhia in innlim ah a om laitak numeino dang khatin mu a, tualai a om mite kiangah, “Hihpa zong Nazareth khua mi Zeisu tawh a kithuah khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Tua pa ka thei kei hi!” ci in kiciam kawmin a nialkik hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin a gei‑a ding mite Peter kiangah hong pai in, “Nang zong amaute khat hingel teh, na awkaih in kithei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Tua pa ka theih ngeitak leh!” ci in kihamsiat in a kiciam hi. Tua khit phetin aak a khuang hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Aak a khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” ci a, Zeisu in ama kianga a gensa thu phawkkik a, a pua lamah paikhia in nakpitak in a kap hi.
A zingsang ciangin siampi liante le Judah mite makaite khempeuh in Zeisu a thah theih nadingun a vaihawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah henin paikhiatpih uha mangpipa Pontius Pilate khutah a piakhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin a lehhekpa Judas in sihna daan thuak dingin Zeisu tungah thu kikhen zo hi cih a theih ciangin khial kisa mahmah a, siampi liante le makaite kiangah nguntang 30 a va piakik hi.
Amah in, “Mawhneilopa lehhek kha ka hih manin ka khial zo hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Tua thu le ko bang kisai nawn ka hi uh hiam? Na suah nop peuh suah in,” a cihsan uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judas in a nguntang teng biakinnpi sungah pai a, paikhia in a gui‑awk hi.
Siampi liante in tua nguntang teng la uh a, “Hih sum sisan man ahih ciangin sumpi laka hel dingin kilawm lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua banga a kikup khit uh ciangin khualmite a kivui nading belsekpa leitang leina in a nei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin tua leitang pen tuni dongin Sisan Leitang, kici hi.
Hih in kamsangpa Jeremiah in a gensa thu a tangtunna ahi hi. Amah in, “Israel mite in ama man ding seh uha nguntang 30 a mansak uh hi.
Amaute in tua sum la uha Topa in kei hong lamlahna bangin belsekpa leitang man dingin a pia uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate mangpipa mai ah Zeisu dinga, mangpipa in, “Nang Judah mite Kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Zeisu in, “Na cih bangin ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi liante le makaite in amah a mawhmatna thu a gengen uh hangin kam khat beek a dawng kei hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in ama kiangah, “Hih zahta in nang hong langpan a a hong mawhmatna uh za lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawn loh ciangin mangpipa in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Paisan Pawi a tun sialin mangpipa in mipi deih thongkia khat peuhpeuh a khahkhiat zel pen ngeina khat ahi hi.
Tua laitak in Barabbas kici a gilo a minthang thongkiapa khat a om hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute a kikhop laitak un Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Barabbas le Khazih a kici Zeisu, kua zaw kong khahkhiat ding na deih uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in a hazat manun amah a piakkhiat uh ahihlam Pilate in a thei gige hi.

Thukhenna tokhom tungah Pilate a tut laitak in a zi in ama kiangah mi khat sawl a, “Tua midikpa tawh bangmah kisawh kha kei in. Tuzan ka mang sungah tua pa hangin gimna nakpi in ka thuak hi,” ci in a zasak hi.
Tu in siampi liante le makaite in Barabbas khah a Zeisu a kithah nading a ngen dingin mihonpi a holhthawh uh hi.
Mangpipa in, “Hih mi nihte kuapen hong khahsak leng na ut uh hiam?” ci in a dotkik ciangin amaute in, “Barabbas!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in, “Tua ahih leh Khazih a kici Zeisu bang ka cih ding hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute khempeuh in, “Singlamteh ah khailum in!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mangpipa in, “Amah in bang siatna bawl ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amaute in, “Singlamteh ah khailum in!” ci in nakpi in a kiko semsem uh hi.

Pilate in ama deihna lah tangtung lo, mipite zong hong so zaw semsem cih a muh ciangin tui la in mipi mai ah a khut sil a, “Hih midikpa sisan tungah kei ka siang hi. Na suahnop peuh uh suah un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, “Ama sisan phu ko le ka tu ka tate uh tungah hong tung tahen,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Pilate in Barabbas khahsak a, Zeisu ahih leh a satsak khit ciangin khailup dingin a piakhia hi.
Tua ciangin galkapte in mangpipa inn ah Zeisu paipih uha galkaphonɠ teng zong ama kiangah a kikhawm uh hi.
Amaute in Zeisu puan a suahsak khit uh ciangin puantual san khat a silhsak uh hi.

A kumpi lukhu dingin linglukhu bawl in khusak uh a, a taklam khutah pumpeng ciang khat a tawisak uh hi. Tua khit ciangin ama mai ah khukdin in, “Judah mite Kumpipa aw, na ci dam tahen!” ci in a zahko uh hi.
Tua ciangin cilphih uh a, a pumpeng tawi la in a lutang a sat uh hi.
A zahko khit uh ciangin a puantual suahkhiatsak in ama puante a silhsakkik uh hi. Tua khit ciangin khailup dingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
Tua banga a paikhiat laitak un Simon kici Cyrene khua mi khat tawh kituak uha zawhthawh thu tawh Zeisu singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
Lutangguh Mun cih khiatna nei, Golgotha kici mun a tun uh ciangin,
a dawn dingin tuikha a kihel lenggahtui thuk a pia uh hi. Amah in tawm ciam a ahih hangin a dawn nuam kei hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in singlamteh tungah khai uh a, lai‑aisan in a puante a hawm uh hi. Tua in, “Amaute in ka puante hawm uha, Ka puansilh a ngah nadingun lai‑ai a san uh hi,” ci a, kamsangpa gensa thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
Amaute in tua munah tusuk in Zeisu a en uh hi.
A lu tungah, “HIHPA IN JUDAH MITE KUMPIPA ZEISU AHI HI,” ci in mawhmatna lai khat a suang uh hi.
Misuamte nih zong a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat amah tawh a kikhaikhawm hi.
Tua mun tawna a pai mite in amah zahko in a lu uh peisan in,
“Biakinnpi susia a, ni thum sunga a lamkik ding pa aw, nang le nang kihonkhia in! Pasian Tapa na hih leh singlamteh tung panin hong kumkhia in,” a ci uh hi.
Siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le makaite in zong tuamah bangin a zahko uh hi.
Amaute in, “Amah in midangte hon zo napi amah le amah a kihonkhia zo kei hi. Israelte Kumpipa ahih takpi leh singlamteh tung panin tu in hong kumkhia hen. Tua hi leh amah i um ding hi.
Amah in Pasian muang in, ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi hi,’ ci ahih manin Pasian in a hotkhiat nop leh tu in honkhia tahen,” a ci uh hi.
Amah tawh a kikhaikhawm misuamte in zong tuamah bangin a zahko uh hi.
Tu in, nai guk a kipan nai kua ciangdong leitung bup ah khimpi a zing hi.
Nai kua pawlin Zeisu nakpi in kiko a, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani,” a ci hi. Tua in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, banghang in hong nusia na hi hiam?” a cihna ahi hi.
Tua muna a ding mi pawlkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “Hihpa in Elijah sam hi!” a ci uh hi.
Amaute lak panin thakhat in mi khat va tai a, tuihupna khat la in lenggahtui thuk sungah a diah khit ciangin pumpeng dawn ah suangin a dawn dingin a tahto hi.
A dangte in, “Hi ci omsak phot dih un. Amah hon dingin Elijah hong pai hiam en dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
Nakpitak in Zeisu a kikokik khit ciangin a huu tawpna a sangkhia hi.
Tua ciangin, en in, biakinnpi sunga kideina puan a lu pan a taw dong kikek in phelnih a kisuah hi. Zin zong lingin suangtumte kitam a,
hante zong kihong in a ihmu khinsa misiangtho tampite kithokiksak hi.
Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin amaute han sung pan hong pusuakkhia uha khuapi siangtho sungah lutin mi tampi kiangah a kilang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu a cing galkap 100 ukpa le a lawmte in zinling le thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in Pasian Tapa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu panpih in a zui Galilee gam pana numei tampite in zong amah a galet uh hi.
Tuate lakah Magdala khua mi Mary, James le Joses‑te nu Mary a kipan Zebedee tate nu zong a om hi.
Nitak lam ciangin Joseph a kici Arimathea khua‑a mihaupa khat a hong pai hi. Amah zong Zeisu nungzui khat ahi hi.
Pilate kiangah amah va pai‑a Zeisu luang a ngen hi. Tua ciangin amah piak dingin Pilate in thu a pia hi.
Joseph in Zeisu luang lakhia in puanpak siangtho tawh a tun hi.
Tua khit ciangin suang a kikhuak ama bawlsa han thak sungah sial a, suangtumpi khat khuk in hankong a khak khit ciangin a ciah hi.
Magdala khua mi Mary le Mary a dang khat zong han lam nga in a tu uh hi.
A zingciang ahi Kigin Niɠ in siampi liante le Pharisee pawlte Pilate kiangah a va kikhawm uh hi.
Amaute in, “Sia aw, tua zuau genpa in a nuntak lai in, ‘Ni thum khit ciangin ka thokik ding hi,’ ci a, a gen thu ka phawkkik uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ni thum sung ama han a kicin nadingin thu pia in. Tua hi kei leh a nungzuite zanin hong pai in a luang gukhia ding uha mite kiangah, ‘Misite lak panin amah thokik zo hi,’ a ci ding uh hi. Tua hi leh a masa khemna sangin a nunung khemna suksia zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Pilate in amaute kiangah, “A cing ding galkapte nei na hih uh ciangin pai unla na hih theih zahzah un a muanhuai theithei in bawl un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute pai in a muanhuai theithei in a han suangtumpi tungah ciaptehna khen uha a cing ding mi zong a koih uh hi.
Tu in Sabbath ni a bei khit nipi kal sunga ni masa pen ni zingsang phalvak tungin Magdala khua mi Mary le Mary dang khat daihawh dingin a pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin, en in, zin nakpi in hong ling hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Topa vantungmi khat vantung pan hong kumsuk a hankong hukna suangtumpi likkhia in a tungah a tu hi.
Ama mel khuaphialep tawh kibang in a puan vuk bangin a ngo hi.
Han cingte in amah kihta lua uh ahih manin linggawp uha misi tawh kibang uh hi.
Ahih hangin vantungmi in numeite kiangah, “Lau kei un. Singlamteh tunga a thah uh Zeisu a zong na hi uh hi cih kong thei hi.
A hong gensa bangin amah thokik zo ahih manin, hihlai ah om nawnlo hi. Hong pai unla, Topa luang kisialna mun hong en un.

Pai mengmeng unla a nungzuite kiangah, ‘Amah misite lak panin thokik zo hi. Galilee gamah amah na pai masa dinga, tualai ah na mu ding uh hi,’ ci in gen un. En un, hih thu note kiangah kong genzo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numeite lau le lungdam kawmsa in han pan ciah pah vingveng uha nungzuite kiangah tua thu a ko dingin a tai uh hi.
A nungzuite kiangah thuko dingin a pai laitak un, Zeisu in amaute na dawntuah a, “Lungdam un!” a ci hi. Amaute in Zeisu khe va kawi in amah a bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Lau kei un. Pai unla ka sanggamte kiangah, Galilee gamah hong pai le uh hong mu ding uh hi ci in va gen un,” a ci hi.
Numeite a pai laitak un hancingte pawlkhat khuapi sungah pai in thupiang khempeuh siampi liante kiangah a va ko uh hi.
Siampi liante in zong makaite kaikhawm in thu a kikup khit uh ciangin galkapte sum tampi pia uh a,
“ ‘Zan ka ihmut kal un a nungzuite hong pai in a luang na gukhia uh hi,’ ci in hong gen un.
Hih thu mangpipa in a zak leh zong amah ka na lungkimsak ding uha note kong sukhasak kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin galkapte in zong a sumteng la in a kisawl bangin a gen uh hi. Amau thugen bangin hih thu Judah mite lakah tuni dongin a kigen lai hi.
Tua khit ciangin nungzui sawm le khatte Galilee gama Zeisu vaikhakna mualah pai uha
amah a muh uh ciangin a bia uh hi. Ahih hangin pawlkhatte a lunghiang lai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu hong pai in amaute kiangah, “Vantung le leitung a om thuneihna khempeuh kei a hong kipia zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla minam khempeuh ka nungzuite na suahsak khit uh ciangin Pa, Tapa le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui na phum un.
Note kong piaksa thu khempeuh a zuih nadingun hilh un. En un, hun a bei dongin note kong ompih tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi. Amen.
Pasian Tapa Zeisu Khazih lungdamna thu a kipatna in hih bang ahi hi.
Kamsangte laibu sungah, “En in, nangma lampi a sialkhol dingin, Na mai ah ka kamtaipa ka sawl hi.
Gamlak a kikopa awging in, ‘Topa pai nading lam na sial unla, Ama lampite na tangsak un,’ a ci hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
John in gamlak ah mite tuiphum a, mawhmaisak nadingin kisikkikna thu tawh kisai tuiphumna thu a hilh hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem khua mite a kipan Judea gama om mi khempeuh ama kiangah hong pai in a mawhnate uh pulak uh a, John in Jordan gunah amaute tui a phum hi.
Tu in John in kala‑oh mul kigan puan silhin, savun kawnggak tawh a kawng gak a, kauphe le gamlak khuaizu tawh a kivak hi.
Amah in, “Kei sanga a vanglian zaw khat hong pai lai ding hi. Kunsuk a a khedapkhau sut ding nangawn in ka kilawm kei hi.
En in keimah in note tui ah kong phum a, ahih hangin amah in note Kha Siangtho tawh a hong phum ding hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
Tua hun laitak in Galilee gam Nazareth khua panin Zeisu hong pai a, John in Jordan gun sungah a tuiphum hi.
Tuisung pan a hong paikhiat phetin van kihong a, Kha in vakhu bangin ama tungah hong kumsuk John in a mu hi.
Tua ciangin van panin aw khat hong ging a, “Nangmah in hong lungdamsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit phetin Kha in gamlak ah Zeisu a sawlkhia pah hi.
Gamlak ah ni 40 sung Zeisu omin Satan ze‑etna thuak a, gamsate tawh a omkhawm hi. Tua khit ciangin vantungmite in amah a kem uh hi.
Thong sungah John a kikhum khit ciangin Galilee gamah Zeisu pai in Pasian kumpigam tawh kisai lungdamna thu a tangko inah,
“A hun hong tungzo a, Pasian kumpigam hong tungta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla lungdamna thu um un,” ci in a gen hi.
Galilee tuili gei ah Zeisu a pai laitak in Simon le a sanggampa Andrew tuili sungah ngen khuh a om a mu hi. Amaute ngabeng mi ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ka nung hong zui un. Mi a mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in thakhat in a ngen uh nusia in Zeisu nung a zui pah uh hi.
Tua mun pan tawmvei sung a pai khit uh ciangin Zebedee tate ahi James le a sanggampa John zong a mu hi. Amaute gunkuang sungah ngen khui a om a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute a sam pah hi. Amaute in a cial uh nasemte le a pa uh Zebedee gunkuang sungah nusia in Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute Capernaum khua ah pai uh a, Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn ah Zeisu lut pahin thu a hilh hi.
Amah in thukhamhilh siate hilh bangin hilh loin thuneipa bangin hilh ahih manin a thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Tu in amaute kikhopna inn sungah dawigilo a vei mi khat a om hi.

Amah kiko in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu aw, komau thuthu in hong omsak in. Ko le nang bang kisai i hi hiam? Kote susia dinga hong pai na hi hiam? Nang kua na hi hiam cih kong thei uh a, Pasian mi Siangthopa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Pau kei in, ama sung pan paikhia in!” ci in a tai hi.
Dawigilo in zong tua pa kongkawsak a, tua khit ciangin nakpitak in kiko a, tua pa sung pan a paikhia hi.

Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Bang thu bang la hi zawzen hiam? Hih thuhilhna thak a bangci thu hi peuhmah hiam? Thuneihna tawh amah in dawigilote thu a piak ciangin ama thuthu a mang uh hi,” ci in khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Galilee gam kim le pam tengah ama thu a kizel pah hi.
Tu in kikhopna inn pan a paikhiat khit phetun Simon le Andrew‑te inn sungah James le John tawh Zeisu a lut hi.
Simon sunghnu nattun in lum ahih manin Zeisu kiangah a ko pah uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah hong pai in tua nu a khut lenin a phot leh a cisa bei pahin tua nu in amaute zin a do hi.
Nitak lam ni a tum khit ciangin cina khempeuh le dawilut mite Zeisu kiangah a hong puak uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin a khuazang un kongpi gei ah hong kikhawm ngeingai uh a,
Zeisu in natna tuamtuam a vei mi tampi damsak in dawi tampi a hawlkhia hi. Dawite in Zeisu thei uh ahih manin amah in amaute kam khat beek a pausak kei hi.
Zingsang khua a vakma in Zeisu tho a, gamdaihna mun khatah pai in thu a ngen hi.
Tua kalin Simon le a lawmte in amah a zong uh hi.
Amaute in Zeisu a muh uh ciangin ama kiangah, “Mi khempeuh in nang hong zong uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Thu ka hilh theih nadingin hih kima om khua dangdangte ah zong pai ni. Banghang hiam cihleh hih na sem ding maha hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Galilee gam kikhopna inn khempeuh ah thu hilhin dawite a hawlkhia hi.
Tua laitak in miphak khat Zeisu kiangah hong pai a, Zeisu mai ah khukdin in, “Hong damsak nuam lecin nong damsak thei hi,” ci in a thum hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua pa hehpihhuai sa ahih manin a khut zanin lawng a, “Kong damsak nuam hi. Damta in,” a ci hi.
Tua bang a cih khit phetin thakhat in tua pa tung panin phaknatna paikhia in a dam pah hi.
Zeisu in tua pa khauhtak in thu a piak khit ciangin ciahsak pah a,

“Hih thu kuama kiangah gen peuhmah kei in. Ahi zongin, pai inla siampipa kiangah va kilak in. Damna ngah na hih manin Moses hong thupiak bangin biakna va pia in. Tua in amaute tunga teci panna a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin tua pa paikhia in tua thu genthang in a kizelsak mang hi. Tua ahih manin Zeisu a kilang in khua sungah lut thei nawnlo a, khuanawl gamlak peuh ah om hi napi mun khempeuh panin mite in ama kiang hong zuan veve uh hi.
Tua khit a sawtlo in Capernaum khua ah Zeisu paikik a, amah inn sungah om hi cih thu mite in a za uh hi.
Kongkhak gei dong nangawn ah om nading omlo zahdong in mi tampi thakhat in hong kikhawm uh a, Zeisu in amaute thu a hilh hi.
Tua laitak in mi li in pumzaw mi khat hong pua uha ama kiangah hong paipih uh hi.
Mihonpi hangin amaute in Zeisu kiang naih theilo uh ahih manin ama omna tungsan innkhum phelkhia in tua panin pumzawpa a lupna tawh a khaisuk uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute upna a muh ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua laitak a tu thukhamhilh siate pawlkhat in amaute lungsim sungah,
“Banghang in hihpa in hih bangin Pasian tungah pausia ahi hiam? Pasian longal kua in mawhna maisak thei ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua banga a ngaihsut lam uh Zeisu in a lungsim sungah thei pah a, “Banghang in tua bangin note lungsim sungah ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
Pumzawpa kiangah, ‘Na mawhnate hong kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding leh, ‘Tho in, na lupna pua inla kalsuan in,’ cih ding koi baih zaw ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitung ah mawhmaisak theihna thuneihna a neih lam na theih nading uh ahi hi,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah,
“Tho in, na lupna pua inla na inn ah ciah in kong ci hi,” ci in a sawl hi.
Tua pa thakhat in tho a, a lupna pua in amaute khempeuh muhin a paikhia hi. Tua mite khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hih bang mahmah khatvei beek i mu ngei kei hi!” ci in Pasian a phat uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin tuili gei ah Zeisu paikhiakik in ama kiangah mipi khempeuh hong kikhawm uh a, amah in amaute thu a hilh hi.
Amah lam a pai laitak in Alphaeus tapa Levi siahdonna buuk sungah tu‑a om a muh ciangin, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Levi zong dingto in a zui hi.

Tu in, Levi inn ah an ne dingin Zeisu a tut laitak in, siahdongte le mawhneite tampitak in zong Zeisu le a nungzuite tawh ankuang a umkhawm uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tualai ah tua bang mi tampi in amah a zui uh hi.

Pharisee pawlte le thukhamhilh siate in siahdongte le mawhneite tawh an nekhawm in a om Zeisu a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Banghang in amah in siahdongte le mawhneite tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Zeisu in tua thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cinate bekin kisam uh hi. Midikte sam dinga hong pai ka hi kei a, mawhneite a kisikkik nadingun a sam dingin hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

John nungzuite le Pharisee‑te nungzuite in an a tang uh hi. Tua khit ciangin amaute Zeisu kiangah pai uh a, “John nungzuite le Pharisee‑te nungzuite in antang napi uh banghang in na nungzuite in antang lo uh ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Zipipa in a lawm a gualte a ompih laitak in amaute in antang thei ding uh ahi hiam? A ompih laiteng an a tang thei kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin zipipa a kilakkhiat hun hong tung dinga, tua hun ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
“Kuamah in puan lui kek puan thak tawh a phop kei hi. Tua bangin phop leh puan thak in puan lui kaikek in, a kekna a zai semsem ding hi.

Kuamah in savun um lui sungah lenggahtui thak a thun kei uh hi. Tua bangin kithun leh lenggahtui thakin savun um lui phukham in lenggahtui teng buakhia dinga, savun um lui zong a kisia ding hi. Lenggahtui thak pen savun um thak sunga thun ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in Sabbath ni in buhlei sung tawnin Zeisu a pai laitak in a nungzuite in buhvuite a zut uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee‑te in ama kiangah, “En in, banghang in Sabbath ni in amaute in thukham tawh kituak loin gamta uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Siampi Abiathar a khanlai in, David le a lawmte gilkial in a cimawh ngei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah Pasian inn sungah lutin siampite longal midangte nek theih ding a hilo Ompihna Anlumte ne in, a lawmte zong a piak thu sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni pen mite aa dinga kibawl hi a, mite pen Sabbath ni aa dinga kibawl hilo hi.
Tua ahih manin Mihing Tapa in Sabbath Ukpa zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin kikhopna inn sungah Zeisu lutkik a, tualai ah khut langkhat a si mi khat a om hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu a mawhmat theih nadingun Sabbath ni in tua mipa a damsak peuhmah hiam ci in a en gige uh hi.
Zeisu in khutsi mipa kiangah, “Ding inla, hong pai in,” a ci hi.

Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni in a pha bawlhuai hiam a sia bawlhuai hiam? Nuntakna khat hotkhiathuai hiam thahhuai hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Ahih hangin amaute pau loin a dai khipkhep uh hi.

Amaute lungkhauhna hangin Zeisu in heh le dah thuah a, a kim a pam teng a ban et khit ciangin tua mipa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci in a sawl hi. Amah in a zankhiat leh a lang khat lam mah bangin a dam hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee pawlte paikhia in Herod pawlte tawh amah a suksiat theih nading uh thakhat in a vaihawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu a nungzuite tawh tuili lamah kihemkhia a, Galilee gam le Judea gam pana hong pai mi tampite in amah a zui uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi, Idumia gam Jordan gungal khat pan le Tyre le Sidon khuakim panin mi tampite in Zeisu nasep tampite a zak uh ciangin ama kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonpite in amah a phut khakloh nadingin gunkuang neu khat ama aa dingin a koihkholh nadingun a nungzuite a sawl hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mi tampi damsak ahih manin cina luna a om zahzah amah lawng kha nuamin a kiphu gawp uh hi.
Dawigilote in amah a muh uh ciangin, a mai ah pukin, “Nang in Pasian Tapa na hi hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Ahi zongin, Zeisu in ama thu kuamah a theihsak loh nading uh khauhtak in a kham hi.
Zeisu in mualtung ah kahto in ama mi deihteng sam a, amaute zong ama kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in amah tawh a omkhawm ding le thuhilh a a sawlkhiat theih ding mi sawm le nih a seh hi.
Natna a damsak theih nading uh le dawite a hawlkhiat theih nadingun thuneihna a pia hi.
Tua mite in, Zeisu in Peter ci a, min thak a phuahsakpa Simon,
Zebedee tapa James, le ama min thak dingin “Vanging Tate” cih khiatna a nei Boanerges cih min a phuah Zebedee tapa James sanggampa John,
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James, Thaddaeus, Cana khua mi Simon, le
amah a lehhekpa Judas Iscariot‑te ahi uh hi. (19) Tua khit ciangin amaute inn khatah a lut uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonpite khatvei hong kikhawmkik uh ahih manin amaute in an nangawn ne manlo uh hi.
Ahih hangin ama innkuanpihte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin mihai tawh kibang sa uh ahih manin a pummat dingin a kuan uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi pana hong paisuk thukhamhilh siate in, “Ama sungah Beelzebubɠ lut a, tua dawi mangpipa min suangin dawite a hawlkhia ahi hi,” a cihsan uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute samin thugentehna tawh thu a hilh in ah, “Satan in bangci bangin Satan hawlkhia thei ding ahi hiam?
Gam khat peuhmah kiphelkhap leh tua gam ding zolo ding hi.
Innkuan khat a kiphelkhap leh zong tua innkuan ding zolo ding hi.
Satan amah le amah kido in kiphelkhap leh ding zolo dinga beimang ding hi.
Mi thahatpa hencip masa loin kuamah in ama inn sungah lutin a neihsate a laksak zo kei ding hi. Amah a kihencip khit ciang bekin a inn a kiluh zo pan ding hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mihingte mawhna khempeuh le Pasian tunga pausiatnate a kimaisak ding hi.
Ahih hangin Kha Siangtho tunga a pausiate cikmah hunin kimaisak lo dinga, tawntung gimna a thuak ding uh hi,” ci in a gen hi.
“Ama sungah dawigilo lut hi,” ci in ngawh uh ahih manin amah in hih thugentehna tawh a hilh ahi hi.
Tua laitak in a nu le a naute ama kiangah hong pai uh a, amah a sam ding mi sawlin inn pualam ah a ngak uh hi.
Ama kim ah mihonpite a tu uh hi. Amah a samte in, “En in, na nu le na naute in innpua lamah omin nang hong zong uh hi,” ci in a gen uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Ka nu le ka naute kua ahi uh hiam?” ci in a dawng hi.
Amah in a kianga tu mite gualet a, “En un, hih mite in ka nu le ka naute ahi uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna banga a gamtate peuhmah ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu le ka nu ahi uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in tuili gei ah thu a hilhkik hi. Mipi khempeuh ama kiangah hong kikhawm uh ahih manin tui tunga om gunkuang sungah a tu hi. Mihonpite in tuili lam nga in lei lakah a om uh hi.
Amah in thugentehna tawh thu tampi a hilh in ah,
“Ngai un! Khaici vawhpa khat khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.
Khaici a vawh ciangin khaici pawlkhat lam gei ah tu a, vana vasate hong lengin a nemang uh hi.
Pawlkhatte leitang a tam lohna mun suang tungah tu a, lei a dai hangin a po pah hi.
Ahih hangin zungkha zolo ahih manin ni hong suakin nisa in a kat ciangin a keumang uh hi.
Khaici pawlkhatte ling lakah tu a, lingkungte hong khangin depgawp ahih manin a gah zo kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin khaici pawlkhatte leihoihna ah a tu hi. Tuate po in hong khanga a zah 30, a zah 60, a zah 100 a gah uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.
Zeisu amah guak a om laitak, sawm le nihte le a kim a pam a om mite in tua thugentehna thu a dong uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “A kiselsim Pasian kumpigam thu note kong theisak hi. Ahih hangin a pualam mite tungah thu khempeuh thugentehna tawh ka hilh hi.

“Tua in, ‘Amaute in enen napi a muh theih loh nading, Ngaingai napi a tel theih loh nading uh ahi hi. Tua hi kei leh amaute hong kihei kha ding uh a, A mawhnate uh kimaisak ding hi,’ a cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Note in hih thugentehna tel zolo na hih uh leh thugentehna khempeuh koici tel zawh ding na hi uh hiam?
Khaici vawhpa in Pasian thu a vawh hi.
Mi pawlkhatte lamgei a a tu khaici tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin thakhat in Satan hong pai in amaute lungsim sunga kivawhsa thu a lakkhiatsak hi.
Tua mah bangin pawlkhatte suang laka a tu khaici tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin lungdamtak in sang pah uh a,
zungkha lo uh ahih manin tawlkhat sung bek thuak zo uh a, Pasian thu hangin haksatna le bawlsiatna a tun ciangin a lungkia pah uh hi.
Tu in hihte in ling laka a tu khaicite ahi uh hi. Amaute in thu a za mite hi uh a,
leitung nuntak nading lunghimawh in khemna tawh kidim na dang tuamtuamte a lunggulh mite ahi uh hi. Tua nate in a zaksa uh thu depgawp ahih manin a gah zo kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin hihte in leihoihna ah a tu khaici ahi uh hi. Amaute in thu a zak uh ciangin sang uh a, pawlkhatte a zah 30, pawlkhatte a zah 60, pawlkhatte a zah 100 a gah uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah a genbeh in ah, “Note in lawh a khuh ding le lupna nuai‑a koih ding peuhin meivak vak ngei na hi uh hiam? Meivak tunna tungah koih zaw hilo na hi uh hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh a kilanglo dinga a kiselsim thei bangmah om lo a, khuavak ah a kilanglo dingin a kiselcip thei bangmah om lo hi.
Zak nading bil a nei mi in za tahen!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute tungah a gen in ah, “Na thu zak uh limtak in ngaihsun un. Note zat seeng mah tawh no aa dingin hong kitehsakkik ding hi. Hih thu a za note tungah a tam zaw in a hong kipia ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a neite kipiak beh dinga, a neilote a neih sunsun nangawn a kilakkhiatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Pasian kumpigam in lei lakah khaici a vawh mipa tawh kibang hi.
Tua pa, sun tawh zan tawh ihmu zel, tho zel a, ama theih loh kalin khaici poin a khang hi.
Leitang in ama thu in gah a gahsak hi. A masa in hong ngum a, tua khit ciangin hong vui in a vui sungah a tak hong dim hi.
A min ciangin at hunta ahih manin a phiaukawi tawh a at pah hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Pasian kumpigam bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding i hi hiam?
Pasian kumpigam in ankamtang tawh kibang hi. Ankamtang in lei ah a kivawh laitak in leitung a khaici khempeuh lakah a tang neupen hi a,

ahih hangin a kivawh khit ciangin a kung hong po in, khai kung khempeuh sangin golzaw a, a mengkhia a hiangte golpipi hong pha hi. Tua ciangin vana leng vasate in a hiang kawm ah bu a tom thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute theih zawh dingin tua bang thugentehna tampi tawh a hilh hi.
Amaute kiangah thugentehna loin thu a gen kei hi. Ahih hangin ama nungzuite bek tawh a om ciangin thu khempeuh teltak in a hilh hi.
Tua ni nitak lamin amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Galkhat lamah pai ni,” a ci hi.
Tu in amaute in mihonpite a nusiat khit uh ciangin Zeisu a na tuanna sa gunkuang tawh amah a paipih uh hi. Gunkuangneu dangte zong amaute tawh a paikhawm uh hi.
Tua laitak in huihpi nakpi in hong nung a, tuihual in gunkuang vatgawp ahih manin gunkuang tui sungah a tum dekdek hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in gunkuang taw lamah lukham khat kham in a ihmu hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite in amah phong uh a, “Sia aw, simang khin le ung phamawh salo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho in huihpi taii a, tuipi kiangah, “Dai inla om hithiat in,” ci in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin huihpi khawl in a dai dide pah hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in hi zahtak in lau zawzen na hi uh hiam? Banghang in upna nei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute lau mahmah uh a, “Hihpa bangci bang mi hi peuhmah ahi hiam? Huihpi le tuipite nangawn in a thu a mang tazen uh hi,” ci in khat le khat a kiho uh hi.
Amaute in tuili gal khat a om Gadara mite teenna kuam a tung uh hi.
Gunkuang tung pan Zeisu a tuahkhiat ciangin dawigilo a vei mi khat han panin hong paikhia in thakhat in Zeisu a na dawntuah hi.
Tua pa han lakah teeng a, sikkhau nangawn tawh kuamah in a hen zo kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh sikkhau tawh tam veipi khih in kol a kibulh hangin a sikkhau bottat in a kol zong peksat a, kuamah in a zozo kei hi.
Han lak le mualtung ah sun le zanin om tawntung a, kiko niloh in amah le amah suang tawh a kikuiliam gawp hi.
Tua pa in Zeisu a galmuh ciangin ama kiangah tai in a bia hi.
Amah nakpi in kiko a, “A Sangbel Pasian Tapa Zeisu aw, nang tawh ka kisaina bang om ahi hiam? Kei nong bawlsiat loh nadingin Pasian minin kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu in, “Nang dawigilo aw, ama sung pan paikhia in,” ci in thu a pia zo hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci a, a dot ciangin amah in, “Kote tampi ka hih manun ka min Legionɠ ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua gam panin amah a hawlkhiat loh nadingin tua pa in nakpitak in a thum hi.
Tu in tua mun tawh a kinai mualte tungah vok honpi khat kicing in a om hi.
Tua ciangin dawigilote in Zeisu kiangah, “Vok honte sungah ka lut theih nadingun hong sawl in,” ci in a thum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a phal pah hi. Dawigilote paikhia in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua ciangin vok honte ken lakah taisuk gawp uha tui sung kidenna in a si khin uh hi. Tua vok honte 2,000 bang a pha hi.
Tua ciangin vokcingte tai pah vingveng uh a, khuasung le gam sungteng ah hih thu a va gen uh ciangin tua thupiang en dingin khua mite a hong paikhia uh hi.
Zeisu kiangah a tun uh ciangin dawigilo legionɠ khat a lutna mipa, puansilh in lungsim maan pua in tu hithiat a om a mu uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute a lau uh hi.
Dawi a lutna mipa le vokte tunga thupiang a mu mite in tua khua mite kiangah a gensawn uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin tua gam panin Zeisu a paikhiat nadingin tua mite in a ngen uh hi.
Gunkuang sungah Zeisu a kah ciangin dawi a lutna mipa in Zeisu zui nuamin a kun hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in sang loin ama kiangah, “Na inn ah ciah inla Topa in na lianpi hong bawlnate le hong hehpihnate na lawmte kiangah va gen in,” ci in a sawl hi.
Tua pa pai in Zeisu in ama tunga a bawl na lianpite Decapolis gam sungteng ah kizelsak a, mi khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
Tu in gunkuang tungah Zeisu tuangin a gal khatah a galkahkik khit ciangin mihonpite a hong kikhawm uh hi.
Amah tuili gei ah a om laitak in en in, kikhopna inn ukte lakah Jairus kici mi khat hong pai a, Zeisu a muh ciangin a khe phungah bokin
nakpitak thum a, “Ka tanuno si dekdek hi. Amah cidam a hong nuntak theih nadingin hong pai inla a tungah na khut hong ngaksak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amah zui a, mihonpi in zong Zeisu paina zui uh ahih manin a phu kha gawp uh hi.
Tualai ah kum sawm le kum nih sung siluang natna a vei numei khat a om hi.
Gimna tampi thuakin siavuan tampi zong kibawlsak a, a neihsa teng nangawn a beita hi. Ahih hangin noptuam cih thadah a gim zaw semsem hi.
Tua nu in Zeisu thu a zak ciangin mihonpi lakah hong lut a, a nunglam panin Zeisu puan a lawng hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua nu in, “A puan va lawng beek leng zong ka dam ding hi,” a ci hi.
A lawn khit phetin tua nu a siluang kang pah a, a natna a dam lam ama sungah a kithei hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama sung pan vangliatna paikhia hi cih thei in mihonpi lamah thakhat in kihei a, “Kua in ka puan hong lawng ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Mihonpi in nang hong sukphut hong tophut cih thei napi cin, ‘Banghang in kua in hong lawng hiam?’ cimawk na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amah a lawng numeinu a muh nadingin a kim a pam teng a en kawikawi hi.
Tua nu in ama tunga thupiang khempeuh thei ahih manin laulua in a ling hi. Tua khit ciangin Zeisu kiangah hong pai in ama mai ah bok a, thupiang khempeuh ahi bangbang in a genkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in hong damsak zo hi. Lungnuamtak in ciah inla na natna dam tahen,” a ci hi.
Amah a paupau laitak in kikhopna inn ukpa inn pana hong paite hong tung uh a, “Na tanu sizo hi. Banghang in Siapa buaisak lai ding na hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in tua thu a zak phetin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, “Patau kei inla um in,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in Peter, James, le a sanggampa John longal kuamah dang a kizuisak kei hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna inn ukpa inn ah Zeisu a tun ciangin mite kap le mau‑a om ngeingai a mu hi.
Zeisu inn sungah luta amaute kiangah, “Banghang in mau in kap ngeingai na hi uh hiam? Numeino a si hilo in a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua mite in amah zahpih in a nuihsan uh hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute a vekpi un pusuaksak a, numeino nu le pa le ama tonpih mite a sap khit ciangin numeino lupna inndei sungah a lut uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in numeino khut len in, “Talitha, cumi,” a ci hi. A khiatna in, “Numeino aw, tho in kong ci hi,” a cihna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin numeino thakhat in tho in lam a pai hi. Amah in kum sawm le kum nih a pha numeino ahi hi. Amaute in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua thu kuamah a theihsak loh nadingun Zeisu in khauhtak in a kham hi. Tua khit ciangin numeino nek theih khatpeuh a piak nadingun a sawl hi.
Tua ciangin tua mun pan Zeisu paikhia in ama khankhiatna gamah pai a, a nungzuite in a zui uh hi.

Sabbath ni hong tun ciangin kikhopna inn sungah thu a hilh hi. Ama thuhilhna a za mi tampi in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in hih thute koilai pana a ngah ahi hiam? A khut tawh hih bang nalamdang a bawl theih nadinga a kipia pilna in bangci bang pilna hi zawzen hiam?
