“A pa in, ‘Ka ta aw, nangmah in kei tawh a omkhawm tawntung na hi a, ka neihsa khempeuh nangma neihsa ahi hi.
Na naupa ahih leh a si khinsa hong nungtakik a, a mangthangsa i mukik hi. Tua ahih manin lungdam a pawi i bawl ding ahi hi,’ a ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Tua banah, Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mihau khatin neihsa kempa khat a nei hi. Tua neihsa kempa in a topa neihsate thangzatgawp hi ci in a topa tungah a kikhia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a neihsa kempa sam a, ‘Na thu ka zakte bangci bang ahi hiam? Ka neihsa kempa hi thei nawnlo ding na hih manin na sum zatna sazian hong pia in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ciangin neihsa kempa in, ‘Ka topa in neihsa kem za panin hong tawpsak ding hita ahih manin bang cih ding ka hiam? Lei tawh ding lah ka ngap kei a, khutdawh nget ding lah ka maizum hi.
Neihsa kem za pan ka zakiat ciangin mite in amau inn a hong tunsak nop nadingun ka hih dingzia ka thei hi,’ ci in a lungsim sungah a ngaihsun hi.
“Tua ciangin a topa tunga leiba a nei khempeuhte sam a, a khatna pa kiangah, ‘Ka topa tungah bangzah ba na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua pa in, ‘Sathau bung 100 ka ba hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua pa kiangah, ‘Na leiba ciaptehna lai la inla tu pakin 50 in gelh mengmeng in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua khit ciangin a dang khatpa kiangah, ‘Nang bangzah na ba hiam?’ a cih ciangin, ‘Mangbuh bem 100 ka ba hi,’ a ci hi. Amah in, ‘Na leiba ciaptehna lai la inla, 80 in gelh in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua hi a, a thumanlo neihsa kempa in, khelpilna tawh a sep manin a topa in a phat hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tulai khang mite in amaute khanpih khuavak tate sangin a khelpil zaw uh hi.
“Ken kong cih in ah hih leitung sum le pai tawh lawm le gual na zong un. Tua hi leh bangmah na neih nawnloh uh ciangin amaute in a tawntung in nang hong sang ding uh hi.
“Thuneupen tungah a muanhuai mi in thuliante tungah zong a muanhuai hi. Thuneupen tunga diktatlo mi in thuliante tungah zong a diktat kei hi.
Tua ahih manin leitung sum le pai tungah muanhuai kei le uhteh, kua in sum taktak hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
Midang khat neihsa tungah muanhuai kei le uh teh kua in a neihsa uh note hong pia ding ahi hiam?

“Nasem khatin to nih na semkhawm theilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khat mudah in khat a it ding hi. Ahih keileh khat thupi simin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian na le leitung na na semkhawm thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in sumduh Pharisee pawlte in hih thu khempeuh a zak uh ciangin amah zahpih in a nuihsan uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Mite mai ah no le no na kidiksak uh hangin Pasian in na lungsim uh a thei hi. Mihing in a thupi ngaihsut mahmahte Pasian in kihhuai a sa hi.
“Thukham le Kamsangte thuhilhnate John hun dongin a kihilh hi. John huna kipan Pasian kumpigam thu kitangko a, mi khempeuh in thagum hatna suangin a lut uh hi.
Thukham sunga laimal neupen khat a manthan ding sangin van le lei a manthan ding a baih zaw hi.
“A zi ma a, numei dang khat a teenpih mi in angkawm ahi hi. A kimasa numei a teenpih mi zong angkawm ahi hi.
“Khatvei lai in mihaupa khat om a, amah in puan dupsan le puanpak silhin nisim in leitung nopsakna tawh a om hi.
Ahi zongin a inn kongpi gei ah a pumtang in meima a vei Lazarus kici khutdawh ngenpa khat a kikoih hi.
Amah in mihaupa ankuang pana anneng kiate duhgawh mahmah in a om laitak in uite hong pai in a meimate a liak uh hi.
“Tua nung ciangin khutdawh ngenpa si a, vantungmite in amah Abraham ang sungah a tun uh hi. Mihaupa zong si in a kivui hi.
Amah in Hadesɠ ah bawlsiatna thuakin a om laitak in a khuadak leh gamlapi a om Abraham le a ang sunga om Lazarus a mu hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Lazarus hong paisak inla, a khutme dawn tui ah diahin ka lei hong votsak hen. Banghang hiam cihleh hih meikuang sungah bawlsiatna ka thuak hi,’ ci in a kiko hi.

“Ahih hangin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, leitung na nuntak sungin nopsakna namkim na ngah a, Lazarus ahih leh gentheihna namkim a ngah hi cih phawkkik in. Tu in amah in hehnepna ngah a, nangmah in bawlsiatna na thuak hi.
Tua thamlo in, no le ko kikal ah guam thukpi khat om a, hihlam panin no kiangah a galkah nuamte in galkah theilo in tualam panin zong ko kiangah kuamah hong galkah theilo hi,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Tua ahih leh pa aw, ka pa inn ah amah nong sawlsak nadingin kong thum hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keimah in sanggam pasal nga ka nei hi. Amaute zong hih gawtmun a hong tun khakloh nadingun amaute tungah teci va pangsak in,’ a ci hi.
Abraham in ama kiangah, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte a nei uh hi. Tuate thu na ngai uh hen,’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hilo hi pa Abraham aw, a sisa mi khat amaute kiangah va pai leh a mawhna uh kisikkik ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.

“Ahih hangin Abraham in ama kiangah, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte thuhilhnate a up kei uh leh misite lak panin a thokik mi khatin thu a gen hangin a um tuan kei ding uh hi,’ a ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Pukna a hong tun loh a phamawh thu hi a, ahi zongin tua pukna a piangsakpa in gimna a thuak ding hi!
Mi khatin hih naupangnote khat a puksak sangin a ngawngah angawina suangtum khat khai in tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama aa dingin hoih zaw ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kikepsiam un. Nang tungah na sanggampa a hong khialh leh thuhilh in taii in. A kisikkik leh maisak in.
Ni khat sungin sagihvei hong khial a, sagihvei mah na kiangah hong pai in, ‘Ka kisikkik hi,’ hong cihleh a khialhna maisak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin sawltakte in Topa kiangah, “Ka upna uh hong khangsak in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Upna ankamtang cia nei le uh teh hih bokthok kung kiangah, ‘Kizunglot inla, tuipi sungah va kisuan in,’ ci le uh teh na cih bangun hong mang ding hi.
“Na lo a kho, ahih keileh na gan a cing na nasempa vai hong tun phet in, ‘Hong pai inla na an ne pah in,’ a ci ding note lakah kua om na hi uh hiam?
Tua bang na cih sangsik un, ‘Kithawi inla, ka annek ding hong lui phot in. Ka nek ka dawn sung hong ngak inla, tua khit ciangin na an ne panin,’ ci zaw ding hilo na hi uh hiam?
Nasempa in a topa thupiak teng a sep manin a topa in nasempa tungah lungdam ko ding ahi hiam? Ko peuhmah lo ding hi.
Tuamah bangin note in zong a hong kisawl teng nasep khit uh ciangin, ‘I sep ding teng mah a sem i hi a, a cingtaklo nasemte i hi zawlai hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Tu in, Samaria le Galilee gamgidung tawnin Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a paitoh laitak in thu khat hong piang hi.
Amah khuaneu khat lut dinga a pai laitak in miphak sawm in amah a na dawntuah uh hi.
Amaute in a gamlapi panin, “Zeisu aw, Siapa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci in nakpi in a kiko uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute a muh ciangin, “Pai unla, siampite kiangah va kilak un,” a ci hi. Amaute a pai laitak mahun a dam uh hi.
Amaute laka khatin a dam lam a kimuh ciangin hong kilehkik a, aw lianpi tawh Pasian a phat hi.
Amah Zeisu khephung ah boksuk in lungdam a ko hi. Tua pa pen Samaria mi ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “A kidamsak mi sawm hilo ahi hiam? A dang kuate koi ah om uh ahi hiam?
Hih gamdang mipa simloh hong kilehkik a Pasian min a phat ding khat beek om lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin tua pa kiangah, “Ding inla ciah in. Na upna in hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Khatvei, Pharisee pawlte in Pasian kumpigam cik ciangin hong piang ding hiam ci in dong uh a, Zeisu in, “Pasian kumpigam in muh theihin hong piang ding ahi kei hi.
‘Hihlai ah,’ om hi, ‘Hualai ah,’ om hi kici theilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in note sungah a om takpi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin nungzuite kiangah, “Mihing Tapa nite lakah khat na muhnop hun uh hong tung dinga, ahi zongin na mu kei ding uh hi.
Amaute in, ‘Hihlai ah om hi hualai ah om hi,’ hong cih uh hangin zui kei unla, nungdelh kei un.
Khuaphialep in vanmong khat pan phia a, vanmong khat dongah a tanzal bangin Mihing Tapa zong ama ni ciangin tua bang ahi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in gimna tampi thuak masa dinga, tulai khang mite in amah a nial ding uh hi.
“Noah hun lai bangin Mihing Tapa ni ciangin zong tua bang hi ding hi.
Tembaw sungah Noah a lut ni dongin mite anne tuidawn le kipi kiteeng in a om uh hi. Tua khit ciangin tuiciin hong tunga amaute khempeuh a susia mang hi.
“Tuamah bangin Lot hun lai in zong anne tuidawn, sumbawl paibawl, lokho singpua, innbawl lobawl in a om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Sodom khua pan Lot a paikhiat ni in, vantung panin kaat le meikuang guah bangin zu a, a vekpi un a susia hi.
“Mihing Tapa hong kilat ni ciangin zong tuamah bangin hi ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin innkhum zanga omte in inn sunga om nate la dingin kumsuk nawn kei uh hen. Tuamah bangin lokuante zong inn ah ciahkik nawn kei uh hen.
Lot zi na ngaihsun un.
A nuntakna a hu nuam mi in a nuntakna tan dinga, a nuntakna a tan mi in a nuntakna a hu ding hi.
Ken kong cih in ah tua zan ciangin lupna khat tunga a lumkhawm mi nih, khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
An sukhawm numei nih, khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi.
Lolai a om mi nih, khat kila in khat kinusia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Topa aw, hih thute koi lai ah hong piang ding hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Misi luang omna peuh ah musanete hong kikhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin lungkialo a thu a nget tawntung nadingun Zeisu in thugentehna khat tawh amaute thu hilh a,
“Khua khatah Pasian a kihta lo, mi zong a thusimlo thukhenpa khat a om hi.
Tu in tua khua mahah meigongnu khat zong a om hi. Tua nu thukhenpa kiangah va pai pahpah a, ‘Thu ka neihpih ka langpa tungah maantak in thu hong khensak in,’ a ci hi.
“Amah in tawlkhat sung a khensak pah nuam kei hi. Ahi zongin a tawpna ah hi bangin ngaihsun a, ‘Pasian kihta loin mi zong ka thusim loh hangin,
hih meigongnu in hong nawngkaisak den ding ahih manin a thu maantak in ka khensak ding hi. Tua hi keileh amah hong pai thithe in hong nawngkaisak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “A thumanlo tua thukhenpa kampauna ngaihsun un.
Pasian teelsa mite sun le zanin kiko le uh Pasian in a thu uh khensak loin sawtpi kingaksak ding ahi hiam?
Ken kong cih in ah manlangtak in a khensak pah ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitung ah upna a mu ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amau le amau midik in a kingaihsun midang khempeuh a neumuh mi pawlkhat tungah thugentehna tawh thu a hilh inah,
“Mi nih thungen dingin biakinnpi huangah a paito uh hi. Khatpa Pharisee hi a, a dang khatin siahdongpa ahi hi.
Pharisee pa dingto in amah le amah kiphat in thungen a, ‘Pasian aw, midangte neihsa a sutte, a thumanlote, angkawmte le hi lai a siahdongpa bang ka hih loh manin, na tungah ka lungdam hi.
Nipi kal khatin nihvei an ka tang a, ka neihsa khempeuh panin sawm a khat ka pia hi,’ a ci hi.
“Siahdongpa ahih leh gamlapi ah dingin vantung lam nangawn en ngamlo in a awm beng a, ‘Pasian aw, mimawh keimah hong hehpih in,’ a ci hi.

“Ken kong cih in ah, hihpa in a khatpa sangin Pasian kiang pan diktansakna ngahsa in a inn ah a ciah hi. Amah le amah a kilamsang mi in niamkhiatna thuak dinga, amah le amah a kiniamkhiat mi, a kilamsang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in Zeisu lawn ding deihin mite in a naungekte a hong paipih uh nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin a taiigawp uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in amaute sam a, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong pai ding kham kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in naupang a bang mite aa ding ahi hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, naupangnote san banga Pasian kumpigam a sanglo mi peuhmah tua kumpigam sungah a lutthei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin milian khatin, “Sia hoih aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin bang hih ding ka hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Zeisu in, “Banghang in mihoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian longal mihoih kuamah a om kei hi.
‘Angkawm kei in. Mi that kei in. Guta kei in. Thumanlo in teci pang kei in. Na nu na pa zahtak in,’ cih thupiakte na thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuate khempeuh ka neutung a kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Zeisu in tua thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Na kisap khat a omlai hi. Na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla mizawngte hawmsak leteh vantung ah na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tua pa hau mahmah ahih manin hih thu a zak ciangin a dah mahmah hi.
Tua pa a dah mahmah lam Zeisu in a muh ciangin, “Mihaute Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding uh haksa mahmah hi.
Mihau khat Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding sangin kala‑oh khat phimbilvang sunga khum ding a baih zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thu a za mite in, “Tua bang ahih leh kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Mihingte aa dingin a piang theilote Pasian aa dingin piang thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “En in, kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Pasian kumpigam thu hangin a inn, a nu a pa, a sanggamte, a zi a tate a nusia mi peuhmah in,
hih leitung a nuntak sungin a zah tampi ngah dinga, hong tung ding hunah zong nuntak tawntungna ngah loin a om kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in sawm le nihte tuam sapkhiat in amaute kiangah, “En un, Jerusalem khuapi ah i paito dinga, Mihing Tapa tawh kisai kamsangte gelhsa thu khempeuh a tangtung ding hi.
Gentile‑te khutah amah pia ding uh a, amaute in zahko in simmawh bawl in a cilphih ding uh hi.
Amah satin that ding uh a, a ni thum ni in a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin a nungzuite in hih thute a tel zo kei uh hi. Hih thute amaute tungah ki‑iimcip ahih manin bang thu gen hiam cih a thei kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu Jericho khua a tunkuan in mittaw khat lamgei ah khutdawh ngenin a tu hi.
Mihonpite in tua mun nawka hong paina husa a zak ciangin bang thu hiam ci in amah in a dong hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nazareth khua mi Zeisu hong pai hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “David Tapa, Zeisu aw, kei hong hehpih in,” ci in a kiko hi.
Tua pa a daih nadingin a mai‑a pai mite in a taiihuan uh hangin amah in, “David Tapa aw, kei hong hehpih in,” ci in a kiko semsem hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu khawl a, tua pa ama kiangah a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi. Tua pa ama kianga tun ciangin Zeisu in,
“Nang aa dingin bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, khua ka mu nuam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Khua muta in, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua pa in thakhat in khua mu a, Pasian min phatin Zeisu nung a zui hi. A mu mi khempeuh in zong Pasian a phat uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu Jericho khuasung tawnin a pai hi.
Tua khua ah, en in, Zacchaeus kici a hau mahmah siahdong mangpa khat a om hi.
Tua pa in Zeisu kua hiam cih a muhnop hangin a tun tom ahih manin mihonpi lak panin a mu zo kei hi.
Tua ahih manin Zeisu pai nading lampi ah na matai in amah a muh theih nadingin theithek kung khatah a kah hi.
Zeisu tua mun a tun ciangin dakto a, amah a muh ciangin, “Zacchaeus aw, hong kum mengmeng in. Tuni in na inn ah kong taam ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zacchaeus zong kumsuk pah a, lungdamtak in a inn ah Zeisu a tungsak hi.
Hih thu a mu mi khempeuh in Zeisu phunsan uh a, “Mimawhpa inn ah zintung dingin a pai tazen hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zacchaeus dingto in Topa kiangah, “Topa aw, en in, ka neihsa a lang mizawngte ka pia dinga, mi khatpeuh neihsa zawhthawh thu tawh ka laksak a om leh a zah li in ka loh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Amah zong Abraham tapa khat ahih manin tuni in hih inn ah hotkhiatna a tung hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa in a mangthang mite zong ding le honkhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Amaute in Zeisu thugen khempeuh a ngai uh hi. Zeisu Jerusalem khuapi hong tung dekta ahihna leh mipite in Pasian kumpigam a phut pah ding sa uh ahih manin Zeisu in gentehna dang khat tawh thu a gen inah,
“Kumpi za sang ding le tua khit cianga hong ciahkik dingin ulian khatin gamlapi gamdang khatah a zin hi.
Amah in a nasem sawmte samin sumtang minaɠ khat ciat pia a, ‘Kong tunkik mateng na met bawl un,’ ci in a vaikhak hi.
“Ahih hangin a gam mite in amah mudah uh ahih manin a nungah tangmi sawl uh a, ‘Hih mipa ka kumpi dingun ka deih kei uh hi,’ ci in a gensak uh hi.
“Tua gamah kumpi za a ngah khit ciangin amah hong ciahkik a, sum a apsa nasemte in bangzah ciat metsak uh hiam cih thei nuam in a samsak hi.
Tua ciangin a khatna pa hong pai in, ‘Topa aw, na sum minaɠ khat panin a met mina sawm ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua pa kiangah, ‘Nasem hoihpa aw, na nasepna hoih mahmah hi. Thuneu khat tungah muanhuai na hih manin khuapi sawm na uk in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ciangin a nihna pa hong pai in, ‘Topa aw, na sum minaɠ khat panin a met mina nga ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
Amah in hihpa zong tuamah bangin phat a, ‘Nang zong khuapi nga na uk in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ciangin a dang khatpa hong pai in, ‘Topa aw, na sum dial tawh tun in hihlai ah ka kem khinkhian hi.
Mi genhakpa na hih manin kong kihta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sum khol lopi sum ngah nuamin khaici tuh lopi an na la nuam hi,’ a ci hi.

“Tua ciangin amah in tua nasempa kiangah, ‘A ginalo nasempa aw, na kampauna zui in thu kong khen ding hi. Sum khol lopi in sum ngah nuam, khaici tuh lopi in an a la nuam, mi genhakpa ka hihlam hong thei na hih leh,
kong ciahkik ciangin a met tawh ka ngahkhop theih nadingin banghang in ka sumte sumkholna ah na koih lo na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
“Tua khit ciangin a kianga a ding mite kiangah, ‘Ama tunga om sum minaɠ khat la unla, mina sawm a neipa pia un,’ a ci hi.
Tua mite in, ‘Topa aw, amah in minaɠ sawm nei khinzo hi,’ a ci uh hi.
“Amah in, ‘Ken kong cih in ah, a neite kipiak beh dinga, a neilote tung panin a neihsa nangawn kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
Keima uk ding a utlo tua ka galte hong paipih unla, ka muhtang mahmah in that un,’ a ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Hih thute a gen khit ciangin, amah masa in Jerusalem khuapi ah a paito uh hi.
Tanluan muala om Bethphage le Bethany khuate a tunkuan uh ciangin a nungzuite nih sawl a,
“Mai‑a khua ah na paikhol un. Khuasung na lut uh ciangin kuama tuan ngei nailoh laano khat kikhih a om na mu ding uh hi. Suut unla hong kai un.
Tua ciangin mi khatpeuh in, ‘Banghang in suut na hi uh hiam?’ a hong cih leh, ‘Topa in deih hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua a sawl mite pai uh a, a gensa bangbang in a mu uh hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in laano a suut laitak un a neite in, “Banghang in tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in, “Topa in deih hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu kiangah laano hong paipih uh a, a tungah puan a phah khit uh ciangin Zeisu a tuangsak uh hi.
Amah a pai ciangin mipite in lampi ah a puante uh a phah uh hi.

A muhsa uh nalamdang khempeuhte hangin a nungzui mihonpite lungdam in a kipak uh hi. Tua ahih manin Tanluan mual panga lampi paisuk ah Zeisu a hong tun ciangin mihonpite nakpi in kiko in Pasian phat uh a,
amaute in, “Topa min tawh hong pai Kumpipa in thupha ngah tahen! Vantung ah nopna om henla, A sangbel munah minthanna om tahen!” a ci uh hi.
Mihonpite lak panin Pharisee‑te pawlkhat in, “Sia aw, na nungzuite taii in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Ken kong cih in ah hih mite dai le uh, suangte hong kiko pah ding uh hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tu in, Jerusalem khuapi hong tung dekta a, khuapi a galmuh ciangin kah a
a gen in ah, “Nopna na ngah nading thute tuni beekin thei hi leteh maw! Ahi zongin tu in tua thute na muh khakloh nadingin nang kiang panin kiselta hi.
Na galte in na kimkot ah kulh hong ciangin hong umcih ding uh a, a munmun panin hong khaktan hun uh hong tung ding hi.

Nang le na sunga om na tate leitang hong den nading uh a, nang sunga om suang kiciangte zong a kithuap khat beek a omsak kei ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na kiangah a hong kihawh hun na thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu biakinnpi huang sungah lut a, vanlei vanzuak a om mite hawlkhia in,
amaute kiangah, “ ‘Ka inn in thungetna inn ahi hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho ah kigelh napi in note in ‘gutate phualpi’ na suaksak tazen uh hi” a ci hi.
Zeisu in ni simin biakinnpi huang sungah thu a hilh hi. Ahih hangin siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le mipi makaite in amah thah theih nading lampi a zong uh hi.
Ahi zongin mi khempeuh in ama thugen limngaih mahmah uh ahih manin bangmah a cih thei kei uh hi.
Ni khat, Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilhin lungdamna thu tangko in a om laitak in siampi liante, thukhamhilh siate le maikaite ama kiangah hong pai uh a,
“Bang thuneihna tawh hih nate hih na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua in hong pia ahi hiam hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Ken zong thu khat kong dong ding hi hong dawng un.
John tuiphumna thu vantung pan ahi hiam ahih keileh mihing kiang pan ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute kikum uh a, “ ‘Vantung pan hi,’ ci lehang, ‘Banghang in amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
‘Mihing kiang pan hi,’ ci lehang lah mite in John pen kamsang khatin um uh ahih manin mi khempeuh in suang tawh hong deng ding uh hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tua ahih manin, “Koi pan hiam cih ka thei kei uh hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Ken zong hih nate bang thuneihna tawh hih ka hi hiam cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in hih thugentehna mipite tungah gen a, “Mi khatin lenggah huan khat bawl in lokhote a khawhlawhsak hi. Tua khit ciangin gamlapi ah khualzin in sawtpi a taam hi.

Lenggah lawh hun a tun ciangin lo khawhlawhte in huan panin a piang lenggah pawlkhat a na piak theih nadingun a nasemte khat a sawl hi. Ahih hangin lo khawhlawhte in amah vuagawp in a khutguak in a ciahsak uh hi.
Amah in a dang nasem khat sawlkik a, tua pa zong vuagawp in a zumhuaipi in bawl uh a, a khutguak mahin a ciahsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin a thumveina ah, a nasemte khat sawlkik a, tua pa zong liamsak gawpin a nawhkhia uh hi.
“Tua ciangin huan neipa in, ‘Bang cih leng hoih ding ahi hiam? Ka it ka tapa sawl leng, na mu le uh zahtak khabuang ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.
Ahih hangin lo khawhlawhte in amah a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hihpa in a innluah ding pa ahi hi. Ama luah ding teng ei aa a suah theih nadingin hong pai un amah that ni,’ a kici uh hi.
“Tua khit ciangin lenggah huan pualam ah kaikhia in a that uh hi. Tua ahih leh lenggah huan neipa in amaute bang a cih ding hiam?
Amah hong pai in lo khawhlawhte that dinga, lenggah huan zong midangte a khosak ding hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, “Tua bangin piang kei tahen!” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute en a, “Tua ahih leh, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang, Innkiusuang bulpi a suakzo hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh thu bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?
Hih suang tunga a kia mi peuhmah kitamkham dinga, hih suangin mi khatpeuh a den leh tua mi a zanciim ding hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in hih thugentehnate in amaute a kawkna ahihlam a thei uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua hun mahin amah matsawm uh a, ahi zongin mihonpite a kihta zel uh hi.
Amaute in mangpipa ukna le thuneihna sungah Zeisu a piak theih nadingun ama kammal mah tawh a lehmat dingin mihoih banga a kineih thukante sawlin a enciksak uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua mite in, “Sia aw, thu a maan bangin genin thu na hilh a, zahtak tuam nei loin Pasian lampi maantak in na hilh hi cih kong thei uh hi.
Caesar kumpipa, siah piak ding thukham tawh kituak hiam kituak lo hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in amaute lungsim kawina thei ahih manin, “Banghang in hong ze‑et na hi uh hiam?
Denariusɠ sum tangkhat hong lak un. Kua lim le kua min tuang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Caesar kumpipa,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Caesar kumpipa neihsate Caesar kumpipa pia unla, Pasian neihsate Pasian pia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in mipite mai ah ama kammal tawh a man zo kei uh hi. Amaute in ama dawnkikna lamdangsa in a dai khipkhep uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin misite thawhkikna thu a nial Sadducee pawlte pawlkhat hong pai in thu a dong uh hi.

Amaute in, “Sia aw, Moses in kote aa dingin a hong gelhsak thu in pasal khatin ta nei man loin a zi a sihsan leh a naupa in tua meigong teenpih henla, a upa aa dingin suan le khak tawisak hen a ci hi.
Khatvei lai in sanggam pasal sagih om uh a, a upapen in zi a neih khit ciangin ta nei loin a si hi.
Tua ciangin a nihnapa in tua nu teenpih a, ta neilo mahin a si hi.
Tua ciangin a thumna pa in tua nu a teenpih hi. Tua bangin a sagihna dongin teenpih suksuk uh a, ta neilo vive in a si uh hi.
A nunung penin tua numei zong a si hi.
Tua hi a, thawhkik ni ciangin tua numei in kuapen zi in om ding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh a sagih un tua numei a teenpih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Tulai khang mite kipi kiteeng in a om uh hi.
Ahi zongin tua huna kihel dingin a kilawm mite le misite lak panin a thokik mite in kipi kiteeng in a om nawn kei ding uh hi.
A thokik mite ahih manun sithei nawnlo ding uh a, vantungmite tawh kibang in Pasian tate a hita uh hi.
Moses in sawlbawk kuang gei ah Topa a hopih lai in, ‘Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian,’ a cihna thu in misite kithokiksak ding hi cih a lak ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian muhna ah mi khempeuh nungta ahih manin amah misite Pasian hilo in a nungtate Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin thukhamhilh siate pawlkhat in, “Sia aw, na thugen maan mahmah hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua huna kipan in bangmah a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Amaute in banghang in Khazih pen David Tapa hi ci thei uh ahi hiam?
David mahmah in Late Bu sungah, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah,
“Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in amah pen ‘Topa’ ci ahih leh bangci bangin ama tapa hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mipite khempeuh zak dingin a nungzuite kiangah,

“Thukhamhilh siate tawh kisai in na kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhin vak nuam uh a, sumbuuk phual ah zahtakna tawh a kihopih ding a ut uh hi. Kikhopna innte le pawikhamna innte ah mun hoih tata a deih uh hi.
Meigongte neihsa teng nek mangsak uh a, kineihna tawh thu sawtpipi a ngen uh hi. Tua bang mite in a nasia zaw mawhna thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu a khuadak leh mihaute in a sumpi uh bung sungah a khiat uh mu a,
a zawng meigongnu khatin zong sumnenɠ tang nih a khiat a mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, hih a zawng meigongnu in midang khempeuh sangin tam a khia zaw hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh midang khempeuh in a vum a leta a neihna sung panun Pasian sumpi ding a pia uh hi. Hihnu in ahih leh a zawnsa pipi in a kivak nading a neihsun teng a khia ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in biakinnpi zepna suangte a hoihzia le Pasian a kipia na manpha pipite thu a gen uh ciangin Zeisu in,
“Hih na muh uh suangte khat tungah khat zong kiciang loin, a kiphelkhiat hun hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Sia aw, hih thute cik ciangin hong piang ding ahi hiam? Hih thute hong tun ding ciangin theihsakna lim bang hong piang ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Amah in, “Kuamah in hong khem zawhloh nadingin kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Keimah in Khazih ka hi hi,’ ahih keileh, ‘A hun hong nai zo hi,’ ci in keima min tawh mi tampi hong pai in hong gen ding uh hi. Ahih hangin zui kei un.
Gal kidona thute za in gam sung buaina hong pian ciangin patau kei un. Hih thute a piang masa ding mah hi a, ahi zongin hun bei nading hi nailo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Minam khat le minam khat, kumpigam khat le kumpigam khat hong kido ding uh hi.
Mun tuamtuam ah nakpi in zin hong ling dinga, kialpi le pul natnate hong tung ding hi. Vantung ah a dipkuathuai nate na mu ding uh a, limlamdang pipi zong hong piang ding hi.

“Ahih hangin hih thu khempeuh a pianma in note tungah a khut uh nga in hong bawlsia ding uh a, kikhopna innte le thong innte sungah hong ap ding uh hi. Keima min hangin kumpite le mangpite mai ah note hong kitun ding hi.
Ahi zongin tuate in note tecipan nadingin hun hoih a hong suak ding hi.
Tua hi a, na dawnkik nading uh na lunghimawh kholhloh nadingun khentatsa in nei un.
Banghang hiam cihleh na galte khempeuh in a hong langpan zawhloh nading le a hong nial zawhloh nadingun thugen siamna le lungpilna kong pia ding hi.
Na nu na pate, na sanggamte, na tanaute le na lawm na gualte in note hong lehhek ding uh a, thah ding dongin note pawlkhat hong tun ding uh hi.
Keima min hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin note luzang a samzang khat nangawn a mangthang kei ding hi.
Thuak keikaina tawh na nuntakna uh na hu un.
“Galkap honpi in Jerusalem khuapi a umcih na muh uh ciangin tua khua a hawmsuak ding hita hi cih thei un.
Tua hun ciangin Judea gama om mite mualtung ah tai uh hen. Khuapi sunga om mite in khuapi nusia in gam sung a om mite khuapi sungah lut nawn kei uh hen.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua hun in Lai Siangtho sunga kigelhsa thu khempeuh a tangtun nadingin Pasian phulakna hun ahi hi.

Tua hun ciangin naupaaite le nawine lai naungek a nei nupite a genthei mahmah ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh hih gam sungah gentheihna lianpi tung dinga, hih mite tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung ding hi.
Namsau in si ding uh a, minamte khempeuh lakah amaute salin kikai ding hi. Gentile‑te in amau hun a kicin mateng Jerusalem khuapi a tuancil ding uh hi.
“Tua hun ciangin ni, kha le aksite ah limlamdangte a hong piang ding hi. Tuipi tuihualte nakpi in kilok dinga, leitung a om minamte lungzing in a amkham ding uh hi.
Vantung nate kiling dinga, mite in leitung a hong piang ding nate mukhol in lau in a sibup ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin vangliatna le minthanna lianpi tawh meiitung tuanga hong pai Mihing Tapa a mu ding uh hi.
Hih thute piang dingin a hong kipat ciangin na lu uh phong unla khuadak un. Banghang hiam cihleh note a hong kitatkhiat nading hun hong naita hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin thugentehna khat gen a, “Theikung le singkung dang khempeuh na en un.
A teh a hong sel ciangin khuakhal dekta hi cih mu in na thei uh hi.
Tuamah bangin hih thute hong piang na muh uh ciangin Pasian kumpigam hong piang dekta hi cih na thei un.
“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tulai khang mite a beima teitei in hih thu khempeuh a piang ding hi.
Van le lei a mangthang ding hi. Ahih hangin ka thute a mangthang peuhmah kei ding hi.
“Kigingsa in om un. Tua hi kei leh zukham pengnawngsa, leitung nuntak nading lungkham le lungkia in na om ding uh a, na upmawh loh laitak un tua Ni a hong tung ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh leitung bupa a teeng mi khempeuh tungah tua Ni in thang kisai bangin a hong tung ding hi.
Tua ahih manin hong tung ding hih thu khempeuh pan suakta in Mihing Tapa mai ah a ding dinga kilawm mite na suah theih nadingun pilvang unla thungen tawntung un,” a ci hi.
Amah in sunhun tengin biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilh a, zan ciangin paikhia in Tanluan mualah a om hi.
Tua ciangin zingsang tungin mi khempeuh ama thugen ngai dingin biakinnpi huangah hong pai uh hi.
Tu in Paisan Pawi kici, Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi hong tung dekta hi.
Siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate in Zeisu a thah theih nadingzia gel uh a, ahih hangin mipite a kihta uh hi.
Tua hun mahin sawm le nihte laka Iscariot a kici Judas sungah Satan a lut hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah pai in Zeisu lehhek a, a apzia ding siampi liante le biakinn cing bute tawh a kikum uh hi.
Amaute zong lungdam in sum piak dingin a kithukim uh hi.
Judas in zong kamciam pia a, mihonpi om loh laitak in amaute khutah a apkhiat theih nading hunhoih a zong hi.
Tu in, Paisan tuuno a kigawh ni ahi Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni hong tung hi.
Zeisu in Peter le John kiangah, “Va pai unla, Paisan Pawi an i nek nading mun va bawlkhol un,” ci in a sawl hi.
Amaute in, “Koi ah hong bawlsak le ung na ut hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “En in, khuapi sung na lut uh ciangin tuibel a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Ama lutna inn ah lut unla,
inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka nek nading zintunna inndei koilai hiam?” ci in hong dongsak hi,’ va ci un.
Tua ciangin amah in a kipuahsa, a za mahmah inndei tungnung khat hong lak ding hi. Tualai ah na bawl un,” a ci hi.
Amaute a pai uh ciangin ama gen bangin mu uh a, tualai ah Paisan Pawi an a bawl uh hi.
A hun a tun ciangin Zeisu in sawltak sawm le nihte tawh ankuang a umkhawm hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ka thuak ding hong tunma in note tawh hih Paisan Pawi an nekkhop ding ka lunggulh mahmah hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah Pasian kumpigam sungah hih na a tangtun mateng ka nekik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin hai la a, lungdam ko in, “Hih hai la unla, a banban in dawn un.
Banghang hiam cihleh ken kong cih in ah, Pasian kumpigam hong tun mateng lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin anlum la in lungdam ko a, balkham in, “Hih in note aa dinga kipia ka pumpi ahi hi. Kei nong phawk nadingun hih bangin na bawl un,” ci in amaute a pia hi.
Tuamah bangin nitak an a nek khit uh ciangin hai zong la a, “Hih hai in note aa dingin a luangkhia, ka sisan tawh a kibawl kiciamna thak ahi hi.
Ahih hangin en un, kei hong lehhekpa khutin kei tawh ankuang a sawkkhawm hi.
A kisehsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai loh phamawh ahi hi. Ahi zongin amah a lehhekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tua banga a gamta ding kua pen i hi ding hiam, ci in a kidong uh hi.
Amaute lak panin kua lianpen ding ahi hiam cih zong a kisel uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Gentile‑te kumpite in a mite uh ukcip in thu neihna zang uh a, amau le amau ‘deihsakna a neite’ a kici uh hi.
Ahih hangin note lakah tua bang ding ahi kei hi. Tua bang hilo in note laka a lianpenpa in a neupenpa bangin om hen. A makaipa in nasempa bangin om hen.
Sabuai tunga an a nepa le an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? An ne a tupa lianzaw hilo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin note lakah an a piapa bangin kong om hi.
Ahi zongin, note in gimna ka thuak sungteng nong ompih uh hi.
Ka Pa in kei tungah kumpigam hong piak mah bangin ken zong note tungah kong pia hi.
Keima kumpigam sungah ka ankuang umin na ne na dawn ding uh a, kumpi tokhom tungah tu in Israel minam sawm le nihte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Simon, Simon aw! En in, Satan in an sep bangin nang hong sepkhia nuamin hong sawm hi.
Ahih hangin na upna na khahsuah loh nading thu kong ngetsak zo hi. Kei lamah nong kilehkik ciangin na sanggamte na hanthawn in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, nang tawh thong a kiakhawm ding ahi zongin, a sikhawm ding ahi zongin a kigingsa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Peter aw, ken kong cih in ah amah ka thei kei hi, ci a, thumvei nong nial khit mateng tuni in aak a khuang kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Sumbawm, thungip le khedapte keng lo a kong paisak lai in na kisap uh a om hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kisap bangmah ka nei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu in sumbawm neite in keng un. Thungip neite in zong keng un. Namsau a neilote in na puan uh zuak in lei un.

Ken kong cih in ah, ‘Thukham palsat mite tawh amah kisimkhawm hi,’ ci a, Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelhsa thu a tangtung ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah tawh kisai thu khempeuh a tangtung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Topa aw, en in, hihlai ah namsau nih a om hi,” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Pha zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah paikhia in ahih ngei bangin Tanluan mual ah pai a, a nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
Tua mun a tun ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun thungen un,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute kiang pan suanglot khat tan bang paibeh in khukdin in thungen a,
“Pa aw, na deihna ahih leh hih hai tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin keima deihna bang hilo in nangma deihna bang hi hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin vantungmi khat ama kiangah hong kilang in tha a pia hi.
Amah lunggim mahmah ahih manin thu nak nget semsem a, a khua‑ulte sisan mal golpi bangin leilak ah a takkhia hi.
Thu a nget khit ciangin dingkhia a, a nungzuite kiangah a pai ciangin amaute a dahna hangun gimin ihmu in a om a mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in ihmu na hi uh hiam? Ze‑etna sungah na lut khakloh nadingun tho unla thungen un,” a ci hi.
Tuateng a gen laitak mahin, en in, mihon khat a hong tung uh hi. Sawm le nihte lakah khat ahi Judas a kici pa in amaute hong makaih a, Zeisu nam dingin a kiangah a va naih hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ama kima om mite in a piang ding thuteng a theih uh ciangin ama kiangah, “Topa aw, namsau tawh ka vat ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute khatin Siampi Ukpa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Tua zah phazo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua pa bil lawngin a damsak hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amah man dinga hong pai siampi liante, biakinn cing bute le makaite kiangah, “Guta buluh khat man ding bangin namsau le molhtum tawh hong kuan na hi uh hiam?
Biakinnpi huang sungah ni simin note tawh ka omlai in nong man kei uh hi. Ahi zongin tuhun in note hun hi a, khuamial in thu a neih hun ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah manin paikhiatpih uh a, Siampi Ukpa inn ah a lutpih uh hi. Peter in a gamla sim panin a galzuih hi.
Tu in amaute in inntual laizang ah meicih in awi uh a, Peter in zong amaute tawh mei‑awi in a tukhawm hi.
Peter mei‑awi a a om laitak in nasem numeino khatin amah mu a, a ettel khit ciangin, “Hih mipa zong ama pawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in, “Numei aw, amah ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin midang khatin amah mu a, “Nang zong amaute pawl na hi hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Peter in, “Mipa aw, ka hi kei hi!” a ci hi.
Nai khat khit bang ciangin midang khatin, “Hihpa zong ama pawl taktak ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Galilee mi ahi hi,” ci in teltak in a gen hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in, “Mipa aw, na thugen ka thei kei hi!” a ci hi. Ama pau laitak mahin aak a hong khuang pah hi.
Topa kihei in Peter a en hi. Tua ciangin Peter in, “Aak khuanma in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” ci a, Topa gensa thu phawkkik a,
pusuak in nakpitak in a kap hi.
Tu in, Zeisu a mante in amah zahko in a sat uh hi.
A mit a tuamsak khit uh ciangin a pang beng uh a, “Nang hong beng kua ahi hiam? Kamsanna tawh hong gen dih in!” a ci uh hi.
Zahpihna thudang tampi tawh zong amah a kosia uh hi.
Khua a vak phetin mipite makai vaihawmte, siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate hong kisutuah in thukhenteɠ kiangah amah paipih uh a,
“Amaute in, Khazih na hih leh hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Kong gen hangin na um kei ding uh hi.
Thu hong dong leng zong nong dawng kei ding uh a, nong khah tuan kei ding uh hi.
Tunung ciangin Mihing Tapa in a thahat Pasian taklam khutah a tu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a vekpi un, “Tua ahih leh Pasian Tapa na hi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Na cih bangun ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Ama kam tektek panin za khinzo i hih manin teci dang bang kisam nawn ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin mihonpite a vekpi un dingkhia uh a, Pilate kiangah Zeisu a paipih uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hihpa in ka minam uh lam a khialsak hi. Amah le amah in Kumpi, Khazih ka hi hi ci in Caesar kumpipa tunga siah ka piak ding uh hong kham hi,” ci in a mawhmat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in ama kiangah, “Nang, Judahte Kumpipa na hi hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Na cih bangin ka hi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in siampi liante le mipite kiangah, “Hihpa tungah khialhna ka mu kei hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute uang semsem uh a, “Amah in Galilee gama kipan hih mun dong, Judea gam buppi ah thu hilhin mite a buaisak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Pilate in Galilee cih kammal a zak ciangin amah Galilee mi ahih leh ahih loh a dong hi.
Pilate in amah Herod uk sung mi ahihlam a theih ciangin tua laitak a Jerusalem khuapi a om Herod kiangah a puak hi.
Herod in Zeisu a muhnop sawt mahmah ahih manin amah a muh ciangin a nuam mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu thu tampi za khinzo a, Zeisu bawl nalamdang khatpeuh zong a mu kha dingin a kilamen hi.
Tua hi a, amah in thu tampi a dot hangin Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawng kei hi.
Tua ciangin siampi liante le thukhamhilh siate dingto in nasiatak in amah a mawhmat uh hi.
Herod le a galkapte in simmawh bawl in zahko uh a, puantualpi hoih mahmah khat a silhsak khit uh ciangin Pilate kiangah a puakkik uh hi.
A beisa hunin Pilate le Herod khat le khat a kigalbawl den uh ahih hangin tua ni in lawmta a suak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in siampi liante, upa vaihawmte le mipite samkhawm in,
amaute kiangah, “Hihpa in mipi lamkhialsak hi ci in ka kiangah nong puak uh hi. En un, note mai mahmah ah thu ka sit khin a, na mawhmatnate uh tawh kisai in ama tungah khialhna ka mu kei hi.
Herod kiangah amah kong paipihsak a, amah in zong sih nading zah mawhna bangmah a mu tuan kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin satin ka khah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pilate in tua pawi hun simin mi khat a khah khiatsak pen ngeina khat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amaute thakhat in kiko uh a, “Hihpa that inla, Barabbas hong khahsak in,” a ci uh hi.
Barabbas in khuapi sunga thupiang kumpi langpanna le mithahna hanga thongkiapa ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Pilate in Zeisu khah nuamin amaute tungah thu a genkik hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Amah khailum in, amah khailum in!” ci in a kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Banghang in amah khailum ding ka hi hiam? Siatna bang bawl ahi hiam? Sih nading mawhna ama tungah ka mu kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin satin ka khah ding hi,” ci in a thumveina a genkik hi.
Ahih hangin amaute nakpitak in kiko uha amah khailup dingin a ngen teitei uh hi. Mipite le siampi liante awging in amah zothawh gawp
ahih manin Pilate in amaute ngetna bangin thu a khen hi.
Kumpi langpanna le mithahna hanga thong a kia amau ngetpa khahsak in Zeisu ahih leh amaute deih banga a bawl nadingun amaute tungah a piakhia hi.
Tu in, amah a paikhiatpih laitak un khuano pana hong pai Cyrene gam mi Simon a lammat uh hi. Singlamteh suanin puasak uh a, Zeisu nungah a paisak uh hi.
Mihonpi in amah zui uh a, tuate lakah Zeisu kah in a tamlo numeite pawlkhat zong a om uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute lamah Zeisu kihei a, “Jerusalem tanute aw, kei hong kah kei un. No le na tate uh aa dingin kap zaw un.
Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Ta a neilo numei, a gil in nau a paai ngeilo, a nawi a kitep ngeilo numeite mihampha ahi uh hi,’ a cih hunte uh hong tung ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin amaute in, ‘Mual sangte aw, “Kote tungah hong cim un.” Mual niamte aw, “Kote hong vuk un,” ’ a ci ding uh hi.
“Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in singhing tungah hi ci bawl uh ahih leh singkeu tungah a bangci bawl ding uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Migilo nih zong thah dingin amah tawh a paipih uh hi.
Calvary a kici mun a tun uh ciangin tualai ah amah a khai uh hi. Migilo nihte zong a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat a khai uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Pa aw, amaute in bang hih uh cih theilo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in,” a ci hi. Amaute in lai‑aisan in a puante a hawm uh hi.
Mipite in dingin en uh a, upa vaihawmte zong amaute tawh a dingkhawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Amah in midangte honkhia hi. Pasian teelpa Khazih ahih leh amah le amah kihonkhia hen,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
Galkapte zong hong pai in lenggahtui thuk pia uh a,
“Judah mite Kumpipa na hih leh nang le nang kihonkhia in,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
“HIH IN JUDAHTE KUMPIPA,” ci in Greek lai, Latin lai le Hebrew lai tawh gelhin a lutung sanah a suang uh hi.
A kikhai migilote khat in, “Khazih na hih leh nang le nang kihonkhia inla kote zong hong honkhia in,” ci in a zahko hi.
A dang khatpa in tua pa taiigawp in, “Mawhsakna a thuak na hih lam kithei loin, Pasian kihta lo na hi hiam?
Eite gel bel i gamtatna tawh kizui in a hong kithukkik hilel a, i thuakna a thuman ahi hi. Ahi zongin hihpa in khialhna bangmah a bawl kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu kiangah, “Topa aw, na kumpigam sung na tun ciangin kei hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tuni in Paradise ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hun in nai guk pawl hi a, tua hun a kipan nai kua dong leitung bup ah khim a zing hi.
Ni mialin biakinnpi sung kideina puan phelnih a kisuah hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Pa aw, ‘Na khut sungah ka kha kong ap hi,’ ” ci in nakpi in a kiko khit ciangin a hu tawpna a sangkhia hi.
Galkap 100 ukpa in thupiang teng a muh ciangin, “Hihpa in midik taktak ahi hi,” ci in Pasian a phat hi.
A en dinga hong pai mi khempeuh in thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin a awm uh bengin a ciah uh hi.
Ahih hangin ama meltheih khempeuh le Galilee gam pan amah a zui numeite in gamlapi ah dingin, thupiang teng a galet uh hi.
Tu in, en in, Joseph kici upa vaihawmte khat om a, amah mihoih midik khat ahi hi.
Amah in amaute vaihawmna le a sepnate uh a thukimpih kei hi. Amah in Judahte khua lian khat ahi Arimathea khua mi hi a, Pasian kumpigam a lamen mi khat zong ahi hi.
Pilate kiangah amah pai in Zeisu luang a va ngen hi.
A ngah ciangin Zeisu luang lakhia in puanpak tawh a tun hi. Tua khit ciangin kuamah a kivui ngei nai lohna, suang kikhuak han sungah a sial hi.
Tua ni in Kigin Niɠ hi a, Sabbath ni a kipan dekta hi.
Galilee gam pana Zeisu hong zui numeite in hanah zui in a han le a luang kisial dan a en uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin ciah uh a, paknamtui le sathau namtuite a baihsa in a koih uh hi. Tuateng khit ciangin thukham tawh kizui in Sabbath ni a tawlnga uh hi.
Tu in nipi khat sunga ni masa pen ni, zingsang phalvak tungin tua numeite in a baihsa a a koih uh paknamtuite tawi in dai a hawh uh hi. Numei dangte pawlkhat in zong a zui uh hi.
Amaute in han a suangtumpi kilikkhia sa a om mu uh a,
han sungah a lut uh leh Topa Zeisu luang a mu kei uh hi.
Tua banga lungmang in a om laitak un en in, puanpak tee dialdial a silh mi nih amaute kiangah a hong ding hi.
Numeite lau mahmah in leilak ah kunsuk a a om laitak un tua mite in, “Banghang in a nungta mi khat misite lakah zong na hi uh hiam?
Amah hihlai ah om nawnlo hi a thokik zo hi. Galilee gamah a omlai in a hong gensa thu phawk un.
‘Mihing Tapa in mimawhte khutah kipiakhia in singlamteh ah khai ding uh a, a ni thum ni in a thokik ding hi,’ ci in,” a gen hi.
Tua ciangin numeite in ama gensa thute a phawkkik uh hi.
Han panin amaute ciah uh a, sawm le khatte le a dangte khempeuh kiangah tua thuteng a gen uh hi.
Sawltakte kiangah hih thu a gen mite in, Magdala khua mi Mary, Joanna, James nu Mary le amaute a zui numei dangte ahi uh hi.
Numeite in hih thute a gen uh ciangin sawltakte in a mawkpau sa uh ahih manin a um kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin Peter dingkhia in han lamah a va tai hi. Kunsuk in han sung a et leh puanpakte bek mu a, thupiang teng lamdangsa in a ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni mahin amaute lakah mi nih Jerusalem khuapi pan tai sagih bang a gamla Emmaus kici khuaneu khat zuanin a pai uh hi.
A nih un tua thupiang teng a kikum uh hi.
Tua bangin holim in thu kikum in a om laitak un Zeisu in va naih a, amaute tawh a tonkhawm hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in Zeisu ahihlam a theih loh nadingun a mit uh a kimangsak hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Na lampai kawmun bang thu kikum a, banghang in maikhing na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
A min Cleopas kici pa in, “Jerusalem khuapi a a zinte lakah tu nai‑a tua khuapi sunga thupiangte a theilo nang bek hi ni teh maw?” ci in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang thu piang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A nasep le a thugente Pasian le mi khempeuh mai ah a vanglian mahmah Kamsangpa Nazareth khua mi Zeisu tawh kisai thu ahi hi.
Tua bang hi napi siampi liante le upa vaihawmte in sihna thukhenna thuak dingin amah piakhia uh a, a kikhailum hi.
Ahi zongin ko bel amah Israelte a tankhia ding pa hi ci in ka lamen uh hi. Tua thamlo in hih thuteng a pianzawh tu in ni thum phata hi.
Tua hi a, zingsang tunga daihawh a pai ka lawm numei pawlkhatte thugente in zong hong lungmangsak mahmah hi.
Amau hong kilehkik uh a, a luang a muh lohna thu le amah hingkik zo hi ci a, a gen vantungmite a muhna thute a hong gen uh hi.
Ka lawmte uh pawlkhat zong hanah va pai in numeite gen bangmah in nadang teng na om a, ahi zongin amah a mu kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Kamsangte gensa thu khempeuh a um khin theilo lungsimmawl le mihaite aw,
Khazih in hihte khempeuh thuak masa dinga, tua khit ciangin minthanna a ngah ding mah hilo ahi hiam?” ci in,
Moses le Kamsangte laibu khempeuh a kipan Lai Siangtho buppi sunga ama thu a kigenna teng a khiatna a hilh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a pai nading khua tung dekta uh a, Zeisu a paisuak ding bangin a kineih hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Ni zong tum dekta a khua zong mial ta ding ahih ciangin ko kiangah hong taam in,” ci in a kho uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute tawh a tamkhawm dingin inn sungah amah a lut hi.
Amaute tawh an ne a a tut uh ciangin amah in anlum la in lungdam ko a, balkham in amaute a pia hi.
Tua laitak in amaute mit kihong a, Zeisu ahihlam a thei uh hi. Ahi zongin amah na mang khin a, a mu nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Lampi ah hong hopih a Lai Siangtho khiatna khawng a hong genlai in i lungsim hong su kha mahmah hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tua hun mahin amaute dingkhia uh a, Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi. Tualai ah sawm le khatte le amau lawmte na kikhawm uh a,
“Topa thokik taktak in, Simon kiangah kilang hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amaute gel in zong lampi a thupiang teng le anlum a balkhap laitak a amaute a kitheihsakna teng a genkik uh hi.
Hih thute a gen laitak un amaute laizang ah Zeisu hong dinga, “Note tungah lungnopna om tahen,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in sikha a mu kisa uh ahih manin lau in a linggawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Banghang in lau na hi uh hiam? Banghang in um zolo na hi uh hiam?
Ka khut ka khete hong en un. Kei mahmah ka hi hi. Hong lawng unla thei un. Sikha in hih bangin satak le guh le tang neilo hi,” a ci hi.
Hih banga a gen khit ciangin a khut le a khete a lak hi.
Ahih hangin amaute nuamlua in lamdangsa mahmah in um zo nai tuanlo uh ahih manin amah in amaute kiangah, “Nek theih khatpeuh na nei uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ngasa hankeu khat le khuailuzu phelkhat a pia uh hi.
Amah in sang a, amau muhin a ne hi.

Tua khit ciangin amaute kiangah, “Moses Thukham laibu, Kamsangte laibu le Late laibu sunga keima thu a kigelh khempeuh a tangtung ding hi ci in note tawh kong omkhop lai a kong gen thute in hih thute ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Lai Siangtho a theih nadingun amaute lungsim a honsak hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh bangin Khazih in hih bangin gimna thuak dinga, a ni thum ni in misite lak pan a thokik ding mah ahi hi.
Mawhna kisikkikna thu le mawhna maisakna thu Jerusalem khuapi pan kipan in minam khempeuh tungah ama min tawh a kitangko ding hi.
Hih thute teci a pang ding note na hi uh hi.

En un, ka Pa in note hong piak dinga a hong kamciamsa ahi Kha Siangtho kong sawl ding hi. Ahi zongin tunglam panin vangliatna in note a hong tuam khit mateng Jerusalem khuapi ah na ngak phot un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Bethany khua dongah amaute a paipih hi. Tua ciangin a khutte lamto in amaute thupha a pia hi.
Amaute thupha a piak laitak in amaute kiang pan amah kilakhia a, vantung ah a kilato hi.
Amaute in amah bia uh a, tua khit ciangin lungdamna lianpi tawh Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian min phat kawmsa le lungdam ko in biakinnpi huang sungah a om tawntung uh hi. Amen.
A kipatcil in Thu a om hi. Thu in Pasian tawh a omkhawm hi. Tua Thu in Pasian ahi hi.
A kipatcil in amah in Pasian tawh a omkhawm hi.
Na khempeuh ama tungtawn a kibawl hi a, a kibawl nate amah lo tawh a kibawl khat beek a om kei hi.
Ama sungah nuntakna om a, tua nuntakna in mihingte aa dingin khuavak ahi hi.
Tua khuavak in khuamial lakah tang a, khuamial in amah a zo kei hi.
Pasian hong sawl mi khat om a, tua pa minin John ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh in ama tungtawn in a up theih nadingun amah in Khuavak tawh kisai teci pang dingin a hong paipa ahi hi.
Amah, tua Khuavak hilo a, tua Khuavak thu teci a pang ding beka hong kisawl ahi hi.
Tua Khuavak in leitunga piang mi khempeuh a taankim Khuavak taktak ahi hi.
Amah leitung ah hong om a, ama tungtawn in leitung a kibawl hi napi leitung in amah a thei kei hi.
Amah a mite kianga hong pai hi napi a mite in amah a sang kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah sang a, ama min a um mi khempeuh Pasian tate suah theihna thu a pia hi.
Tua suahna pen sisan tawh hilo, ci le sa deihna zong hilo, mihing deihna hang zong hilo in Pasian deihna hanga suahna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Thu in mihing hong suak a, eite lakah hong teengin eite in ama minthanna i mu hi. Tua in, Pa in khat bek a neih a Tapa a piak minthanna hi a, hehpihna le thuman thutak tawh a kidim hi.
Ama thu John in teci pang a, “ ‘Ka nunga hong paipa in kei pianma in om khinzo ahih manin kei sangin a lianzaw hi,’ kong cihpa in amah ahi hi,” ci in a kiko hi.
Eite khempeuh in ama kicinna sung panin hehpihna khat khit khat i ngah hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Moses tungtawn in thukham hong kipia a, ahih hangin Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in hehpihna le thuman thutak hong pia hi.
Cikmah hunin kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Ahih hangin Pa ang sunga om Tapa khat bekin Pasian hong pulakkhia hi.
Hih in John teci panna ahi hi. Judah mite in John kiangah, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” ci a, a dong dingin Jerusalem khuapi panin siampi liante le Levi mite a sawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin John in, “Keimah in Khazih ka hi kei hi,” ci in ki‑iim loin siangtak in a kigen hi.

Amaute in, “Tua ahih leh nang kua na hi hiam? Elijah na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” a ci hi. “Tua ahih leh Kamsangpa na hi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kua na hi hiam? Ko hong sawlte kiangah ka genkik theih nadingun nang kua kici na hi hiam hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Kamsangpa Isaiah gen bangin, ‘ “Topa lampi na tangsak un,” Ci a, gamlak a kiko awging,’ ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in, amaute in Pharisee pawlte sawl mite ahi uh hi.
Amaute in, “Nang Khazih hilo, Elijah hilo, Kamsangpa lah hilo na hih leh banghang in mite tuiphum na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
John in, “Mite tui tawh ka phum mah hi. Ahih hangin na theihloh uh mi khat note lakah a om hi.
Ka nunga hong paipa in kei sangin vanglian zaw a, ama khedapkhau sut ding nangawn in ka kilawm kei hi kong cihpa in amah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute in John tuiphumna mun Jordan gungal khat a om Bethabara khua‑a a piang thute ahi hi.
A zingciang in John in ama kianglam manawh a hong pai Zeisu mu a, “En un! Leitung mite mawhna a puakhia Pasian Tuuno!
‘Kei omma in amah om khin ahih manin kei sangin lianzaw a, kei nungah hong pai ding hi,’ kong cihpa in hihpa ahi hi.
Keimah in amah ka theih loh hangin tuiphum dinga kong paina in Israel mite lakah amah a kilatkhiat theih nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua banah, John in teci panga a gen in ah, “Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong kumsuk a ama tungah a khawl ka mu hi.
Keimah in amah ka theih loh hangin tuiphum dinga hong sawlpa in, ‘Kha hong kumsuk a, a tungah a khawl na muh leh tua pa in Kha Siangtho tawh a phum ding pa ahi hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua bangin ama tungah hong piang mu khin ka hih manin hihpa in Pasian Tapa ahi hi ci in teci ka pang hi,” a ci hi.
A zingciang in John le a nungzui nihte, a dinkhop laitak un,
Zeisu hong pai mu uh a, John in, “En un, Pasian Tuuno!” a ci hi.
A nungzui nihte in John thugen a zak uh ciangin Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu kihei a, amaute gel in a zuih uh a muh ciangin, “Bang zong na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Rabbi aw, na omna koilai ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. (Rabbi a khiatna in “siapa” cihna ahi hi.)
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hong pai unla hong en un,” a ci hi. Amaute pai uh a, a omna mun a mu uh hi. Tua hun in nai sawm pawl hita ahih manin amah tawh tua ni a tamkhawm uh hi.
John thugen za a, Zeisu nung a zui nihte lakah khatin Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew ahi hi.
Andrew in a sanggampa Simon va zong masa a, “Messiah ka mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi. (Messiah a khiatna in “Pasian Sathau‑nilhpa” cihna ahi hi.)
Andrew in Zeisu kiangah a sanggampa a paipih hi. Zeisu in amah en a, “Nang Jonah tapa Simon na hi hi. Cephas hong kici ding hi,” a ci hi. (Cephas a khiatna in “suang” cihna ahi hi.)
A zingciang in Galilee ah Zeisu paisawm a, Philip a muh ciangin, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Philip zong Bethsaida khua pan mah hi a, Andrew le Peter‑te khuapih ahi hi.
Philip in Nathanael a muh ciangin, “Moses in Thukham laibu sunga a gelh le Kamsangte in laibu sunga a gelh uh Joseph tapa, Nazareth khua mi Zeisu ka mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Nathanael in, “Nazareth khua panin a hoih na khat peuhpeuh piang thei zawzen ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Philip in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in Nathanael ama kianglam zuana hong pai a muh ciangin, “En un, hihpa in a lungsim ah zuauthu a omlo Israel mi taktak ahi hi!” a ci hi.
Nathanael in, “Kei hong bangci theih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Philip in nang hong sapma, theikung nuai‑a na om laitak in kong mu zo hi,” a ci hi.
Nathanael in, “Rabbi aw, nang in Pasian Tapa na hi a, Israel mite Kumpipa zong na hi hi!” ci in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, “ ‘Theikung nuai‑a na omlai pekin kong mu zo hi,’ ka cih manin hong um na hi hiam? Hihte sanga a lianzaw nate na mulai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tunung ciangin van kihong in Mihing Tapa tungah Pasian vantungmite a kumsuk le a kahto a om na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
A ni thumna ni in Galilee gam Cana khua ah mopawi khat om a, Zeisu nu in zong a va sim hi.
Zeisu le a nungzuite zong tua mopawi sim dingin a kisam hi.
Lenggahzu a bei ciangin a nu in Zeisu kiangah, “Amaute in lenggahzu nei nawnlo uh hi,” ci in a ko hi.
Zeisu in, “Numei aw, banghang in na lung hihmawhna hong ko zenzen na hi hiam? Ka hun a tung nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
A nu in nasemte kiangah, “Ama hong cih bangbang in na hih un,” a ci hi.
Tualai ah Judah mite kisiansuahna a kizang, khat sungah tui gallon 20 gallon 30 bang a ta thei, thambel guk a om hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih bel teng tui dim un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in belgong dong dimin tui a sung uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Tu in, pawlkhat suak unla, pawi ukpa va pia un,” a ci hi. Amaute in zong suakin a pia uh hi.
Pawi ukpa in lenggahzu a kisuaksak tua tui a ciam hi. Tua lenggahzu koi pan kingah hiam cih tuitawi nasemte in a theih uh hangin amah in thei lo ahih manin mopipa sam a,
“Midangte in lenggahzu a ciilteng hawm masa in a kikham khit ciangin a pengteng hawm pan uh hi. Banghang in tu dongin a ciilteng sit lai na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in Galilee gam Cana khua ah a masapen hih nalamdang bawl in ama vangliatna a kilangsak hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite in amah a um uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in a nu, a sanggamte le a nungzuite tawh Capernaum khua ah paisuk uh a, tualai ah tawmvei sung a taam uh hi.
Tu in Judah mite Paisan Pawi hong naita ahih manin Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a paito hi.
Biakinnpi huang sungah bawng zuak, tuu zuak, vakhu zuakte le sumkhek in summet bawla a omte a mu hi.
Amah in khautep khat bawl in tuute, bawngte le mi khempeuh biakinnpi huang sung panin a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhekteɠ sumteng buakkhiatsak in sabuaite zong a lumlet hi.
Vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Hihte lakhia un! Ka Pa inn sumlei sumzuakna inn suaksak kei un!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Na inn ka khualna in kei hong netum hi,” ci a, kigelhsa thu a phawk uh hi.
Judah mite in, “Hih bang na hih theih nadingin thuneihna na neih lam bang lim tawh hong lak ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Hih biakinnpi susia le uh cin ni thum sungin ka lamkik ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Hih biakinnpi kum 46 sung vilvel a kilam ahi hi. Nang ni thum sungin dingkiksak zo zawzen ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in biakinnpi a cih ciangin ama pumpi a genna ahi hi.
Tua hi a, misite lak pan amah a kithawhkiksak khit ciangin a nungzuite in amaute kiangah hih thu a gen khit lam phawkkik uh a, Lai Siangtho le Zeisu thugente a um uh hi.
Tu in Jerusalem khuapi ah Paisan Pawi hun sungin Zeisu a om hi. Tua pawi sunga a bawl nalamdangte a muh uh ciangin mitampi in ama min a um uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in mi khempeuh thei ahih manin amaute tungah a mah ki‑ap lo hi.
Amah in mihing lungsim sungah bang om cih thei khin ahih manin mi khat thu midang khatin a gen ding a kisam kei hi.
Nicodemus kici Judah mite upa vaihawm Pharisee pawlte khat a om hi.

Hihpa in zan laitak in Zeisu kiangah va pai a, “Rabbi aw, Pasian in amah a ompih kei leh kuama peuhin na bawl nalamdangte bawl theilo ding ahih manin Pasian kiang panin hong pai siapa khat na hih lam kong thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, mi khat a suahkik kei leh Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Nicodemus in, “Mi khat a tek khit ciangin bangci suahkik theih ding ahi hiam? A nu gil sungah khatvei lutkik in suak thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, tui le Kha tawh a suakkiklo mi peuhmah Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut thei kei ding hi.
Ci le sa pana suakte ci le sa mah hi a, Kha pana suakte zong kha mah ahi hi.
‘Na suahkik loh phamawh hi,’ kong cih pen lamdangsa kei in.
Huih in a utna peuh ah nung a, a huging na zak hangin koi lampan hong nung a, koilam manawh hiam cih na thei kei hi. Kha tawh a suak mi khempeuh zong tua bang ahi hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Nicodemus in, “Hih thute koici pian theih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Nang Israel mite siapa khat hi napi in hih thute thei lo zawzen na hi hiam?
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, kote in ka theih uh thu genin ka muh uh thu teci ka pang uh hi. Ahih hangin note in kote teci panna na sang kei uh hi.
Leitung thu kong gente um lo na hih uh leh vantung thute hong genleng, bangci up theih ding na hi uh hiam?
Vantung ah omin vantung pana hong kumsuk Mihing Tapa longal vantung ah a kahto kuamah a om kei hi.
Moses in gamlak ah gul a khai bangin Mihing Tapa kikhai ding hi.
Amah a um mi khempeuh in kisialo a nuntak tawntungna a neih nading ahi hi.
“Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin khat bek a neihsun a Tapa a hong pia hi. Tua Tapa a um mi khempeuh in kisialo a nuntak tawntungna a ngah nading ahi hi.
“Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite mawhsak dingin Pasian in a Tapa leitung ah hong sawl hilo in leitung mite in ama tungtawn a hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingin hong sawl ahi hi.
Amah a um mi in thukhenna a thuak kei hi. Ahih hangin a umlo mi ahih leh Pasian in khat bek a neihsun a Tapa min um lo ahih manin tu mahmah in thukhenna a thuakzo hi.
Hih thukhenna in leitung ah khuavak hong tung khin napi mite a gamtatna uh hoih lo ahih manin khuavak sangin khuamial a deih zaw uh hi.
Siatna a bawl mi peuhmah in khuavak mudah a, khuavak a zuan kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a gamtatnate uh kipholak kha ding ahih man ahi hi.
Ahi zongin thuman in a gamta mi in ama gamtatnate Pasian deihna tawh kituak hi cih a kitelmuh nadingin khuavak a zuan hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thuteng khit ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite tawh Judea gamah pai in tualai ah amaute tawh omkhawm a, mite tui a phum hi.
Tu in John in zong Salim khua tawh kinai Aenon ah tuiphum in a om hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tualai ah tui tampi a om hi. Mite hong pai in tui a kiphumsak uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh John thong sungah a kikhum nai kei hi.
Tua ciangin kisiansuahna thu tawh kisai in John nungzuite le Judah mite a kisel uh hi.
Amaute John kiangah pai uh a, “Rabbi aw, Jordan gungal khatah nangmah tawh a omkhawm ngei ama thu teci na panpa in mite tui a phum hi. En in, mi khempeuh in ama nung a zui khin ta uh hi!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin John in, “Vantung panin a kipiak kei leh kuamah in bangmah a bawlthei kei ding hi.
‘Kei Khazih hilo in ama mai‑a kisawlpa ka hi hi,’ ci a, kong genna ah no mahmah ka teci na hi uh hi.
A kipi monu in zineipa aa ahi hi. Zineipa kianga a ding bawmtapa in zineipa aw a zak ciangin a lungdam mahmah hi. Keima lungdamna zong tua banglian mah hi a, tu in ka lungdamna kicing zo hi.
Amah lian semsem dinga kei ka hih leh ka neu semsem ding hi.

“Tung lam pana hong paipa in na khempeuh tungah a lianpenpa ahi hi. Leitung pana a piang mi in leitung mi hi a, leitung thu a gen hi. Vantung pana hong paipa ahih leh na khempeuh tungah a lianpenpa ahi hi.
Amah in a muhsa le a zaksa thu teci hong pan hangin kuamah in ama teci panna a sang kei uh hi.
Ama teci panna a sang mi in Pasian a thuman hi cih a kipsak ahi hi.
Pasian sawlpa in Pasian thu a gen hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama tungah ciangtan om loin Kha a pia hi.
Pa in a Tapa it a, ama khut sungah na khempeuh a pia hi.
Tapa a um mi in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi. Ahih hangin Tapa a umlo mi in nuntakna neilo dinga, Pasian hehna ama tungah a om hi,” a ci hi.
John sangin Zeisu in mi tam tuiphum zaw in nungzui tam a ngah zawk lam Pharisee pawlte in a zak uh Topa in a thei hi.
(Zeisu tektek in tui a phum loh hangin a nungzuite in tui a phum ahi hi.)
Tua ciangin amah in Judea gam nusia in Galilee gamah a paikik hi.
Tua banga a pai ciangin Samaria gam a nawk kul hi.
Tua ciangin Jacob in a tapa Joseph a piak logam tawh kinai, Samaria gam Sychar kici khua a hong tung hi.
Tu in tua munah Jacob tuikhuk a om hi. Zeisu a lampaina gim ahih manin tua tuikhuk gei ah a tu hi. Tua hun in nai guk pawl ahi hi.
Tua laitak in Samaria numei khat tuitawi dingin hong pai a, Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Ka dawn ding tui hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a nungzuite khua sungah an lei dingin a paikhia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samaria numei in ama kiangah, “Nang Judah mi hi napi in banghang in Samaria numei keima kiangah tui hong ngen na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite le Samaria mite a kipawl thei kei uh hi.

Zeisu in, “Pasian hong piak letsong thei in, ‘Ka dawn ding tui hong pia in,’ a cipa kua hiam cih thei lecin ama kiangah tui na ngen khinzo dinga, amah in nuntakna tui nang a hong pia khinzo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Numei in, “Sia aw, tui khai nading bangmah na nei kei a, tuikhuk lah thuk ahih manin tua nuntakna tui koi pan ngah ding na hi hiam?
Hih tuikhuk hong piapa, ka pupi uh Jacob sangin lianzaw na hi hiam? Amah a kipan a tate le a ganhingte in hih tuikhuk tui a nek uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua nu kiangah, “Hih tui a dawn mi peuhmah a dangtakkik ding hi.

Ahih hangin ken ka piak tui a dawn mi peuhmah in a dangtak ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ka piak ding tui in tua mi sungah tuikhuk suak dinga, tua tuikhuk panin nuntak tawntungna tui a phul ding hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Numei in, “Sia aw, ka dangtak nawnloh nading le hih munah tuitawi a ka paikik nawnloh nadingin tua tui hong pia in,” ci in a ngen hi.
Zeisu in, “Pai inla na pasal va sam in. Tua khit ciangin hong paikik un,” a ci hi.
Numei in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi,” a cih ciangin, Zeisu in, “ ‘Pasal ka nei kei hi,’ na cih pen a maan hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh pasal nga na nei khinzo a, tu‑a na neih pen zong na pasal hilo ahih manin thuman na gen hi,” a ci hi.
Numei in, “Sia aw, kamsang khat na hih lam kong thei hi.
Ka pute ka pate un hih mualtung ah Pasian a bia uh hi. No Judah mite in Jerusalem khuapi bekah Pasian kibia ding hi na ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Numei aw, ka thu gen hong um in. Hih mualtung ah ahi a, Jerusalem khuapi ah ahi zongin Pa a kibiakloh hun hong tung ding hi.
Note in na theih lohpi uh na bia uh hi. Kote in ka theih uh ka bia uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite tung panin hotkhiatna hong piang hi.
Ahih hangin a bia taktakte in kha le thuman thutak tawh Pasian a biak ding hun uh tu in hong tung zota hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua banga amah a bia ding mite Pa in a zong hi.
Pasian in Kha ahi hi. Amah a biate in lungsim le thuman thutak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Numei in ama kiangah, “Khazih kici Messiah hong pai ding hi cih ka thei hi. Amah a hong tun ciangin na khempeuh a hong hilhcian ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Nangmah tawh a kiho keimah in tua Messiah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua laitak in a nungzuite hong tungkik uh a, tua numei tawh a kihona lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi zongin, “Bang na deihna ahi hiam?” cih ahi a, “Banghang in tua nu hopih na hi hiam?” cih ahi zongin kuamah in a dong ngam kei uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin numei in a tuibel nusia in khua sungah tai a, a khuapihte kiangah,
“Hong pai unla, ka gamtatna khempeuh hong genpa hong en un. Amah Khazih hilo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute khua sung panin Zeisu kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
Amaute hong tunma in a nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, an ne in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Note theihloh nek ding an khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Mi khatpeuh in nek theih ding khatpeuh puak khin ahi kha ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Kei hong sawlpa deihna bang sem a, ama hong piak nasep ka zawhna in ka annek ahi hi.
‘Tu zawh kha li khit ciangin an kila ding hi,’ ci hilo na hi uh hiam? Ken kong cih in ah khuadak unla lote en un. Ante min khin a, anlak hun hong tungzo hi!
A vawhpa le anlapa a lungdam khop theih nadingun anlapa in thaman sangin nuntak tawntungna gah zong a kaikhawm ding hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatin vawh a, midang khatin a at hi a kici thu a maan hi.
Note khawhlohna lo ah an la dingin kong sawl hi. Midangte in na kho uh a, note in amaute sepsa a la ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
“Ka gamtatna khempeuh hong gen hi,” a ci tua numeinu teci panna hangin Samaria khua mi tampi in Zeisu a um uh hi.
Samaria khua mite Zeisu kianga tun uh ciangin amau khua ah a taam dingin kho uh a, tua khua ah ni nih a taam hi.
Ama thugenna hangin thu‑um mi tampi a kibehlap hi.

Tua khit ciangin amaute in numeinu kiangah, “Nang nong gen hang beka um ka hi nawn kei uh hi. Kote mahmah in ama thugen za in, amah in leitung mite a Honpa Khazih taktak hi cih ka theih manun a um ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ni nih khit ciangin tua khua panin Zeisu paikhia a, Galilee gam a tung hi.
Zeisu in, “Kamsang khat ama pianna gamah kipahtawi lo hi,” a ci hi.
Galilee gam a tun ciangin Galilee mite in amah a sang uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Jerusalem khuapi ah pawisim in a pai lai un Zeisu nasep khempeuh a mu khinzo uh hi.
Tuisik lenggahzu a suahsakna Galilee gam Cana khua ah Zeisu a paikik hi. Tua laitak in Capernaum khua‑a om kumpi nasem ulian khatpa tapa cina in a om hi.
Tua pa in Judea gam panin Galilee gamah Zeisu hong tung cih thu a zak ciangin a kiangah va pai a, “Ka tapa cina in a si ding hita hi. Hong pai inla, hong damsak in,” ci in a thum hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Note in limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite na muh kei ngal uh leh na um peuhmah kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ulianpa in, “Sia aw, ka tapa a sihma in hong paisuk tapeuh in!” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Ciah in na tapa a damzo hi,” a ci hi. Tua pa in Zeisu thugen um ahih manin a ciah pah hi.
Amah a paisuk laitak in a nasemte in na dawntuah uh a, “Na tapa a damzo hi!” ci in a ko uh hi.
Amah in a tapa dam hun a dot ciangin amaute in, “Zan ni nai sagih hunin a cisa natna hong dam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Na tapa a damzo hi,” a cih hun lian mahin a dam lam a pa in a theih ciangin amah le a innkuanpih khempeuh in Zeisu a um uh hi.
Hih in Judea gam pan Galilee gamah Zeisu a tun khit nalamdang a bawl a nihveina ahi hi.
Tua khit ciangin Judah mite pawikhat hong tung a, Jerusalem khuapi ah Zeisu a hawhto hi.
Tu in, Jerusalem khuapi a Tuu Kongpi kiangah Hebrew pau in Bethesda a kici bual khat om a, tua bual kimkot ah buuk nga a om hi.
Tua buukte sungah mittaw, khebai, khutzaw, khezaw a kipan cina tampi tui kilok ding ngakin a lum uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a hun khat ciangin tua bual ah vantungmi khat hong kumsuk in tui a lok hi. Tui a kilawh laitak tui sunga a kidiah masa penpen a natna khempeuh a damsiang pahpah hi.
Tua munah kum 38 sung a kumzawn mi khat a om hi.
Tua pa a lupsa a om Zeisu in mu a, a nat zawh sawt khinzo hi cih thei ahih manin, “Na dam nuam hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Cinapa in, “Sia aw, tui a kilawh laitak bual ah hong paipih ding mi ka neih loh banah kei thu a ka pai ciangin ka mai ah midang khat ta na tung khin pahpah hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Tho in na lupna pua inla pai in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua pa dam pah a, a lupna pua in lam a pai hi. Tua ni in Sabbath ni ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in damna a ngahpa kiangah, “Sabbath ni, tuni in na lupna na puak thukham tawh kituak lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei hong damsakpa in, ‘Na lupna pua inla, pai in,’ hong ci hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “ ‘Na lupna pua inla pai in,’ hong cipa kua ahi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Tua muna om mihonpite lak panin Zeisu kihemkhia ahih manin damna a ngahpa in amah a damsakpa a thei kei hi.

Tua nung ciangin Zeisu in biakinnpi huang sungah tua cinapa mukik a, ama kiangah, “En in, tu in damta na hih manin nang tungah a siahuai zaw khatpeuh a hong tun loh nadingin mawhna na bawl nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua pa paikhia a, amah a damsakpa Zeisu ahihlam Judah mite kiangah a gen hi.
Zeisu in hih nate Sabbath ni in bawl ahih manin Judah mite in amah bawlsia a a thah theih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Ka Pa in tu dongin nasem ahih manin ken zong ka sem hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Tua hi a, Zeisu in Sabbath ni a tan loh banah Pasian nangawn ka Pa hi ci in Pasian tawh a kikim in kikoih ahih manin Judah mite in amah a that nuam semsem uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, Tapa in Pa nasep a muh banga a sep lohngal ama thu in bangmah a semthei kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pa sep bangbang Tapa in zong a sem ahi hi.
Pa in Tapa it ahih manin ama nasep khempeuh a lak hi. Tua ahih manin hihte sanga nasep thupi zawte, amah laklai dinga, note in lamdang na sa mahmah ding uh hi.
Pa in misite thosak a, nuntakna a piak bangin Tapa in zong a piak nop mite tungah nuntakna a pia hi.
Pa in kuama tungah thukhen lo a, thukhenna khempeuh Tapa khut sungah a ap khinzo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in Pa a pahtawi bangin Tapa zong a pahtawi theih nading uh ahi hi. Tapa a pahtawilo mi in Pa in a sawlpa zong a pahtawi lo ahi hi.
“Aman takpi kong cih in ah, keima thu za a, kei hong sawlpa a um mi in nuntak tawntungna neizo ahih manin thukhenna a thuak kei ding hi. Sihna pan paikhia in nuntakna a tungzo hi.
Aman takpi kong cih in ah, misite in Pasian Tapa aw a zak ding hun hong tung ding hi. Tu in hong tungzo a, tua aw a za mite a nungta ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pa in ama sungah nuntakna a neih bangin Tapa in zong ama sungah nuntakna a neih nadingin Pa in thu a piazo hi.
Amah Mihing Tapa ahih manin thukhen theih nading thuneihna zong a pia hi.
“Hih thu lamdangsa kei un, han sunga om mite khempeuh in ama aw za in,
a hong pusuah hun uh hong tung dinga, a pha in a gamtate in a nungta dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a sia in a gamtate in mawhsakna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uh hi.
Keima ut thu in bangmah ka hih kei hi. Ka zak bang beka thu a khen ka hi hi. Keima deihna zui loin kei hong sawlpa ka Pa deihna bang zui ka hih manin ka thukhenna a maan hi.
“Kei le kei teci a kipang hi leng, ka teci panna a maan kei ding hi.
Kei aa dingin teci pang a dang khat om a, ama teci panna in thuman hi cih ka thei hi.
“Note in John kiangah thudong dingin mi na sawl uh a, amah in thuman thutak teci a pangzo hi.
Tua ka cih ciangin mihing teci panna a kisam ka hi kei a, note hong kihotkhiat theih nadingin hih thute a hong gen ka hi hi.
Amah in meivak bangin kuangin tang a, note in ama khuavak sungah tawlkhat sung nopsak ding na ut uh hi.
“Ahih hangin John teci panna sanga a lianzaw teci khat ka nei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pa in ka zawh dinga hong piak nasepte ka sem a, Pa in kei a hong sawl lam tua nasepte in teci a pang uh hi.
Kei hong sawlpa ka Pa mahmah in kei aa dingin teci a pangzo hi. Note in cikmah hunin ama aw na za ngei kei uh a, a mel zong na mu ngei kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin ama hong sawlpa um lo na hih manun note sungah ama thu a teeng kei hi.
Nuntak tawntungna ngah theih nading lametna tawh, Lai Siangtho na limsim mahmah uh a, tua na sim uh Lai Siangtho in keima thu mah genin teci pang napi,
nuntakna na neih nadingun keima kiangah nong pai nuam kei uh hi.
“Keimah in mite pahtawi dingin thu ka gen kei hi.
Ahih hangin note in Pasian na it loh lam uh kong thei hi.
Ka Pa minin kong pai a, nong sang kei uh hi. Midang khatpeuh ama minin hong pai leh na sang ding uh hi.
Pasian khat bek kiang pana a hong pai pahtawina zong loin khat le khat kipahtawi thuk ding a ut zaw note in bangci in um thei ding na hi uh hiam?
“Ahi zongin Pa mai ah note hong mawhsak dingin hong ngaihsun kei un. Note hong mawhsak dingpen na muanpa uh Moses ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Moses in keima thu gelh ahih manin amah um taktak le uh teh kei zong nong um ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin ama laigelhte um lo na hih manun kong gen thute bangci up theih ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Hih thuteng khit ciangin Tiberias tuipi kici Galilee tuili gal khat ah Zeisu a galkah hi.
Tua ciangin cinate tunga a bawl nalamdangte mihonpite in mu khin uh ahih manin ama nung a zui uh hi.
Mualtung ah Zeisu kahto in tualai ah a nungzuite tawh a tukhawm hi.
Tu in Judah mite Paisan Pawi a naita hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu khuadak a, ama kianga hong zuan mihonpite a muh ciangin Philip kiangah, “Hih mite nek ding anlum koi pan lei ding i hi hiam?” a ci hi.
A sep ding teng a theih khitsa hi napi, Philip lungsim a ze‑et nop manin tua bangin a dong ahi hi.
Philip in amah dawng a, “Denariusɠ 200 man anlum i lei zongin bangmah thamin kihil zolo dinga, mikim in tawmkhat tekin kitang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew kici a nungzuite khatin ama kiangah,
“Hihlai ah mangbuh anlum nga le ngasaneu tawn nih a nei naupangno khat om hi. Ahih hangin mihon hi zahta nek dingin bangmah tham hilo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Mite tusak un,” ci in a sawl hi. Tua munah lopa tampi po ahih manin mite tu uh a, pasal 5,000 bang a pha hi.
Zeisu in anlum la in lungdam a koh khit ciangin nungzuite pia a, nungzuite in tua a tu mipite lakah a hawmsawn uh hi. Tuamah bangin ngasa zong a deih zahzah un a hawmsawn uh hi.
An a kham khit uh ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “A kikhamval themneng teng thelthangsak loin kaikhawm un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in a kaihkhop uh ciangin anlum nga panin a kikhamval a themneng lawh sawm le lawh nih dim a ngah uh hi.
Tua mite in Zeisu bawl nalamdang a muh uh ciangin, “Hihpa in leitung a hong pai ding kamsangpa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua mite in amah kumpi dingin thatang koihsawm uh hi cih thu Zeisu in a theih ciangin amah guak mual tungah a kihemkhiakik hi.
Tu in nitak lam hong hita a, a nungzuite tuili ah paisuk in,
gunkuang ah tuang uh a, Capernaum khua zuanin a pai uh hi. Khua hong mialta a, Zeisu lah amau kiang tung nailo hi.
Tua bangin a pai laitak un huihpi nung ahih manin tuihual hong kilok hi.
Tai thum tai li bang a pai khit uh ciangin gunkuang lam zuanin tui tunga hong pai Zeisu mu uh a, a lau uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zeisu in, “Keimah ka hi hi. Lau kei un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in lungdamtak in gunkuang tungah Zeisu tuangsak in a pai nading mun uh a tung pah uh hi.

A zingciang in tuili gal khat a om mihonpite in a nungzuite tuanna gunkuang neu khat longal gunkuang dang mu lo uh hi. Tua banah Zeisu le a nungzuite gunkuang tuangkhawm loin a nungzuite bek paikhia uh ahihlam zong a phawk uh hi.
Ahi zongin Tiberias panin gunkuang tawh midangte hong pai uh a, Topa in lungdam a koh khit cianga anlum a nekna mun a tung uh hi.
Tualai ah Zeisu le a nungzuite a om loh lam mihonpite in a theih uh ciangin Zeisu zong dingin gunkuang tuangin Capernaum khua ah a pai uh hi.
Tuipi gal khat ah Zeisu a muh uh ciangin, “Rabbi aw, bang hunin hihlai na tung na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Aman takpi kong cih in ah, nalamdangte na muh manun hong zong na hi kei uh hi. Gilvahtak in anlum na nek manun hong zong na hi zaw uh hi.

A siathei an ngah nadingin hanciam kei un. Mihing Tapa in hong piak ding nuntak tawntungna an na ngah nadingun hanciam zaw un. Banghang hiam cihleh nuntak tawntungna an a pia dingin Pasian in a Tapa tungah ciaptehna a khen zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Pasian nasepte ka sep theih nadingun bang ka hih ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Pasian hong sawlpa upna in Pasian deihna sepna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua ahih leh kote in mu in nang kong up theih nadingun bang limlamdang hong lakin bang hong bawl ding na hi hiam?
‘Amah in amaute nek dingin vantung pan anlum a pia hi,’ ci a, a kigelh mah bangin ka pute ka pate un gamlak ah manna a ne uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
