Leilak a tun uh ciangin meihol‑am tunga ngasa ki‑em le anlum a mu uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, “Na ngasa matte uh pawlkhat hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Simon Peter in gunkuang tungah kahto a, ngasa gol simsim 153 a awkna ngen, leilak ah a kaikhia hi. Ngasa tam mahmah napi a ngen a kikek kei hi.
Zeisu in, “Hong pai unla, zing an ne un,” a ci hi. Nungzuite in Topa ahihlam thei uh ahih manin khat beek in, “Kua na hi hiam?” ci in a dong ngam kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu hong pai a, anlum la in amaute a pia hi. Tuamah bangin ngasa zong a pia hi.
Hih in misite lak panin Zeisu a thawhkik zawh a nungzuite kiangah thumvei a kilakna ahi hi.

Zing an a nek khit uh ciangin, Zeisu in Simon Peter kiangah, “Jonah tapa, Simon aw, hihte sangin kei nong it zaw hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amah in, “Hi hi, Topa aw, nang kong it lam na thei hi,” a cih ciangin Zeisu in, “Ka tuunote na vak in,” a ci hi.

Zeisu in, “Jonah tapa Simon aw, kei nong it hiam?” ci in a nihveina dongkik a, Simon Peter in zong, “Hi hi, Topa aw, nang kong it lam na thei hi,” a cih ciangin Zeisu in, “Ka tuute na cing in,” a ci hi.

Zeisu in, “Jonah tapa Simon aw, kei nong it hiam?” ci in a thumveina a dongkik hi. “Kei nong it hiam?” ci in Zeisu in thumvei tak a dot manin Peter a khasia hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, na khempeuh na thei a, nang kong it lam zong na thei hi,” a ci hi. Zeisu in, “Ka tuute na vak in.

Aman takpi kong cih in ah, na khangno lai in na kawng gakin na utna peuhpeuh ah na pai hi. Ahih hangin na upat ciangin na khut na zan dinga, midangte in na kawng hong hensak in na pai nop lohna munah hong paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu in, Peter in ama sihzia tawh Pasian minthangsak ding cih a gennopna ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Peter a kihei leh ama nungah Zeisu in a it nungzuipa in a zuih lam a mu hi. Tua pa pen nitak an a neklai un Zeisu ang ah a kingap kawmsa a, “Topa aw, nang hong lehhek ding kua pen ahi hiam?” ci in a dong pa ahi hi.
Peter in tua pa a muh ciangin Zeisu kiangah, “Topa aw, hihpa e leh, bangci ding a hia?” a ci hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, “Kong paikik dong hihpa ka nuntak suaksak nop leh bang phamawh sa na hi hiam? Nang na hih leh ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.

Hih thu hangin tua nungzuipa si lo ding hi ci in nungzuite lakah a thang hi. Ahih hangin Zeisu in amah si lo ding hi a ci hilo a, “Kong paikik dong amah ka nuntak suaksak nop leh bang phamawh sa na hi hiam?” a ci bek ahi hi.
Hih thu khempeuh teci panga a gelhpa in tua nungzuipa ahi hi. Ama teci panna a maan hi cih kote in ka thei uh hi.
Zeisu in a bawl nalamdang tampi zong a omlai hi. Tuate a bantak in kigelh leh a kigelhna laibute leitung ah ta zo in ka um kei hi. Amen.
Theophilus aw, Zeisu in a kilaktoh ni donga a sep le a hilh thu khempeuh kong laikhak masa sungah ka gelh khinzo hi.
Amah in a teelsa sawltakte kiangah Kha Siangtho tungtawn in thu tampi vaikhak a, tua khit ciangin vantung ah a kilato hi.
Sihna a thuak khit ciangin hih mite kiangah kilak a, nungta takpi ahihna thu a kician mahmah kipsakna thu tampi a pia hi. Amaute muhin ni 40 sung om a, Pasian kumpigam thute a gen hi.
Sawltakte tawh a omkhopna khatah Zeisu in amaute thupia a, “Jerusalem khuapi pan paikhia loin, keima tung pan na zaksa uh, Pa kamciam na ngak un.
Banghang hiam cihleh John in mite tui tawh a phum hi. Ahi zongin tu a kipan a sawtlo in note Kha Siangtho tawh hong kiphum ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute hong paikhawm uha ama kiangah, “Topa aw, tu hunin Israel mite tungah kumpigam piakik ta ding na hi hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Pa in ama thuneihna tawh a seh khitsa hun le nite note theih ding ahi kei hi.

Ahi zongin note tungah Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin vangliatna na ngah ding uha Jerusalem khuapi a kipan Judea gam khempeuh, Samaria gam khempeuh le leimong dongah ka teci na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin amaute muhtang mahin amah kilato a, meiilum khatin liah ahih manin a muthei nawn kei uh hi.
Vantung ah Zeisu a kahtoh a limet mahmah laitak un thakhat in amaute kiangah puanpak silh mi nih a ding uh hi.

Amaute in, “Galilee mite aw, banghang in dinsa in vantung lam en gega na hi uh hiam? Note kiang pana vantung ah a kilato hih Zeisu mah tu‑a a paitoh na muh bang tektek un a hong paikik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute Tanluan mual panin Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi. Tanluan mual pen Jerusalem khuapi panin Sabbath ni khat lam ahi hi.

Inn a tun uh ciangin amaute tunna inndei tungnung ah a kahto uh hi. Tua mite in Peter, James, John, Andrew, Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew le Mate, Alphaeus tapa James le Zealot pawl Simon, James tapa Judas‑te ahi uh hi.
Amaute in numeite, Zeisu nu Mary, le Zeisu sanggamte tawh lungsim kikhat in thungetna le thumna a nei den uh hi.
Tualai a a kikhawm nungzuite 120 bang a pha uh hi. Amaute laizang ah Peter dingto in thu gen a,
“Sanggamte aw, Zeisu a mante a hong makaih ahi Judas tawh kisai thu Kha Siangtho in David tungtawn in a genkholhna Lai Siangtho a tangtun loh a phamawh ahi hi.
Tua Judas in eite tawh a kisimkhawm mi khat hi a, hih nasepna ah zong a kihel mi khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hi napi hih mipa in a mawhna thaman tawh lo khat lei a, tualai ah bungbu kiat in a gilpi kitam a, a sungkua khempeuh a buakhia hi.
Tua thu Jerusalem khuapi a teeng mi khempeuh in a thei uh hi. Tua logam pen amau pau in “Akel Dama” ci uh a, “Sisan Lo” a cihna ahi hi.
Tua banah, “Late Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ama teenna mun gamkhing suak henla, Tua munah kuamah teeng nawn kei hen. Midang khatin ama za luah hen,’ ci in a kigelh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Topa Zeisu eite lakah sungtum pusuak in a omsung,

John in tui a phum a kipan eite kiang panin a kilaktoh ni dong, eite tawh a kipawlkhawm mite lak panin mi khat i teel ding kisam hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua pa in eite tawh Zeisu Khazih thawhkikna thu teci a pangkhawm mi ahih ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mi nih Barsabas a kici Joseph (Justus zong kici) le Matthias a teelkhia uh hi.
Amaute in, “Nang, mi khempeuh lungsim a thei Topa aw, Judas ahih leh ama muna pai dingin mawhna bawl in a za pan a kia zo hi.
Tua ahih manin hih mi nihte lakah sawltak a suak ding le hih nasep a sem dinga na teelpa hong lak in,” ci in thu a ngen uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin lai‑ai san uh a, Matthias tungah tu ahih manin sawltak sawm le khatte tawh a kisimkhawm hi.
Pentecost ni a hong tun ciangin amaute khempeuh lungsim kikhat in munkhat ah a omkhawm uh hi.
Tua laitak in huihpi nung tawh a kibang awging khat vantung pan thakhat in hong ging a, amaute tutna innsung khempeuh hong dim hi.
Tua khit ciangin meikuang tawh a kibang leiite hong kilang in kithehzak a, amaute tung ciat ah a tu hi.
Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, Kha in a lawhkhiatsak bangbang in pau nam tuamtuam tawh thu a gen uh hi.
Van nuai‑a om minam khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak Judah mite tua laitak in Jerusalem khuapi ah a om uh hi.
Tua aw a hong gin ciangin mihonpi hong pai uha tua mite thugen amau pau ciat tawh a zak manun a lungmang uh hi.
Lamdangsa lua uh ahih manin lungmang uh a, “En un, hih mite in Galilee pau in a paute vive hilo ahi uh hiam?
I pianpih pau ciat tawh i zak theihpen a bangci ahi hiam?
Parthia mi, Media mi, Elam mite le Mesopotamia gama teeng mite, Judea gam, Cappadocia gam, Pontus gam, Asia gam,
Phrygia gam, Pamphylia gam, Egypt gam, le Cyrene khua kiang Libya gama teeng mite, Rome khuapi pana hong zin Judah mite le Judah mi a kisuaksakte,
Crete mi le Arab mi ahi eite in amaute thugen eima pau ciat tawh i zak theih pen Pasian nasep hi a, lamdang mahmah hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tua hi a, amaute khempeuh in lamdangsa in lungmang uh a, “Bangci bang thu hi peuhmah ahi hiam?” a kici uh hi.
Midangte in ahih leh, “Lenggahzu cil a kham uh hi ding hi,” ci in a zahko uh hi.
Ahih hangin sawm le khatte tawh Peter dingkhawm a, a aw sangkhan in a gen in ah, “Judah mite le Jerusalem khuapi a teeng mite khempeuh aw, hih thu kong theisak nuam hi ka thugen na ngai un.
Note upmawh bangin hih mite zukham hilo uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh nai thum sat pan hi.
Hih thu kamsangpa Joel in a gensa ahi hi.
Amah in, ‘A nunung nite ciangin, Mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka bua dinga, Na tapa na tanute un kamsang in thu a gen ding uh hi. Na tangvalte un mang mu ding uh a, Na putekte un mang a man ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin, ka sila numei le pasalte tungah Ka Kha ka bua dinga, Amaute in kamsang in thu a gen ding uh hi.
Tunglam vanah nalamdang lianpi pite ka lak dinga, Nuai‑a leitung ah sisan, meikuang le meikhu tawh, Limlamdangte ka lak ding hi.
A lauhuai le a lian mahmah Topa ni, A hong tunma in ni hong mial dinga, Kha in sisan hong suak ding hi.
Tua ciangin, Topa min tawh Huhna a ngen mi khempeuh in, Hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi, Pasian in ci hi,’ ci in a gen hi.

“Israel mite aw, hih thute za un. Na theihsa mah bangun Pasian in Nazareth khua mi Zeisu tungtawn in note lakah nalamdangte, nalamdang lianpite le limlamdangte a bawlna tawh amah a sanna thu teci a pangzo hi.
Pasian in a khentat khitsa ama ngimna le a theihkholhna tawh kizui in note tungah amah hong ap a, note in migilote khut tawh manin singkhuam tungah na khailum uh hi.
Ahih hangin, sihna in amah lencip zolo ahih manin sihna panin Pasian in khahkhia in a thosak zo hi.
David in ama thu tawh kisai in a genna ah, ‘Ka mai ah Topa ka mu tawntung hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka kilin loh nadingin, Ka taklam ah amah a om hi.
Tua ahih manin ka lungsim kipak a, Lungdamtak in thu ka gen hi. Tua thamlo in ka pumpi zong, Lametna tawh a tawlnga ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah in Hadesɠ ah ka kha na nusia kei dinga, Na Misiangthopa zong na muatsak kei ding hi.
Nuntakna lampi nong theisak zo a, Nangma omna munah, Lungdamna tawh nong kidimsak ding hi,’ a ci hi.
“Sanggamte aw, i pupi David thu teltak in hong gensak un. Amah si in kivui khin a, a han zong tuni dongin a omlai hi.
Pasian in ci le sa lama ama suan sung pan Khazih piangsak in ama tokhom tungah tusak dingin kiciam a, tua kamciamna David in kamsang khat ahihna tawh a thei hi.
Amah in hih thu mukhol ahih manin ama pumpi muat loin, a kha zong Hadesɠ ah a kinusia kei ding hi ci in Khazih a thawhkik nading thu a gen hi.
Pasian in hih Zeisu thokiksak khinzo hi cih thu kote khempeuh in teci ka hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in ama taklam ah amah lamsang khinzo a, Pa kiang panin Kha Siangtho kamciam zong a sang khinzo hi. Tu in ama hong buakkhiat tua Kha Siangtho mu in na zazo uh hi.
“David in vantung ah kahto lo napi in, ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah,
“Na galte na khengakna ka suahsak khit mateng in, Ka taklam ah na tu in,” ci hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
“Tua ahih manin na khailup uh tua Zeisu, Pasian in Topa le Khazih a suaksak zo hi cih thu Israel mi khempeuh in teltak in theita un,” ci in a gen hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungtang uh vut a, Peter le sawltak dangte kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, bang hih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla Zeisu Khazih min tawh tui kiphum un. Tua hi leh Pasian in na mawhnate uh hong maisak in Kha Siangtho letsong na ngah ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua kamciamna in note aa ding hi a, na suan na khakte uh le Topa i Pasian in a saplai ding gamlapi a om mite khempeuh aa ding zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in thudang tampi tawh teci pangin amaute hanthawn a, “Hih a gilo tulai khang mite lak panin kihemkhia un,” a ci hi.
Ama thugen lungdamtak in a sang mite tui kiphum uh a, tua ni in mi 3,000 bang a kibehlap hi.
Amaute in sawltakte hilh upna thu le kikholhkhopna, anlum balkhapna le thungetnate ah kuhkaltak in a omsuak uh hi.
Pasian in sawltakte tungtawn in nalamdang lianpite le limlamdang tampite bawl uha, mi khempeuh in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Thu‑um mi khempeuh omkhawm in na khempeuh a neikhawm uh hi.
A neih a lamte uh le a vante uh zuak in amaute kisapna zui in a hawm uh hi.
Nisim in lungsim kikhat in biakinnpi huang sungah kikhawm uh a, inn khat khit inn khatah anlum balkham in, lungdamtak le lungsim siangthotak in an a nekhawm uh hi.
Pasian min phat uh a, mi khempeuh maipha zong a ngah uh hi. Topa in hotkhiatna a ngah mite nisim in pawlpi sungah a kibehlapsak hi.
Tu in thunget hun ahi nai kua ciangin Peter le John‑te biakinnpi huangah a paito uh hi.
Biakinnpi huang sunga a lut mite kiangah huhna a nget theih nadingin a nu gil sung panin a khebaisa a suak mi khat kipua in Hoih kici biakinnpi kongpi gei ah nisim in a kikoih zel hi.
Tua pa in biakinnpi huang sungah lut dingin a kithawi Peter le John a muh ciangin huhna a ngen hi.
John tawh a paikhawm Peter in tua pa tangtak in en a, “Hong en in,” a ci hi.
Tua pa in amaute kiang pan na khatpeuh a ngah ding kisa in a limet mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Kham le ngun ka nei kei hi. Ahi zongin ka neihpen kong pia ding hi. Nazareth khua mi Zeisu Khazih min tawh dingto inla lampai in,” a ci hi.
Peter in tua pa a khut taklam ah lenin a kaihtoh ciangin a khepek le a siakmit guhte thakhat in a thahat hi.
Tua pa diangto in dinga, lam a pai hi. Lampai in diangin Pasian min phat kawmsa in biakinnpi huang sungah amaute tawh a lutkhawm hi.
Mi khempeuh in amah lam paithei in Pasian min phata a om a mu uh hi.
Hoih kici biakinnpi kongpi gei ah tu‑a huhna a ngen denpa ahihlam a theih uh ciangin ama tunga thupiang hangin lungmang in lamdang a sa uh hi.
Tu in damna a ngah khebaipa in Peter le John‑te meilet pah cinten in a om laitak in mi khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, amaute omna Solomon buukah a tai ngeingai uh hi.
Peter in a muh ciangin, “Israel mite aw, banghang in hih thu lamdangsa na hi uh hiam? Kote vangliatna le biakna mi hihna tawh hihpa lam a paisak bangin banghang in hong en gega na hi uh hiam?
Abraham, Isaac le Jacob‑te Pasian ahi, i pu i pate Pasian in a nasempa Zeisu min a thangsak zo hi. Pilate in amah khah a sawm hangin Pilate mai‑ah amah na nial uh a, thah dingin na piakhia uh hi.
A Dikpa le a Siangthopa na nial uha mi thatpa khat a hong khahsak zawk nadingin na ngen uh hi.
Nuntakna a Piangsakpa na that uh a, ahih hangin Pasian in misite lak panin amah a thokiksak zo hi. Tua thu ah kote in teci ka hi uh hi.
Na muh na theih uh hihpa in Zeisu min um ahih manin tua min in amah a thakhauhsak zo hi. Hi hi, Zeisu tungtawn a hong pai upna in note muhtang mahmah in amah a damsiangsak zo hi.
“Tu in ahih leh sanggamte aw, na makaite uh mah bangin note in zong na theih loh manun tua banga ahih kha na hi uh hi cih kong thei hi.
Ahih hangin Khazih in gimna thuak ding hi ci a, Pasian in ama kamsang khempeuh kam tawh a genkholhsa tua thute hih bangin a tangtungsak zo hi.
Tua ahih manin na mawhnate uh a kiphiatsiang theih nadingin kisikkik unla kikhel un. Tua hi leh Topa kiang panin thamalhkikna hun a hong tung ding hi.
A beisa hunin note tunga hong kihilh, Zeisu Khazih zong amah in note kiangah hong sawl ding hi.
Pasian in na khempeuh a bawlthakkik mateng vantung ah Zeisu om phot ding hi. Pasian in tanglai peka kipan a siangtho ama kamsangte khempeuh kam tawh hih thu a gen khitsa ahi hi.
Moses in i pu i pate kiangah, ‘Topa na Pasian un na sanggamte uh lak panin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong piangsak ding hi. Note tunga ama hong gen thu khempeuh na mang ding uh hi.
Tua kamsangpa thu a manglo mi peuhmah a mipihte sung panin kisusia ding hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
Hi hi, Samuel a kipan ama khit a thu a gen kamsang khempeuh in tulai a a piang ding thute a genkhol uh hi.

Note in kamsangte suan le khakte na hi uh hi. Pasian in Abraham tungah, ‘Na suan na khak tungtawn in leitung mite khempeuh thupha ka pia ding hi,’ ci in i pu i pate tawh a bawl thuciamna tawh a kizom mite na hi uh hi.
Note khempeuh na gamtat khialhna panun hong kiheisak in thupha hong pia dingin Pasian in a nasempa Zeisu a thawhkiksak khit ciangin note kiangah hong sawl masa hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Tu in amaute in mite tungah thu a gen laitak un siampite, biakinn cingte a ukpa le Sadducee pawlte a hong tung uh hi.
Sawltakte in mite thu hilhin Zeisu hangin misite thawhkikna thu tangko uh ahih manin tua mite in nawngkaisa mahmah uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Peter le John man uha nitak hita ahih manin zingsang dongin thong sungah a khum uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute thugen a za mi tampi in thu um uha pasal bekbek zong 5,000 bang a pha uh hi.
A zingciang in gam ukte, makaite, thukhamhilh siate,
Siampi Ukpa Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander le Siampi Ukpa innkuanpihte, Jerusalem khuapi ah a hong kikhawm uh hi.
Amaute laizang ah Peter le John a koih khit uh ciangin amaute gel kiangah, “Bang vangliatna ahih keileh bang min tawh hihpa damsak na hi uh hiam?” ci in a dong uh hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in Kha Siangtho tawh kidim a, amaute kiangah, “Mipi ukte le Israel makaite aw,
hih mizawngkhal khat tungah thupha ka bawl manun tuni in thu hong sit na hih uh leh,

note in singkhuam tungah khailum in Pasian in misite lak pan a thawhkiksakpa, Nazareth khua mi Zeisu Khazih min tawh hihpa damin note khempeuh mai ah dinga om ahi hi cih thu note khempeuh le Israel mi khempeuh in theita un.
Tua Zeisu in, ‘Inn a lam note in na nilkhiat uh suang hi a, Innkiu suang bulpi a suakpa ahi hi.’
“Tua mi simloh midang tungah hotkhiatna a om kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hotkhiatna i ngah nadingin hong kipia, min dang khat beek vannuai mite lakah a om kei hi,” ci in a gen hi.

Tu in amaute in Peter le John‑te hansanna mu uh a, pilna neilo sinna nei ngeilo mite ahihlam uh a theih uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu tawh kithuah ngei uh ahihlam a phawkkik uh hi.
Damna a ngah mipa in amaute tawh dingkhawm a om mu uh ahih manin bangmah a nial thei nawn kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin thukhenteɠ kiang pan amaute a paikhiat nadingun thu a piak khit uh ciangin thu a kikum uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hih mite bang cih ding i hi hiam? Amaute tungtawn in a kilang mahmah nalamdang khat piang khin a, Jerusalem khua mi khempeuh in mu khinzo uh ahih manin i nial thei kei hi.
Ahih hangin mite lakah a kizelh nawnloh nadingin, ‘Tu a kipan in kuama tungah hihpa min tawh thu gen nawn kei un,’ ci in khauhtak in tawnggawp ni,” a kici uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute gel sam uh a, Zeisu min tawh thugen in, thu a hilh nawn peuhmah loh nadingun thu a pia uh hi.
Ahih hangin Peter le John in amaute kiangah, “Pasian thu sangin note thu kong man zawk ding uh Pasian mai ah maan hiam maanlo hiam note mah in khen zaw un.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote ka hih uh leh ka muhsa ka zaksa uh thute gen loin ka om thei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih nasepna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian min a phat uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua mite hangin Peter le John‑te bangci bangin daanpia ding cih thei zolo uha khauhtak in tawngin a khah uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh lamdangtak in a kidamsakpa in kum 40 val a phazo hi.
Amaute gel a kikhah khit ciangin a lawmte uh kiangah pai in siampi liante le makaite thugenteng a gen uh hi.
Amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin lungsim kituak in Pasian tungah kiko uh a, “Topa aw, nang in vantung le leitung, tuipi le a sunga om na khempeuh a piangsak Pasian na hi hi.
Na nasempa David kam tawh na gen inah, ‘Banghang in minam dangte heh uh a, Mite in kimanna neilo thute vaihawmsim uh ahi hiam?
Topa le a Sathau‑nilhpa a do dingin, Leitung kumpite kithawi uh a, Gam ukte a kikaikhawm uh hi,’ na ci hi.
“Herod le Pontius Pilate in Gentile mite le Israel mipite tawh kipawl in sathau na nilhpa, a siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu langpan in,
nangma vangliatna le na deihna tawh sep dinga na gelsa teng mah a sem uh ahi hi.
Tu in, Topa aw, amaute hong tawnna za in. Na nasemte in na thu a genngam nadingun hansanna pia in.
A siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu min tawh limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite a bawl theih nading le cinate in damna a ngah nadingin na khut hong zan in,” ci in thu a ngen uh hi.
Thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute kikhopna mun a kiling hi. Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, hangtak in Pasian thu a gen uh hi.
Tu in thu‑um mihonpite a lungsim, a ngaihsutna uh kituak a, a neihsa khempeuh uh kuama aituam ci loin a neikhawm uh hi.
Sawltakte in Topa Zeisu thawhkikna thu vangliatna tawh teci pang uh a, amaute khempeuh tungah Pasian hehpihna thupha lianpi a tung hi.
Inn mun logam a nei khempeuh in zuak in a sumte uh hong tawiciat uh hi.
Tua ciangin sawltakte khephung ah hong koih uh a, sawltakte in mi khempeuh a kisapna zui in hawmsak uh ahih manin kisapna a nei kuamah a om kei hi.
Sawltakte in Barnabas (a khiatna in “Hehnepna Tapa”) a cih uh, Cyprus gam mi, Levi suan, Joses a kici mi khat a om hi.
Tua pa in a logam a zuak khit ciangin a sumteng paipih in sawltakte khephung ah a va koih hi.
Ananias a kici pa le a zi Sapphira‑te in zong a logam uh a zuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pasal in a sumte pawlkhat sit in a dangteng paipih a, sawltakte khephung ah a va koih hi. A sumte pawlkhat a sit lam a zi in zong a thei hi.
Peter in, “Ananias aw, Kha Siangtho a khem ding le na logam man sum pawlkhat a sit dingin banghang in na lungsim Satan uksak na hi hiam?
Tua logam na zuakma in nangma aa hi a, na zuak khit ciangin zong nangma thuthu hilo ahi hiam? Banghang in tua bang lungsim nei na hi hiam? Mihing a khem hilo in Pasian a khem na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ananias in hih thu a zak ciangin puksuk in a si hi. Tua thu a za mi khempeuh a lau mahmah uh hi.
Tangvalte dingkhia in puan tawh a luang a tun khit uh ciangin puakhia in a vui uh hi.
Tua khit nai thum bang ciangin a zi zong thu piangteng theilopi in a hong lut hi.
Peter in ama kiangah, “Na logam uh hih zah maha na zuak uh ahi hiam, hong gen in,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hih zah maha ka zuak uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Topa Kha a ze‑et dingin banghang in kithukim na hi uh hiam? En in, na pasal a vuite kongbiang ah hong tungta hi, nang zong hong puakhia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu Peter khephung ah thakhat in puksuk in a si hi. Tangvalte hong lut uh ciangin tua nu a sisa in mu uha puakhia in a pasal gei ah a vui uh hi.
Pawlpi buppi le hih thu a za mi khempeuh a lau mahmah uh hi.
Sawltakte tungtawn in mite lakah limlamdangte le nalamdang lian tampite a piang hi. Thu‑um mi khempeuh lungsim kikhat in Solomon buukah a omkhawm uh hi.
Midangte khat beekin amaute pawlpih ngamlo uh a, ahi zongin thupi a sa mahmah uh hi.
Topa a um numei pasal a honhon in kibehlap a, thu‑um mi a tam semsem hi.
Mite in cinate kongzing ah puakhia uh a, Peter hong pai ciangin a lim beekin a nawk khak theih nadingin lupna le tal tungah a sial uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi kima om khuate panin zong mihonpi hong kikaikhawm uha dawigilote in a bawlsiatte le cinate hong paipih in amaute khempeuh in damna a ngah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa le amah tawh a omkhawm Sadducee pawlte heh mahmah uh a,
sawltakte manin thong sungah a khum uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa vantungmi khatin zan laitak in thong kongkhak hong in amaute khahkhia a,
“Pai unla, biakinnpi huang sungah dingin hih nuntakna thu mite va hilh un,” a ci hi.

Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin zingsang tungin biakinnpi huang sungah lutin thu a hilh uh hi. Tua hun sung mahin Siampi Ukpa le a lawmte hong pai uh a, thukhenteɠ le Israel upa khempeuh samkhawm in sawltakte a lakhia dingin thonginn ah mi a sawl uh hi.
Ahih hangin biakinn cingte a tun uh ciangin thong sungah sawltakte mu lo uh ahih manin kilehkik in thu zasak uh a,
“Thonginn bittak in kikalh a, thong cingte zong kongkhak mai ah a ding uh hi. Ahih hangin kong ka hon uh ciangin a sungah kuamah ka mu kei uh hi!” a ci uh hi.
Tu in Siampi Ukpa, biakinn cingte a ukpa le siampi liante in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, “Bang thuteng hong pianglai ding hiam?” ci in a lungmang uh hi.
Tua laitak in mi khat hong pai in amaute kiangah, “En in, thong sunga na mi khumte un biakinnpi huang sungah thu hilh in a om uh hi!” ci in a ko hi.
Tua ciangin biakinn cingte a ukpa le biakinn cingte va pai uha mite in suang tawh a denkhak ding lau uh ahih manin thu‑ol tawh sawltakte a la uh hi.
A hong tunpih khit uh ciangin thukhenteɠ mai ah koih uh a, Siampi Ukpa in thu a dong hi.

Amah in, “Hih min tawh thu na hilh nawnloh nadingun khauhtak in thu hong pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Ahih hangin en un, Jerusalem khua sungteng note thuhilhna zelsak in hih mipa sisan kote tungah hong tun nuam na hi uh hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter le sawltak dangte in, “Mite thu sangin Pasian thu ka man ding uh kilawm zaw hi.
I pu i pate Pasian in singkhuam tungah khai a na thahpa uh Zeisu a thokiksak zo hi.
Israel mite a mawhna uh kisikkiksak in mawhmaina a piak theih nadingin Pasian in amah Kumpi le Honpa suaksak in a taklam ah a lamsang khinzo hi.
Hih thu ah kote in ama teci ka hi uh hi. Pasian in ama thu a mang mite a piak Kha Siangtho zong ama teci ahi hi,” ci in a dawng uh hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin heh mahmah uha sawltakte thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin thukhente lak panin mi khempeuh in a zahtak thukhamhilh siapa ahi Gamaliel a kici Pharisee pa khat hong dingto in tawmvei sung sawltakte a pusuahsak nadingun thu a pia hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in, “Israel mite aw, hih mite tunga na sepsawm uh thu hoihtak in ngaihsun pha un.

Banghang hiam cihleh tu ma lam in zong mi thupi khat ka hi a kici Theudas hong khang a, mi 400 bangin amah a pawl uh hi. Tua pa a kithah ciangin a nungzui khempeuh kithehthang in bangmah a suak kei uh hi.
Tua pa khit mi kisim hun sungin zong Galilee mi Judas hong khang leuleu a, nungzui tampi mah a ngah hi. Tua pa zong si a, ama thu a zui mi khempeuh a kithehthang uh hi.
Tu in zong note kianga kong cih in ah hih mite bangmah cih loin, hi ci omsak lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih gelna le nasepna mihing pana hong piang ahih leh hong beilel ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian pana hong piang ahih leh na beisak zo kei ding uh a, Pasian a lehdo na suak zawsop ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in ama thu gen hoihsa uh ahih manin sawltakte samin sat uha Zeisu min tawh thu a gen nawnloh nadingun thu a piak khit uh ciangin a khah uh hi.
Tua ciangin sawltakte zong, Zeisu min hanga maizumna a thuak dingin Pasian in kilawm hong sa hi ci in lungdam mahmah uh a, thukhenteɠ kiang panin a paikhia uh hi.
Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi cih thu amaute in nisim in biakinnpi huang sung le innteng ah tatsat loin hilhin a tangko uh hi.
Tua hun sungin nungzuite hong tam semsem uh ciangin nisim annek hawmna ah Greek dan a zui Judah meigongte ki‑awlmawh lo ahih manin tuate in Hebrew kam a zang Judah mite tungah a phun uh hi.
Tua ahih manin sawm le nihte in nungzui honpite kaikhawm in amaute kiangah, “Kote in Pasian thu hilh manlo lianga nek le dawn kong buaipih ding uh kilawm lo hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note lak panin na pahtak uh Kha Siangtho le lungpilna tawh a kidim pasal sagih hong teelkhia un. Hih nek le dawn a vaihawm dingin amaute ka seh ding uh hi.
Kote ka hih uh leh thungetna le thuhilhna nasep kong zomsuak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih thu mipi in hoihsa ahih manin thu upna le Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Antioch khua mi Judah mi a suak Nicolas‑te a teelkhia uh hi.
Sawltakte mai ah amaute koih uha sawltakte in tua mite tungah khut nga in thu a ngetsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian thu hong kizel semsem a, Jerusalem ah nungzuite nasiatak in a pung uh hi. Siampi tampite in zong thu a um uh hi.
Stephen in upna le vangliatna tawh kidim a, nalamdang lianpite le limlamdangte mite muhin a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Sal suaktate kikhopna sunga kihel Cyrene khua pana hong paite, Alexandria khua pana hong paite, Cilicia gam le Asia gam pana hong pai mite in Stephen tawh thu a kinial uh hi.
Stephen in lungpilna le Kha tawh a gen thute amaute in a nial thei kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mi pawlkhat cialsim uh a, “Hihpa Moses le Pasian tungah a pausiatna ka zazo uh hi,” ci in a gensak uh hi.
Amaute in mipite, makaite le thukhamhilh siate hansuah in Stephen omna ah hong pai in man uh a, thukhenteɠ kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Zuau gen ding teci seh uh a, “Hih mun siangtho le thukham tungah hihpa pausia den a,
hih Nazareth khua mi Zeisu in hih mun susia in Moses in kote hong piak ngeinate khel ding hi ci a, a genna ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Thukhenteɠ kikhopna sunga a tu mi khempeuh in Stephen maitang a telet uh ciangin vantungmi maitang tawh kibang in a mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa in, “Hih thute a maan mah ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Stephen in, “Pate le sanggamte aw, ka thugen na ngai un. Haran khua ah i pu Abraham a teenma Mesopotamia gamah a om laitak in ama kiangah a vanglian Pasian kilang a,
‘Na gam le na beh na phungte kiang pan paikhia inla, kong lah ding gamah pai in,’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Chaldea mite gam pan amah paikhia in Haran khua ah a teeng hi. A pa a sih khit ciangin tua mun panin tu laitak a na teenna uh leitang ah a lal hi.
Tua gamah Pasian in ama luah dingin a khepek ngakh nading nangawn leitang a pia kei hi. Ahi zongin Abraham nunga a suan a khakte luah dingin hih gam a piak ding thu, ta a neihma in a kamciam zo hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in ama kiangah, na suan na khakte gamdang khatah va pem ding uh a, tua gam mite in kum 400 sung sal in nei in a bawlsia ding uh hi.
‘Ahih hangin amaute salin a kai tua minam tungah thu ka khen dinga, tua khit ciangin amaute hong paikhia in hih munah keimah a hong bia ding uh hi,’ a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in Abraham tungah vunatna tawh kipawl thuciamna zong a pia hi. A tapa Isaac a neih ciangin a ni giat ni in vun a atsak hi. Isaac tapa Jacob hi a, Jacob in i pupi sawm le nihte pa ahi hi.
“Tua i pupite in Joseph haza in Egypt gamah a zuak uh hangin Pasian in amah ompih a,
a gentheihna khempeuh panin honkhia in Egypt kumpipa Pharaoh mai ah maipha le lungpilna a pia hi. Pharaoh in Egypt gam le ama inn sung khempeuh Joseph a uksak hi.
Tua hun in Egypt gam le Canaan gam bup ah kialpi tunga haksatna lianpi om ahih manin i pu i pate in nek le dawn ding a nei kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jacob in Egypt gamah an om hi cih thu a zak ciangin i pu i pate a paisak masa hi.
A nihveina a hawh uh ciangin a sanggamte kiangah Joseph kipulak a, tua ciangin Pharaoh in Joseph innkuanpihte a thei hi.
Tua nung ciangin Joseph in mi sawlin a pa Jacob le a innkuanpih khempeuh lasak a, mi 75 a pha uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jacob zong Egypt gamah paisuk in tua gamah si a, i pu i pate zong tua gam mahah a si uh hi.
Amaute luanghawmte Shechem khua ah pua uh a, Abraham in Shechem khua mi Hamor tate kiang panin sum tawh a leisa hanah a vui uh hi. Moses in Israelte Makaih
“Pasian in Abraham tunga a ciamsa kamciamna a tunkuan ciangin Egypt gamah amaute khangin pung mahmah uh a,
Joseph a theilo kumpi dang khat hong khan dong tua bangin a pung uh hi.
Tua pa in i minamte khembawl a, i pu i pate bawlsia in, a tangekte uh a nungta lo dingin a paihsak hi.
Tua hun mahin Moses hong suak a, tua in Pasian lungkimsak mahmah hi. Tua hi a, a pa inn sungah kha thum sung amah kikem hi.
Ahih hangin a kikoihkhiat ciangin Pharaoh tanu in na la a, ama tapa banglian in a pantah hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Egypt gam pilna khempeuh sin a, kampau le sepna bawlna ah a siam mahmah hi.
“Tu in Moses kum 40 a phak ciangin a sanggam Israel tate kiangah hawh nopna lungsim a nei hi.
Egypt mipa khatin ama mite khat a thuman lopi a a bawl a muh ciangin a kibawlsia mipa va guma Egypt mipa a satlum hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama khut zangin amaute a hotkhiat ding lam a sanggamte in a thei ding sa a, ahih hangin amaute in a thei kei uh hi.
A zingciang in Israel mi nih a kilai laitak uh va tuak kha a, ‘Lawmte aw, unau khat na hi uh hi, banghang in kilai na hi uh hiam?’ ci in a kilem nadingun a kho hi.
“Ahih hangin a lawmpa tunga a mawh zaw pa in Moses sawnkhia in a gen in ah, ‘Kote a hong uk ding le thu a hong khen dingin kua in nang hong seh ahi hiam?
Zanni a Egypt mipa na thah bangin kei zong hong that nuam na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
“Hih thu hangin Moses taimang in Midian gamah teenga tualai ah tapa nih a nei hi.
“Kum 40 a cin ciangin Sinai mual gamlak ah sawlbawk kuang sung panin Topa vantungmi khat Moses kiangah a kilang hi.
Moses in a muh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, a telet dinga a va naih ciangin Topa hopihna aw hong ginga,
amah in, ‘Keimah in na pu na pate Pasian, Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian ka hi hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses a ciling gawpin a telet ngam nawn kei hi.
“‘Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Na dinna mun leitang siangtho ahih manin na khedap suahkhia in.
Egypt gam sunga om ka mite a kibawlsiatna ka mu khinzo hi. Amaute thumna zong ka zazo a, a honkhia dingin kong paisuk hi. Tu in hong pai in, Egypt gamah kong sawl ding hi,” a ci hi.’

“Tua Moses in, ‘Kote hong uk ding le thu hong khen dingin kua in nang hong seh ahi hiam?’ ci a, a nialpa uh ahi hi. Pasian in tua Moses mah amaute a uk ding pa le a honkhia ding pa in sawlbawk a kilang vantungmi tungtawn in a sawl hi.
Tua bangin Moses in Egypt gam, San Tuipi le gamlak ah kum 40 sung nalamdang lianpite le limlamdangte bawl in amaute a paikhiatpih hi.

“‘Topa na Pasian un, na sanggamte uh lak panin kei tawh a kibang Kamsang khat note aa dingin hong piangsak dinga, ama thu na ngaih ding uh ahi hi,’ ci a, Israel tate tunga a genpa in hih Moses ahi hi.

“Hihpa in Sinai muala amah a hopih Vantungmi tawh ahi a, i pu i pate tawh ahi a, gamlak a om mihonpite tawh ahi zongin a omkhawmpa hi a, eite hong piak dingin Pasian in a kam tawh hong gen a nungta thute a sangsawnpa ahi hi.
“Ahih hangin i pute i pate in ama thu mang nuamlo in nial uh a, Egypt gam lamah a lungsim uh a heikik uh hi.
Amaute in Aaron kiangah, ‘Egypt gam pana hong paikhiatpihpa Moses bang suakta hiam cih thei lo ka hih manun kote mai‑a a pai ding pasiante hong bawlsak in,’ a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua hun sungin bawngno limkhat bawl uh a, tua lim tungah gangawh biakna pia in amau khut tawh a bawltawm uh tua nate mah tawh a kipak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in amaute nungngatsan in vantung a om nate a bia dingin a khahkhong ta hi. Tua thu Kamsangte laibu sunga kigelhsa mah bangin, ‘Israel innkuante aw, Gamlak ah kum 40 sung tawntung gan go in, Nong piak uh gangawh biaknate, Keimah nong piak takpi mah uh ahi hiam?
Hi hi, Moloch biakbuuk, Na pasian uh Remphan aksi le, Biak dinga na bawltawm uh milimte na pua uh hi. Tua ahih manin Babylon gam lam pekah, Note kong puak ding hi,’ ci in a gen hi.
“A muhsa bang tektek in a lam nadingin Pasian in Moses a sawlna tawh kizui in a kilam teci panna biakbuuk, i pu i pate in gamlak ah a nei uh hi.
Tua biakbuuk a sangsawn i pute i pate le Joshua in amaute mai pana Pasian in a hawlkhiatsak Gentile‑te leitang ah tua biakbuuk lutpih uh a, tua gamah David hun dongin a om hi.
David in Pasian maipha ngah a, Jacob Pasian teen nading biakbuuk khat a lam theih nadingin Pasian kiangah a ngen hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian biakinn pen Solomon in a lam zaw hi.
“Ahi zongin, kamsangpa gensa bangin Sangbel Pasian in khut tawh kibawl biakinn sunga teeng ahi kei a,
‘Topa in, vantung ka tokhom hi a, Leitung ka khengakna ahi hi. Keima aa dingin bang inn hong lamsak in, Koi munah tawlnga ding ka hi hiam?
Hih na khempeuh ka khut tawh ka bawlsa hilo ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. Israelte in Kha Siangtho Nial
“Lungsim le bilvun ki‑atlo, ngawng khauh mite aw! Na pute na pate mah bangin note in zong Kha Siangtho na langpan den uh hi.
Na pute na pate un a bawlsiatloh kamsang kua om ahi hiam? Amaute in a Dikpa a hong pai nading thu a genkhol mite a that uh hi. Tu in note in tua a Dikpa a lehhekte le a thatte na suakzo uh hi.
Note in vantungmite tungtawn a hong kipia thukham ngah napi in na zui kei uh hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Amaute in hih thute a zak uh ciangin a lung uh so a, a ha uh a gawisan uh hi.
Ahih hangin Stephen in Kha Siangtho tawh kidim in vantung a ettoh leh Pasian vangliatna le Pasian taklam a a ding Zeisu a mu hi.
Amah in, “En un! Vantung kihong a, Pasian taklam ah Mihing Tapa dinga om ka mu hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute nakpi in kiko uh a, a bil uh humkawm in ama lamah lungsim kituak in a hong tai uh hi.
Khua nawlah amah kaikhia in suang tawh a denglum uh hi. Tua a denglum mite in Saul a kici tangval khat khephung ah a puante uh a koih uh hi.
Suang tawh a den laitak un Stephen in, “Topa Zeisu aw, ka kha hong la in,” ci in Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah khukdin a, “Topa aw, hih mawhna amaute tungah na suan kei in,” ci in nakpitak in a kiko khit ciangin a si hi.

Tu in Stephen a kithahna thu ah Saul zong a thukim hi. Tua hunin Jerusalem khuapi a om pawlpi nasiatak in kibawlsia ahih manin sawltakte simloh thu‑um dang khempeuh Judea gam le Samaria gamah a kithehthang uh hi.
Pasian a zahtakte in Stephen luang puakhia in vui uh a, nakpi in a kah uh hi.
Saul ahih leh pawlpi bawlsiat ding hanciam in inn simah lut a, numei pasal kaikhia in thongah a puak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a kithehthang mite pai kawikawi in lungdamna thu a tangko uh hi.
Philip zong Samaria gam khua khatah paisuk in Khazih thu a tangko hi.
Mihonpi in Philip thugennate za in nalamdang a bawlte mu uh a, lungsim kikhat in ama thugen a ngai uh hi.
Dawigilote nakpitak kiko in mi tampi sung panin a taikhia uh hi. A pumzaw mitampi le khebai mitampi in zong damna a ngah uh hi.
Tua khua ah lungdamna lianpi a piang hi.
Tua khua ah amah le amah mi thupi khat a kingaihsun Simon kici mi khat a om hi. Amah in nidang in hih khua sungah mitphial lak a, Samaria khua mite in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
“Hihpa in Pasian vangliatna nei hi,” ci in a neupen pan a lianpen dongin a thu a ngai uh hi.
Amaute in ama bawl mitphialte lamdang a sak uh sawt khinzo ahih manin ama gen bangbang a ngai uh hi.
Ahih hangin Philip in Pasian kumpigam tawh kipawl lungdamna thu le Zeisu Khazih min a tangko ciangin um uh a, numei pasal tui a kiphum uh hi.
Tua ciangin Simon in zong um ahih manin tui a kiphum khit ciangin Philip paina peuh ah a zui kawikawi hi. Philip in a bawl nalamdangte le limlamdangte a muh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Tu in Samaria mite in Pasian thu a up lam uh Jerusalem khuapi a om sawltakte in a zak uh ciangin amaute kiangah Peter le John a paisak uh hi.
Amaute a tun uh ciangin tua mite in Kha Siangtho a ngah nadingun thu a ngetsak uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu mina tui a kiphum khit uh hangin amaute khat beek tungah Kha Siangtho a tung nai kei hi.
Tua hi a, sawltakte in tua mite tungah khut a ngak uh ciangin amaute in Kha Siangtho a ngah uh hi.
Tua mite in sawltakte khut ngakna tawh Kha Siangtho a ngah uh Simon in a muh ciangin Peter le John‑te mai ah sum lui a,
“Mi khatpeuh tungah ka khut ka ngakh ciangin, Kha Siangtho a ngah theih nading thuneihna hong pia un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in ama kiangah, “Pasian letsong sum tawh a kilei thei ding sa na hih manin na sum tawh kisiakhawm in!
Pasian mai ah na lungsim maanlo ahih manin hih thu tawh na kisai kha kei a, na ngah ding zong bangmah a om kei hi.
Tua ahih manin na hoih lohna kisikkik inla, Pasian tungah thum in. Tua hi leh amah in na lungsim ngaihsutna a hong maisak kha ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim siatna tawh na kidim a, hoih lohna in hong hencip hi cih kong thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Simon in, “Tu‑a na gensa thute khat beek ka tungah a hong tun loh nadingin Topa tungah thu hong ngetsak in,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Samaria mite teenna khua tampi ah lungdamna thu tangko in Topa thu hilhin teci a pan khit uh ciangin Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciahkik uh hi.
Tu in Topa vantungmi khatin Philip kiangah, “Ding inla, Jerusalem khuapi pan Gaza khua paisukna lampi tawnin va pai in,” a ci hi. Hih munin leitaw lam sehnel gam ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Philip zong dingkhia in a pai pah hi. Tualai ah Ethiopia kumpinu Candace neihsa khempeuh a uk, thu a nei mahmah a kiget Ethiopia mipa khat a na om hi. Amah in Pasian bia in Jerusalem khuapi pan a hong ciahkik hi.
Amah in a sakolleng tungah a tuankawm in kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim hi.
Tua ciangin Kha in Philip kiangah, “Sakolleng kiangah va naih inla, va pawl in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Philip zong tua pa kiangah va tai a, kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim a zak ciangin, “Na laisim a thu na theitel hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Tua pa in, “Hong hilh khat a om kei leh bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah tawh leng tungah tuangkhawm dingin Philip a sam hi.
Tua pa Lai Siangtho simna in, “A kigo ding tuu bangin amah a kipaipih hi. Tuuno in a mulmetpa mai ah a ham loh bangin, Amah zong a pau kei hi.
Simmawh nuaisiahna thuakin, Ama tungah thuman thukhenna a kizang kei hi. Ama nuntakna leitung pan kilakhia ahih manin, A suan a khakte thu, Kua in gen nawn ding ahi hiam?” a cihna mun ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Ethiopia mangpa in Philip kiangah, “Hih kamsangpa in kua thu gen ahi hiam? Ama thu gen ahi hiam? Ahih keileh midang khat thu gen ahi hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Tua ciangin Philip in tua Lai Siangtho mun pansan in Zeisu thu a hilh hi.
Tu in, amaute paisuk uh a, tui omna munkhat a tun uh ciangin Ethiopia mangpa in, “En in, hihlai ah tui a om hi. Tui ka kiphum ding bangin hong khaktan ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Philip in, “Na lungsim khempeuh tawh na up leh na kiphum thei hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Zeisu Khazih in Pasian Tapa ahi hi cih ka um hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin amah in a sakolleng khawlsak a, Philip le Ethiopia mangpa tui sungah paisuk in Philip in amah tui a phum hi.
Tui sung pan a hong paikhiat uh ciangin Topa Kha in Philip lakhia ahih manin Ethiopia mangpa in amah mu nawnlo a, ahi zongin lungdamtak in a paisuak hi.
Philip ahih leh Azotus khua ah a kimukik hi. Amah zin kawikawi a, Caesarea khua dongin khua khempeuh ah lungdamna thu a tangko hi.
Hih hun sungin Saul in Topa nungzuite thah dingin a sawm hi.

Tua ahih manin hih Lampi thu a um numei pasal a muh peuhpeuh manin Jerusalem khuapi ah a puak theih nadingin Siampi Ukpa kiangah pai in, Damascus khuapi a kikhopna inn ukte a lah ding phalna lai a ngen hi.
Amah hong kuankhia a Damascus khuapi a tunkuan in thakhat in vantung pan khuavak khat ama kimkot ah a tang hi.
Tua ciangin amah lei ah puksuk a, “Saul aw, Saul aw, banghang in hong bawlsia na hi hiam?” ci a, hopihna awging khat a za hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, nang kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Topa in, “Na hong bawlsiat Zeisu ka hi hi. Ciangzum sui lecin nang aa dingin na mahmah ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in lamdangsa mahmah in a ciling a, “Topa aw, bang hih dinga hong deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tho inla khua sungah lut in. Na hih ding teng hong kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Saul tawh a zinkhawm mite in tua awging a zak uh hangin kuamah mu lo uh ahih manin gen ding mel thei loin a dingcip uh hi.
Saul zong leilak pan tho in a khuadak hangin kuamah a muthei kei hi. Amaute in a khutah lenin Damascus khuapi sungah a lutpih uh hi.
Amah in khuamu lo, an nelo, tui dawn loin ni thum sung a om hi.
Tu in Damascus khuapi sungah Ananias a kici nungzuipa khat om a, a mangmuhna sungah Topa in, “Ananias aw,” ci in a sam hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hihlai ah ka om hi, Topa aw,” ci in a dawng hi.
Topa in, “Dingkhia inla, ‘Tang,’ a kici kongzing ah va pai in. Judas inn ah Tarsus khua mi Saul a kici pa va kankhia in. En in, amah thungen in a om hi.
Thu a nget laitak in mang mu a, Ananias a kici mi khat ama kiangah hong pai in khua a muhkik theih nadingin ama tungah a khut hong nga ding hi cih thu a mu zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ananias in, “Topa aw, hihpa in Jerusalem khuapi a om nangma misiangthote bawlsia mahmah hi cih mi tampi tung panin ka zazo hi.
Hih khua ah zong nangma min a suang khempeuh a mat theih nadingin siampi liante kiang panin phalna a ngah khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in, “Va pai in. Gentile‑te, kumpite le Israel tate mai ah ka min a genkhia dinga ka teel, keima vanzat khat ahi hi.
Keima min hangin a thuak ding gimna tampi ka laklai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ananias zong pai in tua inn sungah va lut a, Saul tungah a khut nga in, “Ka sanggampa Saul aw, khua na muhkik nading le Kha Siangtho tawh na kidim nadingin nong paina lampi a hong kilang Topa Zeisu in kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul mit panin ngalip tawh a kibang na khat thakhat in kia a, khua a muthei pah hi. Tua ciangin amah tho in tui a kiphum hi.
An a nek khit ciangin a tha a dimkik hi. Tua khit ciangin Damascus khuapi a om nungzuite tawh tawmvei sung Saul a omkhawm hi.
Kikhopna inn ah Saul pai a, “Zeisu in Pasian Tapa ahi hi,” ci in Khazih thu a hilh pah hi.

Ama thugen a za khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hihpa in Jerusalem khuapi sunga Zeisu min a suangte a bawlsiapa hilo ahi hiam? Hih khua ah zong tua mite manin, siampi liante kiangah a puak dinga hong pai hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Saul thakhauh semsem a, Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi ci in teltak in lak ahih manin Damascus khuapi a teeng Judah mite lungsim a patausak mahmah hi.
Ni tampi khit ciangin Judah mite in Saul thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin Saul in amaute vaihawmna a thei hi. Amaute in amah a thah theih nadingun kongpi ah sun le zan in a pang uh hi.
Tua ahih manin nungzuite in zan laitak in Saul paipih uh a, bawmpi sungah koihin kulhpi pua lamah a khaisuk uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi ah Saul a tun ciangin nungzuite tawh kipawl ding a hanciam hangin amah nungzui suak khin cih thu um zolo uh ahih manin a vekpi un a kihta uh hi.
Ahih hangin Barnabas in sawltakte kiangah amah paipih a, lampi ah Topa a muhna, Topa in amah a hopihna le Damascus khuapi sungah Zeisu min tawh hangtak a thu a hilhnate a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Jerusalem ah amaute tawh kikhawl a, sungtum pusuak in a om hi.
Amah in Topa Zeisu min tawh hangtak in thu a gen hi. Greek dan a zui Judah mite tawh thu kinial uh a, amaute in amah thah a sawm uh hi.
Sanggamte in hihthu a theih uh ciangin Caesarea khua ah amah kha uh a, tua panin Tarsus khua ah a paisak uh hi.

Tua hun in Judea gam a kipan Galilee gam le Samaria gam khempeuh a om pawlpite lungmuangtak in om uh a, tha a ngah uh hi. Topa kihtakna le Kha Siangtho thapiakna tawh kalsuan uh a, a pung semsem uh hi.
Tu in Peter khualzin kawikawi a, Lydda khua‑a a teeng misiangthote kiangah a hong tung hi.
Tua khua ah Aeneas a kici mipa khat a om hi. Amah a pumzaw ahih manin kum giat sung lupna tung ngakin a om khat ahi hi.
Peter in ama kiangah, “Aeneas aw, Zeisu Khazih in nang hong damsak zo hi. Tho inla, na lupna zial in,” a ci hi. Amah zong thakhat in a tho pah hi.
Tua hi a, Lydda khua le Sharon zanglei a teeng mi khempeuh in tua pa a muh uh ciangin Topa lamah a kikhel uh hi.
Tu in Joppa khua ah Tabitha, Greek pau in Dorcas a kici nungzui numei khat a om hi. Tua nu in mizawngte huhin thupha a bawl tawntung numei khat ahi hi.
Tua laitak in amah cina in a si hi. A luang a sil khit uh ciangin inndei tungnung ah a sial uh hi.
Joppa khua le Lydda khua kinai ahih manin tua khua ah Peter om hi cih thu nungzuite in a zak khitsa uh ahi hi. Peter sam dingin mi nih sawl uh a, thakhat in a hong pai pah nadingin a thumsak uh hi.

Peter zong dingin amaute tawh a paikhawm hi. A tun ciangin inndei tungnung ah a kahtohpih uh hi. Meigong khempeuh Peter kiangah dingin kap uh a, Dorcas in a nuntak lai‑a a khuisak nikteen puansilhte a lak uh hi.

Peter in amaute khempeuh a pusuahsak khit ciangin khukdin in thu a ngen hi. Tua khit ciangin misi luang lamah kihei in, “Tabitha aw, tho in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua nu a mit hong hak a, Peter a muh ciangin a tho hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in a khut khakin dingsak a, misiangthote le meigongte samin a nungtakik Dorcas a pia hi.
Joppa khua sungteng ah tua thu kizel a, mi tampi in Topa a um uh hi.
Joppa khua ah Peter ni tampi taam a, savun khuipa Simon inn ah a kinga hi.
Caesarea khua ah Cornelius kici mi khat om a, Italy galkaphonɠ sungah galkap 100 ukpa khat ahi hi.
A innkuanpih khempeuh tawh Pasian thu hahkat in Pasian a kihta mi khat ahi hi. Mizawngte tungah cinghtak in huhna pia a, Pasian kiangah thu a ngen tawntung mi khat zong ahi hi.
Ni khat, nai kua pawlin mang mu a, “Cornelius aw!” ci in a hopih Pasian vantungmi khat teltak in a mu hi.
Amah in vantungmi limtak in a et ciangin lau a, “Bang ahi hiam, topa aw?” a ci hi. Vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Na thungetna le mizawngte na huhna Pasian in hong thei khinzo hi.
Tu in Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Peter a kici Simon samsak in.
Amah in tuipi gei‑a a teeng savun khuipa Simon inn ah a om hi. Amah in na hih ding teng a hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah a hopih vantungmi a paikhiat khit ciangin Cornelius in a innsung nasemte nih le a kisapna teng a sepsak den Pasian thu a hahkat galkap khat a sam hi.
A thuteng a hilhcian khit ciangin Joppa khua ah amaute a paisak hi.
A zingciang in amaute zinkhia uh a, Joppa khua a tunkuan uh nai guk hun pawlin Peter zong thungen dingin innkhumzang ah a kahto hi.
Amah a gilkial mahmah a, an a lunggulh hi. Ahi zongin ankuang a bawl laitak un Peter in mangmu a,
van kihong in puanzapi tawh a kibang kiuli a nei, a kiu ciat ah a kikhihsa in vantung pan a kikhai, ama lamah hong kiasuk a mu hi.
Tua sungah leitung a om khe li nei ganhing namkimte, gamsate, a bokvak ganhingte le vana leng vasate a om hi.
Tua laitak in aw khat hong ging a, “Peter aw, tho in, tuate go inla ne in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in, “Topa aw, ka ne peuhmah kei ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a nekhuailo le a sianglo na khat beek ka ne ngei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin awging khatin a nihveina hopihkik a, “Pasian in siang hi a cihte nekhuailo hi ci kei in,” a ci hi.
Hih bangin thumvei a cih khit ciangin tua hong kikhaisuk na vantung ah a kilatokik hi.
Peter in a mangmuhna a khiatna bang hi ding hiam ci a, lungmang in a om laitak in Simon inn a zongzong Cornelius sawltakte kongpi mai ah a ding uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hihlai ah Peter a kici Simon hong tung kha hiam?” ci in a galdot uh hi.
Peter in a mangmuhna ngaihsun in a om laitak in Kha in ama kiangah, “En in, mi thum in nang hong zong uh hi.
Tua mite keima hong sawl ahi hi. Tua ahih manin ding inla, kumsuk in. Lunghianglo tak in amaute zui in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Cornelius in a hong sawl mite kiangah Peter paisuk a, “Hong en un, na mi zon uh keimah ka hi hi. Bang thu a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Amaute in, “Galkap 100 ukpa Cornelius in a inn ah nang hong sap nading le na thugen a ngaih nadingin Pasian in a siangtho vantungmi khat tungtawn in amah thu a pia zo hi. Amah in Pasian a kihta, a thuman mi khat hi a, Judah minam buppi in a zahtak uh mi khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in inn sungah amaute samin a giaksak hi. A zingciang in tua mite tawh Peter dingkhia a, Joppa khua‑a sanggamte pawlkhat in zong a zui uh hi.
A zingciang in Caesarea khua a tung uh hi. Tu in Cornelius in a tanaute le a lawm itteng kaikhawm in amaute a ngak hi.
Inn sungah Peter a lut ciangin Cornelius in dawn a, a khe phungah bokin a bia hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in amah phongto a, “Ding in, kei zong mihing mah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in amah a hopih kawmin inn sungah a lut ciangin mi tampi kikhawm in a om a mu hi.

Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Judah mi khat minam dangte tawh a kikholh ding le a kianga a hawh ding thukham tawh kituak lo hi cih thu na thei uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in mi khatpeuh santaklo, sianglo hi ka cih khakloh nadingin a hong lakzo hi.
Tua ahih manin nong sap phetun nial loin kong pai pah hi. Bang thu a hong sam na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Cornelius in, “Tuma ni li lai, tubang hun, nai kua pawlin ka inn sungah antang in thu ka ngen hi. Tua ciangin puanpak a silh mi khat ka mai ah hong dinga,
‘Cornelius aw, na thungetnate Pasian in hong zazo a, mizawngte na huhna zong a hong ciaptehsak zo hi.

Tua ahih manin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Peter a kici Simon samsak in. Amah in tuipi gei‑a a teeng savun bawlpa Simon inn ah zintung in a om hi. Amah hong tun ciangin thu hong gen ding hi,’ a hong ci hi.

Tua ahih manin nang hong sam ding mi kong sawl pah a, tu in hong paithei na hih manin hoih mahmah hi. Tua ahih manin na gen dinga Pasian in hong piak thu khempeuh a ngai dingin tu in Pasian mai ah koteng ka om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter zong thugen kipan a, “Pasian in kuamah a deidan loh lam ka thei taktak hi.
Minam khempeuh lakah amah kihta in a dik a gamta mite amah in a sang hi.
Pasian in Israel mite tunga a puak lungdamna thu in mi khempeuh Topa, Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in a kihilh kilemna thu ahi hi.
Tua thu Judea gam khempeuh ah kitangko khinzo a, John in tuiphumna thu a tangko khit ciangin Galilee gam pana hong kipankhia thu ahi hi, cih thu zong na thei uh hi.

Pasian in Nazareth khua mi Zeisu, Kha Siangtho le vangliatna tawh nilh a, amah in thupha bawl in a vak kawikawi hi. Pasian in ompih ahih manin Dawimangpa bawlsiat mi khempeuh a damsak hi cih thu zong na thei uh hi.
“Singkhuam tunga a khailuppa uh tua Zeisu in Judah mite gam sung le Jerusalem khuapi sunga a bawl na khempeuh ah a teci ka hi uh hi.
A ni thum ni in Pasian in amah a thawhkiksakna thu kilangtak in a lak hi.
Ahih hangin mi khempeuh muhin lak lo a, Pasian in a teel kholhsa teci ahi kote muh ding bekin hong lak hi. Misite lak pan a thawhkik khit ciangin amah tawh anne tuidawn in ka omkhawm uh hi.
Zeisu in a nungta lai mite le a sisa mite tungah thukhen dinga Pasian in a sehpa ahi hi cih thu mite tungah a tangko ding le teci a pang dingin amah in kote thu hong pia zo hi.
Amah a um mi khempeuh in ama min hangin mawhmaisakna a ngah ding uh hi ci in kamsang khempeuh in zong ama thu teci a pangzo uh hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
Peter in hih thute a gen laitak mahin ama thugen a za mi khempeuh tungah Kha Siangtho a tung hi.
Pasian in Gentile‑te tung nangawn ah Kha Siangtho letsong a piakna thu, Peter tawh a paikhawm vun ki‑at thu‑um mite in a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua mite in paunam tuamtuam tawh pau in, Pasian min a phatna uh amaute in a za uh hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Eite mah bangin Kha Siangtho a ngah hih mite tui sungah a kiphum ding uh kua in khamthei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa minin tui a kiphum nadingun Peter in amaute thu a pia hi. Tua khit ciangin amaute in ni tawmvei sung Peter a tambeh nadingin a kho uh hi.
Tu in Gentile‑te in zong Pasian thu sangta uh hi cih thu Judea gama om sawltakpite le sanggamte in a za uh hi.
Jerusalem ah Peter a paitoh ciangin vunat mite in ama kiangah,
“Vunatlo mite kiangah va pai in an na nekhawm hi!” ci in a mawhsak uh hi.
Ahih hangin Peter in a kipat a kipan a bantak in hih bangin a hilhcian hi.
Amah in, “Joppa khua ah thungen a ka om laitak in mang ka mu a, puanzapi tawh a kibang na khat, kiu li nei, a kiu ciat ah kikhihsa in vantung pan hong kikhaisuk, ka kiangah hong tung hi.
Tua sung limtak ka et ciangin leitung a khe li nei ganhingte, gamsate, a bokvak ganhingte, vana leng vasate ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘Peter aw, tho in tuate go inla ne in,’ a hong ci awging khat ka za hi.
“Kei zong, ‘Topa aw, ka ne peuhmah kei ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh a nekhuailo le a siangtholo na khat beek ka kamsung ka tun ngei kei hi,’ ka ci hi.
“Ahih hangin tua awging mahin vantung panin hong dawngkik a, ‘Pasian in siang hi a cihte nekhuailo hi ci kei in,’ a hong ci hi.
Hih bangin thumvei a hong cih khit ciangin, a vekpi in vantung ah a kikhaitokik hi.
“Tua hun mahin Caesarea khua panin ka kianga hong kisawl mi thumte, ka omna inn mai ah hong ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin lunghianglo taka amaute ka zuih nadingin Kha in a hong gen hi. Tua thamloh in hih sanggamte guk in zong kei hong zui uh a, a hong samsakpa inn ah ka lut uh hi.
Tua pa in, Vantungmi khat ka inn sungah hong ding ka mu a, ‘Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Peter a kici Simon samsak in.
Amah in nangmah le na inn sunga om mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna na ngah nadingun thu hong hilh ding hi hong ci hi,’ ci in a hong gen hi.
“Tua banga thugen ka kipat laitak in a kipat cillai‑a eite tunga a hong tun banglianin amaute tungah Kha Siangtho a hong tung hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘John in mite a tuiphum hi note na hih uh le Kha Siangtho tawh hong kiphum ding hi,’ ci a, Topa hong gensa thu ka phawkkik hi.
Tua ahih manin eite in Topa Zeisu Khazih i up cianga Pasian in hong piak Kha Siangtho letsong mah amaute zong pia ahih leh Pasian a langpan dingin kei leltak kua ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thute a zak uh ciangin bangmah gen nawnlo in Pasian phat uh a, “Tua ahih leh Pasian in Gentile‑te tungah zong nuntakna ngah nadingin mawhna kisik kikna thu a pia zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tu in Stephen a kibawlsiatna hangin a kithehthang mite Phoenicia gam, Cyprus tuikulh le Antioch khua dong tung uh a, kuamah dang tungah thuhilh loin Judah mite tung bekah a hilh uh hi.
Ahi zongin Cyprus gam mite le Cyrene khua mite pawlkhat, Antioch khua ah va pai in Greek ngeina a zui Judah mite kiangah Topa Zeisu thu a va hilh uh hi.
Topa vangliatna in amaute ompih a, mi tampi in thu um in Topa lamah a kihei uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi a om pawlpi mite in hih thute a zak uh ciangin Antioch khuapi dong a pai dingin Barnabas a sawl uh hi.
Tua khua ah Barnabas tungin Pasian hehpihna a muh ciangin a lungdam a, a vekpi un lungsim takpi tawh Topa sungah a kipsuak nadingun a hanthawn hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoih khat hi a, Kha Siangtho le thu upna tawh a kidim mi hi a, Topa kiangah mi tampi a tun hi.
Tua khit ciangin Saul a zong dingin Tarsus khua ah Barnabas a pai hi.

A muh ciangin Antioch khua ah a paipih hi. Tua khua ah kum khat sung pawlpite tawh omkhawm uh a, mi tampi kiangah Pasian thu a hilh uh hi. Thu‑um mite pen Christian ci in min a kiphuah masakna mun in Antioch khua ahi hi.
Tua hun sungin Jerusalem khuapi panin Antioch khua ah kamsangte a hong paisuk uh hi.
Tuate lakah Agabus a kici pa dingto a, “Claudius Caesar kumpipa hun lai‑a a tun bangin leitung bup ah kialpi hong tung ding hi,” ci in Kha theihsakna bangin a gen hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in zong amaute hihzawh zah ciat tawh, Judea gama om sanggamte huhna sum khak dingin a khentat uh hi.
A khentat bangun semtakpi uh a, Barnabas le Saul khut tungtawn in upate kiangah a khak uh hi.
Tua hun sungin Herod kumpipa in pawlpi mite pawlkhat bawlsiat dingin a man hi.
Amah in John sanggampa James namsau tawh a thatsak hi.
Tua thu in Judah mite lungdamsak hi cih a muh ciangin Peter zong mat dingin a sawm leuleu hi. Tua hunin Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi sung ahi hi.
Amah in Peter a mat khit ciangin thongah khum a, Paisan Pawi a ven ciangin mihonpi mai ah a lahkhiat dingin galkap li ta in a om pawl lite cin dingin a ap hi.
Tua ahih manin thong sungah Peter kikhum a, ahi zongin pawlpi in ama aa dingin tatsat loin Pasian kiangah thu a ngetsak uh hi.
Herod in Peter a lahkhiat sawm ni zanin sikkhau nih tawh amah kikhih a, galkap nihte kikal ah a ihmu hi. Thongcingte zong kongkhak mai ah amah cingin a om uh hi.

Tu in en in, Topa vantungmi khat Peter kiangah thakhat in hong dinga, thong inn sung khempeuh ah khuavak a tang hi. Vantungmi in Peter a pang khoih in, “Tho mengmeng in!” ci in a phong hi. Tua ciangin Peter khut a sikkhaute a kitolkhia hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Na kawng gak inla, na khedap bulh in,” a cih ciangin Peter in zong tua bangin a hih hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Na puan silh inla hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter paikhia in vantungmi nung a zui hi. Ahi zongin vantungmi nasep teng a taktak ahihlam thei loin mangmu a kisa hi.

A cingte vilna mun a khatna le a nihna a khen uh ciangin khuapi sung lutna sikkongpi a tung uh hi. Tua kongpi ama thu in kihong a, amaute gel zong a pusuakkhia uh hi. Kongzing khat a zuih khit uh ciangin vantungmi in thakhat in amah a nusia hi.
Peter in khua a phawkkik ciangin, “Tu in Topa in a vantungmi hong sawlin, Herod khut sung pan le Judah mite hong thah nading panin hong honkhia khinzo hi cih thu teltak in ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in hih thu a phawk khit ciangin Mark a kici John nu Mary inn ah va pai a, tualai ah mi tampi thungen in a kikhawm uh hi.
Peter in kong a kiuh ciangin Rhoda kici numeino khat kong a hon dingin a pai hi.
Tua nu in Peter aw ahihlam a theih ciangin lungdamlua a, kongpi hon nai loin inn sungah lehtaikik a, kongpi mai ah Peter a dinlam a va ko hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “A hai hi ni teh!” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Ahi taktak mah hi,” ci in a gen teitei ciangin amaute in, “Ama vantungmi hi in teh,” a ci lai uh hi.
Tu in, Peter in kong kiukiu lai ahih manin hon uh a, amah a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.

Ahih hangin amah in daitak in a om nadingun a khut tawh lak a, Topa in thong sung pan a lakkhiatna thuteng a gen hi. Amah in, “James le i sanggamte kiangah hih thu va gen un,” a cih khit ciangin mun dang khatah a pai hi.
Khuavak phetin Peter bangci ahi hiam ci in galkapte sungah buaina lianpi a om hi.
Herod in Peter limtak in a zonsak hangin a mu zo kei uh hi. Tua ciangin a cingte thu sit a, amaute thah dingin thu a pia hi.

Tu in Tyre khua le Sidon khua mite tungah Herod a heh mahmah hi. Tua ahih manin kumpi innsung vaihawmpipa Blastus a pawlmat khit uh ciangin Herod kiangah amaute hong paikhawm uh a, kilem nading a thum uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in hih kumpipa kiang panin a annek ding uh a ngah uh hi.
A kisehkholh ni a tun ciangin kumpi puan tawh Herod kizem in a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mipi tungah thu a gen hi.
Mipite in, “Ama awging in mihing aw hilo in pasian awging ahi hi!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Herod in minthanna Pasian pia lo ahih manin Topa vantungmi khatin thakhat in amah vattuk a, than in ne in a si hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian thu ahih leh khangin a pung semsem hi.
Barnabas le Saul in a sep ding teng uh a zawh khit uh ciangin Jerusalem khuapi pan ciahkik uh a, Mark a kici John a tonpih uh hi.
Tu in Antioch khua pawlpi sungah kamsangte le sia pawlkhat a om uh hi. Amaute in Barnabas, Niger kici Simeon, Cyrene khua mi Lucius, gam uk mangpa Herod tawh a khangkhawm Manaen le Saul‑te ahi uh hi.
Amaute in antang in Topa nasem in a om laitak un, Kha Siangtho in, “Ka piaksa nasep a sem dingin Barnabas le Saul hong khenkhia un,” a ci hi.
Antang a thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute tungah khut nga in a sawlkhia uh hi.
Kha Siangtho in a sawlkhiat amaute, Seleucia khua ah paisuk uh a, tua panin tembaw tawh Cyprus tuikulh ah a pai uh hi.
Salamis khua a tun uh ciangin Judah mite kikhopna inn sungah Pasian thu hilh uh a, John in zong amaute nasep a huh hi.
Tua tuikulh ah zin kawikawi uh a, Paphos khua a tun uh ciangin Bar‑Jesus kici Judah minam, dawi thu a siam, kamsangzuau khat a mu uh hi.
Amah in mipil mangpipa Sergius Paulus nasemte khat ahi hi. Mangpipa in Pasian thu za nuam ahih manin Barnabas le Saul a samsak hi.
Ahih hangin mangpipa in thu a up loh nadingin dawi thu a siam Elymas a kici pa in hamciam in amaute a langpan hi.
Ahih hangin Paul a kici Saul pen Kha Siangtho tawh kidim in, Elymas en gega a,
“Khemna le zuauthu bekbek tawh a kidim, Dawimangpa tapa, thuman khempeuh a galbawlpa aw, Topa lampi tangte na kawikaih den pen khawl lo ding na hi hiam?

Tu in en in, Topa khut nang tungah hong tung dinga, na mittaw in tawlkhat sung khua na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Thakhat in tua pa tungah khuamial hong tung ahih manin a khut lena a paipih ding mi zongin a zawt kawikawi hi.
Mangpipa in tua thu piang a muh ciangin amaute in Topa tawh kisai thu a hilhte uh lamdang sa mahmah in a um hi.
Tu in, Paul le a lawmte Paphos khua pan tembaw tuangin Pamphylia gam Perga khua tung uh a, tua panin John in amaute nusia in Jerusalem khuapi ah a ciah hi.
Perga khua panin paikhia uh a, Pisidia gam Antioch khua a tung uh hi. Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn sungah lutin a tu uh hi.
Thukham le Kamsangte laibu‑te a kisim khit ciangin kikhopna inn ukte in amaute samsak uh a, “Sanggamte aw, mipite hanthot nop na neih uh leh gen un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul dingto in a khut vana thu a hilh in ah, “Israel mite le Pasian a kihta mite aw, na ngai un.
Hih Israelte Pasian in i pute i pate na teel a, Egypt gamah mikhual bangin a om laitak un amaute lamsang in, tua gam panin a thahat ama khut tawh a paikhiatpih hi.
Sehnel gam sunga tua mite gamtatna teng kum 40 sung a thuak keikai hi.
Amah in Canaan gam sunga minam sagihte a suksiat khit ciangin amaute aa dingin tua gam a hawmsak hi.
“Tua khit ciangin Pasian in kamsangpa Samuel hun dong kum 450 sung amaute aa dingin thukhen mangte a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi khat ngen uh a, Pasian in Benjamin suante khat ahi Kish tapa Saul pia a, tua pa in kum 40 sung a uk hi.

Tua khit ciangin amah in Saul hemkhia in, amaute kumpi dingin David a lamto hi. Pasian in David thu a genna ah, ‘Keima deihna khempeuh a sem ding ka lungsim puak bang a nei Jesse tapa David ka mu zo hi,’ a ci hi.
Pasian in ama kamciamna tawh kizui in hih mipa suan pan Israel mite aa dingin Honpa Zeisu a piangsak hi.
Zeisu hong paima in John in Israel mi khempeuh a mawhna uh kisikkik a tui a kiphum nadingun thu a hilh masa hi.

John in a nasep a zawh ciangin, ‘Kei kua hi, ci in nong ngaihsun uh hiam? Kei, amah ka hi kei hi. Ahih hangin en un, kei khit ciangin a dang khat hong pai dinga, ama khedapkhau sut dingin zong ka kilawm kei hi,’ a ci hi.
“Abraham suan ka sanggamte le note laka om Pasian a kihtate aw, Pasian in hih hotkhiatna thu note kiangah hong puakzo hi.

Jerusalem khuapi a teengte le gam ukte in Zeisu a thei kei uh hi. Sabbath ni sima a kisim den kamsangte thugente zong theilo uh ahih manin Zeisu tungah thu khen in tua thu kigente a tangtungsak uh hi.
Sihkhop nading zah thu khat beek mu lo napi in, Pilate in amah a thah nadingin a ngen uh hi.
Lai Siangtho sunga kigelhsa amah tawh kisai thu khempeuh tua bangin a tangtunsak khit uh ciangin singkhuam tung pan amah lakhia in han sungah a vui uh hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in misite lak panin amah a thokiksak hi.
Galilee gam panin Jerusalem khuapi ah amah tawh paitokhawm mite in ni tampi sung amah mu uh a, tua mite in ama aa dingin mipi tungah teci a pang uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Pasian in i pute i pate tunga a kamciamsa lungdamna thu note tungah a hong tangko ka hi uh hi.

Late nihna sungah, ‘Nangmah in ka Tapa na hi hi, Tuni in nang kong piangsak zo hi,’ ci a, a kigelh mah bangin Pasian in misite lak panin Zeisu thokiksak a, i pute i pate suan le khak ahi eite tungah tua kamciamna hong tungsak zo hi.
‘David tunga ka kamciam a siangtho le, A muanhuai hehpihna note tungah kong tungsak ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin a muatlo dingin misite lak panin Zeisu a thosak zo hi.
“Tua ahih manin amah in Late laibu mundang khatah zong, ‘Na Misiangthopa, Na muatsak kei ding hi,’ a ci hi.
“David ahih leh Pasian deihna bangin ama khang aa dingin na a sep khit ciangin si a, a pute a pate tawh kivuikhawm in a muat hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in a thawhkiksak pa a muat kei hi.
“Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian in hih mipa tungtawn in mawhna hong maisakna thu a hong tangko ka hi uh hi cih thu theita un.
Moses thukham tawh dik na tan zawh lohna khempeuh panun, Pasian in Zeisu a um khempeuh dik hong tangsak hi.
Tua ahih manin Kamsangte gensa thu note tungah hong tun loh nadingin kidawm un.

“Kamsangte in, ‘No, mi a neumuhte aw, en un, Lamdangsa unla kisiamang un. Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah a hong kitangko hangin, Na up theih hetloh ding uh nasep khat, Note khang sungin ka sem ding hi,’ a ci hi,” ci in a hilh uh hi.
Kikhopna inn pan Judah mite a paikhiat uh ciangin, Gentile‑te in amaute kiangah Sabbath ni kik ciangin hih thute mah a genkik nadingun a thum uh hi.
Kikhop a man uh ciangin Judah mi tampi le Judah mi a kisuaksak biakna mi tampi in Paul le Barnabas nung a zui uh hi. Amaute in zong Pasian hehpihna sungah a omsuak nadingun tua mite a hanthawn uh hi.
Sabbath ni kik ciangin Pasian thu ngai dingin khuazang phialin a hong kikhawm uh hi.
Judah mite in mihonpi a muh uh ciangin haza mahmah uh ahih manin Paul thugente lehgen in kosia in a langpan uh hi.

Tua ciangin Paul le Barnabas hang semsem uh a, “Pasian thu note tunga kong hilh masak ding uh a kul ahi hi. Ahih hangin note in tua thu nolhin nuntak tawntungna a ngah dingin no le no kilawm kisalo na hih manun en un, Gentile‑te kiangah ka pai ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh, ‘Hotkhiatna thu leimong dongah puakin, Gentile‑te khuavak a suak dingin, Note kong seh hi,’ ci in Topa in thu a hong pia zo hi,” ci in a gen uh hi.
Gentile‑te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah uh a, a kigen Topa thu a phat uh hi. Nuntak tawntungna ngah dingin a kisehsa mite in a um uh hi.
Tua gam buppi ah Topa thu a kizel hi.
Ahih hangin Judah mite in Pasian thu a hahkat, a kithupi muh numei makaite le khuapi uliante holhthawh uh a, Paul le Barnabas‑te bawlsia in amau gam panin a hawlkhia uh hi.
Ahih hangin Paul le Barnabas in amaute khe a leivuite singkhia in Iconium khua ah a pai uh hi.
Nungzuite ahih leh lungnopna le Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim uh hi.
Iconium khua a tun uh ciangin Paul le Barnabas in Judah mite kikhopna inn sungah lutin mihonpi thu hilh uh a, Judah mite le Greek mite tampi in a um uh hi.
Ahi zongin Gentile‑te in sanggamte tungah lungsim hoihlo a neih nadingun thu‑umlo Judah mite in a holhthawh uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tua khua ah Paul le Barnabas‑te sawtpi taam uh a, Topa thu hangtak in a gen uh hi. Pasian in amaute tungtawn in limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite piangsak in ama hehpihna thu teci a pang hi.
Ahih hangin khuasung mite kipawlkhen uh a, pawlkhat in Judah mite pawlin a dangte in sawltakte a pawl uh hi.
Gentile‑te le Judah mite in a makaite uh tawh kikop in thagum tawh sawltakte bawlsia in suang tawh denlup ding a hanciam uh hi.
Sawltakte in tua thu a theih uh ciangin Lycaonia gama om Lystra le Derbe khua‑a kipan tua kim khuate ah tai in,
lungdamna thu a tangko uh hi.
A suah tunga kipan a khezaw in lam a pai ngeilo pasal khat Lystra khua ah a om hi.
Amah in Paul thugen a ngai hi. Paul in tua pa limtak in en a, dam theih nading upna a neih lam a muh ciangin,
“Na khe tawh dingtang in!” ci in nakpitak kiko in thu a piak leh tua pa diangin lam a pai hi.
Tu in mihonpite in Paul nasep a muh uh ciangin, “Pasiante mihing bangin hong paisuk ahi hi!” ci in Lycaonia pau tawh nakpi in a kiko uh hi.
Barnabas pen Zeus ci uh a, Paul pen thugenpipa ahih manin Hermes a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin khuanawl a om Zeus biakna innpi a siampipa in bawngtalte le pakkualte kongpi ah hong paipih in mipite tawh biakna pia dingin hong kithawi uh hi.
Ahih hangin sawltak Barnabas le Paul in tua thu a zak uh ciangin a puan uh balkek in mihonpi lakah lut uh a,

“Lawmte aw, banghang in hih bangin hih na hi uh hiam? Kote zong note mah tawh a kibang mihing ka hi uh hi. Kimanna a omlo hih nate nusia in leitung le vantung, tuipi le tuate sunga om na khempeuh a bawlpa, a nungta Pasian lamah na kihei nadingun lungdamna thu a hong hilh ka hi bek uh hi.
Tua Pasian in a beisa khangte ah minamte khempeuh amau ut bangbang in nungta dingin a phal hi.

Ahi zongin ama teci ding om loin a koih kei hi. Eite aa dingin a hoih nate hong bawlsak in vana guahtui le khaici a gahsak khuahunte hong pia a, an ne tui dawnin lungdam kipahna tawh a hong kidimsak hi,” ci in kiko in a gen uh hi.
Hih thute a gen uh hangin mihonpi in gangawh biakna tawh amaute biakna piaksawm veve uh a, khamlah dektak in a om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Antioch khua le Iconium khua pana Judah mite tua munah hong pai uh a, mihonpi holhthawh in suang tawh Paul a deng uh hi. Amah a si khinzo sa uh ahih manin khuapua lamah a kaikhia uh hi.
Ahi zongin ama kimah nungzuite a din laitak un amah tho in khua sungah a lut hi. A zingciang in Barnabas tawh Derbe khua ah a pai uh hi.
Tua khua ah lungdamna thu tangko in mi tampi nungzui a suahsak khit uh ciangin Lystra, Iconium, le Antioch khua lamah a kilehkik uh hi.
Nungzuite lungsim hanthawn in thu upna a zopsuak nadingun thapia uh a, “Haksatna tampi thuakin Pasian kumpigam sungah a lut ding i hi hi,” ci in a hilh uh hi.
Pawlpi khempeuh ah makaite a koih khit uh ciangin antan thungetna tawh a uppa uh Topa khut sungah a ap uh hi.
Pisidia gam kantan in Pamphylia gam hong tung uh a,
Perga khua ah thu a hilh khit uh ciangin Attalia khua ah a paisuk uh hi.
A zawh khitsa uh nasepna teng a sem dingin Pasian hehpihna sungah amaute a ki‑apna mun Antioch khua zuan dingin tua mun panin tembaw tawh a pai uh hi.
Tua lai a hong tun uh ciangin pawlpite kaikhawm uh a, amaute tungtawn a Pasian nasepnate genin Pasian in Gentile‑te tungah thu upna kong a honsakna thu a zasak uh hi.
Tua khua ah nungzuite tawh amaute sawt veipi a omkhawm uh hi.
Judea gam panin a hong paisuk mi pawlkhat in, “Moses hong piak ngeina zui in vun na at kei uh leh hotkhiatna na ngahthei kei ding uh hi,” ci in sanggamte a hilh uh hi.

Tua ahih manin Paul le Barnabas in tua mite tawh nakpitak in kinial uh a, thu tampi a kisel uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih thu tawh kisai in Jerusalem khuapi a om sawltakte le makaite kiangah Paul, Barnabas le a dang mi pawlkhat paisak dingin a khentat uh hi.
Pawlpi mite in amaute kha uha Phoenicia gam le Samaria gam kantan in a pai uh hi. Gentile‑te a kikhelna thu zasak kawikawi uha, sanggamte khempeuh a kipak mahmah uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi a tun uh ciangin pawlpi mite, sawltakte le makaite in amaute na dawn uha amaute tungtawn in Pasian nasepnate khempeuh a zasak uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pharisee pawlte lak panin thu‑um mi pawlkhat hong ding uh a, “Tua mite in vunat in Moses thukham a zuih nadingun thu i piak ding kisam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin tu in hih thu a ngaihsun dingin sawltakpite le makaite a kikhawm uh hi.

Nakpitak in a kisel khit uh ciangin Peter dingto a, “Sanggamte aw, Gentile‑te in keima kam panin lungdamna thu za a, a up theih nadingun a sawtvei simlai in Pasian in eite lak panin kei hong teel hi cih na thei uh hi.
Tua hi a, lungsim a thei Pasian in eite mah bangin Kha Siangtho a piakna tawh amaute a san lam a kilangsak zo hi.
Upna tawh a lungsim uh hahsiangsak in amaute le eite kikal ah kilamdanna a omsak kei hi.
Tua ahih manin tu in, i pute i pate le eite mahmah in i puak zawh loh hakkol banghang in thu‑um mite tungah suanin Pasian ze‑et na hi uh hiam?
Amaute mah bangin eite in zong Topa Zeisu Khazih hehpihna tungtawn in hotkhiatna i ngah ding hi cih i um hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Tua khit ciangin Pasian in amaute tungtawn in Gentile‑te laka a bawl limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite Paul le Barnabas in a zaksak uh ciangin mihonpite in dai khipkhep in a ngai uh hi.
Amaute a daih khipkhep khit uh ciangin James in, “Ute naute aw, na ngai un.
Pasian in ama min dingin Gentile‑te lak panin mi honkhat lakhia dingin a hawhcilna thu Simon in hong gen khinzo hi.
Hih in kamsangte gensa thu tawh kituak hi. Kamsangte in,
‘Tua hun khit ciangin kong paikik ding hi. A puk khinsa David biakbuuk ka lamkik dinga, A kicimsa teng puahpha in ka dingkiksak ding hi.
Tua hi leh a kiplai mite le, Keima min a suang Gentile‑te khempeuh nangawn in Topa a zong ding uh hi. Hih na khempeuh a bawl Topa in a gen ahi hi,’ ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi.
“Pasian in ama sep ding khempeuh a kipatcil a kipan a theih khitsa vive ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian lama hong kihei Gentile‑te buaisak kei ni.
Ahi zongin amaute in milim biakna a kizang an, numei pasal mawhna, gawlmek a kithat ganhing sa le sisan a tan nadingun laikhak i gelh ding hoih ka sa hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tanglai peka kipan khua khempeuh ah Moses laibu sunga om thute kihilh a, Sabbath ni sialin kikhopna innteng ah a kisim den hi,” a ci hi.

Sawltakpite, makaite le pawlpi buppi in tua thu hoih a sa uh hi. Antioch khua ah Paul le Barnabas tawh a paikhawm dingin sanggamte laka a makaite sung panin Barsabas a kici Judas le Silas‑te a teel uh hi.
Amaute in hih bangin laikhak gelhin a puasak uh hi. Sawltakpite, makaite le sanggamte in Antioch khua, Syria gam le Cilicia gama om Gentile mi ahi sanggamte kong hopih uh hi.

Kote kiang panin a hong pai mi pawlkhat in, “Vunat in, thukham na zuih ding uh ahi hi,” ci in a thugenna uh tawh note hong buaisak in na lungsim uh hong siatsak lam ka na za uh hi. Kote in tua bang dingin amaute tungah thu ka pia kei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin lungsim kituak in ka kikhawm uh a, mi pawlkhat teelkhia in i it Barnabas le Paul tawh note kiangah kong paisak ding uh hoih ka sa uh hi.
Amaute in i Topa Zeisu Khazih min hangin a nuntakna uh a pia ngamte ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin hih thute amau kam mahmah tawh zong hong genkawm dingin Judas le Silas kong paisak uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh hih a kisam thute lobuang note tungah vangik zaw hong suan lo dingin Kha Siangtho le kote in hoih ka sa uh hi.

Tuate in, milim biakna a kizang an, sisan, gawlmek a kithat ganhing sa le numei pasal thangtatnate na tan nading uh ahi hi. Tuate tang le uh cin note aa dingin a hoih ding hi. Na ci damta un. Mangpha, ci in lai a khak uh hi.
Tua bangin amaute sawlkhia uh a, Antioch khua a tung uh hi. Tualai ah mihonpi kikhawmsak in tua laikhak a pia uh hi.
Tua laikhak a sim khit uh ciangin tua thapiakna thu hangin a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
Tu in Judas le Silas‑te in zong kamsang ahihna uh tawh thu tampi gen uh a, sanggamte thapia in a thakhauhsak uh hi.
Sawtkhop a taam khit uh ciangin sawltakpite kiangah lungnuamtak in a ciahkiksak uh hi.
Ahih hangin Silas in amah tualai ah a taamlai ding hoih a sa hi.
Paul le Barnabas zong Antioch khua ah taamlai uh a, midang tampi tawh Topa thu hilhin lungdamna thu a tangko khawm uh hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin Paul in Barnabas kiangah, “Topa thu i hilh khitna khuate ah paikik in i sanggamte bangci uh ahi hiam cih a en dingin va hawh ni,” a ci hi.
Tu in Barnabas in Mark kici John tonpih dingin a sawm hi.
Ahih hangin Mark in Pamphylia gam panin amaute ciahsan in amaute nasepna ah zuisuak lo ahih manin Paul in amah tonpih loh dingin a gen hi.
Kinak sellua uh ahih manin kikhen uh a, Barnabas in Mark tonpih in Cyprus tuikulh ah tembaw tawh a pai uh hi.
Ahi zongin Paul in Silas teel a, sanggamte in Pasian hehpihna sungah amaute a ap khit uh ciangin a kuankhia uh hi.
Syria gam le Cilicia gamah Paul zin kawikawi in pawlpite tha a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Derbe le Lystra khua ah Paul a tung hi. En in, tua khua ah Timothy kici nungzui khat a om hi. Amah Judah minam, thu‑um numei khat tapa hi a, a pa ahih leh Greek mi ahi hi.
Amah pen Lystra khua le Iconium khua‑a om sanggamte in a pahtak mahmah uh mi khat ahi hi.
Paul in amah tonpih nuam ahih manin sam a, tua kima om Judah mi khempeuh in a pa Greek mi ahihlam thei uh ahih manin vun a atsak hi.
Khuapi tengah zin kawikawi uh a, Jerusalem khuapi ah sawltakpite le makaite in zuih dingin a khun uh thute a theisak kawikawi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin pawlpite upna ah kip in nisim in mimal a khang hi.
Tu in Phrygia gam le Galatia gamah a zin khit uh ciangin Asia gam sungah Pasian thu a gen ding uh Kha Siangtho in a kham hi.
Mysia gam a tun khit uh ciangin Bithynia gam zinsawm uh a, ahi zongin Kha in a phal kei hi.
Tua ciangin Mysia gam kantan in, Troas khua ah a paisuk uh hi.
A zan ciangin Paul in mang mu a, Macedonia mi khat ama kiangah hong dingin, “Macedonia gam lamah hong galkah inla, kote hong huh in,” ci in a thum hi.
Paul in mang a muh khit ciangin Topa in tua mite kiangah lungdamna thu a tangko dingin hong samzo hi cih thei in Macedonia gam pai dingin ka sawm pah uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Troas khua panin tembaw tuangin Samothrace tuikulh ah tangtak in ka pai uh a, a zingciang in Neapolis khua ka tung uh hi.
Tualai panin Macedonia gam sunga khua lianpen khat ahi Rome mite teenna Philippi khua ka tung uh a, tua khua ah nitam simsim ka taam uh hi.
Sabbath ni in khuapua lamah paikhia in thu kingetna mun gungei ah ka pai uh hi. Tualai ah ka tu uh a, kikhawm a om numeite kiangah thu ka gen uh hi.

Tu in ka thugen uh a zate lakah Lydia a kici Pasian a bia numei khat a om hi. Amah Thyatira khua mi hi a, puan dupsan zuakte khat ahi hi. Tua nu in Paul thugen a up theih nadingin Topa in a lungsim a honsak hi.
Amah le a innkuanpihte tui kiphum uh a, amah in, “Topa tungah a citak mi khatin nong ngaihsut uh leh hong pai unla ka inn ah hong tung un,” ci in hong samin a hong kho tentan hi.
Khatvei, thungen dinga ka pai laitak un mailam thu genkholhna tawh a tote aa ding sum tampi a ngahsak, dawilut sila numei khatin kote hong dawntuah hi.
Tua numei in Paul le kote hong zui a, “Hih mite in hotkhiatna lampi a hong hilh, Sangbel Pasian nasemte ahi uh hi,” ci in a kiko hi.

Tua numei in ni tampi sung tua bangin a hih den hi. Tua ciangin Paul in nopmawhsa mahmah ahih manin tua dawi lamah kihei a, “Ama sung pan na paikhiat nadingin Zeisu Khazih min tawh thu kong pia hi,” a cih ciangin tua hun lian mah in tua dawi a paikhia hi.
A tote in a sum ngah nading uh lametna om nawnlo hi cih a theih uh ciangin Paul le Silas‑te man uh a, thuneite omna sumbuuk lamah a kai uh hi.
Thukhen vaihawmte kiangah puak in, “Hih Judah mite in ka khuasung uh nakpi in hong buaisak uh hi.
Ei Rome mite san theihloh ding le zuih theihloh ding ngeinate hong hilh uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
