Tua ciangin mihonpite in Paul le Silas langpan huan uh a, thukhen vaihawmte in amaute puan suahkhiatsak in ciangpum tawh sat dingin thu a pia uh hi.
Tam veipi a sat khit uh ciangin thonginn ukpa in hoihtak a cin nadingin thupia a, thongah a khum uh hi.
Thonginn ukpa in tua bang thupiakna ngah ahih manin thongsung tawngnung pen ah amaute khum in a khe uh kol a bulh hi.
Ahih hangin zankim laitak in Paul le Silas in thungen in Pasian phatna la sa uh a, thongkiate in a ngai uh hi.
Tua laitak in nakpitak in zinling a, thonginn bulpi nangawn a kilok hi. Thong kongkhak khempeuh thakhat in kihong a, thongkiate a kikhihna sikkhau khempeuh zong a kitolkhia hi.
Thonginn ukpa a khanlawh ciangin thonginn kongkhakte honsa a om mu a, thongkia teng a taimang khin sa ahih manin a namsau dokin amah le amah a kithahsawm hi.
Ahih hangin Paul nakpi in kiko a, “Ka vekpi un hihlai ah ka om uh hi. Nang le nang bangmah kicih kei in,” a ci hi.
Thonginn ukpa in meivak a nget khit ciangin taikawm in thong sungah lut a, a cilingsa in Paul le Silas mai ah a bok hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute gel paikhiatpih a, “Siate aw, hotkhiatna ka ngah nadingin bang ka hih ding hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Topa Zeisu Khazih um in. Tua hi leh nang le na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah le inn sunga om mi khempeuh tungah Topa thu a hilh uh hi.
Amah in tua zan tua hun mahin Paul le Silas‑te lakhia in a liammate uh a sawpsak hi. Amah le a innkuanpih khempeuh tui a kiphum pah uh hi.
Thonginn ukpa in a inn sungah amaute lutpih in an a pia hi. A innkuan buppi un Pasian um uh ahih manin a lungdam mahmah hi.
A zingciang in thukhen vaihawmte in palikte sawlin, “Tua mite khahkhia un,” ci in a gensak uh hi.
Thonginn ukpa in Paul kiangah, “Note kong khah nadingin thukhen vaihawmte in thu hong zasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin tu in nuamtak in ciahta un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Rome gam mi ahi kote thusit lopi in mipi mai ah hong satin thong hong khia uh hi. Tu in a simtham in hong sawlkhia ziau thei ding uh ahi hiam? Hi thei peuhmah lo ding hi! Amaute mahmah hong pai in hong lakhia uh hen,” a ci hi.
Palikte in thukhen vaihawmte kiangah tua thu a zasak uh hi. Amaute Rome gam mi ahihlam a zak uh ciangin a patau uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute pai in va thum uh a, a lakkhiat khit uh ciangin khuasung pan a paikhiat nadingun a sawl uh hi.
Amaute gel zong thonginn sung pan paikhia in Lydia inn ah a lut uh hi. Tualai ah sanggamte tawh kimu in amaute tha a piak khit uh ciangin a dingkhia uh hi.
Tu in amaute in Amphipolis le Apollonia khuate a nawk khit uh ciangin Thessalonica khua a tung uh hi. Tua khua ah Judah mite kikhopna inn khat a om hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in ahih ngei bangin kikhopna inn ah lut a, amaute tawh nipi thum sung Lai Siangtho kikum in a om hi.
Khazih in gimna a thuak khit ciangin misite lak panin a thokik ding mah ahihna thu teltak in lak a, “Note kianga kong hilh uh hih Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi,” ci in a hilh hi.
Amaute pawlkhat in tua thu um uh a, Pasian thu a hahkat Greek mi honkhat le numei makai tampi in Paul le Silas‑te a pawl uh hi.

Ahih hangin a umlo Judah mite in haza uh ahih manin sumbuuk phual panin migilo pawlkhat a va zawnkhia uh hi. Mi honkhat ngah uh a, tuate tawh khuasung teng a so ngeingaisak uh hi. Paul le Silas‑te mihonpi mai ah kaikhia nuamin Jason inn a busim uh hi.
A muh loh uh ciangin Jason le sanggamte pawlkhat khuapi ukte kiangah kai uh a, “Leitung a lumlet mite hih mundong hong tungta uh a,
Jason in zin a tungsak hi. Hih mite in, ‘Zeisu a kici kumpi dang khat om hi,’ ci in Caesar kumpipa thukhunna tawh a kilehbulh vive in a gamta uh hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Mihonpite le khua‑ukte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungmang uh hi.
Amaute in Jason le a dangte kitansak in a khah uh hi.
Tua ciangin sanggamte in a zan a zanin Berea khua ah Paul le Silas paisak pah uh a, tua khua a tun uh ciangin Judah mite kikhopna inn ah a lut uh hi.
Thessalonica khua mite sangin hih khua mite a lungsim uh gina zaw ahih manin lawpna takpi tawh thu ngai uh a, a maan le a maanlo a theih nadingun nisim in Lai Siangtho tawh a sittel uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Judah mitampi in thu um uh a, Greek mite lak panin zong a zahtak uh numei pasal tampi in a um uh hi.
Ahih hangin Paul in Berea khua ah Pasian thu a hilh lam a theih uh ciangin Thessalonica khua‑a Judah mite va pai in mihonpi a va holhthawh uh hi.
Tua ciangin sanggamte in tuipi lam tawnin Paul paikhiasak pah uh a, Silas le Timothy ahih leh Berea khua ah a taamlai uh hi.
Paul a kha mite in Athens khuapi dong a zui uh hi. Silas le Timothy‑te a manlang theithei a hong pai nadingin Paul vaikhakna thu pua in a ciahkik uh hi.
Tu in Paul in Athens khuapi ah amaute ngakin a om sungin khuapi sungah milim tawh kidim in a om a muh ciangin a lungsim sungah na a sa mahmah hi.
Tua ahih manin kikhopna inn ah lutin Judah mite le Pasian thu a hahkat Gentile‑te tawh thu kikum in sumbuuk phuala a kimuh khakpih mite tawh zong nisim in a kikum hi.

Tua khit ciangin Epicurus nungzuite le Stoic mipilte pawlkhat in amah nialin, “Hih a mawk ciakciakpa gennop bang thu ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Paul in Zeisu thu le a thawhkikna thu hilh ahih manin a dang pawlkhatte in, “Gamdang pasiante thu a gen hi leh kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah samin Ares mualvumɠ tungah paipih uh a, “Na gengen hih thuhilhna thak nong hilh thei ding hiam?
Ka zak ngeiloh uh thu pawlkhat hong gen na hih manin bangci dan hiam cih ka thei nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Athens khua mi khempeuh le tua khua‑a om gamdang mite in a hun uh thudang mahmah in zang lo uh a, thuthak khat peuhpeuh gen nading le ngaih nading bekin a zang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ares mualvumɠ tunga mite lakah Paul dingin thu a gen in ah, “Athens khua mite aw, na khempeuh ah na biakna mi mahmah lam uh kong thei hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh khuasung ka vak kawikawina ah biakna a na piak uh nate ka telet mahmah a, biaknatau khat tungah, ‘A KITHEILO PASIAN AA DING,’ ci a, a kigelh lai khat ka mu hi. Tua ahih manin theilopi a na biak pa uh thu note kiangah hong tangko ka hi hi.
“Leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh a piangsakpa tua Pasian in leitung le vantung a uk Topa hi a, khut tawh kibawl biakinn sungah a teeng kei hi.
Amah in mi khempeuh tungah nuntakna le naksuk naktoh a kipan na khempeuh hong piapa ahih manin kitangsapna a nei bangin mihingte khut tawh ama aa ding sepsak bawlsak a kul kei hi.
Amah in leitung maitang khempeuh a a teeng dingin minam khempeuh sisan khat panin bawl a, tua minamte hun ding le amaute teen nading mun a sehkholhsak hi.
Hih pen mite in Topa zongin a khut uh tawh zam a a muh theih nading uh a deihna ahi hi. Tua bang i cih hangin amah in eite tawh a kigamla ahi kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note laka laphuakte in zong, ‘Eite zong ama suan le khakte i hi hi,’ ci a, a gen bangin eite in ama sungah nungta in gamta in i om hi.
Tua hi a, Pasian suan le khakte i hih manin Pasian pen mihingte gelna le khutsiamna tawh a kibawl kham lim peuh, ngun lim peuh, suangtum lim peuh tawh a kibang a i ngaihsut ding ahi kei hi.
A taktak in cileng nidanglai in Pasian in tua bang theih lohnate a kimuhmawh bawl hangin tu in ahih leh mun khempeuh a om mi khempeuh mawhna a kisikkik nadingin thu a pia zo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a sehsa mipa tungtawn in leitung mite tungah maantak a thu a khen ding hun khat a sehkhol zo hi. Amah in tua a sehsa mipa, misite lak pan thokiksak a, tua thu maantakpi ahihna mi khempeuh tungah teci a lakzo hi,” a ci hi.
Misite thawhkikna thu a zak uh ciangin pawlkhat in, “Hih thu ka zakik nuam uh hi,” ci uh a, a dangte in a zahpih uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute lak panin Paul a paikhia hi.
Ahi zongin tuate lak panin Ares mualvumɠ a thu vaihawm pawlte laka Dionysius, Damaris a kici numei khat le amaute tawh a omkhawm midangte in um uh a, Paul lamah a pang uh hi.
Hihteng khit ciangin Athens khuapi pan Paul paikhia in Corinth khua a tung hi.

Caesar kumpipa Claudius in Judah mi khempeuh Rome khuapi panin a paikhia dingin thu pia ahih manin Pontus gam mi Aquila a kici Judah mipa khat le a zi Priscilla‑te Italy gam panin a tun zawh a sawt nai kei hi. Paul in a muh ciangin amaute kiangah a va hawh hi.
Amaute puanbuuk khuimi hi uh a, a nasep uh kibang ahih manin amaute tawh Paul omkhawm in na a sem hi.
Paul in Sabbath ni simin kikhopna inn ah thu kikuppih in Judah mite le Greek mite a zol hi.
Silas le Timothy‑te Macedonia gam panin a hong tun uh ciangin Kha in Paul thahatsak a, Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi ci in Judah mite tungah teci a pang hi.
Judah mite in langpan in a kosiat uh ciangin Paul in a puan sing in, “Note sisan nomau tungah hong tu tahen kei ka siang hi. Tu a kipan in Gentile‑te kiangah ka paita ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua kikhopna inn panin amah paikhia a, Pasian bia khat ahi Justus kici pa inn ah a pai hi. Tua pa inn pen kikhopna inn tawh a kizom pah ahi hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna inn ukpa Crispus in a innkuanpih khempeuh tawh Topa a um uh hi. Paul thugen a za Corinth khua mi tampi in zong um in tui a kiphum uh hi.
Zankhat a mangmuhna sungah Topa in Paul hopih a, “Lau kei in pau loin om kei inla gen in.
Banghang hiam cihleh hong ompih ka hih manin kuamah in nang hong do lo dinga, bangmah hong cih lo ding uh hi. Hih khua ah mi tampi ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khua ah kum khat le a lang sung tamsuak in Pasian thu a hilh hi.
Gallio in Achaia gamah mangpi a suah ciangin Judah mite in kithukhat in Paul langpan uh a, thukhen zumah puak in,
“Hih mipa in thukham tawh kilehbulh in Pasian a bia dingin mite a zol hi,” a ci uh hi.
Thugen dinga Paul a kithawi laitak in Gallio in Judah mite kiangah, “Judah mite aw, hih thu in khialhna le tatsiatna thu ahih leh kong ngaihsutsak bek ding hi.
Ahi zongin thu kinialnate, minte le na thukham uh tawh kisai thute peuh ahih leh nomau mahin thei un. Tua bang thute ka khen nuam kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin thukhen zum panin amaute a hawlkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Greek mite in kikhopna inn ukpa Sosthenes manin thukhen zum mai ah a sat uh hi. Ahih hangin Gallio in tua thute a awlmawh kei hi.
Paul in tawlpi khat a taam khit ciangin sanggamte mangpha khak a, a kiciamna sa bangin Cenchrea khua ah a sam a met khit ciangin Priscilla le Aquila‑te tawh tembaw tuangin Syria gamah a pai uh hi.
Ephesus khua a tun uh ciangin tua khua ah amaute a nusia hi. Amah ahih leh kikhopna inn ah lutin Judah mite tawh thu a kikum hi.
Amaute kiangah sawtkhop khat taam dingin a khoh uh hangin mang zo loin,

mangpha khak a, “Mai‑a hong tung ding pawi, Jerusalem khuapi ah ka zat loh phamawh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in hong awi leh note kiangah kong paikik ding hi,” ci in Ephesus khua pan tembaw tuangin a dingkhia hi.
Caesarea khua a tun ciangin khua sungah paito in pawlpi mite hopih a, tua khit ciangin Antioch khua ah a paisuk hi.
Antioch khua ah tawlkhat a taam khit ciangin zinkhia a, Galatia gam le Phrygia gamteng ah zin kawikawi in nungzui khempeuh tha a pia hi.
Tu in Apollos a kici Judah mi khat Ephesus khua a hong tung hi. Amah Alexandria khuapi a a suak mi khat hi a, thugen a siam banah Lai Siangtho zong a thei mahmah khat ahi hi.
Amah in Topa lampi thu a sin khinsa mi khat hi a, lawptak le maantak in Topa thu gen in a hilh hi. Ahi zongin John tuiphumna thu bek a thei hi.
Amah in kikhopna inn sungah hangtak in thu a gen hi. Priscilla le Aquila in ama thugen a zak uh ciangin samkhia uh a, Pasian lampi a kicing zaw in a hilhcian uh hi.

Achaia gamah Apollos in zin a sawm ciangin sanggamte in amah hanthawn uh a, a paina ah hoihtak in a na kisan nadingin zong lai khat a puasak uh hi. Amah a tun ciangin hehpihna tungtawn a thu‑um mite nakpitak in a huh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite upkhialhna teng mihonpi mai ah khauhtak in lakkhia a, Zeisu in Khazih hi cih Lai Siangtho panin a lak hi.
Corinth khua ah Apollos a om sungin Paul in saklam gam nawkin pai a, Ephesus khua a tung hi. Tua khua ah nungzuite pawlkhat a muh ciangin
amaute kiangah, “Note in na up hun mah un Kha Siangtho na ngah pah uh hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Kha Siangtho kici a om lam nangawn ka za ngei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Bangci bang tuiphumna tawh kiphum na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin, amaute in, “John tuiphumna tawh ka kiphum uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “John in ama khit cianga hong pai ding pa Zeisu Khazih a up nadingun hilh a, kisikkikna tawh kipawl tuiphumna a pia hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Zeisu minin tui a kiphum uh hi.
Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngak ciangin amau tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung a, pau nam tuamtuam tawh pau in kamsang in thu a gen uh hi.
Tua mite a vekpi un pasal sawm le nih ahi uh hi.
Kikhopna inn ah Paul pai zel in kha thum sung hangtak in thu gena Pasian kumpigam thute kikuppih in amaute a zol hi.

Ahih hangin mi pawlkhatte lungkhauh in um lo uh a, mihonpi mai ah tua Lampi thu a gensia uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul in amaute paikhiatsan a, a nungzuite a sapkhiat khit ciangin Tyrannus sanginnpi sungah nisim in thu a kikuppih hi.
Hih bangin kum nihsung a sepsuak ciangin Asia gam sunga a teeng Judah mite le Greek mi khempeuh in Topa Zeisu thu a za uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Paul khut zangin a tuampian nalamdangte a bawl hi.
Paul pumpi tawh a kisu kha khinsa puan ahi zongin dial khatpeuh ahi zongin cinate tawh a kisukkhaksak ciangin, a natna uh damin amaute sunga om dawigilote zong a paikhia hi.

Tua ciangin phuisamna tawh kha gilote hawlkhia a a kawi vakvak Judah mite pawlkhat in dawigilo a lutna mite tungah Topa Zeisu min zangin, “Paul genpa Zeisu min tawh na paikhiat nading thu kong pia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Sceva a kici Judah mite siampi lianpa tapa sagihte in zong tua bangin a hih uh hi.
Tua ciangin dawigilo in, “Zeisu lah thei ing, Paul lah thei ing, note banglak mi na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tungah dawiveipa dianggawp in zogawp ngingei ahih manin si le nai tawh a guaktang un tua inn panin a taikhia uh hi.
Tua thu Ephesus khua‑a teeng Judah mite le Greek mi khempeuh in a theih uh ciangin lau mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa Zeisu min nakpitak in a phat uh hi.
Thu‑um mi tampi hong pai uh a, a gamtat siatna teng uh genkhia in a pulak uh hi.
Mitphial bawl mi tampi in zong a laibute uh hong paipih in mi khempeuh mai ah a haltum uh hi. Tua laibute a man a kiseh ciangin nguntang 50,000 man ahi hi.
Hih bangin Topa thu nasiatak in hong khangin hong kizel semsem hi.

Hihteng a sep khit ciangin Paul in Macedonia gam le Achaia gamah a zin hi. Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem khuapi a pai dingin Kha in theisak a, “Tua khuapi ka tun khit ciangin Rome khuapi zong ka phak kul ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin amah a huh mi nihte ahi Timothy le Erastus‑te Macedonia gamah paisak a, amah ahih leh Asia gamah tawlkhat sung a taamlai hi.
Tua hun lai mahin Lampi thu tawh kisai buaina lianpi khat a hong piang hi.
Demetrius a kici nguntui sungpa khatin Diana a kici nusian biakinn limte ngun tawh bawl a, a nasem khutsiamte in sum tampi a ngah uh hi.
Amah in tua bang nasepna a sem khempeuh samkhawm in, “Lawmte aw, hih nasepna panin sum tampi i ngah lamtak na thei uh hi.
Tu in hih Paul in, ‘Khut tawh a kibawl peuhmah pasian hilo hi,’ ci in Ephesus khua bekthamlo in Asia gam buppi phial ah mi tampi a zol khinzo hi cih thu za in na mu uh hi.

Tua ahih manin i nasepna a minsiat ding banah a lian nusian Diana‡ biakinnpi zong a kisimmawh khak ding lauhuai hi. Tua thamlo in Asia gam buppi le leitung buppi a kibia hih nusian thupina a bei ding zong lauhuai lai hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin heh mahmah uh a, “Ephesus khua mite Diana§ thupi mahmah hi!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Khua sung khempeuh ah tua buaina a hong kizelh ciangin Paul tawh khual a zinkhawm Macedonia gam mi Gaius le Aristarchus‑te manin pawilahna innpi sungah lungsim kikhat in a lut uh hi.
Mihonpi lakah Paul pai dingin a kithawi ciangin nungzuite in a phal kei uh hi.
Paul lawmte ahi Asia gam uliante pawlkhat in zong pawilahna innpi sungah a pai teitei loh nadingin mi sawlin a gensak uh hi.
A kikhawm mite buaigawp in amau tumciat in awng zelzul uh a, tua hangin mipite buai in mi a tam zaw in a kikhopna uh a hang nangawn a thei kei uh hi.
Mihonpi lak panin Judah mite pawlkhat in Alexander kaikhia uh a, mipi mai ah a koih uh hi. Alexander in a kihutna thu mipite tungah gen nuamin a khut tawh a lak hi.
Ahih hangin amah Judah mi ahihlam a theih uh ciangin, “Ephesus khua mite nusian Diana thupi mahmah hi!” ci in aw kituak in nai nihsung bang a awng uh hi.

Khuapi lai‑atpa in mihonpi a daihsak khit ciangin, “Ephesus khua mite aw, Ephesus khua mite pen a lian nusian Diana biakinnpi le Zeus pasian pana hong kiasuk tua nusian lim a cingte na hih lam uh a theilo kua om ahi hiam?
Hih thute kuama nial theih ding hilo ahih manin daitak in om unla pheng gamtat kei un.
Hih mite in nusian biakna innpi hong luhsak uh lah hilo, na nusian uh a hong kosiatsak uh zong hilo napi hih mun nong tun uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Demetrius le a seppih khutsiamte in mi khatpeuh tungah lungkim lohna a neih uh leh thukhen zum om a, thukhen mangte zong a om uh hi. Tualai ah kikhia uh hen.
Hihteng banah thudang kantelnop na neih uh leh thukhenna ngeina tawh a kituak kikhopna ah kikhen ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh tuni‑a thu piangteng in mipi so gawpsak hi ci in hong kingawh ding lauhuai hi. Hih bangin mipi so ziazua na a hang kician om lo ahih manin i gen ding zong bangmah a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
Hih bang teng a gen khit ciangin mihonpi a ciahsak hi.
Tua thubuai a ven khit ciangin Paul in nungzuite samsak a, mangpha a khak khit ciangin Macedonia gamah a pai hi.
Tua gamah Paul zin kawikawi a, thu tampi tawh amaute tha a piak khit ciangin Greek gam tung a,
tua gamah kha thum sung a taam hi. Syria gamah tembaw tawh a paikuan ciangin Judah mite in amah thahsim sawm uh ahih manin Macedonia gam lam tawnin a pai dingin a khentat hi.
Asia gama Paul a zinna ah Berea khua mi Sopater, Thessalonica khua mi Aristarchus le Secundus, Derbe khua mi Gaius le Timothy, Asia gam mi Tychicus le Trophimus‑te in a zui uh hi.
Amauteng na pai masa uh a, Troas khua ah kote hong ngak uh hi.

Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi a ven khit ciangin kote zong Philippi khua panin tembaw tuangin ka dingkhia uh hi. Ni nga khit ciangin amaute omna Troas khua ka tung uh a, tua khua ah ni sagih ka taam uh hi.
Nipi kal sunga ni masapen ni in anlum balnen dingin nungzuite a kikhawm uh hi. A zingciang in Paul paisawm ahih manin zankim dongin thu a gen hi.
A kikhopna uh inndei tungah meivak tampi a kivak hi.
Eutychus a kici tangvalno khat padenpauh ah tu a, Paul in thu sawtpi a gen sungin ihmu kha ahih manin inn dawl thumna panin kiasuk a, a va top uh ciangin a na si khinzo hi.
Ahih hangin Paul kumsuk in tangvalpa tungah bok a, kawi in, “Lunghimawh kei un. A nuntakna omlai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin kahtokik a, anlum balnen in a ne uh hi. Khuavak dongin sawtveipi holim uh a, tua khit ciangin Paul a dingkhia hi.
Amaute in tangvalpa a nungtasa in inn sungah paipih uh a, a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
Paul in Assos khua ciangdong khe in paisawm a, tua khua ah amah tawh kituah dingin ka gel uh hi. Tua ahih manin kote in tembaw tuangin Assos khua ah ka paikhol uh hi.
Amah tawh Assos khua ah ka kimuh uh ciangin Paul in tembaw tungah hong tuangin Mitylene khua ah ka paisuak uh hi.
A zingciang in tua khua pan ka paikhia uh a, Chios tuikulh gal ka tung uh hi. A thaiciang in Samos tuikulh ka tung uh a, Trogyllium khua ah taam in a zingciang in Miletus khua ka tung uh hi.

Paul in a hun neihteng Asia gamah a bei loh nadingin Ephesus khua ah taam loin paisuak dingin a khentat hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ahih theih leh Pentecost ni in Jerusalem khuapi ah a om theih nadingin a kinawh nuam ahi hi.
Miletus khua a tun ciangin Ephesus khua pawlpi makaite a sam dingin mi a sawl hi.
Amaute a hong tun uh ciangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Asia gam sung kong lutcil ni‑a kipan in note laka ka nuntakzia na thei uh hi.
Kiniamkhiat mahmahna le khitui tampi tawh Topa na ka sem a, Judah mite in thah a hong sawm manun gimna tampi ka thuak hi.
Note phattuam nading bangmah sit loin, mihonpi kikhopna ah ahi zongin inn khat khit inn khat ah ahi zongin lungdamna thu tangko in kong hilh khinzo hi.
Pasian tunga mawhna kisikkikna le i Topa Zeisu Khazih upna thu, Judah mite le Greek mite tungah teci ka pangzo hi.
Tu in en un, Jerusalem khuapi ah bang tuak ding cih ka theih loh hangin tua khua ah a pai teitei dingin ka lungsim in hong phu hi.
Matna henna le haksatna in hong ngak hi cih bekbek Kha Siangtho in khua khempeuh ah hong theisak hi.

Ahi zongin tuate khat beekin a hong linglawngsak zo kei hi. Pasian hehpihna tawh kisai lungdamna thu teci pang in Topa Zeisu tung pana ka ngah nasep lungdamtak a ka matut theih nadingin ka nuntakna zong pammaih ka sa kei hi.
Tu in ngai un. Pasian kumpigam thu gena ka vak kawikawi na mite in ka maitang nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi cih ka thei hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh sisan panin kei ka siang hi cih thu tuni in note tungah teci kong pang hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian gelna khempeuh sit loin note kong hilh khinzo hi.
Pasian in ama sisan tawh a leisa ama pawlpi tuucin banga a cing dingin Kha Siangtho in note hong koih ahi hi. Tua ahih manin no le no kikem unla, tuuhon khempeuh zong na kem un.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka ciah khit ciangin note lakah keivom hangsante hong lut ding uh a, tuuhonte a hong koihkhong kei ding uh hi.
Note sung panin thuman thutak lehkaih a, amaute lamah nungzuite a kaimang nuam mi pawlkhat a hong piang ding hi.
Tua ahih manin na pilvang un. Kum thum tawntung sun le zan tatsat loin khitui tawh note khempeuh tunga kong hilh thute na phawk un.
“Tu in sanggamte aw, Pasian tung le ama hehpihna thu ah note kong ap hi. Ama hehpihna thu in note hong kipsak in a sianthosak mi khempeuh tawh luahna a hong ngahkhawmsak ding hi.
Kham le ngun, nikteen puansilh kuama a ka deihgawh ngei kei hi.
Hi hi, keimah le ka lawmte kisapna teng hih ka khut in hong guan hi cih no mahmah in zong na thei uh hi.
Na khempeuh ah hih bangin nasep hahkat in a zawngkhal mite na huh nadingun kong lak khinzo hi. ‘Ngahna sangin piakkhiatna ah thupha om zaw hi,’ ci a, Topa Zeisu thugente na phawk un,” a ci hi.
Hih thuteng a gen khit ciangin khukdin in amaute khempeuh tawh thu a ngenkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a vekpi un nakpitak in kap uha Paul ngawngkawi in a nam uh hi.
Ka maitang nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi a cihna thu in amaute a dahsak phadiak hi. Tua khit ciangin tembaw tungah amah a kha uh hi.
Tu in amaute tawh ka kikhen khit uh ciangin tembaw tawh tangtak pai in Cos tuikulh ka tung uh hi. A zingciang in Rhodes tuikulh ka tung uh a, tua panin Patara khua ka tung uh hi.
Tua khua ah Phoenicia gama pai ding tembaw khat ka muh uh ciangin tuangin ka zui uh hi.
Cyprus tuikulh ka muh uh ciangin taklam zuanin ka paisuak uh a, Syria gamah pai in Tyre khua ka tung uh hi. Tualai ah tembaw vanteng kisuahkhia ding ahih manin ka kumkhia uh hi.
Tua khua ah thu‑um mite ka muh uh ciangin ni sagih ka taam uh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem khuapi ah Paul a pai loh nadingin Kha theihsakna tawh a gen uh hi.
Ni sagih a cin ciangin tua khua pan dingkhia in ka khualzinna uh ka zom uh hi. Thu‑um mite in a zi a tate uh tawh khuanawl dong hong kha uh a, tuipi gei ah khukdin in thu ka ngen uh hi.
Mangpha ka kikhak khit uh ciangin tembaw tungah ka kah uh a, amaute zong a ciah uh hi.
Tyre khua pan tuitung khualzinna ka man khit uh ciangin Ptolemais khua ka tung uh a, sanggamte tawh kimu in ni khat ka taam uh hi.
A zingciang in Paul le ko a kithuahpih teng tua khuapan dingkhia in Caesarea khua ka tung uh hi. Upa sagihte lakah khatpa ahi lungdamna thu puakpa Philip inn ah tungin ka taam uh hi.
Tu in amah in kamsanna tawh thu a gen ta nungak siangtho li a nei hi.
Tualai ah ni tampi ka taam hun sungun Judea gam panin Agabus kici kamsangpa khat hong paisuk hi.

Kote kiangah amah a hong tun ciangin Paul kawnggak la in tua kawnggak tawh amah le amah a khut le a khe a kihen hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in, “ ‘Jerusalem khuapi a Judah mite in hih kawnggak neipa hih bangin hen ding uha Gentile‑te khutah a pia ding uh hi,’ ci in Kha Siangtho in a hong gen hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu ka zak uh ciangin kote le tua muna om mite in Jerusalem khuapi ah Paul a pai loh nadingin ka kho uh hi.

Ahih hangin Paul in, “Banghang in kapin ka lungsim hong kitamsak na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu min hangin Jerusalem ah matna henna thuak bekthamlo in a si ding dongin ka kigingkhol zo hi,” ci in a dawng hi.
Ka khoh zawhloh uh ciangin bangmah gen nawnlo in, “Topa deihna bang hi tahen,” ka ci uh hi.
Ni tawmkha ka taam khit uh ciangin kithawi in Jerusalem khuapi ah ka paito uh hi.
Caesarea khua‑a nungzuite pawlkhat in zong hong zui uha ka zin tun nading uh Cyprus mi Mnason a kici pa inn ah hong kha uh hi. Amah pen nungzui a suak masate khat ahi hi.
Jerusalem khuapi ka tun uh ciangin sanggamte in lungdamtak in hong dawn uh hi.
A zingciang in Paul le koteng James kiangah ka va hawh uh a, pawlpi makaite khempeuh zong a na om uh hi.
Paul in amaute a hopih khit ciangin ama nasepna tungtawn in Pasian in Gentile‑te laka a nasepnate kicingtak in a gen hi.
Amaute in tua thute a zak uh ciangin Topa min phat uha Paul kiangah, “Sanggam aw, Judah mite lakah thu‑um mi tul tampi om a, thukham zuih ding a hahkat mahmah uh hi cih na thei hi.

Ahih hangin mi pawlkhat in nangma thu amaute tungah puak uh a, ‘Gentile‑te laka a teeng Judah mite in a tate uh vunat loin khanglui thuhilhnate zong a zuih loh nadingun Paul in gen a, Moses thu a nusiat nadingun thu a hilh hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Bangcih ding i hi hiam? Nang hong tungzo cih thu za khin ding uh ahih manin mihonpi hong kisutuah pelmawh ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin kong gen bangun hih in. A kiciam khinsa mihing li ka nei uh hi.

Hih mite paipih inla amaute tawh kisiansuah khawmin a sammet man uh piaksak in. Tua hi leh nangma thu a kipuakte maanlo hi cih mi khempeuh in thei ding uh a, thukham zui in thumaan in a gamta na hihlam zong hong thei ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin thu‑um Gentile‑te in milim biakna sa, sisan le gawlmek a kithat ganhing sa ne loin numei pasal mawhna bawl lo ding uh hi cih thu lobuang a dang tua bang nate a tan loh nadingun khentatna lai ka khak khinzo uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua hi a, a zingciang in Paul in tua mite tonpih in amaute tawh a kisiansuah khit uh ciangin, kisiansuahna hunte bei ni ding le mi khat ciat in biakpiakna a kipiak ding hun uh cingta hi cih a theisak dingin biakinnpi huang sungah a lut uh hi.
Tu in ni sagih beikuanta in Asia gam pana hong pai Judah mite in biakinnpi huang sungah Paul a muh uh ciangin mihonpite holhthawh in amah man uh a,

“Israel mite aw, hong huh un! Hihpa in i minam, i thukham le hih mun langpan in mun khempeuh a om mite khempeuh tungah thu a hilhpa ahi hi. Tua thamlo in biakinnpi huang sungah Greek mite hong lutpih in hih mun siangtho a ninsak hi,” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tu madeuh in Ephesus khua mi Trophimus kici pa Paul tawh khuapi sungah a omkhawm mu uh ahih manin biakinnpi huang sungah tua pa lutpih ngelngel ding hi ci in a ummawh uh hi.

Hih thu hangin khuapi sung khempeuh hong buai a, mun khempeuh panin mihonpite tai in hong kikhawm uha Paul a man uh hi. Biakinnpi huang pualam ah a kaihkhiat khit uh ciangin kongpite thakhat in a khak uh hi.
Amaute in Paul thah a sawm laitak un Jerusalem khua buppi buai hi ci in galkaphonɠ a uk galkap mangpaɠ kiangah thu a tung hi.
Tua ciangin amah in galkapte le galkap 100 ukte sam pah a, mihonpi omna munah a taisuk uh hi. Amaute in galkap mangpaɠ le galkapte a muh uh ciangin Paul a sat nawn kei uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Paul kiangah galkap mangpaɠ hong pai in a man hi. Tua ciangin sikkhau nih tawh khihsak a, amah kua hi a, bang teng bawl ahi hiam ci in thu a dong hi.

Ahih hangin mihonpite lakah pawlkhat in thu khat genin a dangte in thu tuampi khat genin a ciak ngeingai uh hi. Gamlumlua uh ahih manin galkap mangpaɠ in a thu uh theitel zolo a, galkap lenah Paul a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi.
Kahlei bul ah Paul a tun ciangin mihonpi hong ngongtatlua uh ahih manin galkapte in Paul a puakhia uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mihonpi in nungzuih uh a, “Amah that un!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
Galkap len sung a lutpih ding uh ciangin Paul in galkap mangpaɠ kiangah, “Thu tawm kong gen thei ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Greek pauthei na hi hiam?
Nang, tuma lam a kumpi langpanna khat piangsak in misuam 4,000te gam sungah a taikhiatpih Egypt mipa hilo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Paul in, “Cilicia gam khua thupi khat ahi Tarsus khua‑a a suak Judah mi ka hi hi. Nong hehpihna in hih mite tungah thu hong gensak in,” a ci hi.
Galkap mangpa in phalna a piak ciangin kahlei tungah Paul dingin mipite lamah a khut a van hi. Mihonpite a daih khipkhep ciangin amah in Hebrew pau tawh thu a gen hi.
Paul in, “Pate le sanggamte aw, tu in ka kihutna thu hong gen ding ka hih manin hong ngaihsak un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Hebrew pau† tawh a gen a zak uh ciangin a gamdai semsem uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Cilicia gam Tarsus khua‑a piang Judah mi taktak ka hi hi. Ahi zongin, Gamaliel pattahna tawh hih khuapi ah a khangkhia ka hi hi. Amah in i pute i pate thukham tawh kituak in limtak in hong sinsak a, tuni‑a note khempeuh mah bangin Pasian thu ka hahkat mahmah hi.
“Hih Lampi thu a um numei pasalte manin thong sungah ka khia a, tua Lampi thu suksiat ding ka hanciam hi.

Siampi Ukpa le makaite khempeuh in a theih ding mah bangin amaute kiang panin laikhak khat Damascus a om sanggamte muh dingin ka pua a, amaute Jerusalem ah a kibawlsiat theih nadingin kolbulh in a kai dingin ka kuan hi.
“Tu in Damascus khuapi ka tunkuan uh, sunkim pawlin a tang pha mahmah khuavak khat vantung panin ka kimah thakhat in a hong tang hi.
Tua ciangin lei ah ka puksuk a, ‘Saul aw, Saul aw, banghang in hong bawlsia na hi hiam?’ hong ci awging khat ka za hi.
“Tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, nang kua na hi hiam?’ ka ci hi. “Amah in, ‘Nong bawlsiat Nazareth khua mi Zeisu ka hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.
Ka tonpih ka lawmte in tua khuavak a muh uh ciangin a lau uh hi. Ahi zongin kei hong kihopihna awging a tel thei kei uh hi.
“Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, bang hih ding ka hi hiam?’ ka ci hi. “Topa in, ‘Tho inla, Damascus khuapi sungah lut in. Nangma sep dinga ka gelsate tualai ah kong hilh ding hi,’ a hong ci hi.
Tua khuavak khauhlua a, khua mu theilo ka hih manin ka lawmte in hong bankaih uh a, Damascus khuapi ka tung hi.
“Tualai ah thukham tawh kituak in Pasian a bia, Ananias kici mi khat om a, tua khua‑a teeng Judah mi khempeuh in a zahtak mahmah khat uh ahi hi.
Amah ka kiangah hong pai in ka gei ah hong dinga, ‘Sanggampa Saul aw, khua muta in,’ a hong cih ciangin tua hun lian mahin amah ka mu thei pah hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Pasian deihna a thei ding, Midikpa a mu ding le ama thu genna aw a za dingin i pute i pate Pasian in nang hong teel zo hi.
Na muh khitsa le na zak khitsa thute mi khempeuh tungah na gen dinga, ama aa dingin teci na pang ding hi.
Tu in zong bang ngak na hi hiam? Tho inla tui kiphum in. Topa minin thungen inla, na mawhnate silsiang in,’ a hong ci hi.
“Tua khit ciangin Jerusalem khuapi ah ciahkik in biakinnpi huang sungah thungen a ka om laitak in mang ka mu hi.
Tua ka mangmuhna sungah Topa ka mu a, amah in, ‘Kinawh inla Jerusalem khuapi pan paikhia mengmeng in. Banghang hiam cihleh keima thu teci na panna amaute in hong sang lo ding uh hi,’ a hong ci hi.
“Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, kikhopna inn sungah lutin nang hong um mite satin thongah ka khiatna thu amaute in a hong thei uh hi.
Nangma thu hanga thahna a thuak Stephen sisan a luansak laitak un ama sih nading thukim in amaute kiangah ka dinga, amah a that mite puan zong ka kepsak hi,’ ka ci hi.
“Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hih mun pan paikhia in. Gamlapi a om Gentile‑te kiangah kong sawl ding hi,’ a hong ci hi,” ci in a gen hi.
Amaute in Paul thugen hih ciangciang a ngai uh hi. Tua khit ciangin a aw uh sangsak in, “Hih bang mipa leitung panin hemkhia un a nungta dingin kilawm lo hi!” ci in a kiko uh hi.
A kiko kawmun a puante uh suahkhia in vantung lamah leivui a thehto uh hi.

Galkapte in galkap lenah Paul a paipih nadingun galkap mangpaɠ in thu a pia hi. Banghang in mihonpi in amah langpan in hi bangin kiko uh hi ding hiam cih a theih nadingin amah sata thu a sit nadingun a sawl hi.

Amaute in savun khau tawh amah a hen laitak un Paul in ama kianga a ding galkap 100 ukpa kiangah, “Rome gam mi khat mawh hi ci a, thukhenna om nailopi a sat ding pen thukhenna ngeina tawh a kituak mah ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Galkap 100 ukpa in hih thu a zak ciangin galkap mangpaɠ kiangah pai in, “Hihpa Rome gam mi ahi hi na hihsawm thu kidawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Paul kiangah galkap mangpaɠ pai in, “Nang, Rome gam mi na hi hiam hong gen in,” a ci hi. Paul in, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin galkap mangpaɠ in, “Ken Rome gam mi ka suah nadingin sum tampi ka pia hi,” a ci hi. Paul in, “Kei ka suahpih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin thu a sitsawm mite ama kiang panin a kihemkhia pah uh hi. Galkap mangpaɠ in Paul na hen kha khinzo ahih manin Rome gam mi ahihlam a theih ciangin a lau hi.

Banghang in Judah mite in Paul mawhmat uh hiam cih thu galkap mangpa in theitel nuam ahih manin a zingciang in Paul a kihennate a phelsak hi. Siampi liante le thukhenteɠ khempeuh kikhawmsak a, Paul zong paipih in amaute mai ah a koih nadingun thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in thukhenteɠ limtak in a etkawm in, “Ute naute aw, tuni dongin Pasian mai ah kisuang hetlo in ka nungta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa Ananias in Paul kianga a ding mite kiangah Paul muk a satsak nadingun thu a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Paul in ama kiangah, “Leikang kizut suangcian tawh a kibang pa aw, Pasian in nang hong sat ding hi! Banghang hiam cihleh thukham tawh kituak in thu hong khen dingin a tu kimlai banghang in thukham tawh kilehbulh in kei hong satsak na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua kima a ding mite in, “Pasian Siampi Ukpa zahko vial ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Sanggamte aw, amah Siampi Ukpa ahihlam ka thei kei hi. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na mite a ukpa gensia kei in ci mah hi,’ ” a ci hi.

Amaute pawlkhat Sadducee pawlte hi uh a, a dangte Pharisee pawlte ahihlam uh Paul in a theih ciangin thukhenteɠ mai ah kiko a, “Ute naute aw, Pharisee mipa khat tapa Pharisee pawlte khat ka hi hi. Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai lametna hangin thusitna a thuak ka hi hi!” a ci hi.
Tua bang a cih ciangin Pharisee pawlte le Sadducee pawlte kisel uh a, mihonpi pawl nih a suak uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Sadducee pawlte in misite thokik lo hi, vantungmi om lo hi, kha zong om lo hi a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Pharisee pawlte in a nih in om hi ci in a um uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute nakpi in a kiko uh hi. Pharisee pawlte sunga thukhamhilh siate hong ding uh a, “Hihpa tungah thusia ka mu kei uh hi. Vantungmi khat ahih keileh kha khatpeuh in hopih ahih leh Pasian langpan in i do kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tu in kipawlkhenna le kitotna nasialua ahih manin Paul a tum a tel a suahkhak ding uh galkap mangpaɠ a patau hi. Tua ahih ciangin galkapte paisuksak in mihonpite lak panin thatanghat suangin Paul kaikhia a, galkap lenah a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi.
A zingciang zanin Paul kiangah Topa dinga, “Paul aw, lungkia kei in. Keima aa dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah teci na pan bangin Rome khuapi ah zong na panglai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Khua a vak ciangin Judah mite pawlkhat kituah uh a, Paul a thah khit mateng un an ne lo tui dawn lo dingin a kiciam uh hi.
Tu in Paul a thahsawm mite 40 val a pha uh hi.
Siampi liante le makai vaihawmte kiangah amaute va pai uh a, “Paul ka thah khit mateng un bangmah ne lo dingin ka kiciam khinzo uh hi.

Tua ahih manin note le thukhenteɠ in Paul thu a kicing zaw in a sit nuam bang khatin zingciang in a hong paipih nadingun galkap mangpaɠ kiangah va gen un. Note kianga hong tunpihma un a that dingin kigingsa in ka na om ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Paul sanggamnu tapa in tua mite suamsim nading thu a zak ciangin galkap lenah va lutin Paul kiangah a va ko hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in galkap 100 ukte khat sam a, “Hih tangvalpa in galkap mangpaɠ kiangah gennop khat nei ahih manin ama kiangah va puak in,” a ci hi.

Tua pa in galkap mangpaɠ kiangah amah a paipih hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Thongkiapa Paul in kei hong sam a, hih tangvalpa nang kianga kong paipih ding hong ngen hi. Tangvalpa in nang kiangah gennop khat hong nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin galkap mangpaɠ in a khut tawh kai in paikhiatpih a, “Nong gennop thu bang ahi hiam?” ci in a dongsim hi.
Tangvalpa in, “Judah mite in a kicing zaw a Paul thu a sit nuam bang khatin zingciang in thukhenteɠ kiangah amah na paisak nading hong ngen dingin a kithukim khinzo uh hi.

Amaute thu mang kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh Paul a thah khit mateng un an ne lo tui dawn lo dingin a kiciam khinsa mihing 40 val in amah a pangsim uh hi. Tu in amaute in na kamciam piak ding bek ngakin kigingsa in a om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin galkap mangpaɠ in tangvalpa ciahsak a, “Hih thute kei nong hilh lam kuama kiangah gen kei in,” ci in thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in galkap 100 ukte nih sam a, “Zan nai thum ciangin Caesarea khua donga a pai dingin galkap 200, sakol galkap 70 le teipi a tawi galkap 200 kithawisak un.
Paul a tuan nading khat zong keng unla, mangpipa Felix kiangah hoihtak in va puak un,” ci in thu a pia hi.
Amah in hih bangin laikhak khat a gelh hi.
Keimah Claudius Lysias in a lian mahmah mangpipa Felix kong hopih hi.
Judah mite in hihpa manin thah a sawm uh hi. Amah Rome gam mi khat ahihlam ka theih ciangin galkapte tawh pai in ka va honkhia hi.
Amah a mawhmatna uh thei nuam ka hih manin amaute thukhenteɠ kiangah ka puak hi.
Amaute thukham tawh kisai kinialna hangin a mawhmat uh hi a, sih nading le thongkiat nading zah dong ama mawhna ka mu kei hi.

Judah mite in amah pangsim uh hi cih thu a hong kigen ciangin nang kiangah kong puak pah hi. A mawhmat mite in a mawhmatna uh nangma mai ah hong sun nadingun thu ka pia zo hi. Mangpha, ci in lai a khak hi.
Tua ciangin galkapte in a thu ngahna uh tawh kizui in Paul lakhia uh a, Antipatris khua ah a zan a zan in a paipih uh hi.
A zingciang in Paul tawh a paikhawm dingin sakol galkap teng omlai uh a, galkap dangteng galkap lenah a ciahkik uh hi.
Caesarea khua a tun uh ciangin mangpipa khutah laikhak pia uh a, Paul zong ama khutah a ap uh hi.
Mangpipa in laikhak a sim khit ciangin Paul kiangah, “Bang gam mi na hi hiam?” ci in a dong hi. Cilicia gam mi ahihlam a theih ciangin,
“Nang hong mawhmat mite a hong tun uh ciangin na thu kong sit ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit ciangin Herod inn ah Paul a kep nadingun thu a pia hi.
Ni nga khit ciangin Siampi Ukpa Ananias, makaite le Tertullus a kici thugen siampa tawh hong paisuk uh a, Paul a kimawhmatna thu a maan takpi mah hi ci in mangpipa mai ah thu a sung uh hi.
Paul a sap khit uh ciangin Tertullus in Paul a mawhmatna thu gen a, “A lian mahmah Felix aw, nangma hang bekin nuamtak in sawtpi a om thei ka hi uh hi.
Hih minam in na vaihawm siamna tawh a munmun ah khantohna tuamtuam ngah den ahih manin nakpitak in ka lungdam uh hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin hong cimtak loin nong hehpihna tawh ka thugen tawmkha nong ngaihsak nadingin kong thum hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh hihpa thusia bawl mi khat ahihlam ka mu uh hi. Amah in leitung mun khempeuh a om Judah mite lakah langpanna a piangsakpa le Nazareth pawlte makaipipa ahi hi.
Biakinnpi huang zong nitsak sawm ahih manin ka man uh a, kote thukham tawh kituak in ama tungah thu ka khen sawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin galkap mangpa Lysias hong pai in kote khut panin thagum tawh amah lakhia a,
Paul a mawhmat mite nang kiangah hong pai nadingun thu a pia hi. Nang mahmah in thusit lecin ka mawhmatna khempeuh uh a maan lamtak na tel ding hi,” a ci hi.
Judah mite zong panghuan uh a, “Hih thute a maan takpi mah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in thu a gen nadingin mangpipa in a khut tawh a lah ciangin Paul in, “Hih minam kum tampi sung thu a khenpa na hihlam thei ka hih manin ka kihutna thu nuamtak in kong gen ding hi.
Pasian bia dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah ka paitoh zawh ni sawm le ni nih val a phak nai loh lam na thei uh hi.
Biakinnpi huang sungah mi tawh ka kiniallam, kikhopna inn le khuapi sungah mipi ka buaisak lam amaute in a hong mu kei uh hi.
Tu a kei hong mawhmatna uh a maan takpi ahihna zong hong lakthei tuanlo ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin nang tunga kong pulaknop thu in, upna maanlo hi hong cihsan uh hih Lampi thu tawh kituak in ka pute ka pate Pasian ka bia a, Thukham laibu le Kamsangte laibu sunga kigelh thu khempeuh ka um hi.
Misi peuhmah mihoih ahi a, mi hoihlo ahi zongin a vekpi un thokik ding hi cih thu amaute in um uh a, kei zong tuamah bangin Pasian sungah lemetna ka nei hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian tung le mihingte tungah lungsim kisuanna ka neih loh nadingin ka hanciam den hi.
“Tu in kum tampi khit ciangin ka minam mizawngte huhna a pia ding le biakna a pia dingin kong pai hi.
Asia gam pana hong pai Judah mite pawlkhat in biakinnpi huangah kisiansuah a ka om hong mu uh hi. Tualai ah mihonpi om loin buaina zong bangmah a om kei hi.
Kei hong mawhmat nading uh thu khatpeuh a neih uh leh hihlai ah na mai mahmah ah hong sung le uh hi ding hi.
Ahih keileh zong thukhenteɠ mai ah ka din laitak in,
‘Misite thawhkikna thu hangin tu in thusitna ka thuak hi,’ ci a, ka kiko lohngal khialhna dang khatpeuh ka bawl lam hihlai a om mite in a theih uh leh hong gen uh hen,” a ci hi.
Felix in hih thute za in tua Lampi thu a kician zaw in a theih ciangin, “Galkap mangpaɠ Lysias hong tunsuk ciangin, na thu kong khensak ding hi,” ci in a hun a sotto hi.
Paul kemin a ut bangbang in a omsak nadingun Felix in galkap 100 ukte khat thu pia a, a huh nuam le a veh nuam a meltheihte zong a kham loh nadingun a vaikhak hi.
Tua nung a sawtlo in Felix le Judah mi ahi, a zi Drusilla hong pai in Paul samkhiasak a, Khazih upna thu a ngai hi.
Paul in dikna thu, pumpi kidekna thu le a hong tung ding thukhenna thute a gen ciangin Felix lau a, “Na paikhia phot in. Hun hoih ka ngah ciangin kong samsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hun sungin Paul in amah a kikhah theih nadingin sum hong pia kha ding hi ci in Felix in a lamen hi. Tua ahih manin samkhiasak thithe in a hopih pahpah hi.
Ahih hangin kum nih a cin khit ciangin Porcius Festus in Felix za a laih hi. Felix in Judah mite lungdamsak nuam ahih manin thong sungah Paul a koihsuak hi.
Tu in Festus tua gam a tun zawh ni thum ciangin Caesarea khua panin Jerusalem khuapi ah a hawhto hi.
Tua ciangin Siampi Ukpa le Judah mi makaite in Paul thu a sia lam in a ko uh hi.
Amaute in lamkal ah Paul pangin a thah theih nadingun Jerusalem khuapi ah Paul a paisak nadingin Festus mai‑et in a kun uh hi.
Ahih hangin Festus in Caesarea khua mahah Paul kepsuak nading le amah zong a sawtlo in tua khua ah a pai nading thu gen hi.
“Tua ahih manin na makaite un hong zuisuk uh hen. Hih mipa in khialhna a neih le a neih loh ka theih nadingin amaute mawhmatna thu tualai ah hong sung uh hen,” a ci hi.
Amaute kiangah ni sawmval a taam khit ciangin Caesarea khua ah a paisuk hi. A zingciang in thukhenna tokhom ah amah tu in a kiangah Paul a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi.
Paul hong tun ciangin Jerusalem pana hong paisuk Judah mite ama kimah dingin Paul mawhsakna thulian pipite a gen uh hi. Ahi zongin, a teci dingin bangmah a lak thei kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Judah mite thukham tungah ahi zongin biakinnpi tungah ahi zongin Caesar kumpipa tungah ahi zongin khialhna bangmah ka bawl kei hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Festus in Judah mite lungkimsak nuam ahih manin Paul kiangah, “Jerusalem ah paito in tualai ah na thu hong kikhensak leh na ut hiam?” ci in a dong hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Tu a ka dinna mun in ka thu hong kikhensak nading Caesar kumpipa thukhenna tokhom mai ahi hi. Hoihtak a na theih mah bangin Judah mite tungah khialhna bangmah ka nei kei hi.

Mikhial ka hi a, sih nadingin a kilawm mawhna a bawl ka hih leh sih ding ka nial kei hi. Ahih hangin hih mite hong mawhmatna a maanlopi ahih leh amaute khutah kuamah in hong pia thei kei ding hi. Caesar kumpipa mai ah ka thu ka tunto ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Festus in upa vaihawmte tawh a kikup khit uh ciangin Paul kiangah, “Caesar kumpipa mai ah ka thu ka tunto ding hi ci na hih manin Caesar kumpipa kiangah na paikul ding hi!” a ci hi.
Tua nung a sawtlo in Festus kianga hawh dingin kumpipa Agrippa le Bernice‑te Caesarea khua ah hong paisuk uh hi.
Ni tampi sung a taam khit uh ciangin Festus in Paul thu kumpipa Agrippa tungah ko a, “Felix in thongah a nusiat mi khat a om hi.
Jerusalem khuapi a ka om sungin siampi liante le Judah mite makaite in ama thu hong zasak uh a, ama tunga thu ka khen ding a hong ngen uh hi.

Amaute kiangah, ‘A kimawhmatpa le a mawhmat mite kimaituah ding uh a, a kimawhmatpa in ama tunga kisuan mawhmatna tawh kisai in amah le amah kihu masa ding hi. Tua lopi in mi khat thah dinga piakkhiat theih nading Rome mite ngeina om lo hi,’ ci in ka dawng hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute hih munah hong kikaihkhop uh ciangin khinkhin nawnlo in a zingciang mahin thukhenna tokhom ah tu in tua pa ka samsak hi.
A mawhmat mite hong din uh ciangin ka upmawh thute khat beek tawh a mawhmat kha kei uh hi.
Amaute biakna tawh kisai kinialna thute le Paul in amah nungta hi a cihpa, a si khinsa Zeisu thu bek a gen uh hi.
Tua bang kinialna thute theitel lo ka hih manin Jerusalem ah pai in tualai ah na thu hong kikhensak leh na ut hiam, ci in ka dong hi.
Ahih hangin Paul in a thu Caesar kumpipa Augustus khen dingin a kikoihsak nading hong nget ciangin Caesar kumpipa kiang ka puak theih mateng amah a kikep nadingin thu ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Kei zong tua pa thu ka za nuam hi,” a cihleh Festus in, “Zingciang in ama thugen na za ding hi,” a ci hi.
A zingciang in Agrippa le Bernice‑te thupitak in hong pai uh a, galkap mangteɠ le khuapi uliante tawh thugenna innpi sungah a hong lut uh hi. Festus in thu a piak ciangin Paul zong hong lutpih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Festus in, “Kumpipa Agrippa le hihlai a om mite khempeuh aw, hihpa en un. Amah pen Jerusalem ah ahi a, hi lai ah ahi zongin Judah mi bupin a nungta dingin kilawm lo hi ci a, hong ngetpa uh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin hihpa in sih nading zahin a lian mawhna a bawl loh lam ka mu hi. Caesar kumpipa Augustus tungah a thu puakto nuam ahih manin paisak dingin ka khentat hi.

Ka topa ahi kumpipa tungah hih mipa thu lai tawh gelhin ka zaksak theih ding thu kician khat beek ka nei kei hi. Tua ahih manin note mai ah kong puak hi. A diakdiak in kumpipa Agrippa aw, thu na dot khit ciangin ka gelh ding thu kician pawlkhat ka ngah theih nadingin na mai ah kong puak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thongkia mi khat a kimawhmatna thu kician omlopi in ka puak ding hi theilo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Na thu tawh kisai na gen theih nading hun kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Paul in a khut zanin a kihutna thu gen a,
“Kumpipa Agrippa aw, Judah mite hong mawhmatna thute tawh kisai in ka kihutna thu tuni in nangma mai ah hong gen thei ding ka hih manin hampha ka kisa hi.
Judah mite ngeina khempeuh le amaute kinialna thute thei mahmah na hih manin ka nuam phadiak hi. Tua ahih manin lungduaitak in nong ngaihsak nadingin kong thum hi.
“Ka khangno lai‑a kipan in Jerusalem a ka nuntakzia le ka khantohziate ka mipihte khempeuh in a hong theih uh ahi hi.
Kote biakna sunga a khauhpen Pharisee pawlte thu zui in ka nuntak lam a tung lai a kipan a hong theih khitsa uh ahih manin teci pang nuam uh hi leh pang thei ding uh hi.
Pasian in ka pu ka pate uh tunga a piak kamciamna ka lamet manin tu in thusitna thuakin ka ding hi.

Tua kamciamna a ngah dingin kilamen ka hih manun ko minam sawm le nihte in sun le zan tatsat loin Pasian ka bia uh hi. Kumpipa Agrippa aw, tua lametna thu hangin Judah mite in kei hong mawhmat uh ahi hi.
Pasian in misite thokiksak ding hi cih thu banghang in uptak salo na hi uh hiam?
“A taktak in ci lehang kei zong Nazareth khua mi Zeisu min langpan theih zah in langpan ding hi ci in ka ngaihsun ngei hi.
Tua bangin zong Jerusalem ah ka hih takpi a, siampi liante phalna tawh misiangtho tampite thong sungah ka khum hi. Amaute a kithah ciangin ka thukim hi.
Kikhopna innteng ah amaute ka bawlsia kawikawi a, Zeisu min a kosiat theihtheih nadingun ka bawl hi. Amaute tungah hehlua ka hih manin gamdang khualiante nangawn ah pai in ka va bawlsia hi.
“Tua banga ka hih sung mahin siampi liante thuneihna le sawlna tawh Damascus ah ka pai hi.
Kumpipa aw, ka pai laitak uh sunkim laitak in kei le ka khualzinpih mite kimah ni sangin a tang pha zaw khuavak khat vantung panin hong tang ka mu hi.

Ka vekpi un leilak ah ka puksuk uh a, tua laitak in, ‘Saul aw, Saul aw, banghang in kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam? Ciangzum sui leteh na mahmah ding hi,’ ci in Hebrew pau tawh hong hopih awging khat ka za hi.
“Tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, nang kua na hi hiam?’ ka ci hi. “Amah in, ‘Nong bawlsiat Zeisu ka hi hi.
Ahi zongin tho inla, na khe tawh ding in. Na muh khitsa nate le kong hilh lai ding thute gen a, teci pang khat na suah theih nadingin nang tungah hong kilang ka hi hi.
Judah mite khut sung pan le Gentile‑te khut sung panin kong honkhia ding hi.

Gentile‑te mit honsak in khuamial pan khuavak ah a kiheisak ding le Satan thuneihna panin Pasian lama a kiheisak dingin nang kong sawl hi. Tua in amaute in mawhmaisakna ngahin keimah a hong up manun sianthona a ngah mite tawh go a luahkhop theih nading uh ahi hi,’ ci hi.
“Tua ahih manin kumpipa Agrippa aw, vantung panin ka ngah mangmuhna thu mang loin ka om thei kei hi.

A masa pen in Damascus, Jerusalem le Judea gam sung khempeuh a om mite kiangah hih thu ka tangko a, tua khit ciangin Gentile‑te kiangah ka tangko hi. Amaute mawhna kisikkik in Pasian lamah a kihei nading uh le mawhna kisikkikna tawh kituak in a gamtat nadingun ka hilh hi.
Hih thute hangin Judah mite in biakinnpi huang sungah hong manin hong thahsawm uh hi.
Tua hi a, Pasian in hong huh in milian mineu tungah teci pangin tuni dong ka ding lai hi. Moses le Kamsangte in hong piang dinga a gen khitsa uh thute longal thu dang ka gen kei hi.
Tua thu in, ‘Khazih in misite lak pan a thokik masa pen a suah theih nadingin gimna thuak dinga, Judah mite le Gentile‑te tungah khuavak a puak ding hi,’ cih thu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Paul in hih bangin ama kihutna thu a gengen laitak in Festus in aw lianpi tawh, “Paul aw, na haita hi! Thu tampi na sinna in hong haisak hi!” ci in a kiko hi.
Ahih hangin Paul in, “A zahtakhuai Festus aw, ka hai kei hi. Thuman thutak mah hoihtak ngaihsun kawmsa a ka gen ahi hi.
A mai‑a suakta taka thu ka genna pa kumpipa in zong hih thute a thei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu a simtham a kisem hilo ahih manin a theih khakloh khat beek om lo hi cih ka thei hi.
Kumpipa Agrippa aw, Kamsangte thugente na um hiam? Na up lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Christian khat nong suaksak dektak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Nang bek hilo in tuni a ka thugen a zate khempeuh hih banga mat le hen ka thuakna simloh kei tawh kibang in Pasian in bawl leh ka ut hi,” a ci hi.
Paul in hih thute a gen khit ciangin kumpipa dingkhia a mangpipa le Bernice tawh a tukhawm mite zong a dingkhia uh hi.
Amaute a paikhiat khit uh ciangin, “Hihpa in sih nading ahi a, mat le hen nading ahi zongin khialhna bangmah bawl lo hi,” ci in a kikum uh hi.
Tua ciangin Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Hihpa in Caesar kumpipa tungah a thu tunto khin hi kei leh khahkhiat ding hi lel hi,” a ci hi.
Italy gamah tembaw tawh kote hong puak dingin a kikhentat khit ciangin Paul le thongkia dang pawlkhatte Augustus galkaphon laka galkap 100 ukpa khat ahi Julius khutah a ap uh hi.

Tua ahih manin Adramyttium khua panin a hong pai tembaw khat ka zui uh a, Asia gam tuipi dungteng tawn dingin ka dingkhia uh hi. Macedonia gam Thessalonica khua mi Aristarchus a kici pa zong kote tawh hong tuangkhawm hi.
A zingciang in Sidon khua ka tung uh hi. Paul tungah Julius thunuam mahmah a, a lawmte in huhna a piak theih nadingun amaute kiangah a va hawh ding a phal hi.
Tua khua panin tembaw tuangin ka dingkhia uh a, huih hong lehnun ahih manin Cyprus tuikulh bel in ka pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Cilicia gam le Pamphylia gam lampang tuipidung zui in ka zin khit uh ciangin Lysia gam khua lian khat ahi Myra khua ka tung uh hi.
Tua khua ah galkap 100 ukpa in Italy gam a pai ding Alexandria tembaw khat mu a, tua tembaw ah kote a hong tuangsak hi.

Ni tampi sung damdam in ka pai khit uh ciangin, haksapitak in Cnidus khua ka tung uh hi. Huih nun hoihlo in mainawt theilo ka hih manun Crete tuikulh bel in ka pai uh a, Salmone kici leidawk ka tung uh hi.
Tuipi gei zui in haksapitak in ka pai uh a, Lasea khua tawh a kinai Khawlmun Nuam a kici mun ka tung uh hi.
Tu in ni tampi hong beita a, Antan Ni nangawn kheng khin ahih manin tembaw tawh khualzin ding a lauhuai hun hong hita hi.
Tua ahih manin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Lawmte aw, hih i khualzinna ah kituahsia mahmah dinga, tembaw le vante bek hilo in, i nuntakna nangawn a beikhak ding lauhuai hi cih ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin galkap 100 ukpa in Paul thu sangin tembaw hawlpa le tembaw neipa thu a mang zaw hi.

Phalbi sung taam nadingin hih muna tembaw khawlna ginalo ahih manin hihlai pan Phoenix khua delh teitei in tualai ah phalbi sung taam zaw lehang ci in a tam zaw in ngaihsutna a pia uh hi. Tua khua in Crete tuikulh a tembaw khawlna mun khat hi a, nitumna khanglam le nitumna saklam a maingattuak hi.
Leitaw lam pan huih dam hong nun ciangin a tupna mun uh tung zo ding a kisa uh hi. Tua ahih manin tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ khaikhiato uha Crete tuikulh nehin a pai uh hi.
Ahih hangin a sawtlo in Euroclydon a kici pingpei tawh a kithuah huihpi khauh mahmah a hong nung hi.

Huihpi in tembaw a nawk khak ciangin phul zolo 27:9 Antan Ni: September ahih keileh October kha sunga tung Mawhkhuhna Ni (Yom Kippur) genna ahi hi. Tua hun in phalbi huih nun hun hi in tembaw tawh khualzin nadingin a lauhuai hun ahi hi. ahih manin huihpi mutna lamlam ah ka paisak uh hi.
Clauda a kici tuikulh bela ka pai laitak un tembaw tawh a kikhihkhawm gunkuang a siat loh nadingin haksapitak in ka kem zo uh hi.

Tua gunkuang tembaw sungah a koih khit uh ciangin khauhualpi tawh tembaw a gakcip uh hi. Syrtis muna sehnel lakah a awkkhak ding lau uh ahih manin tembaw puankhaite sutkhia in huihpi mutna lamlam ah a paisak uh hi.
Huihpi in hong nak nawklua ahih manin a zingciang in tembaw a zan nadingin vante a lawnkhia uh hi.
A ni thum ni ciangin tembaw vanzatte nangawn ka khut mahmah uh tawh ka lawnkhia uh hi.
Tu in ni tampi sung ni mulo, kha mu loin ka om uh a, huihpi in hong nak nawklua ahih manin a suakta zo dingin ka kilamen nawn kei uh hi.
Sawtpitak an a kingolh khit ciangin amaute laizang ah Paul dinga, “Lawmte aw, ka thugen hong mangin Crete tuikulh pan paikhia lo hi le uh cin hih tuahsiatna teng na thuak kha kei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin tu in lungnuam taka na om nadingun kong hansuah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tembaw bek kisia dinga mi khat beek na si kei ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keimah a hong neipa le ama na ka sepsak ka Pasian in a hong sawl vantungmi khat tu zanin ka kiangah hong dinga,
‘Paul aw, lau kei in. Caesar kumpipa mai ah hong kitun pelmawh ding hi. En in, tembaw a na tuanpih mi khempeuh Pasian in na khut sungah hong pia zo hi,’ a hong ci hi.
Tua ahih manin lawmte aw lungnuam un. Ka tunga hong kigen khinsa bangin hong piang taktak ding hi ci in Pasian ka um hi.
Ahih hangin tuikulh tung khatah i awk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Huihpi in Adriatic tuipi sungah hong sukmut hong tomut a, zan sawm le zan lina zankim pawl ciangin lei tawh kinai ta hi cih tembaw nasemte in a thei uh hi.
Tui a teh uh ciangin lam 20 bang a thuk lam a thei uh hi. Tawlkhat a pai khit uh ciangin tehkik uha lam sawm le lam nga na thuk lai hi.
Tua ciangin suang a phutkhak ding lau uh ahih manin tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ li tembaw nunglam ah khia uha thungen in khuavak ding a ngak uh hi.
Tembaw nasemte in tembaw pan taikhiat ding sawm uh a, tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiɠ tembaw mai lamah a khia ding kineih in gunkuang a khiasim uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in galkap 100 ukpa le galkapte kiangah, “Hih tembaw nasemte om kei le uh na suakta zo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin galkapte in gunkuang khau sattat in tui sungah a khia uh hi.
Khua hong vakkuan ciangin Paul in amaute khempeuh an ne dingin hansuah a, “An ne lo a na om zawh uh ni sawm le ni li cingta in bangmah na ne kei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin na thahat zawh nadingun an na nek ding uh kong hanthawn hi. Na samzang uh khat nangawn zong pulhkhia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute a gen khit ciangin anlum khat la in amaute khempeuh mai ah Pasian hehpihna phat a, balkham in a ne hi.
Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in tha ngah uh a, an a ne ciat uh hi.
Tembaw tunga tuang mi peuhmah ka vekpi un mi 276 ka pha uh hi.
An a kham khit uh ciangin mangbuhte tui sungah khia in tembaw a zangsak uh hi.
Khua hong vak ciangin a tunna uh bang gam hiam cih a thei kei uh hi. Ahi zongin sehnel tawh kidim leidawk khat mu uh a, ahih theih leh tua munah tembaw a kingaksak sawm uh hi.
Tembaw khawlsakna sikkawipiteɠ a khau sattat in tuipi sungah a pai uh hi. Tembaw heina pekte a kikhihna khaute zong a phel uh hi. Puankhaipi pen huih dawh in khaito uh a, tuigei lam a zuan uh hi.

Ahi zongin tembaw in gunpi nih kituahna muna om sehnel vum khat phu kha ahih manin a lulam tumsuk a, tang thei nawnlo in a awkcip hi. A tawlam ahih leh tuihual in khauhtak in sat ahih manin a kitam hi.
Thongkiate in tuipek in a taikhiat loh nadingun galkapte in thongkia teng a thahsawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin galkap 100 ukpa in Paul honkhia nuam ahih manin tua banga ahih loh nadingun kham a, tuipek theiteng tuakkhia masa in lei ah a kah nadingun thu a pia hi.
A dangteng in singpek le tembaw kitam themte khatpeuh a mat nadingun a sawl hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi un suakta in leilak a tung uh hi.
A suahtak khit uh ciangin Malta tuikulh ahihlam a thei uh hi.
Tua gam mite thunuam mahmah uha limtak in zin a hong do uh hi. Guahzu in khuadam ahih manin mei cih in a hong awisak uh hi.
Paul in singkang lomkhat khawmin mei tungah a koih ciangin mei sa ahih manin a gupha gul khat hong paikhia a, a khutah a kivial hi.
Tua gam mite in tua gul Paul khut tungah a luai lam a muh uh ciangin, “Hihpa mithat hi ngelngel ding hi. Tuipi tung pana hong suahtak hangin a nungta dingin Thumaan in phal lo hi,” a kici uh hi.
Ahih hangin Paul in tua gul mei tungah singkhia a, amah ahih leh bangmah a ci kei hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in, “A ci hong bawkgawp ding hi, ahih keileh thakhat in thaltuk in hong si ding hi,” ci in a ummawh lai uh hi. Ahi zongin sawtpitak a etet uh hangin amah bangmah ci lo ahih manin, a lungsim uh khel uh a, “Amah pasian khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua mun tawh kigamlalo munkhat ah tuikulh hausapa Publius teenna huang a om hi. Amah in kote zin hong tungsak a, ni thum sung nuamtak in zin a hong do hi.
Publius ii pa in cisanat le gilsan natna thuahin a lum hi. Tua pa kiangah Paul va pai in a tungah a khut nga‑a thu a ngetsak ciangin a dam hi.
Hih thupiang hangin tuikulh tunga om cina khempeuh hong paipih uh a, damna a ngah uh hi.
Hong thupi bawl mahmah uh a, ka paikhiat uh ciangin kote kisapnate a hong guan uh hi.
Kha thum khit ciangin Alexandria tembaw khat zui in ka pai uh hi. Tua tembaw in Unau peng lim a tuang khat hi a, hih tuikulh ah phalbi sung a khawl hi.
Syracuse khua ka tun uh ciangin tualai ah ni thum sung ka taam uh hi.
Tua khua panin tembaw tuangin ka kualpai uh a, Rhegium khua ka tung uh hi. Ni khat khit ciangin leitaw lam huih hong nung a, a zingciang in Puteoli khua ka tung uh hi.
Tua khua ah sanggamte pawlkhat ka mu uh a, amaute kiangah ni sagih sung a taam dingin hong kho uh hi. Tua khit ciangin Rome zuanin ka pai uh hi.

Tua panin sanggamte in ko thu na za khin uh ahih manin hong dawn dingin Appii Sumbuuk phual le Giahbuuk Thum mun ciang dongah hong pai uh hi. Paul in amaute a muh ciangin Pasian hehpihna phatin tha a ngah hi.
Tu in Rome ka tun uh ciangin galkap 100 ukpa in kumpipa inncing galkap mangpa khutah thongkia teng a ap hi. Paul ahih leh amah a cing galkap khat tawh a ut bangbang in a omsak hi.

Tua hi a, ni thum khit ciangin Paul in Judah mi makaite samkhawm in amaute hong kikhop uh ciangin, “Sanggamte aw, i minam tungah ahi a, i pute i pate ngeina ah ahi zongin ka khial kei hi. Ahi zongin amaute in Jerusalem ah kei hong manin, Rome mite khutah hong piakhia uh hi.
Thu hong sit uh ciangin sihna ka thuak nading thu om lo ahih manin hong khahkhia nuam uh hi.
Ahih hangin Judah mite in tua thu a nial uh ciangin Caesar kumpipa tungah ka thu ka tuttoh ding a kul hi. Hih bang ka cih ciangin ka mipihte ka mawhsak nopna hilo hi.
Tua ahih manin hih thu hangin note tawh kimu ding le a holimkhawm dinga kong sapsak ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Israelte lametna thu hangin hih banga sikkhau hong kikhih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Judea gam panin nang tawh kisai laikhak ka ngah kei uh hi. Hihlai a hong pai sanggamte in zong nang tawh kisai thusia hong gen ngeilo uh hi.
Ahi zongin mun khempeuh ah hih biakna pawlte thu kigensia kawikawi hi cih thei ka hih manun tua thu nangma ngaihsutzia ka za nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paul tawh kimuh nadingin ni khat seh uh a, tua ni ciangin Paul tunna inn ah mi tampi a hong pai uh hi. Paul in hoihtak in thu hilhcian a, Pasian kumpigam thu nasiatak in teci a pang hi. Moses Thukham laibu le Kamsangte laibu‑te sunga om Zeisu tawh kisai thute tawh zing tunga kipan nitak dongin amaute a zol hi.
Paul thugente mi pawlkhat in um uh a, pawlkhat in a um kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in hih bangin a gen ciangin amaute kithutuak loin a paikhia uh hi. “Kha Siangtho in i pute i pate tungah kamsangpa Isaiah tungtawn in maantak in a gen inah,
‘Hih mite kiangah va pai inla hih bangin genin, “Note in zaza napi in na telthei kei ding uh hi. Mumu napi in na phawk thei kei ding uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh hih mite a lungsim uh mawlin, A bil un khuaza hak mahmah a, A mit uh zong a sicip uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mit un khuamu in, A bil un khua a za ding hi. A lungsim un theitel in, Hong kihei ding uh a, Amaute ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.’
“Tua ahih manin Pasian hong hotkhiatna thu Gentile‑te tungah kipuak zo a, amaute in tua thu a sang ding uh hi cih theita un,” a ci hi.
Paul in hih thute a gen khit ciangin Judah mite paikhia uh a, nakpitak in a kinial uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in inn khat sapin kum nih sung om a, ama kianga pai mi khempeuh hoihtak in a sang hi.
Amah in Pasian kumpigam thu genin Topa Zeisu Khazih tawh kisai thute hangtak in hilha kuamah in a kham kei hi.
Pasian lungdamna thu tangko dinga kisehkhia, sawltakpi dinga kisam keimah Zeisu Khazih sila Paul in,
Pasian in a kamsangte tungtawn in Lai Siangtho sunga hong kamciamsa lungdamna thu,
ci le sa lam panin David suan ahi ama Tapa,
i Topa Zeisu Khazih in sianthona Kha hangin misite lak pan a thawhkikna in Pasian Tapa hi ci in thuneihna tawh a pulakkhia ahi hi.
Minamte khempeuh lakah ama min hangin upna thu a kizuih theih nadingin kote in ama tungtawn le ama min hangin hehpihna thupha le sawltakpi za ka ngah uh hi.
Note zong Zeisu Khazih aa dingin a kisamte lakah a kihel mite na hi uh hi.
Pasian it le misiangthote ci a, kisam Rome khua‑a om khempeuh tungah lai kong khak hi. I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin a hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
Na thu upna uh leitung mun khempeuh ah thang ahih manin note khempeuh hanga ka lungdamna ka Pasian tungah Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in ka ko masa hi.
Thu ka ngetsim in note aa ding tatsat loin ka hel den a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ama Tapa lungdamna thu ka hilhna a na ka sepsak Pasian in hong thei hi.
Pasian in hoih a sak hun khatpeuh ciangin note kiangah lam khatpeuh tawh kong pai theih nadingin zong thu ka ngen den hi.
Note thahat in na kip theih nadingun Kha Siangtho letsong pawlkhat hong hawmsawn nuam ka hih manin a hong mu nuam mahmah ka hi hi.
Tua bang ka cih ciangin upna tawh khat le khat tha i kipiaktuah theih nading ka cihna ahi hi.

Tu in sanggamte aw, Gentile dangte lakah gah ka neih bangin note lakah zong gah pawlkhat ka neih theih nadingin note kiangah pai kong sawm zel hangin tuciang dong mah hong khaktan om den hi cih thu na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Greek mite le Greek mi a hilote tungah leiba ka neih bangin a pilte le a haite tungah zong ka nei hi.
Tua hi a, Rome khuapi sunga om note kiangah zong lungdamna thu kong tangko ding ka lawp mahmah hi.

Khazih lungdamna thu ka maizumpih kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua thu in a um mi khempeuh a masa pen in Judah mite le tua khit ciangin Greek mite in hotkhiatna a ngah nadingun Pasian vangliatna ahi hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh tua lungdamna thu sungah Pasian dikna hong kilang hi. “Midik in upna tawh a nungta ding hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin tua dikna pen upna tawh kingah a, upna mah tawh a kizomsuak ahi hi.
Pasian thusimlote le a thumanlo mite in thumanlohna tawh thuman a netcip manun amaute khempeuh tungah Pasian thangpaihna vantung panin a hong kilang hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in amah tawh kisai thute theih ding amaute tungah lak khinzo ahih manin amaute aa dingin a kitel mahmah hi.

Bangci bang hiam cihleh a kimu theilo Pasian hihnate ama bawlsa nate panin kitheithei a, leitung a piansak cil a kipan teltak in ama neih tawntung vangliatna le Pasian pianzia kimu thei ahih manin paulap a zong thei kei ding uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian a theih uh hangin Pasian ahihna zahin pahtawi loin a tungah zong a lungdam kei uh hi. Tua sangsik in thu ginalo vive ngaihsun uha a lungsimte uh a mialcip hi.
Mipil ka hi hi a kicih uh hangin mihai suak uh a,
a sia theilo Pasian vangliatna pen a kisia thei mihing lim, vasa lim, khe li nei ganhingte lim le a bokvak ganhing lim peuh tawh a khek uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute lunggulhna zui in a pumpi uh a zumhuai pipi in zang uh a, Pasian in zong amaute siangtho lohna ah a khahkhong vet hi.
Amaute in Pasian thuman thutak pen zuauthu tawh khek uh a, a Piangsakpa sangin ama piansak nate bia in a na a sem zaw uh hi. Tua Pasian in thupha a ngah tawntungpa ahi hi. Amen.
Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu hangin a zumhuai theithei a lunggulh dingin Pasian in amaute khahkhong a, a numeite nangawn un pasal tawh omkhop ding ngeina tawh kilehbulh in a gamta uh hi.

Tuamah bangin pasalte in zong numei tawh omkhop ding ngeina nusia in pasal le pasal peuh kilunggulh in a zumhuai pipi in a mawh uh hi. Tua ahih manin a lehtatna uh tawh kituak in daan a thuak ciat uh hi.
Pasian a theihna nangawn uh zomsuak nuamlo uh ahih manin a kilawmlo le a kihhuai pipi a gamta dingin Pasian in siat theihtawp a sia lungsim guanin a khahkhong hi.

Amaute in siatna namkim bawl uh a, numei pasal thangtatna, gitlohna, huaihamna, midangte siatsak nopna, hazatna, mithahna, kiselna, khemna, thusia ngaihsutna tawh kidim uh hi. Amaute in mi sutuah nuamte,
mi a gensiate, Pasian a mudahte, a ngongtatte, a kiphasakte, a kisialte, thusia a piangsakte le nu le pate thu a manglote,
bangmah a thei theilote, mi muanhuailote, itna a neilote, midang khual lote le hehpihna a neilote ahi uh hi.
Tua bangin a gamta mite a si dingin Pasian in maantak in thu a khen lam thei napi, a gamtat ngei un gamta veve uh a, tua banga a gamta mite zong a pakta lai uh hi.

Tua ahih manin midangte a mawhsak mi aw, midangte na mawhsakna teng linlian mah nang zong sem na hih manin midangte na mawhsak ciangin nangma tunga thu a kikhen na hi hi. Tua ahih manin na suakta thei kei ding hi.
Tua banga a gamta mite tungah Pasian in thumanna tawh thukhen hi cih i thei hi.
Tua banga a gamta mite mawhsak napi tua mawhnate mah a bawl veve mi aw, Pasian thukhenna tawh kipelh ding kisa na hi hiam?
Ahih keileh na kisikkik theihtheih nadinga hong mapi Pasian migitna thei theilo in nangma tunga hong migit mahmahna hong lungduai mahmahna le hong thuak keikainate thusim lo na hi hiam?
Tua banga na lungkhauhna le na kisik nop lohna hangin Pasian thangpaihna le thumantak in a thukhenna a hong kilat ni ciangin na thuak ding Pasian thangpaihna a kholkhol na hi hi.
Amah in milip tungah ama gamtatna zui in thaman a pia ding hi.
Lungduaitak in a hoih sep tentanna tawh minthanna, pahtawina le sihtheih lohna a zong mite tungah nuntak tawntungna a pia ding hi.
Ahi zongin angsungthei a, thuman nialin siatna lampi a zui mite tungah Pasian thangpaihna le hehna a om ding hi.
A sia in a gamta mi peuhmah in buaina le lunggimna thuak dinga, Judah mite in thuak masa in, Greek mite in zong a thuak ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin a hoih in a gamta mi peuhmah in minthanna, pahtawina le nopna ngah dinga, Judah mite in ngah masa in Greek mite in zong a ngah ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in deidan tuam a nei kei hi.
Thukham neilo‑a a mawh khempeuh thukham neilosa mahin kisia ding uh hi. Thukham nuai‑a a mawh khempeuh lah thukham tawh kizui in thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zakna hang hilo in thukham zuihna bekin Pasian mai ah dik a hong tangsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thukham a neilo Gentile‑te in thukham kalhna amau theih tawmna tawh a sep uh ciangin amau aa dingin thukham a suak hi. Amaute in thukham a neih loh uh hangin

tua banga a sepnate panun thukham kalhnate amaute lungsim sungah kigelh hi cih hong lak hi. Tua thu amaute lungsim tawngin tecipang ahih manin a ngaihsutna un amaute mawhsak zel, diksak zel in a om hi.
Pasian in thu a khen ni ciangin mihingte thusimte keima hilh lungdamna thu tawh kizui in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in thu a khen ding hi.
“Kei Judah mi ka hi hi,” ci in thukham a suang le Pasian a kisialhpihpa aw,
thukham hong kihilh ahih manin Pasian deihna na thei a, a hoihpente mah zong hoih na sa hi.
Mittawte lamhilhpa ka hi a, khuamial sunga om mite aa dingin khuavak ka hi a,
mihaite a pantahpa le naungekte aa dingin siapa ka hi hi na kici a, thukham sunga om thutakte a thei takpi bangin na kimuang hi.
Tua ahih leh midangte thu a hilhpa aw, nang le nang zong thu kihilh lo na hi hiam? “Guta kei in,” ci a, midangte thu a hilhpa aw, nang zong guta hilo na hi hiam?
“Angkawm kei in,” a cipa aw nang zong angkawm hilo na hi hiam? Milimte lipkhaphuai a sapa aw, milim biakna innpite a luh hilo na hi hiam?
Thukham a kisialhpihpa aw, thukham na palsat manin Pasian min daisak hilo na hi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh, “Note hangin Gentile‑te lakah Pasian min a kigensia hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
Thukham na zuih leh na vunatna in man a nei ding hi. Ahih hangin thukham na palsat leh vun na at hangin a atlo mah tawh na kibang hi.
Tua ahih manin vunat lopa in thukham a zuih leh tua vunat lopa pen vunat bangin kisim ding hilo ahi hiam?
Lai tunga kigelh thukham nei in vun zong at napi in, thukham na palsat leh ci le sa ah vun a at loh hangin thukham a zui mi in nang hong mawhsak ding hilo ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh a puatham a Judah mi ahite Judah mi taktak ahi kei hi. A pualam pumpi a vunatna zong vunatna taktak ahi kei hi.

A sunglam a Judah mi ahite Judah mi taktak ahi hi. Vunatna zong lai tawh a kigelh thukham hang hilo in Kha hanga lungsim vunatna ahi hi. Mite in tua bang mite a pahtak loh uh hangin Pasian in a pakta hi.
Tua ahih leh Judah mite in bang hamphat tuamna nei a, vunat mi ahihna uh bang phattuamna nei ahi hiam?
A phattuamna tampi a om hi! A masa pen in Pasian in ama kam tawh a gen thute amaute tungah a pia hi.
Ahi zongin amaute pawlkhat in um kei le uh bang a ci ding hiam? Amaute uplohna in Pasian thumanna a mawkna a suaksak ding hiam?

A mawkna a suaksak peuhmah kei ding hi! “Na thugente in na thutanna hong lak a, Thu hong kikhen ciangin zong na gualzawh theih nading ahi hi,” ci a, Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin Pasian mah thuman hi a, mi khempeuh a zuauthei hilo ahi hiam.
Eite diklohna in Pasian dikna kilangsak ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Mihingte thugen banga kong gen inah, eite tungah Pasian hehna a hong thuaksak ciangin amah a thuman lo ahi hiam?
Ahi peuhmah kei hi. Tua ahih leh Pasian in bangci bangin leitung mite thu khen thei ding ahi hiam?
Keima zuauphuahna in Pasian thumanna khangsak in ama minthangsak ahih leh banghang in mimawh hong kici zel ahi hiam?
Pawlkhat in a thukimpih bangun, “A hoih a pian nadingin a sia bawl ni,” ci in mi pawlkhat in kote kam ding hong phuahsak uh hi. Hi bangin thu a gen mite Pasian in maantak in thu a khen ding hi.

Tua ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Amaute sangin eite hoih zaw i hi hiam? I hoih zaw peuhmah kei hi. Tua ahih manin Judah mite le Greek mite a nih tuakun mawhna khut nuai ah om khin uh hi ci in a patna lamah kong gen khinzo uh hi.
Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin, “Midik khat beek a om kei hi. Khat nangawn a om kei hi.
A theisiam mi kuamah a om kei hi. Pasian a zong mi kuamah a om kei hi.
A vekpi un lampial khin uh a, Kimanna a nei kei uh hi. A hoih in a gamta kuamah om lo a, Khat nangawn a om kei hi.
A gawl uh a kihongsa hankhuk hi a, A leii uh mi khemna in a zang uh hi. Amaute mukah gulgu a om hi.
A kampau uh hamsiat le kamkha vive ahi hi.
Mi thah ding haksa a sa kei uh hi.
Amaute paina tengah siatna le gentheihna a om hi.
Lungmuanna lampi a thei kei uh hi.
Amaute mit ah Pasian kihtakna limlim om lo hi.”

Tu in thukham in a gen khempeuh thukham khutnuai mite tunga a gen ahi hi cih i thei hi. Thukham hangin kam khempeuh kikhakcip in leitung mi khempeuh in Pasian mai ah mawhsakna a thuak theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian mai ah kuamah in diktansakna a ngah kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zuihnate tungtawn in mawhna kilangkhia hi.
Ahih hangin Thukham le Kamsangte in teci a pan bangin Pasian in thukham loin a hong piak dikna tu in a hong kilang zo hi.
Pasian in Zeisu Khazih upna tungtawn in tua dikna mi khempeuh hong pia a, a um khempeuh in a ngah hi. Tua ahih manin kilamdanna a om kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh mawh khin uh a, Pasian minthanna cinzo nawnlo uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in Khazih Zeisu hong tatkhiatna tungtawn in Pasian in ama hong hehpihna tawh manngen loin midik a hong tangsak hi.

Pasian lungkim nadingin Zeisu sisan luanna tawh upna tungtawn in mawhna a mai theih nadingin Pasian in amah thoihna in a hong pia hi. Hih in a beisa huna kibawl mawhnate Pasian in iip keikai in daan a piak lohna in amah dik ahihna a kilatsak nading leh,
tu hunin zong Zeisu a umte dik a tansakna ah amah thuman in thudik ahihlam a kilatsak nading ahi hi.
Tua ahih leh kisialh nading thu koi ah om ahi hiam? Kisialh theih nading thu a kilakhia zo hi. Bang tawh kilakhia ahi hiam? Thukham zuihna tawh ahi hiam? Hilo hi. Upna tawh a kilakhia hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatin thukham zuihna tawh hilo in upna tawh diktansakna a ngah hi ci in thu i khum hi.
Amah Judah mite Pasian bek ahi hiam? Gentile‑te Pasian zong hilo ahi hiam? Hi mah hi. Gentile‑te Pasian zong ahi hi.
Vunat mite amau upna hangin diktangsak a, vunatlo mite zong upna hang mahin dik a tangsakpa in Pasian khat bek ahi hi.
Tua ahih leh upna thu hangin thukham in kimanna neilo a suaksak i hi hiam? I hi peuhmah kei hi. Thukham a kipsak i hi zaw hi.
Tua ahih leh ci le sa a ka pupi uh Abraham in hih thu tawh kisai bang mukhia ahi hiam?
Abraham in a gamtatna tawh diktansakna ngah hi leh kisial thei ding hi napi Pasian mai ah a kisialh theih nading a om kei hi.
Lai Siangtho in bang gen ahi hiam? “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna pen ama dikna in kisimsak hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
Tu in nasempa in thaman a ngah ciangin hehpihna a ngah hi kici loin thaman a ngah hi kici hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian a zahtaklo mi khatin gamtatna suang loin, dik a tangsakpa a up leh ama upna pen dikna in a kisimsak hi.
Gamtatnate kihel loin Pasian in midik a a sim mipa in thupha a ngahna thu David in hih bangin a gen hi.
Amah in, “A tatkhialhnate uh kimaisak a, A mawhnate uh a kikhuhcipsak mite, Mihampha hi uh a,
Topa in mawhna a suatloh mi, Mihampha ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thupha in vunat mite aa ding bek ahi hiam? Ahih keileh vunatlo mite aa ding zong ahi hiam? Abraham upna pen ama dikna in kisimsak hi i cih ciangin,
bang hunin kisimsak ahi hiam? A vunat khit ciang ahi hiam? Ahih keileh a vunatma ahi hiam? A vunat khit ciang hilo in a vunatma in a kisimsak ahi hi.

Abraham in a vun a at ma in upna hangin dikna ngah takpi ahihna a kilat nadingin a vun a nung at hi zaw hi. Amah in vun ki‑atlo thu‑um mite khempeuh pa a suah nading leh tua mite tungah dikna in a kisimsak theih nading ahi hi.
Ka pa uh Abraham in ngeina banga vunat bek hilo in amah in vun a ki‑atma a a neih upna khekhap a zui vunat taktakte pa ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh leitung luah ding cih kamciam Abraham le a suan a khakte in thukham tungtawn a a ngah uh hilo in upna hanga dikna tawh a ngah uh ahi hi.
Thukham tawh a nungta mite in gamhluah ding uh ahih leh upna in man neilo dinga, kamciamna zong a mawkna suak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thukham in Pasian hehna a piangsak hi. Thukham om kei leh thukham palsatna zong a om kei ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tua kamciamna pen hehpihna hanga kipia a suah nadingin upna tungtawn in kingah hi. Tua in Abraham suante khempeuh le thukham tawh kisai mite bek hilo in eite khempeuh pa ahi Abraham banga a um mite in zong tua kamciamna a ngah takpi theih nading uh ahi hi.

Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin, “Minam tampite pa a suak dingin kong bawl khin hi,” a cihna tawh kituak in Abraham in ama uppa Pasian muhna ah eite khempeuh pa a suak hi. Tua Pasian in misite a hingkiksakpa le a om nailopi nangawn a omsa banga a genpa ahi hi.
Abraham tungah, “Na suan na khakte in hih bangin a piang ding hi,” ci a, a kigenna bangin Abraham in minam tampite pa a suah nadingin a lamethuai lopi mah lamen in a um veve hi.
Ama khan kum 100 bang pha zo a, a pumpi a si tawh kibang ahihna le Sarah zong tasel ahihna ngaihsut in nei loin amah in upna ah a thanem tuan kei hi.
Uplahna tawh Pasian kamciam tungah lunghiang hetlo in a upna khauhsak a, Pasian min a thangsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a kamciamna bangin a tangtungsakpa hi ci in upna kician a nei hi.
Tua ahih manin, “Tua upna pen ama dikna in a kisimsak hi.”
Tua banga a kisimsakna thu Lai Siangtho sungah ama aa ding bekin a kigelh ahi kei hi.
Eite aa dinga kigelh zong hi a, misite lak panin i Topa Zeisu a thokiksakpa i up leh tua upna mah eite dikna in a hong simsak ding hi.
Eite thu palsatnate hangin Zeisu hong kipiakhia a, diktansakna i ngah nadingin a thokik hi.
Tua hi a, upna hangin diktansakna ngah i hih manin i Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in Pasian tawh i kilemkik hi.
Ama tungtawn in hehpihna sungah upna hangin tu‑a i omna ah luttheihna i ngah a, Pasian minthanna lametna nei in i lung a dam hi.
Tua bek zong hilo in haksatna in thuakzawhhatna piangsak hi cih thei i hih manin haksatnate i tuah ciangin i kipak hi.
Thuakzawhhatna in gamtat hoihna, gamtat hoihna in lametna a piangsak hi cih i thei hi.
Tu in lametna in hong lungkiasak lo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama hong piak Kha Siangtho tungtawn in eite lungsim sungah ama itna hong guanzo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite thanem in i om laitak a hun a cin ciangin Pasian a thusimlo eite tangin Khazih hong si hi.
Midik khat tanga a singam ding mi haksa mahmah a, ahi zongin mihoih khat tanga a singam mi khatpeuh omthei khasam ding hi.
Ahi zongin mimawh i hih laitak mahin eite tanga Khazih hong sihna tawh Pasian in eite hong itna hong kilangsak hi.
Tu in ama sisan tawh diktansakna i ngah bekthamlo in ama tungtawn in Pasian hehna panin hong kihonkhia ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite in galte i hih laitak in ama Tapa sihna tawh Pasian in amah le eite hong kilemkiksak zo a, i kilemkik khit ciangin ama nuntakna tawh hotkhiatna i ngah lai ding hi.
Tua bek zong hilo in kilemkikna hong ngahsak i Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin Pasian tungah i kipak hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khat tungtawn in leitung ah mawhna hong lut a, mawhna hangin sihna a piang hi. Tua hi a, mi khempeuh mawh khinzo ahih manin mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi.
Thukham a omma in leitung ah mawhna a om khinzo hi. Ahih hangin thukham a om loh lai in mawhna pen mawhna in a kisim kei hi.
Tua hi napi Adam huna kipan Moses hun dongin sihna in mite uk veve a, Adam bangin thupiak palsat in a mawhlo mite nangawn zong sihna in a uk hi. Tua Adam in hong pailai ding pa lim a lakkhol ahi hi.
