Ahi zongin letsong le thupalsatna a kibang kei hi. Mi khat thu palsatna hangin mi tampi a si hi. Ahi zongin Pasian hehpihna le mi khat ahi Zeisu Khazih hehpihna tawh i ngah letsong lian zawlai a, mi tampi aa dingin a kicing hi.
Mi khat mawhna hangin a piang thu le letsong a kibang kei hi. Mi khat mawhna hangin mawhsakna kingah a, ahi zongin manngenlo a hong kipia letsong in thu palsatna tampite a maisak hi.

Mi khat thupalsatna hangin tua mi khat tungtawn in sihna in mite uk ahih leh a dimlet hehpihna le dikna letsong a ngah mite in Zeisu Khazih ahi mi khat tungtawn in amaute nuntakna sungah a tam zawsem a uk ding uh hi.

Tua ahih manin mi khat thupalsatna hangin mi khempeuh tungah mawhsakna thukhenna a hong tung hi. Tuamah bangin mi khat diktatna hangin khawnkhong letsong mi khempeuh tungah tunga, tua in nuntakna tawh kipawl diktansakna a piangsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat thumanlohna in mi tampi mimawh a suahsak bangin mi khat thumanna in mi tampi midik a suaksak hi.
Tua thamlo in thupalsatna a khan nadingin thukham hong lutbeh hi. Ahi zongin mawhna a khan ciangin hehpihna a khang zaw sem hi.
Tua hi a, mawhna in sihna a uk mah bangin, i Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in tawntung nuntakna a tun dingin hehpihna in dikna tungtawn in a uk hi.
Tua ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Hehpihna a khan nadingin mawhna i bawl behbeh ding hiam?
I bawl behbeh peuhmah kei ding hi! Mawhna a sihsan khinsa eite tua mawhna sungah koici bangin bual thei lai ding i hi hiam?
Khazih Zeisu sunga hong kiphum eite khempeuh in ama sihna sungah zong hong kiphum ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Ama sihna sungah hong kiphum ahih manin amah tawh hong kivuikhawm khinzo hi. Tua in misite lak pan Pa vangliatna tawh Khazih a thawhkik bangin eite zong nuntakna thakah i kalsuan theih nading ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ama sihna lim la in amah tawh sikhawm a i kipumkhat leh amah bangin i thokik pelmawh ding hi.
Mawhna pumpi kisusia in mawhna sila i suah nawnloh nadingin eite mi lui pen Khazih tawh kikhailum khawm zo hi cih i thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a si khin mi peuhmah mawhna pan a suakta zo ahi hi.
Tu in Khazih tawh sikhawm khin i hih leh amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi cih i um hi.
Misite lak pan Khazih a kithawhkiksak khit ciangin si nawnlo a, sihna in zong amah uk nawnlo hi cih i thei hi.
Khazih sihna in a kimangsuak dinga mawhna sihsanna hi a, nuntakna ahih leh Pasian aa dinga nuntakna ahi hi.
Tuamah bangin note zong mawhna a sihsan khinzo le i Topa Khazih Zeisu sungah Pasian aa dingin a nungta khinzo in kingaihsun un.
Tua ahih manin pumpi lunggulhnate a zui dingin a sithei na pumpi uh mawhna ki‑uksak kei un.

Tatsiatna hiamte bangin mawhna bawl nadingin na pumpi nate uh zang kei un. Misite lak panin a nungtakikte na hih manun na pumpi nate uh zong dikna hiamte bangin dikna bawl nadingin Pasian tungah pia un.
Thukham nuai ah om loin hehpihna nuai ah om na hih manun mawhna in note a hong uk kei ding hi.
Tua ahih leh bang i ci om ding hiam? Thukham nuai ah om loin hehpihna nuai ah om i hih leh mawhna i bawlbawl lel ding hiam? I bawlbawl peuhmah kei ding hi!

Mi khat thu mangin a sila dinga na kipiak uh ciangin a thu zong mang takpi in tua mipa sila na suak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin sihna a hong tun ding mawhna sila maw ahih keileh dikna a hong tangsak ding thumanna sila maw, hihte gel lakah khat zawzaw na hih lam uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?
A beisa hunin mawhna sila na hih ngei uh hangin note hong kipia thuhilhna lungsim takpi tawh mang na hih manun Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Mawhna pan hong kisuaktasak khinzo ahih manin dikna sila na suak uh hi.

Na ci le na sa uh thanem ahih manin mihing kammal zangin thu a gen ka hi hi. A siangtholo nate sila ding leh hong tatsiasak semsem tatsiatna sila dingin na pumpi nate uh na piak ngei bangun tu in na pumpi nate uh dikna sila bangin a siangtho dingin kipia un.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna sila na hih lai un dikna tawh na kipelh uh hi.
Tu in zumhuai na sak uh tua mawhnate panin bang metlawh na hi uh hiam? Tua nate in a tawpna ah sihna a piangsak hi.
Ahi zongin tu in ahih leh mawhna pan suakta in Pasian silate na suak uh hi. Tua ahih manin tu in sianthona na ngah uh a, a tawpna ah nuntak tawntungna na ngah ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna thaman in sihna ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian hong piakkhong letsong in eite Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn a kingah nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
Thukham a thei mite tunga kong gen inah sanggamte aw, mi khat a nuntak laiteng thukham in amah uk hi cih theilo na hi uh hiam?
Numei khat a pasal a nuntak laiteng thukham in a pasal tawh a khihkhawm hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a sih leh a pasal tawh kisai thukham pan a suakta hi.

Tua ahih manin a pasal nungta lai napi pasal dang a teenpih leh angkawmnu a kici ding hi. Ahih hangin a pasal a sih leh tua thukham pan suakta ahih manin pasal dang a teenpih zongin angkawmnu ahi nawn kei hi.

Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note zong Khazih pumpi hangin thukham a sihsan khin mite na hi uh hi. Hih in midang khat ahi misite lak pana a kithokiksakpa tawh kiteeng in Pasian aa dingin na gah theih nading uh ahi hi.
Eite i pianpih mawhna lungsim tawh i nuntak lai in thukham in mawhna lunggulhnate phonglo a, tua mawhna lunggulhnate in i pumpi sungah nasem in sihna hong tun hi.

Ahi zongin tu in laimal a kigelh ngeina lui bang hilo in Kha‑a nuntakna thak tawh na i sep theih nadingin eite hong khihcip ngei thukham sihsan khinta i hih manin tua thukham panin hong kisuaktasak khinzo hi.

Tua ahih leh bang i gen ding hiam? Thukham in mawhna ahi hiam? Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Tua cih thadah in, thukham om kei leh mawhna bang hiam cih ka thei kei ding hi. Thukham in, “Deihgawh kei in,” ci hi kei leh deihgawhna in bang hiam cih ka thei kei ding hi.
Ahi zongin thukham hangin mawhna in panmun ngahin keima sungah a hoihlo lunggulhna namkim a piangsak hi. Tua ahih manin thukham om kei leh mawhna zong a om kei hi.
Khatvei lai in thukham loin ka nungta hi. Ahih hangin thukham hong tun ciangin mawhna hong hingkik a, kei ka si hi.
Tua hi a, nuntakna a hong tun ding thukham in sihna a piangsak hi cih ka mu hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thukham siksan in kei hong khem a, tua tawh hong that hi.
Tua ahih manin thukham siangtho in, thupiakna zong siangtho a, thumaan in a hoih hi.

Tua ahih leh tua na hoih in kei aa dingin sihna suak ahi hiam? A suak peuhmah kei hi! Ahih hangin mawhna pen mawhna mahin a kilatkhiat theih nadingin tua na hoih tungtawn in kei sungah sihna a piangsak ahi hi. Tua in thupiakna tungtawn in mawhna pen mawhna ahih taktak lam a kilat nading ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thukham in khalam thu tawh kisai hi cih i thei hi. Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ci le sa tawh a om mi ka hi a, tua in mawhna nuai ah kei hong zuak hi.
Ka sepnop teng sem loin ka muhdah teng peuh sem zawsop ka hih manin ka sepmel ka thei zo nawn kei hi.
Ka sep noploh teng mah sem ka hih leh thukham hoih hi ci in ka thukim hi.
Ahih hangin tua banga a semsem pen kei hi nawnlo in ka sunga a teeng mawhna ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin ci le sa ahi keima sungah a hoih bangmah a om kei hi cih ka thei hi. A hoih sepnopna lungsim ka neih hangin a hoih sepkhiat nadingzia ka thei zo kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka sepnop a hoih sem loin ka sep noploh a sia mah ka sem thapai hi.
Tu in ka sep noploh teng sem ka hih leh tuate a sem pen kei hi nawnlo in ka sunga a teeng mawhna in a sem ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin a pha a bawl nuam keima sungah siatna om hi cih thu khat ka theikhia hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka sunglam mi in Pasian thukham sungah nuam a sa hi.
Ahih hangin ka pumpi nate sungah a dang thukhat ka mu hi. Tua thu in ka lungsim a om thu tawh kido a, ka pumpi nate sunga om mawhna sila dingin hong mancip hi.
Mi gentheipa ka hi taktak hi! A si ding hih pumpi panin kua in kei hong honkhia ding ahi hiam?
I Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi! Hih bang teng ahih manin ka lungsim tawngah Pasian thukham nuai ah sila ka hi a, ka ci ka sa panin lah mawhna thukham nuai‑a sila ka hi zel hi.
Tua ahih manin tu in ci le sa deihna zui loin Kha deihna a zui, Khazih Zeisu sunga a om mite aa dingin mawhsakna a om nawn kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih Zeisu sunga om nuntakna a piangsak Kha thu in mawhna le sihna thu panin kei a hong suaktasak zo hi.
Thukham in ci le sa hangin thanem ahih manin a sep zawhloh teng a sem dingin Pasian in ama Tapa mahmah mawhna a dim mihing bangin hong paisak a, tua ci le sa sungah mawhna thu a khen zo hi.
Hih in ci le sa deihna zui loin Kha deihna a zui eite sungah thukham in hong kalh dikna a tangtun nading ahi hi.
Ci le sa deihna banga a nungtate in ci le sa tawh kisai thute lunggulh uh a, Kha deihna banga a nungtate in Kha tawh kisai thute a lunggulh uh hi.
Ci le sa lungsim puakna in sihna piangsak a, ahi zongin kha lungsim puakna in nuntakna le lungmuanna a piangsak hi.
Ci le sa lungsim puakna in Pasian galbawlna ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa lungsim in Pasian thukham a manglo bek hilo in a mang thei limlim kei hi.
Tua hi a, ci le sa deihna a zuite in Pasian a lungdamsak thei kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin note sungah Pasian Kha hong teen takpi leh ci le sa sungah omlo in Kha sungah a om na hi uh hi. Tu in Khazih Kha a neilo mi peuhmah Khazih mi ahi kei hi.
Note sungah Khazih Kha a hong om leh mawhna hangin na pumpi uh a si hi a, ahi zongin dikna hangin na kha uh a nungta hi.
Misite lak pan Zeisu a thokiksak Pasian Kha note sungah hong teen leh misite lak pan Khazih a thokiksakpa in a sithei note pumpi zong note sunga a teeng ama Kha tungtawn in nuntakna a pia ding hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, ci le sa deihna zui in a nungta dingin ci le sa tungah leiba i nei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa deihna zui in na nuntak uh leh na si ding uh hi. Ahi zongin Kha hangin pumpi deihna na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian Kha in a makaih mi peuhmah Pasian tate ahi uh hi.
Sila hong suakkiksak in a hong lausak ding kha a ngah na hi kei uh a, ta hong suaksak Kha na ngah uh hi. Tua Kha in, “Abbaɠ, Pa aw,” hong cisak hi.
Pasian tate i hih lam tua Kha in eite kha tawh teci a pangkhawm hi.
Tate i hih leh innluahte i hi a, Pasian innluahte le Khazih tawh innluahkhawmte i hi hi. Khazih tawh i thuakkhop takpi leh amah tawh minthanna i ngahkhawm ding hi.
Tu laitak a i thuak gimnate ka ngaihsut ciangin eite tungah a hong kilakkhia ding minthanna tawh tehkaktham ka sa kei hi.
A kipiangsak na khempeuh in Pasian tate a kilat ding hun a ngaklah mahmah uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a kipiangsak na khempeuh siattheihna nuai ah a om hi. Amaute utthu a om hilo in a koihpa in ama thu tawh a koih hi zaw a,
a kipiangsak nate in muattheihna kol panin kikhahkhia a, Pasian tate suahtakna thupi sungah kikoih ding hi cih lametna tawh a om uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a kipiangsak na khempeuh in nupi nausuak ding a gim bangin tu dongin thum le tau in a om uh hi cih i thei hi.
Amaute bek hilo in Kha gah masa a nei eite nangawn i pumpi hong tankhia a, tate hong suahsak ding hun ngaklah in i lungsim sungah khuisa in i om hi.
Lametna sungah eite hotkhiat i hi hi. Ahi zongin i muh khitsa na khat lametna in lametna ahi kei hi. Kua in a muh khitsa na khat lamen theinawn ding ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin i muh nailoh na khat i lamet ciangin thuak keikai in i ngak hi.
Tuamah bangin Kha in zong eite thanemnate a hong huh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite in thungetzia ding nangawn i thei kei hi. Ahi zongin Kha mahmah in a kilokhia theilo tauna tawh thu hong ngetsak hi.
Tu in lungsim sung a zongpa in Kha lungsim zong thei a, tua Kha in Pasian deihna tawh kituak in misiangthote aa dingin thu a hong ngetsak hi.
Ama gelna bangin a sap Pasian a it mite aa dingin, amah in na khempeuh a hoih dingin a kituak in piangsak hi cih i thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a Tapa in sanggam tampite lakah ta upapen a suah theih nadingin Pasian in a theihkholhsa mite mah ama Tapa lim le mel a sun dingin a sehkhol hi.
Tua banah a sehkholhsa mite a sam hi. A sapsa mite dik a tangsak hi. Dik a tansak mite minthanna a pia hi.
Hihteng banah bang i genlai ding hiam? Pasian ei lamah a pan nak leh eite langah kua pang zo ding ahi hiam?
A Tapa takpi itsik loin eite khempeuh aa dinga hong piakhiapa in na khempeuh zong manngen loin a Tapa tawh hong piakhawm loin om ding ahi hiam?
Pasian teelsa mite dik a tangsakpa in Pasian ahih manin amaute kua in mawhsak zo ding ahi hiam?
Mawhsakna thu a khen kua ahi hiam? Khazih in a sipa bek hilo in a thokikpa zong hi a, Pasian taklam ah omin eite aa dingin a hong thumsakpa zong ahi hi.

Khazih hong itna tawh kua in eite hong kikhensak zo ding ahi hiam? Haksatna ahi a, gentheihna ahi a, bawlsiatna ahi a, kialpi ahi a, puan neihlohna ahi a, manthanna ahi a, namsaute ahi zongin tuate in a hong kikhensak zo kei ding hi.
“Nangma hangin sun thapai in thahna ka thuak uh a, A kigo ding tuute bangin hong kingaihsun hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi.
Ahi zongin eite hong itpa hangin hihte khempeuh tungah a gualzopente i hi hi.
Sihna, nuntakna, vantungmite, zalianpente, a vangliante, tu laitak a om nate le hong pianglai ding nate,
a sang nate, a thuk nate le a kipiangsak nate khat beekin i Topa Khazih Zeisu sunga om Pasian hong itna tawh hong kikhensak zolo ding hi cih ka theitel hi.
Ka lungsimtawng in Kha Siangtho sungah teci a pan mah bangin zuaugen hetlo in Khazih sungah maantak a kong gen thu in,
ka lungsim sungah dahna lianpi le lungsim gimna ka thuak niloh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa in ka sanggam ka mipih Israel mite tangin Khazih tawh kikhen in samsiatna a thuakthei ding hi leng ka ut hi.
Tate suahsakna, minthanna, thuciamnate le thukham piakna, Pasian nasepna le kamciamte amaute aa ahi hi.
Amaute in pu le pate suan le khakte hi uh a, ci le sa tawh kisai in Khazih zong amaute sung panin a piang ahi hi. Tua Khazih in na khempeuh tunga thunei a tawntung in a kiphat Pasian ahi hi. Amen.
Ahi zongin Pasian thu a kiplo ahi kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Israel suante khempeuh Israel mi taktak ahi kim kei uh hi.
Abraham panin a piang ahih hangun Abraham tate taktak ahi kim kei uh hi. Pasian in, “Isaac panin a piangte bek nangma suan le khak kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ci le sa panin a piang tate Pasian tate taktak hilo in kamciamna panin a piang tate bek suan le khakin a kisim hi.
Kamciamna in, “A kiseh hun hong tun ciangin kong pai dinga, Sarah in tapa khat a nei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bek hilo in, Rebecca tate zong a pa uh a kibang hi a, ka pupi uh Isaac ahi hi.
Ahi zongin, amaute a teelna tawh kisai in Pasian gelna le tupna pen mihing sepna hang hilo a sampa hangin a tangtung ahih theih nadingin amaute a suahma, a sia a pha bangmah a bawlma un,
Pasian in Rebecca kiangah, “A uzaw pa in a nauzaw pa sila a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih in, “Jacob ka it a, Esau ka mudah hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelhna tawh a kituak ahi hi.
Tua ahih leh bang gennawn ding i hi hiam? Pasian thumaanlo ahi hiam? Ahi peuhmah kei hi!
Amah in Moses kiangah, “Ka hehpih nopte ka hehpih dinga, ka lainat nopte ka lainat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih bang ahih manin mihing lunggulhna le mihing hanciamna tungah kinga loin Pasian hehpihna tung bekah a kinga hi.
Lai Siangtho in Pharaoh kiangah, “Ka vangliatna nang tungah kilang in leitung khempeuh ah ka min a kitangko theih nadingin nang kong lamto hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin amah in a hehpih nopte hehpih in a lungkhauhsak nopte a lungkhauhsak hi.
Tua ahih leh, “Banghang in Pasian in mite hong mawhsak thei veve ahi hiam? Kua in ama deihna nial zo ngei ahi hiam?” nong ci kha thei ding uh hi.
Hi mah hi. Ahi zongin, Pasian kam a dawngngam mi aw, nang in kua na hi hiam? A kibawl na khatin a bawlpa tungah, “Banghang in hih banga kei hong bawl na hi hiam?” ci thei ding ahi hiam?
Belsekpa in tungman lomkhat panin bel hoih le bel hoihlo sek theih nading thu nei hilo ahi hiam?
Pasian in a hehna lakin a vangliatna a kitheih nading a deihna tawh suksiat dingin a koihkholhsa, ama hehna a ngah belte lungduaitak in thuak keikai ahih leh eite in bang awlmawh ding i hi hiam?
Pasian in minthanna a piak dingin a koihkholhsa, ama hehpihna a ngah belte tungah ama vangliatna tawh kizui hauhna a theihsak theih nading ahi hi.
Tua belte in Judah mite lak pan bek hilo in Gentile‑te lak panin zong hong sapkhiat eite mah hilo i hi hiam?
Amah in Hosea Lai Siangtho sungah zong hih bangin a gen hi, “Ka mi a hilote, ‘ka mite’ ka ci dinga, Ka itloh mi zong, ‘ka it mi’ hi ka ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin hih bang a hong hi ding hi. ‘Ka mite na hi kei uh hi,’ ka cihna munah, ‘A nungta Pasian tate na hi uh hi,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Israel mite tawh kisai in Isaiah zong kiko a, “Israel tate a tamzia uh, Tuipi gei‑a sehnel zah a phak uh hangin, A omlai teng bekin, Hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
Topa in ama thukhenna leitung ah Manlangtak le kicingtak in semkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih thu a beisa huna Isaiah genna tawh a kituak hi. Amah in, “Vantung galkap honpite Topa in eite aa dingin, Suan le khak khat hong sitsak lo hileh Sodom khua mite i bang khinzo dinga, Gomorrah khua mite bangin hong kibawl khinzo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih leh bang gennawn ding i hi hiam? Dikna thu a delhlo Gentile‑te in upna hanga kingah dikna a ngah uh hi.
Ahi zongin dikna thukham a delh Israel mite in tua dikna a ngah kei uh hi.
Banghang in ngah lo uh ahi hiam? Upna tawh zong loin thukham zuihna tawh a zon man uh hi a,

“En un, palkhak suangpi ahi, Pukna suangpi khat Zion ah ka koih a, Amah a um mi khempeuh Maizumna a kithuaksak kei ding hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho ah a kigelh mah bangin tua palkhak suangpi a pal kha uh ahi hi.
Sanggamte aw, Israel mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh deihsak mahmah in Pasian tungah thu ka ngetsak hi.
Pasian aa dingin hanciam mahmah uh hi cih teci ka pang hi. Ahi zongin a hanciamna uh theihna tungah a kinga kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian dikna thei lo uh ahih manin amaute dikna bulphuh sawm uh a, Pasian dikna a mang kei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a um mi khempeuh in dikna a ngah theih nadingin Khazih in thukham tawpna ahi hi.
Moses in thukham hangin a piang dikna thu a gelhna ah, “Thukham a zuimi in tua thukham zuihna hangin a nungta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin upna tawh a kingah dikna in a gen in ah, “Na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantung ah kua kahto ding ahi hiam?’ ci kei in.” (Hih thu in Khazih lasuk ding cihna ahi hi.)
Ahih keileh, “ ‘A thukpi sungah kua kumsuk ding ahi hiam?’ ci kei in.” (Hih in misite lak pan Khazih lato ding cihna ahi hi.)
Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho in bangci gen ahi hiam? “Ama thu in note tawh kinai mahmah a, note kamsung le note lungsim sungah a om hi,” a ci hi. Tua thu in kote hong tangko upna thu ahi hi.
Zeisu in Topa ahi hi ci in na kam tawh pulak a, Pasian in misite lak panin amah thokiksak hi ci in na lungsim sungah na up leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim a upna in dikna hong ngahsak a, kam tawh pulakna in hotkhiatna a piangsak hi.
Lai Siangtho sungah, “Amah a um mi khempeuh in maizumna a kithuaksak kei ding hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Judah mite le Greek mite a kilamdanna a om kei hi. Topa pen mi khempeuh Topa mah hi a, amah a sam mi khempeuh tungah kicingtak in hehpihna a pia hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh, “Topa min tawh huhna a ngen mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.”

Tua bang ahih leh a uploh mipa uh bangci bangin suang thei ding uh ahi hiam? A thu a zak ngeiloh mipa uh bangci bangin um thei ding uh ahi hiam? A hilh om kei leh bangci bangin za thei ding uh ahi hiam?

A sawl om kei leh bangci bangin hilh thei ding uh ahi hiam? “Nopna hong pia lungdamna thu hong tangko, Lungdamna thu hoih hong puak mite, A khe uh kilawm mahmah hi!” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
Ahih hangin mi khempeuh in lungdamna thu a um kim kei uh hi. Isaiah in, “Topa aw, kote tangkona kua in um ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua bangin upna in thu zakna panin hong piang a, thu zakna in Pasian kammal panin a hong piang hi.
Ahi zongin ken kong cih in ah amaute in za lo uh ahi hiam? A za khinzo taktak uh hi. “Amaute awging, Leitung bup ah kiza khinzo a, Amau thugente leimong dongah kizel khin hi.”

Ahih hangin ken kong cih in ah Israel mite in thei lo uh ahi hiam? A masa pen in Moses in, “Keima mipawl a hilo mite tungtawn in, Note sungah hazatna ka piangsak dinga, A theilo minamte tungtawn in, Note kong hehsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Isaiah in hangtak in a gen inah, “Kei hong zong lote in hong mu uh a, Kei hong kan lote tungah ka kilak hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in Israel mite tungah, “A thumanglo le A genhak minamte aa dingin Sun thapai in ka khut ka zan den hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih leh Pasian in a mite nawlkhin ahi hiam ci in ka dong hi. A nawlkhin peuhmah kei hi! Keimah tektek zong Abraham suan, Benjamin phung sung panin a piang Israel mi ka hi hi.
Pasian in a theihkholh khitsa a mite a nawlkhin kei hi. Elijah in Pasian tungah Israel mite a khiatna thu Lai Siangtho in a gen theilo na hi uh hiam?
Amah in, “Topa aw, amaute in na kamsangte that khin uh a, na biaknataute zong a susia khin uh hi. Kei bek ka omlai a, kei zong thah ding a hong sawmlai uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in bangci dawnkik ahi hiam? “Baal milim mai ah kunin a bialo mihing 7,000 kei aa dingin ka sit lai hi,” a ci hi.
Tuamah bangin tu in zong Pasian in a hehpihna tawh kizui in a teel a omlai mi pawlkhat a om hi.

Hehpihna hang ahih leh gamtatna hang ahi nawn kei hi. Tua hi kei leh hehpihna pen hehpihna a suak nawn kei hi. Gamtatna hang hi leh hehpihna ahi nawn kei hi. Tua hi kei leh nasepna zong nasepna a suak nawn kei hi.
Tua ahih leh i gen bang ahi hiam? Israel mite in a zonzon uh a ngah kei uh hi. Pasian teel mite bekin ngah uh a, a dangteng ahih leh a mit uh a taw hi.
Hih thu Lai Siangtho ah, “Pasian in thu a theitheilo lungsim, Khua a mu theilo mittang, Khua a za theilo bilte, Tuni dongin a neisak hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
David in zong, “Amau ankuangte, amaute aa dingin, Thang le tehlop suak henla, A kipalkhakna uh suakin, Thuhkikna suak tahen.
Khua a muh theihloh nadingun, Pasian in a mit uh mialsak henla, A nung uh kulsak den tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih leh amaute a puk dingin kipal kha uh ahi hiam ci in ka dong hi. Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Amaute thupalsatna hangin Gentile‑te tungah hotkhiatna tung a, amaute in a een nadingun a piangsak hi.
Tu in amaute pukna in leitung mite hauhna suak a, amaute supna in Gentile‑te aa dingin hauhna suak ahih leh amaute kicinna in bangzahtak in nasia zawlai ding ahi hiam!
Gentile‑te sawltakpa ka hihna tawh no Gentile‑te tunga kong gen inah,
ka mipihte lungsim sungah lamkhat peuhpeuh tawh eenna piangsak in amaute pawlkhat beek ka hotkhiat theih khak leh ka cih manin ka nasepna a hong thupi gen ka hi hi.
Amaute a kipampaihna hangin leitung mite tawh kilemkikna piangsak ahih leh amaute a kisankikna in sihna pan nuntakna longal thu dang bang hi ding ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh a gah masa pen a siantho leh a kungpi zong a siangtho hi. A zungpi a siantho leh a hiangte zong a siangtho hi.
A hiangte pawlkhat kisatkhia in tuate tungah gamlak tanluan sing ahi nang hong kipeh a, amaute tawh tanluan zung le tanluan kung panin an hoihte na ngahkhawm hi.
Tua ahih manin tua a hiangte tungah kisathei kha kei in. Ahi zongin na kisaktheih leh nang in a zung pua loin a zungin nang hong pua zaw hi cih phawk in.
“Kei hong kipeh theih nadingin a hiangte kisatkhia hi,” na cinuam kha ding hi.
Hi mah hi. Amaute in a up loh manun a kisatkhia hi a, nang na hih leh upna tawh a kip na hih manin kiphasak kei inla lauthawng zaw in.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a hiang taktakte nangawn zah lo ahih leh nang zong a hong zah tuan kei ding hi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian migitna le a thukhauhna ngaihsun in. A puk mite tungah amah a thukhauh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian migitna sungah na omsuak leh nangma tungah a hong migi ding hi. Tua bang na hih kei leh amah in nang zong a hong satkhia ding hi.
Amaute zong um loin a omsuak kei nak uh leh Pasian in pehkik thei ahih manin a pehkik ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in gamlak tanluan kung pan nang hong satkhia in nangma pianzia tawh kilehbulh in tanluan kungah nang hong peh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in tanluan hiang taktak ahi amaute a kung tungah pehkik zaw peuhmah ding hilo ahi hiam?

Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, no ngaihsuttawmna ah pil na kisak khakloh nadingun hih thusim thei lo a na om ding uh ka deih kei hi. Tua in, Gentile‑te kicinna hong tun mateng in Israel mite tungah tawlkhat sung mittawtna a om hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, “Zion khuapi panin Honpa hong pai dinga, Jacob suan sung panin Pasian a uplohna uh A heikhiatsak ding hi.
A mawhnate uh ka lakkhiatsak ciangin, Amaute tunga ka bawl ding thuciamna in hih thu mah ahi hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Amaute in lungdamna thu tawh kisai in note hangin Pasian galte a suak uh hi. Ahih hangin teelna tawh kisai in a pute a pate uh hangin Pasian it mite ahi uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian letsong le a sapna pen a kilaih thei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nidang in Pasian thu a manglo note in amaute thumanlohna hangin tu in hehpihna na ngah uh hi.
Tuamah bangin note ngah hehpihna hangin amaute in hehpihna a ngah theih nadingun tu in amaute zong thumang loin a om uh ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in mi khempeuh a hehpih theih nadingin thumanlohna sungah amaute khempeuh a khum hi.
Aw! Pasian pilna le a thu theihna thuk in kicing zen mah si ee! Ama thukhenzia theih khit zawh ding hilo a, ama sulnung kankhiat zawh ding hilo hi!
Banghang hiam cihleh, “Kua in Topa lungsim thei a, Ahih keileh amah in kua tawh thu kikum ngei ahi hiam?”
“Tua ahih keileh Pasian in a thuhkik dingin, Kua in amah pia masa ahi hiam?”
Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh ama hang leh ama tungtawn in a piang hi a, ama aa ding vive ahi hi. Amah in pahtawina ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian hehpihna hanga kong kut in ah na pumpi uh a hing biakpiakna, a siangtho le Pasian san theih dingin pia un. Hih in note sep dingin a kilawm biakna nasep ahi hi.
Hih leitung mite gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh thaksuaksak in na kikhel un. Tua hi leh a hoih, a sanhuai a kicing Pasian deihna bang ahi hiam cih na theitel ding uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh kei hong kipia hehpihna tungtawn in note khempeuh tunga kong gen in ah no le no ahi ding zahval in na kingaihsun kha kei un. Pasian in mikim tungah a hong piak upna zah tawh kizui in a kilawm a kituak in kingaihsun un.
Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi tungah na tampi i nei hi. Tua nate a vekpi un a nasep uh a kibang khin kei hi.
Tuamah bangin eite in mi tampi i hih hangin Khazih sungah pum khat i hi a, eite khat ciatin pumpi nate i hi hi.
Pasian in eite hong piak hehpihna tawh kizui in letsong a tuamtek i ngahte zatsiam ciat ni. Pasian thu genkhiat theihna i ngah leh upna tawh kituak in thu gen ni.
Nasepna za i ngah leh i ngah nasep sem ni. Thuhilh theihna a ngah mi in thuhilh nasep sem hen.
Hanthot theihna a ngah mi in hanthot nasep sem hen. A piakhia mi in cinghtak in pia hen. A makai mi in kuhkaltak in makaih hen. A hehpih thei mi in lungdamtak in hehpihna lak hen.
Lungsim takpi tawh ki‑it un. Thusia mudah unla, thuhoih lenkip un.
Unau banga ki‑itna tawh khat le khat ki‑it kingai mahmah un. Nang sangin midangte pahtawi zaw in.
Nasep thadah loin lawpna lungsim tawh Topa na sem un.
Lametna tawh kipak un. Haksat hun ciangin thuak keikai un. Thungetna ah citak un.
Mi siangthote kisapnate huh unla, zindo thanuam un.
Hong bawlsiate thupha pia un. Amaute hamsiat loin thupha pia zaw un.
A lungdamte lungdampih unla, a kapte kahpih un.
Khat leh khat na ngaihsutna uh kibangsak un. Kiphasak loin a dinmun uh a niam mite tawh kikhawl zaw un. Kipilsak kei un.
Thusia pen thusia mah tawh thukkik kei un. Mi khempeuh muhna ah thuman in gamtat ding ngaihsun un.
Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem un.

Kong itte aw, phu na kila kei unla, thangpaihna pen Pasian aa hi sak zaw un. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Phulakna in keima aa hi a, keimah in ka thukkik ding hi,” Topa in ci hi ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
Tua ahih manin, “Na galpa a gilkial leh an pia in. A dangtak leh dawn ding tui pia in. Tua bangin hih leteh a luzang ah mei‑am a koih na hi ding hi.”
Thusia kizosak kei inla, thusiate thupha tawh zo zaw in.
Kuama peuh in kumpi thuneite thu mang uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian piak loh in thuneihna om theilo ahih manin ukna thu a nei mite in Pasian koih ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin ukna thu a nialte in Pasian thu sehna a nial ahi uh hi. Tua banga a nial mite in thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi.

A hoih in a gamtate aa dingin gam ukte kihtak nading thu om lo hi. A hoihlo a gamtate aa dingin a kihtakhuai ahi hi. Hong uk mite kihtakna panin na suakta nuam hiam? Na suahtak nop leh gamtat hoih lecin amaute in nang hong pahtawi ding uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amah in nang hoih nadingin Pasian nasem ahi hi. Ahi zongin a hoihlo in na gamtat leh amah kihta in. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in namsau a mawk tawi hilo a, gamtat hoihlo mite tungah daanpia dingin Pasian nasem ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin ukna a nei mite a heh ding launa bek tawh hilo in lungsim a theihtawmna tawh ukna thu na man ding uh ahi hi.
Amaute in tua nasep a sem Pasian nasemte ahih manun phiangsiah zong na piak ding uh ahi hi.

Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh amaute ngah dinga kilawm bangin pia un. Siah ngah dinga kilawmte siah na pia unla, mangmu ngah dinga kilawmte mangmu na pia un. Kihtak dingte kihta unla, pahtawi dingte pahtawi un.
Khat le khat ki‑itna longal kuamah leii na kibasak kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh midang a itte in thukham a zui khin ahi hi.

“Angkawm kei in,” “Mi that kei in,” “Guta kei in,” “A maanlo teci pang kei in,” “Deihgawh kei in,” cih thupiakte a kipan a dang thupiak khempeuh, “Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,” cih thupiakna in a huam khin hi.
Ki‑itna in a vengpa siat nading bangmah a bawl kei hi. Tua ahih manin ki‑itna in thukham kicinna ahi hi.
Tuhun in bang hun hiam cih thei unla, ihmutna panin khanlawh hun mahmah ta ahihlam thei un. Banghang hiam cihleh i upcil lai sangin eite hotkhiatna tu in hong nai zawta hi.
Zan hun saupi bei khinzo a, khua hong vak dekta hi. Tua ahih manin khuamial gamtatnate paikhia in khuavak galvante silh ni.
Sun hun sunga om bangin a kilawm a kituak in gamta ni. Uangtatna, zunek zukhamna, hukna lanna, kitot kiselna le kihazatnate omsak kei ni.
Ahih hangin ci le sa lunggulhnate tangtungsak dingin bangmah lunggel kei unla, Topa Zeisu Khazih na silh un.
Upna thu ah a thanem mi na sang unla, upkhialh nading thute ah tua mi tawh na kikum kei un.
Mi pawlkhat in an khat peuhpeuh nek theih ding hi ci in um uh a, pawlkhatte in ahih leh upna thu ah thanem uh ahih manin gah le teh bek a ne uh hi.
A ne mi in a nelo mi neumuh kei henla, a nelo mi in a ne mi tungah thukhen kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a ne mi zong a sang veve hi.
Midang khat nasempa tungah thu a khen dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Amah a puk nading leh a kip nading ama topa tawh a kisai hi. A taktak in amah a kipsak theipa in Pasian ahih manin a kipsak ding hi.
Mi khatin ni khat sangin nidang khat thupi zaw hi ci in a ngaihsun hi. A dang khatin ni khempeuh a kibang hi ci in a ngaihsun hi. Mi khempeuh in ama lungsim ah limtak in theitel hen.

Ni a tang mi in Topa hangin a tang hi a, a tanglo mi in zong Topa hang mahin a tang lo ahi hi. A ne mi in Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahih manin Topa hangin a ne hi. A nelo mi in zong Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahih manin Topa hang mahin a ne kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite khat beek ei aa dingin a nungta i om kei a, ei aa dingin a si zong kuamah i om kei hi.
I nuntak leh Topa aa dingin a nungta i hi a, i sih leh zong Topa aa dingin a si i hi hi. Tua ahih manin i nungta a, i si zongin Topa aa mah i hi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in a si mite le a nungta mite Topa, a suah nadingin si a, thokik in a nungta hi.
Banghang in na sanggampa tungah thukhen na hi hiam? Ahih keileh banghang in na sanggampa neumuh na hi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh eite khempeuh Khazih thukhenna tokhom mai ah i ding ciat ding hi.
Lai Siangtho ah, “Keimah nungta ka hih manin Ka mai ah mi khempeuh khukdin ding uh a, Leii khempeuh in Pasian tungah Kiciamna a nei ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh in eima vaitek Pasian tungah i piaciat ding hi.
Tua ahih manin khat le khat thu kikhen nawn kei ni. Na sanggampa in a palkhak theih ding le amah a puksak thei ding lampi ah bangmah na koih loh nadingin na lungsim ah khentat zaw in.

Topa Zeisu sunga om mi khat ka hihna tawh kong gen in ah an khempeuh amau thu in a sianglo cih bang a om kei hi ci in ka tel mahmah hi. Ahi zongin mi khatin na khatpeuh a sianglo in a ngaihsut leh ama aa dingin a sianglo ahi hi.
Na annekna tawh na sanggam khat a lungsim na natsak leh itna tawh a gamta na hi nawn kei hi. Ama tangin Khazih in a sihlawh mi khat, na annekna tawh siasak kei in.
Tua ahih manin na hoihna a kigensiat ding phal kei in.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in nek le dawn thute hilo a, Kha Siangtho sunga dikna, lungmuanna le lungdamnate ahi hi.
Hih thute zui a Khazih na a sem mite in Pasian santak le mite in zong a thukimpih uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin kilem nading thute le khat le khat i kilamkip theih nading thute delh ni.
Nek le dawn thu tawh Pasian nasepna siasak kei ni. An khempeuh a siangtho hi. Ahi zongin mi khat puk nadingin an a ne mi in a khial ahi hi.
Na sanggam khat a puksak, a hehsak, a thanemsak ding ahih leh sa nekna, lenggahzu dawnna, a dang na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin na nek loh ding hoih hi.
Hih thute tawh kisai in na upna nangmah le Pasian kikal thu hi sak in. Amah in maan a sak thu hangin amah le amah a kimawhsaklo mi in mihampha ahi hi.
Ahih hangin lunghei neipi in a nek leh amah le amah a kikhialsak hi a, upna tawh a ne hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh upna tawh a hilo na khat peuhpeuh hihna in mawhna ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin a thahat eite in eima nopsak bangin om loin a thanem mite zawngkhalnate i puakpih ding ahi hi.
A kua maciat in i vengte hoih nading le a kilamkip nading uh semin amaute lungkimsak ni.
Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Nang hong zahko mite hong zahkonateng ka tungah hong tu hi,” ci in a kigelh mah bangin Khazih nangawn ama nopsak bangin a om kei hi.
A beisa huna kigelh thu khempeuh eite hong kithuhilh nadingin a kigelhkhol ahi hi. Hihin Lai Siangtho tungtawn a thuakzawhhatna le hehnepna tawh lametna i neih theih nading ahi hi.
Tu in thuakzawhhatna le hehnepna Pasian in Khazih Zeisu hangin khat le khat lungsim kituak dingin hong guan tahen.
Tua bangin lungsim khat, kampau khat tawh Topa Zeisu Khazih ii Pa, Pasian min hong phatsak thei tahen.
Tua ahih manin Pasian min a than theih nadingin Khazih in eite a hong san mah bangin note zong khat le khat na kisang un.
Tu in i pu i pate tunga a kamciamsate a kipsak dingin Pasian thumaanna hangin Zeisu Khazih in vunat mite nasempa a hong suahna thu a hong gen ka hi hi.

Hih in Gentile‑te in hehpihna hangin Pasian a phat theih nading uh ahi hi. Hih in Lai Siangtho sungah, “Hih thu hangin Gentile‑te lakah Na min ka pulak dinga, Na min phatin la ka sa ding hi,” ci a, a kigelhsa thu ahi hi.
Tua banah amah in, “No, Gentile‑te aw, Ama mite tawh lungdam khawm un!” a cikik hi.
Tua banah, “No, Gentile‑te khempeuh aw, Topa phat un! No, mi khempeuh aw, Ama min phat un!” a cikik hi.
Tua banah Isaiah in zong, “Jesse panin zung khat hong meng dinga, Gentile‑te a uk dingin Amah hong khangkhia ding hi. Gentile‑te in ama sungah lametna a nei ding uh hi,” a cikik hi.
Tu in, Kha Siangtho vangliatna hangin tua lametna tawh na kidim nadingun lametna Pasian in note upna tungtawn in kipahna le lungmuanna namkim tawh hong dim tahen.
Tu in ka sanggamte aw, note na hih uh leh, hoihna tawh kidim in thu theihna ah kicing in khat le khat thu a kihilh thei dingin kong muang hi.
Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, Pasian hong piak hehpihna hangin kong phawksak nop thu pawlkhat hangtak in kong gelh hi.

Gentile‑te aa dingin Zeisu Khazih nasempa khat ka suak a, Pasian lungdamna thu ka gen hi. Tua in Gentile‑te Kha Siangtho tawh kisiansuah a, Pasian mai ah a santak biakpiakna a suah theih nading uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian tawh kisai in Khazih Zeisu hangin ka kisialh theih nading thu khat ka nei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Gentile‑te in Pasian thu a man theih nadingun ka thugente le ka sepnate ah Khazih in kei tungtawn in a sepkhiat khit sate lobuang a dang bangmah ka genngam kei ding hi.

Amah in tua bangin Pasian Kha vangliatna tawh kei tungtawn in limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite tawh na a sem hi. Tua ahih manin Jerusalem khuapi a kipan Illyricum gam tengah zinin Khazih lungdamna thu cingtak in ka hilh khinzo hi.
Midangte phuhsa khuambul tungah ka lam khakloh nadingin Khazih min a kizak ngeinai lohna munte bekah lungdamna thu tangko ding ka tup ahi hi.
Hih tawh kisai Lai Siangtho sungah, “Ama thu a kihilh ngeinai lohna mite in mu ding uh a, Ama thu a za ngei nailo mite in theitel ding uh hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
Hih thu hangin note kianga kong pai ding tam veipi kikhaktan hi.
Ahi zongin tu in hih lamah ka seplohna mun a om nawnloh banah note kong muhnop zong kum tampi sawtzo ahih manin,
Spain gam ka zin peuhpeuh ciangin note kiang hong tawnin note tawh a kimu dingin ka kilamen hi. Note tawh tawmvei sung i omkhop khit ciangin note huhna tawh a zinsuak thei dingin zong ka kilamen hi.
Ahi zongin tu tadih in Jerusalem khuapi a om misiangthote kiangah nasem dingin ka paiphot ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Macedonia gam le Achaia gam mite in Jerusalem khuapi a om misiangthote laka mi cimawhte huhna piak ding a lungkim uh hi.

Macedonia gam le Achaia gam mite in amaute tungah leiba nei in kingaihsun uh a, a lungdam mahmah uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Gentile‑te in Judah mite in a ngah uh khalam thute sanpih uh ahih manin amaute in zong leitung thute tawh Judah mite a huhkik ding mah uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin hih huhnate amaute khut sungah bittak in ka ap khit ciangin note kiang hong tawnin Spain gamah ka pai ding hi.
Note kiang kong nawk ciangin Khazih lungdamna thupha a dimtak tawh kong tung ding hi cih ka thei hi.
Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, Topa Zeisu Khazih le Kha tungtawn a ki‑itna tawh kong thumnop in ah Pasian kiangah kei aa dingin thu hong ngetsak in hong panpih un.
Judea gama thu‑umlo mite khut sung ka tun loh nading le Jerusalem a misiangthote in ka nasepna a hong san theih nading ahi zongin
Pasian deihna a om leh note kiangah lungdamtak in hong pai in note tawh tha thak ka ngahkhop theih nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
Tu in kilemna Pasian in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
Cenchrea khua‑a pawlpi nasem i sanggamnu Phoebe mi hoih ahihlam kong theisak nuam hi.
Mi siangthote hih dinga kilawm bangin Topa hangin amah na sang unla, huh ding a kisapna peuhpeuh ah na huh un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mi tampi huh a, kei zong a hong huh hi.
Khazih Zeisu sunga ka naseppih Priscilla le Aquila‑te na hopihsak un.
Amaute in ka nuntakna a hut nadingun a ngawng uh a dawh ngamte ahi uh hi. Kei bek hilo in Gentile pawlpite khempeuh zong amau tungah a lungdam uh hi.
Tuamah bangin amau inn a kikhawm pawlpi mite zong na hopihsak un. Ka it mahmah Epaenetus na hopihsak un. Amah in Achaia gam sungah Khazih aa dingin a gah masa pen ahi hi.
Kote aa dingin nakpitak in na a sem Mary na hopihsak un.
Ka mipihte le ka thongkiatpihte ahi Andronicus le Junia‑te zong na hopihsak un. Amaute in sawltakte lakah a min kidawkte hi uh a, kei sangin zong Khazih sungah a om masa zawte ahi uh hi.
Topa sunga ka it Amplias na hopihsak un.
Khazih sunga kote naseppih Urbanus le ka it Stachys na hopihsak un.
Pasian in Khazih sunga a sittel le a san khitsa Apelles na hopihsak un. Aristobulus le a innkuanpih teng zong na hopihsak un.
Ka mipihpa Herodion na hopihsak un. Topa sunga om Narcissus le a innkuanpih teng zong na hopihsak un.
Topa nasep a hahkat Tryphena le Tryphosa na hopihsak un. Topa nasep a hahkat mahmah ka it Persis zong na hopihsak un.
Topa sunga teel khitsa Rufus le nu banga ka neih ama nu zong na hopihsak un.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes le amaute tawh a omkhawm sanggamte zong na hopihsak un.
Philologus, Julia, Nereus le a sanggamnu a kipan Olympas le amaute tawh a omkhawm misiangthote khempeuh na hopihsak un.
A siangtho kinapna tawh khat le khat na kihopih un. Khazih pawlpite in note a hong hopih uh hi.
Tu in sanggamte aw, na sansa uh thuhilhna tawh a kilehbulh thute hong hilh a, kikhenna le pukna a piangsak mite thei unla na pelh un, ci in kong hanthawn hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang mite in i Topa Zeisu Khazih na sem hilo uh a, amaute gilpi aa dingin nasemte ahi uh hi. Kamsiam le kamzol tawh lungsim hoih mite a khem uh hi.
Pasian thu na zuihna uh mun khempeuh ah thang ahih manin note hangin ka lungdam hi. Ahi zongin thu hoihte ah mipilte hi unla, thusiate ah mawhna bang loin na om ding uh kong deih hi.
Nopna hong pia Pasian in a sawtlo in Satan tuancil in note khenuai ah a koih ding hi. Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen. Amen.
Ka naseppih Timothy, ka mipih Lucius, Jason le Sosipater‑te in note hong hopih uh hi.
Hih laikhak a gelh keimah Tertius in, Topa sunga om note khempeuh kong hopih hi.
Ka zinpa le pawlpi buppi inntekpipa ahi Gaius in note a hong hopih hi. Khuapi sumkempa Erastus le i sanggampa khat mah ahi, Quartus‑te in zong note a hong hopih uh hi.
Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
Tu in, kong hilh lungdamna thu, Zeisu Khazih thu tangkona ahi lei piancil a kipan a ki‑iimcip thusim kilakkhiatna tawh kizui in, note a hong kipsak zopa in Pasian ahi hi.
Tu in tawntung Pasian thupiakna tawh kamsangte laigelhna tungtawn in minam khempeuh in upna tawh thu a man theih nadingun hih thu ki‑iimcip a hong kilang zo hi.
Amah khat bek a pil ahi tua Pasian in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in minthang tawntung tahen. Amen.
Pasian deihna banga Zeisu Khazih sawltak dinga hong kisam keimah Paul le i sanggampa Sosthenes in,

Khazih Zeisu sunga a kisiangthosak, misiangthote ci a, kisam Corinth khua‑a om Pasian pawlpi le mun khempeuh a om i Topa Zeisu Khazih min a belte kiangah lai kong khak uh hi. Tua Topa Zeisu Khazih in amaute le eite Topa ahi hi.
I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
Pasian hehpihna thupha note tungah Khazih Zeisu tungtawn in hong kipia zo ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah ka lungdam tawntung hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thugen siamna le thutheihna a kipan na khempeuh ah note hong kicingsak zo hi.
Tua in, Khazih thu teci ka panna uh note sungah a kikipsakna ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa Zeisu Khazih hong kilat ding lawptak a na ngak sungun kha letsong khat zong na tasam kei uh hi.
I Topa Zeisu Khazih ni ciangin kawkbanna na neih loh nadingun amah in a tawp dongin hong kipsak ding hi.
Ama Tapa, i Topa Zeisu Khazih tawh a kipawlkhawm dinga note hong sampa in a citak Pasian ahi hi.

Sanggamte aw, tu in i Topa Zeisu Khazih min a kong thumnop in ah note sungah pawl kikhenna a om loh nadingin na vekpi un kithu khatin thugen un. Lungsim kibang, ngaihsutna kibang in hoihtak in kipumkhat un.
Sanggamte aw, note lakah kilemlohna om hi ci in Chloe innkuanpihte in hong gen uh hi.

Tu in kong gen in ah, note lakah mi khat in, “Kei Paul pawl ka hi hi,” ci in, a dang khat in, “Kei Apollos pawl ka hi hi,” na ci uh hi. A dang khat in, “Kei Cephas pawl ka hi hi,” ci in, a dang khat in, “Kei Khazih pawl ka hi hi,” na ci uh hi.
Khazih kiphelkhap thei ahi hiam? Note aa dingin Paul kikhailum ahi hiam? Ahih keileh Paul min tawh tui kiphum na hi uh hiam?
Crispus le Gaius longal note lakah khat beek tui kong phum loh manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note lakah khatpeuh in, Paul min tawh tuiphumna ka ngah hi ci a, na gen khakloh nading uh ahi hi.
Hi hi, Stephanas‑te innkuan zong ka tuiphum a, tualo midang ka tuiphum lam ka thei kei hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in tuiphum dingin kei hong sawl lo a, lungdamna thu a tangko ding bekin hong sawl ahi hi. Khazih singlamteh vangliatna a mawkna a suah loh nadingin lungdamna thu ka tangko ciangin mihing pilna kammalte zangin ka gen kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh singlamteh thu in thu‑umlo mite aa dingin a haihuai thu ahi hi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite aa dingin Pasian vangliatna ahi hi.
Lai Siangtho sungah, “Mipilte pilna ka susia dinga, Miteite thutheihna bangmah lo ka suah ding hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Mipil koi ah om ahi hiam? Thukhamhilh sia koi ah om ahi hiam? Hih leitung ah thuthuk thei koi ah om ahi hiam? Pasian in hih leitung pilna teng haina suaksak khin hilo ahi hiam?

Leitung mite in amaute pilna tawh Pasian a thei zo kei uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in ama pilna tawh kizui in a haihuai thuhilhna tungtawn in a um mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding pen Pasian lungkimna ahi hi.
Judah mite in nalamdang kal uh a, Greek mite in pilna a zong uh hi.
Ahih hangin kote in a kikhailum Khazih thu ka hilh uh hi. Amah in Judah mite aa dingin kipalkhakna suak a, Greek mite aa dingin haina a suak hi.
Ahih hangin Judah mi ahi a, Greek mi ahi zongin Pasian in a sapsa mite aa dingin Khazih in Pasian vangliatna le Pasian pilna ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian haina in mihingte pil penna sangin pil zaw lai a, ama thanemna zong mihing hat penna sangin a hat zaw hi.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong saplai a na omzia uh na lungngai un. Mite muhna ah a pil, mite tunga thunei le mi thupi tampi na om kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin leitung a a haihuai nate a teel hi. Pasian in a thahatte a maizumsak nadingin a thanem leitung nate a teel hi.
Leitung in thupi a sakte a suksiat nadingin a kineumuh le a kisimmawh hih leitung nate Pasian in a teel hi.
Tua in, Pasian mai ah kuamah a kisialh theihloh nading ahi hi.
Ama hangin Khazih Zeisu sungah om na hih manun amah in eite aa dingin Pasian hong piak pilna, dikna, sianthona le tatkhiatna a hong suakzo hi.
Tua hi a, Lai Siangtho sungah, “A kisial mi in Topa hang bekin kisial tahen,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian teci panna thu tangko a note kiangah kong pailai in thugen siamna ahi a, pilna ahi zongin ka suang kei hi.
Note laka kong om sungin a kikhailum Zeisu Khazih longal thudang bangmah a thei lo dingin ka lungsim ka khentat a,
thanemna, launa le patauhna tawh ka om hi.
Ka thuhilh, ka thugennate ah zong mihing pilna tawh kuamah ka zol kei hi. Ahih hangin Kha le vangliatna a kilatkhiat nadingin ka gen hi.
Tua hi a, note upna in mihingte pilna ah kinga loin Pasian vangliatna ah a kingak theih nading ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a picingsa mite tungah thu ka gen uh ciangin pilna tawh ka gen uh hi. Tua nangawn zong a maimang ding tulai mite pilna le tulai makaite pilnate ahi kei hi.
Kote ka hih uh leh eite minthan nadinga Pasian in leitung pianma in a sehkholhsa, a ki‑iimcip Pasian pilna thuthukpi a gen ka hi uh hi.
Tulai makaite khat beekin tua pilna a thei kei uh hi. Thei uh hi leh minthang Topa a khailum kei ding uh hi.

Lai Siangtho sungah, “Pasian in amah a it mite aa dingin A bawlkholhsa nate in Mittang tawh kimu ngeilo, Bil tawh zong a kiza ngeilo, Mihingte lungsim sungah zong, A om ngeilote ahi hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in ama Kha tungtawn in tua nate eite hong lakzo hi. Kha in na khempeuh zongtel a, Pasian thu thukpite nangawn hong telsak hi.
Mi khat sunga om ama lungsim longal tua mi lungsim a thei kua om ahi hiam? Tuamah bangin Pasian Kha simloh Pasian lungsim a thei kua om ahi hiam?
Tu in Pasian in a khawnkhong a hong piakte i theih theih nadingin leitung kha a ngah i hi kei a, Pasian hong piak Kha a ngah i hi hi.
Hih thute ka gen uh ciangin mihing pilna tawh ka gen kei uh hi. Kha Siangtho in hong hilh bang bekin ka gen uh a, Khalam thute kha thu mah tawh ka hilhcian uh hi.
Ahi zongin leitung lungsim a nei mi in Pasian Kha thute haihuaisa ahih manin a sang kei hi. Tua thute kha bek tawh kikhentel thei ahih manin amah in a theitel zo kei hi.
Ahih hangin a khami pa in na khempeuh khentel thei a, amah ahih leh kuamah in a khentel thei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh, “kua in Topa lungsim thei a, kua in amah thuhilh thei ding ahi hiam?” Eite in Khazih lungsim i nei hi.
Sanggamte aw, kha mite tunga thugen bangin note tungah thu kong gen thei kei hi. Ahi zongin Khazih sungah naungek tawh a kibang, sa mite tunga thugen bangin kong gen hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note in sa mi na hih manun anham na ne zo nai kei uh a, nawizu tawh kong vak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tu ciangdong anham na hai zo nai kei uh a, tu nangawn in zong na ne zo kei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin note lakah kihazatna, kitot kiselna le kipawl khenna a om laiteng sa mite bangin a gamta hilo na hi uh hiam?
Note lakah mi khat in, “Paul pawl ka hi hi,” ci in, a dang khat in, “Apollos pawl ka hi hi,” na cih uh ciangin a sa mi lai hilo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Paul kua hi a, Apollos kua ahi hiam? Note in amaute tungtawn in na up theih nadingun Topa in mi khat ciat tunga a sehsak bangin nasemte hilo ahi uh hiam?
Keimah in ka suan a, Apollos in tui buakin Pasian in a khangsak hi.
Tua ahih manin a suanpa ahi a, tuibuakpa ahi zongin bangmah a thupi hilo in a khangsakpa ahi Pasian bek a thupi ahi hi.
Tu in a suanpa le tui a buakpa in pumkhat ahi uh hi. Mi khatpeuh in ama sepna tawh kizui in thaman a ngah ding hi.
Kote in Pasian tawh ma a pangkhawmte ka hi uh a, note in Pasian huan le Pasian inn na hi uh hi.

Pasian hong piak hehpihna thupha tawh kizui in innlam siampa bangin khuambul ka phut khinzo a, midangte in tua tungah a lam uh hi. Ahi zongin a lam mi peuhpeuh in bangci lam ahi hiam cih limtak in ngaihsun hen.
A kiphut khinsa khuambul ahi Zeisu Khazih longal khuambul dang kuamah in a phut thei kei hi.
Tu in mi khatpeuh in tua khuambul tungah kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, suangmanpha ahi a, sing ahi a, lopa ahi a, buhtu ahi zongin a lam leh,

amaute nasepna ciat hong kilangkhia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua Ni ciangin amaute nasepna ciat meikuang tawh kilangsak dinga, mi khat ciat nasepna bangci nam hiam cih meikuang tawh a kisittel ding hi.
Mi khatin tua khuambul tunga a lamsa a sepna a kattum kei leh sepna thaman a ngah ding hi.
Mi khat nasepna a kattum leh thaman tan dinga, amah ahih leh meikuang tawh kipelh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding hi.
Note in Pasian biakinnpi na hi uh a, note sungah Pasian Kha a teen lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Mi khatpeuh in Pasian biakinnpi a nitsak leh Pasian in tua mi a susia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian biakinnpi siangtho a, note in tua biakinnpi na hi uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh amah le amah kikhem kei hen. Hih leitung a om mi khatpeuh in note lakah pil a kisak leh, a piltakpi ahih theih nadingin mihai suakphot hen.
Leitung pilna in Pasian aa dingin haina ahi hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, “Pasian in mipilte amau zuausiamna mah tawh a man hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
Tua thamlo in, “Topa in mipilte ngaihsutna thei a, tuate a mawknapi ahihlam a thei hi,” ci in kigelh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kuamah in mihingte hangin kiphasak kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh note aa ahi hi.
Paul a kipan Apollos le Cephas‑te, leitung ahi a, nuntakna le sihna ahi a, tu laitak a om nate, a hong pianglai ding nate ahi zongin na khempeuh note aa ahi hi.
Note in Khazih aa na hi uh a, Khazih in Pasian aa ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin mite in kote Khazih nasemte le Pasian thusim a kemte bangin hong ngaihsun uh hen.
Tua hi a, neihsa kemte in mi muanhuai ahih ding uh kisam hi.
Note na hi uh a, leitung thukhente ahi zongin kei tungah thu na hong khen ding uh kei aa dingin thu neuno khat ahi hi. A taktak in cileng kei le kei nangawn thu ka kikhen kei hi.
Ka lungsim tawngah bangmah kisuanna ka thei kei hi. Ahi zongin tua in kei dik hong tangsak ahi kei hi. Kei tunga thu hong khenpa in Topa ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a hun a tunma in bangmah thu khen kei unla, Topa hong pai dong ngak un. Amah in khuamial sunga a kisel nate le mihingte lungsim sunga a tup a gelte uh a lakkhia ding hi. Tua hun ciangin mi khat ciatin Pasian kiang panin phatna a ngah ding uh hi.

Sanggamte aw, tu in note phattuam nadingin hih thute Apollos le keima tungah kibulh in hong genteh ka hi hi. Tua in a kigelh zah valkan in na ngaihsut loh nadingun ko tung panin na sin theih nading uh ahi hi. Tua hi leh mi khat hangin kisathei in midang khatpeuh na simmawh kha kei ding uh hi.
Midangte tawh hong kilamdangsak kua ahi hiam? Hong kipia lopi a na ngah uh bang om ahi hiam? Tu in hong pia a om man bekin na ngah uh hi napi banghang in a ngah lo bangin kisathei na hi uh hiam?

Tu in na deih khempeuh uh na nei khin uh a, na hau khin uh hi! Kote tawh loin kumpite bangin na maang khin uh hi. Kote zong note tawh ka maankhop theih nadingun note kumpi bangin a maang taktak na hih ding uh kong deihsak hi!

Pasian in ko sawltakte pen thah dinga thu kikhen khinsa mite lak panin a kithat nunung pen dingin a kikoihte tawh hong kibangsak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh vantungmite le mihingte in leitung ah pawi‑et banga hong et dingun hong kibawl zo hi ci in ka ngaihsun hi.
Kote in Khazih aa dingin mihai ka suah uh hangin note Khazih sungah mipil na suak uh hi! Kote ka thanem uh hangin note na thakhauh uh hi! Note hong kipahtawi hangin kote hong kisimmawh hi!
Tudong mahin gilkial dangtak in ka om uh a, puansilh gina zong ka nei kei uh hi. Mite vuak ka thuak uh a, teen nading inn takpi zong ka nei kei uh hi.
Komau khut tawh nakpi in na ka sem uh hi. A hong kizahko ciangin thupha ka pia uh a, a hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka thuak keikai uh hi.
A hong kigensiat ciangin kamkhum tawh ka thuk uh hi. Leitung nin bangin kote hong kibawl a, tuni ciangdong mun khempeuh pana kikhawm nin lompi bangin a hong kibawl hi.
Hih thute note maizum nadingin a hong gelh ka hi kei hi. Ka it ka tate banga thu hong hilh ka hi zaw hi.
Khazih thu hong hilh ding sia 10,000 bang na nei uh zongin pa tampi na nei kei uh hi. Lungdamna thu hangin Khazih Zeisu sungah note pa ka suakzo hi.
Tua ahih manin keima gamtat bangin gamta un ci in kong hanthawn hi.
Hih thu hangin Topa sunga a muanhuai ka it ka tapa Timothy kong paisak hi. Pawlpi omna mun khempeuh ah ka gen bangin Khazih sunga keima nuntakzia teng amah in a hong phawksakkik ding hi.
Tu in note kiangah kei hong pai lo ding sa in mi pawlkhat na kiphasak uh hi.
Topa in hong awi leh a sawtlo in kong pai dinga, tua a kiphasak mite thugente bek hilo in bang hihtheihna nei uh hiam cih zong ka theikhia ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kumpigam in a thu bek hilo in vangliatna hi zaw hi.
Ciangduai tawh kong pai ding le itna le lungnemna tawh kong pai ding koi ut zaw na hi uh hiam?
Note lakah numei pasal thangtatna om bekthamlo in Gentile‑te lak nangawn ah a kiza ngeilo a pa zi a teenpih mi bang na om tazen uh hi, ci in hong kigen hi.
Tua bang mawhna a bawl mipa khasiat pipi mahin note lak pan na hawlkhiat ding uh hi napi na kisialhpih zawsop uh hi.
Ka pumpi tawh note lakah kong om loh hangin ka kha tawh kong om veve hi. Tua ahih manin ka pumpi a hong om mah bangin mawhna a bawl tua pa tungah hih bangin thu ka khen hi.
I Topa Zeisu Khazih minin na kikhop uh ciangin i Topa Zeisu Khazih vangliatna le keima kha in note hong ompih hi.
Tua mipa pumpi a kisiat nadingin Satan khutah na pia un. Tua hi leh Topa Zeisu Ni ciangin a kha in hotkhiatna a ngah kha ding hi.
Na kisialhna uh a hoih kei hi. Silngo tawmno khatin annel lompi tawk thei hi cih thu thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Silngo sawhloh annel thak na hih manun silngo lui teng paikhia un. Banghang hiam cihleh eite Paisan Tuuno ahi Khazih in eite tangin a kigo zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siatna le gitlohna ahi silngo lui tawh Paisan Pawi bawl loin, silngo sawhloh anlum lungsim takpi le thutak tawh pawi bawl ni.
Numei pasal vai ah a thangtat mite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ci in lai kong khakzo hi.

Tua bang ka cih ciangin hih leitung a numei pasal thangtatte, a huaihamte, mi neihsa a sutte, milim a biate tawh kikhawl kei un kong cihna hilo hi. Tua bang hi leh leitung panin na paikhiat uh a kul ding hi.

Tu‑a kong gelh pen thu‑um mi khat kici napi numei pasal mawhna a bawl mi ahi a, a huaiham mi ahi a, milim a bia mi ahi a, midang a gensia mi ahi a, zukham mi ahi a, mi neihsa a sut mi tawh ahi zongin kikhawl kei unla, an nangawn nekhawm kei un a ci ka hi zaw hi.
Pawlpi pualam mite tunga thukhen ding pen kei tawh bang kisai ahi hiam? Pawlpi sunga mite tungah thu a khen ding note hilo na hi uh hiam?
A pualam mite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin “tua a gamtatsia mipa note lak panin hawlkhia un.”
Note khat le khat thu na kineih uh ciangin misiangthote mai ah kitun loin thumanlote zumah kitun ngam tazen na hi uh hiam?
Misiangthote in leitung mite tungah thukhen ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Leitung mite tunga thukhen dingte na hih uh leh thuneupente khen theilo zawzen na hi uh hiam?
Eite in vantungmite tungah thu a khen ding i hihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung nuntakna tawh kipawl thute i khen ding kilawm zawtham hilo ahi hiam?
Hih leitung nuntakna tawh kisai thute khen ding na neih uh ciangin pawlpi sunga a kineumuh tatate seh zawsop ding na hi uh hiam?
Na maizum nadingun hih banga kong cih ahi hi. Note lakah mipil om lo na hi uh hiam? A sanggamte kikal thu a khensak thei ding mipil khat beek om lo na hi uh hiam?
Tu in sanggam khat le khat thu kinei in thu‑umlo mite mai ah na kikhia tazen uh hi!
Tua banga khat le khat na kikhiatna uh zong guallelhna ahi khinzo hi. Banghang in a khial tang zaw loin supna thuak zaw mailo na hi uh hiam?
Na tua cih uh cih thadah sanggam khat le khat a hilopi in kibawl in na neihsa uh na kilaksak tazen uh hi!

Mi thumanlote in Pasian kumpigam luah theilo ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Mite khemsa in om kei un. Numei pasal mawhna a bawlte, milim a biate, angkawmte, pasal le pasal a mawhte, numei le numei a mawhte,
gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi a gensiate, mi neihsa a sutte in Pasian kumpigam a luah kei ding uh hi.
Nidang lai in note pawlkhat tua bang mi na hi uh a, ahi zongin tu in Pasian in hong sawpsiang in hong siansuah zo a, Topa Zeisu min le i Pasian Kha hangin dik hong tangsak zo hi.
Na khempeuh hih theih nading thu ka ngah hangin na khempeuh in phattuamna hong pia lo hi. Na khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tuate khatpeuh sila ka kisuaksak kei ding hi.

An in gilpi aa ding hi a, gilpi zong an aa ding ahih hangin Pasian in tuate a nihin a susia ding hi. Tu in pumpi in numei pasal thangtat nading hilo in Topa aa ding hi a, Topa zong pumpi aa ding ahi hi.
Pasian in misite lak panin Topa thokiksak zo a, eite zong ama vangliatna tawh hong thokiksak ding hi.
Note in Khazih pumpi nate na hih lam uh kithei lo na hi uh hiam? Khazih pumpi nate la in numei kizuakte pumpi tawh pumkhat suaksak ding ka hi hiam? Ka suaksak peuhmah kei ding hi!
Numei kizuak tawh a mawh mi in tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suah lam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, “Amaute gel pumkhat sakhat a suak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa tawh a kizom mi in Topa tawh lungsim khat a suakkhawm hi.
Numei pasal thangtatna na taisan un. Mi khatin a bawl a dang mawhna khempeuh ama pumpi pualam hi a, ahi zongin numei pasal thangtatna a bawl mi in ama pumpi tungah a mawh ahi hi.
Note pumpi in note sunga om Pasian hong piak Kha Siangtho teenna biakinnpi hi a, note aa ahih loh lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Note in man tawh a kilei khinsa na hih manun Pasian aa ahi na pumpi uh le na kha uh tawh Pasian min thangsak un.
Tu in nong laikhak uh tawh kisai thute kong gen ding hi. Pasal in zi a neih loh ding a hoihpen ahi hi.
Ahi zongin numei pasal thangtatna a pian loh nadingin pasal khatin zi khat bek nei henla, numei khatin zong pasal khat bek mah nei zaw hen.
Pasal in nupa hihna tawh a zi tungah a bawl ding bangin bawl henla, zi in zong a pasal tungah tuamah bangin bawl tahen.
Zi in ama pumpi a ut bangin a zat ding hilo in a pasal zat ding ahi hi. Tuamah bangin pasal in zong ama pumpi a ut bangin a zat ding hilo in a zi zat ding ahi hi.

Antanna le thungetna nei dingin hun tomkal sung kithukim a na kitan lohngal uh nupa omkhop ding na kinial kei un. Pumpi na ki‑uk zawh loh manun Satan in mawhna ah hong zol kha ding ahih manin lumkhawmkik un.
Ahi zongin hih thute thupiak hilo in keima hoihsak thu a hong gen ka hi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh keima om bangin om le uh ka deih pen hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in hihzawhna letsong a tuamciat hong piak hi a, khat le khat kibang lo hi.
Ahih hangin kiteenpih a nei nailote le meigongte tunga kong gen in ah keimah bangin om le uh cin note aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
Ahi zongin a pumpi uh a ki‑uk zawh kei ding uh leh kiteenpih nei uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi ki‑uk zolo in a om uh sangin kiteenpih a neih ding uh a hoih zaw hi.
Tu in, kiteenpih a nei khinsate tawh kisai in keima hong thupiak hilo Topa hong thupiakna in, zi in a pasal ciahsan kei hen.
A ciahsan leh zong pasal dang nei nawn kei hen. Ahih keileh a pasal tawh kilemkik hen. Pasal in zong a zi ma kei hen.
Ahih hangin Topa ahi lo, ken a dangte tunga kong gen in ah sanggampa khatin thu‑umlo zi a neiha, a zi in amah tawh teenkhop ding a ut nak leh ma kei hen.
Tuamah bangin numei khatin thu‑umlo pasal a neiha, a pasal in amah tawh teenkhop ding a ut nak leh ma kei hen.

Banghang hiam cihleh a zi hangin thu‑umlo a pasal siangtho a, a pasal hangin thu‑umlo a zi zong a siangtho veve hi. Tua bang hi kei leh na tate uh siangtholo dinga, ahi zongin tu in ahih leh amaute a siangtho uh hi.

Ahi zongin thu‑umlo pen a paikhiat nop leh paikhia hen. Hih thu hangin thu‑um sanggampa ahi a, sanggamnu ahi zongin, bangmah in a khih kei hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in eite a kilem dinga hong sap ahi hi.
Zi aw, na pasal na hot theih ding le na hot theihloh ding bang thei na hi hiam? Pasal aw, na zi na hot theih ding le na hot theihloh ding bang thei na hi hiam?
Ahih hangin Pasian in mi khat ciat tungah a hong piakna le Topa in a hong sapna bang ciatin gamta uh hen. Hih bangin pawlpi khempeuh in a zuih dingin hih thu ka pia hi.
Pasian in vunat mi ahih laitak a a sap ahih leh vunatloh mi suak kei hen. Vunatlo mi ahih laitak a a sap ahih leh vunat mi suak kei hen.
Vunatna le atlohna a thupi hilo in Pasian thupiakte zuihna bek a thupi ahi hi.
Pasian in a hong sap laitak a na om bangbang un omciat un.
Sila na hih laitak in Pasian in hong sam ahi hiam? Hih thu patauhna in nei kei in. Ahih hangin suahtakna na ngah theih leh na suahtakna zatsiam in.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat sila ahih laitak in Topa in a sap leh Topa aa dingin a suakta mi ahi hi. Tuamah bangin mi suakta ahih laitak a sapna a ngah mi in Khazih sila ahi hi.
Note in man tawh a kilei khinsa na hih manun mihingte silate suak kei un.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in hong sap laitak a na om bangbang un omsuak un.
Tu in kitenpih a neilote tawh kisai in Topa thupiakna ka ngah kei hi. Ahi zongin Topa hong hehpihna tawh mi muanhuai khat ka hihna tawh kizui in thukhenna kong pia hi.
Tua ahih manin tuhun haksatna hangin pasal in ama om bangbang in a omsuak ding hoih ka sazaw hi.
Zi nei khin na hih leh zi neilo a om ding sawm kei in. Zi nei nailo na hih leh zi zong kei in.

Ahi zongin zi na neih leh mawhna hilo a, nungak in zong pasal a neih leh mawhna ahi kei hi. Ahi zongin zi nei pasal neite in pumpi haksatna tampi thuak ding uh ahih manin tuate tawh na kipelh ding uh kong deihsak zaw hi.
Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, a hun tom ahih manin tu a kipan in zi neite in zi neilo bangin,
a kapte a kaplo bangin, a lungdamte a lungdamlo bangin, van a leite zong bangmah a neilo bangin om uh henla,
hih leitung nate a zang mi in zangkhial kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh hih leitung nate a beibeita ahi hi.
Ahi zongin lung hihmawhna a tamluat ding kong deihsak kei hi. Zi a neilo mi in Topa a lungdamsak nadingin Topa tawh kisai nate bek a buaipih hi.
Ahih hangin zi a nei mi in a zi lungdamsak nuam ahih manin leitung nate a buaipih hi.

Pasal a nei numei le nungak in a kilamdang hi. Pasal a neilo numei in ama pumpi le a lungsim siangthosak in Topa tawh kisai nate bek a buaipih hi. Ahih hangin pasal a nei numei in a pasal lungdamsak nuam ahih manin leitung nate a buaipih hi.
Hih thute note phattuam nadingin kong gen hi a, kong thangsiahna hilo hi. A hong lehkaih bangmah om loin Topa na nasep theih nadingun a hoih ding thu a hong gen ka hi hi.
Mi khatin a tanu nungakpi in a omsak ding khial kisa a, a teenpih nuam mi a om leh ama hoihsak bangin hih hen. Bangmah khialhna a om kei hi. Kiteengsak hen.
Ahi zongin lungsimkip nei a, kul salo in a hihnop bang a hih theih nading thu nei a, ama tanu limtak in kemzo ning ci in a lungsim sungah khentatna a nei mi in a hoih a gamta ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin, a ta nungak siangtho mi zi dingin a piakhiapa in thuhoih a bawl hi a, a teengsak lopa in thuhoih zaw a bawl ahi hi.

Numei khat a pasal a nuntak laiteng thukham in a pasal tawh a khihkhawm hi. Ahih hangin a pasal a sih leh ama hoihsak pasal dang khat tawh kiteenkik theih nading suahtakna a nei hi a, Topa sunga om mi bek tawh kiteeng hen.
Ahi zongin keima ngaihsutna ah a ngei bangin tua ci om leh lungdam zaw dingin ka um a, Pasian Kha ngaihsutna mah zong hi in ka um hi.
Tu in milim biakna a kipia nate tawh kisai thu kong gen ding hi. Eite khempeuh thu thei vive i hih lam ka thei hi. Thu theihna in kiphatsakna piangsak a, itna in hong kilamkipsak hi.
Na khatpeuh thei‑a a kingaihsun mi in a theih dinga kilawm zah a thei nailo ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in amah a it mite a thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin milim biakna a kipia nate tawh kisai kong gen in ah leitung ah milim bangmah hilo a, Pasian khat bek longal Pasian dang a om kei hi cih i thei hi.
Leitung vantung ah pasian a kicite om hi mah ta leh (pasian tam om in topa tampi om hi),

eite aa dingin Pa ahi Pasian khat bek a om hi. Ama sung panin na khempeuh piang a, eite in ama aa i hi hi. Topa Zeisu Khazih khat bek om a, na khempeuh ama piansak hi in ama tungtawn in eite a nungta i hi hi.

Ahih hangin mi khempeuh in tua thu a theikim kei uh hi. Mi pawlkhat in tudong in milim biakna a kipia na a nek uh ciangin milim phawk kawmsa in ne uh a, amaute lungsim kisuangsak ahih manin tua in amaute a ninsak hi.
Ahih hangin annek in Pasian maipha a hong ngahsak kei hi. I nek manin mi hoih zaw i hi kei a, i nek loh manin misia zaw zong i hi tuan kei hi.
Ahi zongin nangma suahtakna in a thanem mite palkhak a suah loh nadingin kidawm in.
Banghang hiam cihleh thu a thei nangmah in an ne dingin milim biakna inn ah na tut laitak in a thanem mi khatin hong mu leh kisuangsa pi mahin milim biakna a kipia nate ne ngamsak ding hilo ahi hiam?
Tua a thanem na sanggampa tangin Khazih si khinzo napi na thutheihna tawh amah kisiasak ding na hi hiam?
Tua bangin na sanggamte uh tungah mawhin a thanem amaute lungsim na liamsak uh ciangin Khazih tungah a mawh na hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin ka annek in ka sanggam khat puksak ahih leh amah ka puksak khakloh nadingin sa ka ne ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Sawltak khat hilo ka hi hiam? A suakta mi khat hilo ka hi hiam? I Topa Zeisu Khazih a mu khin hilo ka hi hiam? Note in Topa sunga ka nasepna gah hilo na hi uh hiam?
Midangte in sawltak in a hong sim kei uh zongin note aa dingin sawltak ka hi mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Topa sunga sawltak ka hihna ciaptehna in note na hi uh hi.
Kei hong dongtel mite kiang pan ka kihutna in hih bang ahi hi.
Annek tuidawn nading thuneihna neilo ka hi uh hiam?
Sawltak dangte, Topa sanggamte le Cephas‑te bangin thu‑um zi khat tonpih theih nading thu nei lo ka hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih keileh Barnabas le keimah in zong khut tawh na sem loin om theih nading thunei hilo ka hi uh hiam?
Kua in ama sum zangin galdo in kuan ahi hiam? Lenggah kung suan a, a gah a nelo kua om ahi hiam? Ahih keileh gankhawi in a nawi a nelo kua om ahi hiam?
Hih thute mihing muhna pan beka kong gen ahi hiam? Thukham in zong hih bangmah in gen hilo ahi hiam?
Moses thukham sungah, “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitak in a muuk hencipsak kei in,” ci in a kigelh hi. Pasian in hih thu ah bawngte a cih nopna ahi hiam?

Ahih keileh eite hong gennopna ahi hiam? A taktak in eite aa dingin a kigelh ahi hi. Lokhopa in lametna tawh lokho a, lametna tawh buh a cilpa in zong a lamet pen a ngah theih nadingin buh a cil ahi hi.
Note aa dingin khalam thu khaicite hong vawh khin ka hih manun note tung panin leitung nate ka ngah uh hangin lianlua ding ahi hiam?

Midangte in note tungah hih bang thuneihna nei uh ahih leh kote in nei zaw thamlo ding ka hi uh hiam? Ahih hangin Khazih lungdamna thu a khaktan ka suah loh nadingun ka thuneihna uh zang loin na khat peuhpeuh ka thuak tentan uh hi.
Biakinnpi sunga a siangtho nate tawh kisai in na a semte in tua nate mah ne uh a, biaknatau a nasemte in zong tua biaknatau tunga kipia nate mah a ne uh hi cih theilo na hi uh hiam?
Tuamah bangin lungdamna thu a tangkote in lungdamna thu mah kivakna in nei uh hen ci in Topa in thu hong pia zo hi.

Ahih hangin hih thuneihnate khat beek ka zang kei a, kei tungah hih bangin hong bawl un ci in zong lai kong khak ngei kei hi. Hih keima angtanna mi khatpeuh in a mawkna a suahsak sangin si leng kei aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna thu ka tangko ciangin kisialh nading bangmah ka nei kei hi. A hangin tua thu ka hilh loh a phamawh ahi hi. Hi takpi hi. Lungdamna thu ka hilh loh ciangin gimna ka thuak hi!
Hih nasep keima utthu tawh a sem ka hih leh thaman ka ngah ding hi. Ahi zongin keima ut lohpi a a sem ka hih leh kei tunga a hong kipia nasep a sem ka hi hi.
Tua ahih leh ka thaman bang ahi hiam? Lungdamna thu ka hilh ciangin tua lungdamna thu hanga ka thuneihna zangkhial loin Khazih lungdamna thu manngenlo a mite ka piak pen mah ka thaman hi pah hi.
Mi khatpeuh nasem ka hih loh hangin mi a tam theithei ka ngah zawh nadingin mi khempeuh nasem ka kisuaksak hi.
Judah mite ka ngah zawh nadingin Judah mite lakah Judah mi bangin ka om hi. Thukham nuai‑a om mite ka ngah theih nadingin thukham nuai‑a om mite lakah thukham nuai‑a om mi bangin ka om hi.
Thukham a neilo mite ka ngah theih nadingin thukham a neilo mite lakah thukham a neilo mi bangin, Pasian thukham a nial hilo in Khazih thukham nuai ah ka om hi.
A thanem mite ka ngah theih nadingin a thanem mite lakah a thanem mi bangin ka om hi. Mi pawlkhat lam khat peuhpeuh tawh ka hotkhiat theih khak leh ci in mi khempeuh tungah na khempeuh ka suak hi.
Tu in hi bang ka sepna in lungdamna thu hang hi a, tua lungdamna thupha note tawh ka ngahkhop theih nading ahi hi.
Tai kidem mite a vekpi un a tai uh hangin mi khat bekin pahtawina a ngah lam theilo na hi uh hiam? Note in zong pahtawina na ngah theih nadingun tai un.

Tai kidemna a a kihel khempeuh in a siathei lukhu a ngah nadingun na khempeuh ah amaute pumpi a ki‑uk uh hi. Tu in amaute in a siathei lukhu ngah nadingin tai uh a, eite i hih leh a siatheilo lukhu i ngah nadingin i pumpi a ki‑uk i hi hi.
Tua ahih manin ngimna kician neilopi a, a mawktai hilo in huih lak a mawktup zong ka hi kei hi.
Ahi hangin midangte tungah lungdamna thu ka hilh khit ciangin a san thamlo mi ka suah loh nadingin ka pumpi sekin thu ka mangsak hi.
Tua thamlo in sanggamte aw, ka pu ka pate khempeuh in meiipi nuai ah a vekpi un tuipi a kantanna uh ah,
amaute in tua meiipi le tuipi ah a vekpi un Moses sungah a kibaptize na uh,
a vekpi un a kibang kha an a nekna uh le
a vekpi un a kibang khalam tui a dawnnate uh na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi. Tua tui pen amaute a zui kha Suangpi pana a dawn uh hi a, tua Suangpi in Khazih ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a tam zawte tungah Pasian lungkim lo ahih manin gamlak ah amaute luanghawm a thehthang hi.
Tu in amaute in thusia a lunggulh bangun eite in i lunggulh loh nadingin hih thute pen eite etteh ding ahi hi.
Amaute pawlkhat bangin milim bia kei un. Lai Siangtho sungah, “A ne a dawn dingin amaute tusuk uh a, tua khit ciangin a phengtat dingin a dingto uh hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Amaute pawlkhat in numei pasal mawhna a bawl manun ni khat sungin 23,000 a si uh hi. Eite in tua mite bangin numei pasal mawhna bawl kei ni.
Amaute pawlkhat in Khazih a ze‑et bangun eite in ze‑et kei ni. Tua mawhna hangin gul in amaute tulum hi.
Amaute pawlkhat bangin phun kei ni. A phun manun a susia vantungmi in amaute a that hi.
Tu in hih thute in eite etteh dingin a piang hi a, hun nunung a om eite hong kihilhkholh nadingin a kigelh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin kip a kisa mi in a puk loh nadingin kidawm hen.

Mihing thuakngei ze‑etna a val note tungah a hong tung kei hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in a muanhuai ciampellopa ahih manin note thuak zawh ding zah val a hong kize‑et ding a phal kei hi. Tua bang ze‑etna na thuak uh ciangin zong na thuak zawh nadingun suahtak nading lampi a hong bawlsak ding hi.
Tua ahih manin kong itte aw, milim biakna nusia un.
Mipilte tunga thugen bangin kong gen ding hi. Ka thugen bang hiam cih nomau mahin na khentel un.
Eite in hehpihna i phatna thupha hai in Khazih sisan tawh i kizopna hilo ahi hiam? I balkhap anlum in Khazih pumpi tawh i kizopna hilo ahi hiam?
Eite khempeuh in anlum khat nekhawm i hih manin mi tampi i hih hangin anlum khat le pumpi khat i hi hi.
Ci le sa lamsang ah Israel mite ngaihsun dih un. Gangawh biakna sa a nete in tua biaknatau tawh kizom uh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih leh bang gen nuam ka hi hiam? Milim thupi hi a ci ka hi hiam? Ahih keileh milim a kipia biakpiakna thupi hi a ci ka hi hiam?
Ka hi kei hi. Gentile‑te biakpiakna pen Pasian a piak uh hilo in dawite a piak uh ahih manin dawite tawh na kikholh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Topa hai le dawite hai na dawnkhawm thei kei ding uh hi. Topa ankuang le dawite ankuang na sawkkhawm thei kei ding uh hi.
Topa a heh nadingin phin ding i hi hiam? Topa sangin thahat zaw i hi hiam?
Na khempeuh hihtheih nading thu ka ngah hangin na khempeuh in phattuamna a hong pia kei hi. Na khempeuh hihtheih nading thu ka ngah hangin na khempeuh in a hong kipsak kei hi.
Kuamah in ama phattuam nading zong loin midangte phatuam nading zong hen.
Sa zuakna muna kizuak sa khatpeuh dongtel loin lei unla ne un. Tua hi leh na lungsim uh kisuang lo ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh “leitung le a sunga om khempeuh Topa aa ahi hi.”
Thu‑umlo mi khatin an ne dingin a hong sap ciangin na pai nop leh na paithei hi. Ahi zongin na mai‑a hong kilui khempeuh dongtel loin ne in. Tua hi leh na lungsim kisuang lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin mi khatpeuh in, “Hih in milim biakna a kipia khinsa ahi hi,” hong cih leh tua pa na khualna le lungsim kisuanna a om loh nadingin ne kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh “leitung le a sunga om khempeuh Topa aa ahi hi.”

Lungsim kisuanna, ka cih ciangin nang lungsim a gen hilo in tua bang hong ci mipa lungsim a gen ka hi zaw hi. Midang khat lungsim kisuanna ka khualna in banghang in kei suahtakna tungah thu hong khen ding ahi hiam?
Lungdam ko a, ka nek ciangin lungdam ka kohna tua an hangin banghang in hong kimawhsak ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin nekna dawnna a kipan na khat peuhpeuh na hih uh ciangin Pasian minthan nadingin na hih un.
Judah mite hi ta leh, Greek mite hi ta leh, Pasian pawlpi hi ta leh kuamah puksak kha kei un.
Mite in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun keima phattuam nading zong loin mi tampite phattuam nading ka zonga, na khempeuh ah mi khempeuh ka lungdamsak hi.
Khazih ka etteh bangin note in zong kei hong etteh un.
Tu in sanggamte aw, na khempeuh ah kei hong phawkin kong hilh thute zui na hih manun kong pakta hi.
Ahi zongin pasal khempeuh lutang in Khazih hi a, numei lutang in pasal hi in Khazih lutang in Pasian ahi hi cih thute kong theisak nuam hi.
Pasal peuhmah in thu a nget laitak ahi a, kamsang a thu a hilh laitak ahi zongin a lu a khuh leh a lutang a selpho ahi hi.
Numei peuhmah in thu a nget laitak ahi a, kamsang a thu a hilh laitak ahi zongin a lu a khuh kei leh a lutang a selpho hi a, a sam mettol mah bangin a zumhuai hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh numei in a lu a khuhnop kei leh a sam met hen. Sam met ding ahi a, mettol ding ahi zongin zumhuai a sak leh a lu khuh hen.
Pasal in Pasian lim le a minthanna ahih manin a lu a khuh hetloh ding ahi hi. Ahi zongin numei ahih leh pasal minthanna ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh numei panin pasal piang hilo in pasal panin numei a piang ahi hi.
Numei aa dingin pasal kipiangsak hilo in pasal aa dingin numei a kipiangsak ahi hi.
Hih thu hang le vantungmite hangin numei in ukna nuai ah a om ahihna a lak lim khat peuhmah a lu tungah a khuk ding ahi hi.
Ahi zongin Topa sungah numei loin pasal kia tangdin theilo a, pasal loin numei kia zong tangdin thei tuanlo hi.
Pasal pana numei piang ahih mah bangin pasal zong numei sung pan a piang ahi hi. Ahih hangin na khempeuh Pasian pan a piang ahi hi.
Numei in a lu khuhlosa in Pasian kiangah thu a nget ding kilawm hiam, kilawmlo hiam nomau mah in khentel un.
Pasal in a sam a sausak leh zumhuai hi cih thu leitung ngeina nangawn in hong hilh hilo ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin numei in a sam a sausak leh ama minthanna hi a, ama kikhuh nadinga Pasian in a piak ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mi khatpeuh in hih thu a nialnop leh kote ka hi uh a Pasian pawlpite ahi zongin tua simloh ngeina dang kinei lo hi.
Na kikhop uh ciangin na hoih zawk nading uh hilo in na siatzawk nading uh suaksak na hih manun hih thu ah note kong pakta kei hi. Tua ahih manin tu in hih thute kong pia hi.
A thu masapen in pawlpi bangin na kikhop uh ciangin na kituambawlna thu uh ka za a, maan kha thei dingin zong ka um hi.
Note lak pan Pasian san mite kua hiam cih a kilat nadingin kithutuah lohna zong a omthei ding mah ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin munkhat ah na kikhop uh ciangin Topa Nitak An nekna na suaksak nawn kei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh na nek uh ciangin kingak cih om loin nomau an ciat na ne masa uh a, a gilvah zolo tawh a khamlua tawh na om uh hi.

A bangci na hi uh hiam! Annek tuidawn nading inn neilo na hi uh hiam? Ahih keileh Pasian pawlpi simmawh in bangmah a neilote a maizumsak nuam na hi uh hiam? Bang hong gen ding ka hi hiam? Hih thu ah kong pakta ding hiam? Kong pakta kei hi.
Note tunga kong piak thu pen Topa tung pana ka ngah ahi hi. Amah a kilehhek ni nitak in Topa Zeisu in anlum la in,
lungdamna a koh khit ciangin balkham a, “La unla, ne un. Hih in note aa dingin a kibalkham ka pumpi ahi hi. Kei nong phawk nadingun hih bangin na bawl un,” a ci hi.
A nek khit uh ciangin tuamah bangin hai zong la a, “Hih hai in ka sisan a thuciamna thak ahi hi. Na dawn sim un kei nong phawk nadingun hih bangin na bawl un,” a ci hi.
Hih anlum ne in, hih hai na dawn sim un, Topa hong pai mateng Topa sihna thu a tangko na hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh in a kilawm lopi in hih anlum ne a, hih hai a dawn leh tua mi in Topa pumpi le ama sisan tungah a mawh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin mi khatin amah le amah a kisittel khit ciangin anlum ne in hai panin dawn tahen.
A kilawmlopi in a ne a dawn mi in Topa pumpi a theitel lo ahih manin ama tungah thukhenna a tun nadingin a ne a dawn ahi hi.
Hih thu hangin note lakah a thanem le a cina tampi na om uh a, a ihmu zong tampi na om khin uh hi.
Ahih hangin eimah le eimah i kisittel leh Pasian in thu hong khen lo ding hi.
Topa in thu hong khen leh zong leitung mite banga mawhsakna i thuak loh nading a hong thuhilhna ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, an ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin khat le khat na kingak un.
A gilkialte in ama inn ah an ne hen. Tua hi leh na kikhopna hangun thukhenna na thuak nawn kei ding uh hi. Kong pai ciangin thu dangdangte kong hilhcian ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, Khalam letsongte tawh kisai in awlmawhlo in na om ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Gentile‑te na hihlai un a pau theilo milimte kiang hong kitun in lam hong kipialsak ahihna na thei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian Kha tawh thugen mi peuhmah in Zeisu samsiat in om hen ci ngeilo a, Kha Siangtho tawh loin kuamah in Zeisu in Topa ahi hi, ci theilo hi cih thu kong theisak hi.
Letsong a tuamtuam a om hangin, Kha khat bek ahi hi.
Nasepna a tuamtuam a om hangin Topa khat bek ahi hi.
Sepna bawlna a tuamtuam a om hangin mi khempeuh sungah na khempeuh a sem Pasian khat bek ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mikim i kiphat tuampih theih nadingin Kha kilatkhiatna hong kipia ciat hi.
Pasian in Kha tungtawn in mi khat tungah ciimna pia a, tua Kha tungtawn mahin a dang khat tungah thutheihna a pia hi.
Tua Kha tungtawn mahin a dang khat tungah upna pia a, tua Kha tungtawn mahin a dang khat tungah cina damsak theihna letsong a pia hi.

A dang khat tungah nalamdang bawl theihna pia a, a dang khat tungah kamsang in thuhilh theihna a pia hi. A dang khat tungah khate khentel theihna a pia hi. A dang khat tungah pau nam tuamtuam pau theihna pia a, a dang khat tungah pau nam tuamtuamte a khiatna gentheihna a pia hi.
