Hihte khempeuh Kha khat bekin sem a, ama deihna bangin mi khat ciat aa dingin a hawmsak hi.
Pumpi khat bek ahih hangin pumpi tung nate tampi a om hi. Tua pumpi tung nate tampi ahih uh hangin a vekpi un pumpi khat ahih bangin Khazih zong tuamah bang ahi hi.

Eite khempeuh in Judah mi i hi a, Greek mi i hi zongin, sila i hi a, a suakta mi i hi zongin i vekpi in pumpi khat sungah Kha khat bek tawh phumna i ngah hi. Kha khat sung panin hong kidawnkhawmsak hi.
Pumpi in pumpi tung nate khat bek nei loin tampi a nei hi.
Khe in, “Khut hilo ka hih manin, pumpi tawh ka kisai kei hi,” ci leh a kisai lo takpi ahi ding hiam?
Bil in, “Mittang hilo ka hih manin pumpi tawh ka kisai kei hi,” ci leh a kisai lo takpi ahi ding hiam?
Pumpi buppi mittang hi khin leh bangci bangin khuaza thei dinga, pumpi buppi bil hi khin leh bangci bangin a gimnam zathei ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin pumpi tung nate amau munciat ah a koih hi.
Tuate khempeuh pumpi tung na khat bek hi khin leh pumpi omthei ding ahi hiam?
Tu in ahih leh pumpi tung nate tampi a om hangin pumpi khat bek a om hi.
Mittang in khut kiangah, “Kei aa dingin nang na kisam kei hi,” ci theilo hi. Lutang in zong khe kiangah, “Kei aa dingin nang na kisam kei hi,” ci theilo hi.
Tua bangci theilo bekthamlo in a thanem zaw tawh a kibang pumpi nate a kisam zawteng ahi uh hi.
A thupi suahlo i pumpi nate pawlkhat i limkep pente hi zaw hi. Zumhuai i sakteng mah a kilawm zaw thamteng ahi uh hi.
Kilawm i sakzawk i pumpi nate, limbawl tuam a kisam loteng na hi zaw uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in hoihtak in pumpi lemkhawm a, a ginalo nate a pahtawihuai zaw in a koih hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi sungah kikhenna om loin pumpi tung nate khat le khat a kikeptuah ciat theih nading uh ahi hi.
Pumpi tung nate khatin gimna a thuak leh a dangteng in zong thuakpih uh a, khatin pahtawina a ngah leh a vekpi un a lungdamkhawm uh hi.
Tu in note in Khazih pumpi na hi uh a, mi khat ciatin pumpi tung nate na hi ciat uh hi.

Pasian in pawlpi sungah a masapen in sawltakte, a nihna ah kamsang a thu a hilhte, a thumna ah siate a koih hi. Tua khit ciangin nalamdang a bawltheite le cina damsak theihna letsong a ngahte, tua khit ciangin midang a huh theite, a uk theite le pau nam tuamtuam a pau theite a koih hi.
Tuate a vekpi un sawltakpite hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un kamsang a thuhilhte hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un siate hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un nalamdang a bawltheite hi khin uh ahi hiam?
A vekpi un cina damsak theihna letsong a ngahte hi khin uh ahi hiam? A vekpi un pau nam tuamtuam a paute, a vekpi un pau nam tuamtuamte a khiatna a gentheite hi khin uh ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin a hoih penpen letsongte mah na deih zaw un. A hoih zawlai thukhat kong gen ding hi.
Mihingte pau le vantungmite pau tawh ka pauthei phial zongin, itna ka neih kei leh dakging le daltuah ging tawh a kibanglel ka hi ding hi.
Kamsang in thuhilh theihna letsong nei a, thuthuk khempeuh le na khempeuh thei in mualte kinsak zawh nading upna ka nei zongin itna ka neih kei leh a mawkna ka hi veve ding hi.
Ka neihsa khempeuh mizawngte nek dingin pia in ka pumpi zong mei‑a khultum dingin ka pia zongin itna ka neih kei leh kei aa dingin phattuamna a om tuan kei hi.
Itna in lungduai in a migi hi. Itna in kuamah a haza kei hi. Itna in kisial loin a kiphasak kei hi.
A kilawmlo in a gamta kei hi. Ama angsung ding bek a khual kei hi. A hehbaih kei hi. Midangte siatna a ciamteh kei hi.
Thumanlote lungdampih loin thuman thutak ah a lungdam hi.
Na khempeuh a hu hi. Na khempeuh a um hi. Na khempeuh a lamen hi. Na khempeuh a thuakzo hi.
Itna a kip tawntung hi. Ahi zongin, kamsang a thuhilhnate kibeisak dinga, paunam tuamtuam pau theihnate a bei hun om ding hi. Thu theihna a om leh zong beimang ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh i thu theihna kimkhat bek hi a, kamsang in thu i hilhna zong kimkhat bek mah ahi hi.
Ahi zongin kicinna hong tun ciangin a kicinglo khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.
Naupang ka hihlai in naupang bangin ka pau hi. Naupang bangin thu ka thei a, naupang bangin thu ka ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin ka picin ciangin naupang vai khempeuh ka paikhia hi.

Tu laitak in limlang tawh ki‑et bangin ahi milmial bekin i mu hi. Ahi zongin tunung ciangin kimaituah in i mu ding hi. Tu laitak in kimkhat bek ka thei a, tunung ciangin Pasian in kei hong theih bangin a kicing in amah ka thei ding hi.
Tu laitak in upna, lametna le itna, hihteng thum om a, tuateng lakah itna a thupipen ahi hi.
Itna neih ding na hanciam un. Kha letsongte na lunggulh unla, kamsang in thugen theihna na lunggulh deuh un.
Banghang hiam cihleh paunam tuamtuam tawh a pau mi in mihingte tunga thugen hilo in Pasian tunga thugen ahi hi. Kuamah in a thugen theilo a, kha tawh thuthuk a gen ahi hi.
Ahih hangin kamsang in thu a hilh mi in kilamkip nading thute hansuah nading thute le thapiak nading thute mite tungah a gen hi.
Paunam tuamtuam tawh a pau mi in amah le amah a kikipsak hi a, ahi zongin kamsang a thuhilh mi in pawlpi a kipsak hi.

Na vekpi un paunam tuamtuam in na pau ding uh ka deih hangin kamsang a thu na hilh ding uh ka deih zawlai hi. Banghang hiam cihleh paunam tuamtuam tawh thu a gen mi in pawlpi a kilamkip theih nadingin a khiatna a gen kei leh amah sangin kamsang a thu a hilhpa a thupi zaw hi.

Tu in sanggamte aw, note kiangah hong pai in kilakna thu tawh ahi zongin thu theihna tawh ahi zongin kamsang a thuhilhna tawh ahi zongin hilhcianna tawh ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh tawh hong gen loin paunam tuamtuam khatpeuh tawh hong genleng, note aa dingin bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?
Nuntakna a neilo nate ahi tamngai le gawsemte nangawn a aw maantak in ging kei leh bang aw kitum hiam cih kua in theithei ding ahi hiam?
Pengkul zong a aw mantak in ging kei leh galsim dingin kua kithawi thei ding ahi hiam?
Tuamah bangin a kitheitel kampau tawh thu gen kei le uh cin kua in na thugen uh theithei ding ahi hiam? Tua in huih lakah a pau tawh na kibang ding uh hi.
Leitung ah kampau nam tampi om a, khiatna a neiciat uh hi.
Mi khat thugen a khiatna ka mat theih kei leh tua pa aa dingin minam dang ka suak a, amah zong kei aa dingin minam dang mah a suak lel hi.
Note zong tuamah bang na hi uh hi. Kha letsongte deih mahmah na hih manun pawlpi kilamkip nading letsongte tampi na neih nadingun hanciam un.
Tua ahih manin paunam tuamtuam tawh a gen mi in a khiatna a gen theih nadingin ngen hen.
Banghang hiam cihleh paunam tuamtuam tawh thu ka nget leh ka kha in thu a nget hangin ka theihtelna a khang tuan kei hi.
Tua ahih leh bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Kha tawh thu ka ngen dinga, ka theihtelna tawh zong ka ngen ding hi. Kha tawh la ka sa dinga, ka theihtelna tawh zong ka sa ding hi.
Tua ahih keileh kha tawh Pasian na phat laitak in tua inn sunga hong om, bangmah a theilo mi khatin na thugente thei kei leh bangci bangin, “Amen,” ci thei ding ahi hiam?
Lungdamna na limkoh mahmah hangin midangte aa dingin kipna a piang kei hi.
Note khempeuh sangin paunam tuamtuam tawh ka pau theih zawk manin ka Pasian tungah ka lung a dam hi.
Ahi zongin pawlpi sungah paunam tuamtuam tawh kammal 10,000 ka gen sangin midangte zong thu ka hilhcian theih nadingin a kitheitel sinsen kammal nga tawh thu ka gen nuamzaw hi.
Sanggamte aw, thu theihna lamah naupangte bang loin a khang khinsa mite bang unla, gitlohna lamah naungekte bang un.
Thukham laibu sungah, “Gamdang mite kam le muk zangin Hih mite tungah thu ka gen ding hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Ka thugente a ngai tuan kei ding uh hi,” Topa in ci hi, ci in a kigelh hi.

Tua ahih manin paunam tuamtuam in theihsakna lim hi a, thu‑um mite aa ding hilo in thu‑umlo mite aa ding ahi hi. Kamsang a thuhilhna ahih leh thu‑um mite aa ding hi a, thu‑umlo mite aa ding ahi kei hi.

Tua ahih manin mun khatah pawlpi buppi in na kikhop uh ciangin paunam tuamtuam tawh pautek le uh cin bangmah a theilo mite ahi zongin, thu‑umlo mite ahi zongin hong pai leh, mihaihon hi hong ci ding uh hilo ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin na vekpi un kamsanna tawh thu na hilh laitak un, a umlo mi khat ahi zongin bangmah a theilo mi khat ahi zongin hong lut leh tua pa a mawhna teng kiphawksak in thu a khen na hi ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a lungsim sunga a selsim khempeuh hong kipholak ding hi. Amah boksuk in Pasian bia dinga, note lakah Pasian om taktak hi ci in hong pulak ding hi.

Tua ahih leh sanggamte aw, a koici bang ding ahi hiam? Na kikhop uh ciangin mi khatin phatna lasakna, a dang khatin thu hilhna, a dang khatin paunam tuamtuam a pauna, a dang khatin Pasian kiang pana kilakna, a dang khatin a khiatna gen theihna na ngah ciat uh hi. Tuate khempeuh kilamkipna a pian nadingin na zang un.
Paunam tuamtuam tawh thu a kigen leh nih bang a tampen in thum ciangin gen hen. Khat khit khat a banban in gen uh henla, khatin a khiatna gen hen.
Ahih hangin a khiatna gen ding a om kei leh pawlpi kikhopna ah paunam tuamtuam tawh a pau ding pa pau loin om henla, ama thu in Pasian tawh kiho hen.
Kamsang a thuhilhte nih ahih keileh thum in thugen uh henla, a dangteng in saikak uh hen.
Ahi zongin a kianga a tu midang khat tungah na khat peuhpeuh a hong kilah leh a gen masapa khawlphot hen.
Mi khempeuh in thu kihilhcian a tha a ngahkim theih nadingun na vekpi un a banban in kamsang in thu na hilh ciat thei uh hi.
Kamsangte lungsim kamsangte ukna nuai ah a om hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh misiangthote pawlpi khempeuh ah a kimuh mah bangin Pasian in buaina a piangsak Pasian hilo in kilemna a piangsak Pasian ahi hi.
Pawlpi sungah na numeite uh pau loin om uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in thu a hilh ding uh kiphal lo hi. Ahi zongin thukham in a gen mah bangin amaute in thumang uh hen.
Tua hi a, a theihnop uh a om leh inn ah a pasal ciat uh dong uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh numeite in pawlpi sungah thu a hilh ding uh zumhuai hi.
Pasian thu note kiang pana hong kipankhia ahi hiam? Ahih keileh note tung bekah hong tung ahi hiam?
Kamsang a kingaihsun mi khat ahi a, khami a a kingaihsun mi khat ahi zongin hih kong gelh thute Topa hong thupiakte ahihna thei tahen.
Ahi zongin hih ka thugente a thudon lo a om leh amah zong kithudon kei tahen.
Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kamsang a thuhilh theih ding deih mahmah unla, paunam tuamtuam tawh thu gen ding zong na kham kei un.
Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituak in hih un.
Tua bekthamlo in sanggamte aw, note kianga kong hilhsa lungdamna thu kong phawkkiksak nuam hi. Tua lungdamna thu in na san khitsa uh le na dinkipna uh ahi hi.
Kong hilh tua lungdamna thu lenkip na hih manun hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Tua hi kei leh na upna uh a mawkna suak ding hi.
A masa pen in ka ngahsa lungdamna thu note tungah kong gensawn hi. Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin Khazih in eite mawhna hangin sihna thuak in,
amah kivui a, Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin a ni thum ni in a thokik hi.
Tua ciangin Cephas kiangah kilang a, tua khit ciangin sawm le nihte kiangah a kilang hi.
Tua nung ciangin sanggam 500 valte kiangah khatvei va kilang a, amaute a tam zaw a nungta lai uh hi. Pawlkhatte ahih leh a ihmu khinzo uh hi.
Tua nung ciangin James kiangah kilang a, tua khit ciangin sawltak khempeuh kiangah a kilang hi.
Tua khit ciangin a nunung pen in a hun cing lopi in a suak naungek tawh a kibang keima kiangah a hong kilang hi.
Sawltakpite lakah a neupen ka hi a, Pasian pawlpi a bawlsiapa ka hih manin sawltak cih dinga kilawm zong ka hi kei hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian hong hehpihna thupha hangin ka hihna bangbang in ka hi a, kei tunga ama hehpihna thupha a mawkna a suak kei hi. Tua thamlo in sawltak dang khempeuh sangin na ka nak sep zaw hi. Ahi zongin a sem taktak kei hilo in kei hong ompih Pasian hehpihna thupha in a sem ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin kei ka hi a, amaute ahi zongun note tungah hih thu mah kong hilh uh a, note in zong tua mah bangin na um uh hi.
Tu in, misite lak pan Khazih thokik zo hi ci a, kong hilh khitsa uh hi napi banghang in note pawlkhat in misite thokik lo ding hi ci na hi uh hiam?
Misite thokik lo ding hi leh Khazih zong a thokik lo hi ding hi.
Khazih thokik lo hi leh kote thugen a mawkna hi dinga, note upna zong a mawkna mah ahi ding hi.
Hi hi, Pasian in Khazih thokiksak zo hi cih thu kote in teci ka pang uh hi. Misite thokik loin Khazih zong Pasian in thokiksak lo hileh, Pasian teci zuaute ka hi ding uh hi.
Misite thokik lo hi leh Khazih zong a thokik lo ahi ding hi.
Khazih thokik lo hi leh na upna uh a mawkna hi dinga, na mawhnate uh sunga omlai na hi ding uh hi!
Khazih sunga a ihmu khinsa mite zong a mangthang uh hi ding hi.
Hih leitung nuntakna aa ding bekin Khazih sungah lametna a nei i hih leh mi khempeuh lakah a hehpihhuai pente i hi hi.
Tu in ahih leh, misite lak panin Khazih thokik khinzo a, a ihmu khinsa mite lakah gah masa a suakzo hi.
Mi khat hanga sihna hong tun mah bangin misite thawhkikna zong mi khat hang mahin a hong tung ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Adam sungah mi khempeuh a sih bangin Khazih sungah mi khempeuh a kinungtasak ding hi.
Ahih hangin mi khempeuh in amaute hun ciat a zui ding uh hi. Khazih in gah masa hi a, Khazih hong pai ciangin Khazih mite a thokik ding uh hi.
Amah in ukna, thuneihna le vangliatna khempeuh a suksiat khit ciangin Pa Pasian tungah kumpigam ap dinga, tua khit ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a galte khempeuh ama khenuai ah a koih khit mateng a uk ding hi.
A nunung pen in a suksiat ding galin sihna ahi hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh, “Pasian in na khempeuh ama khenuai ah a koih hi.” Ahih hangin, “Na khempeuh ama khenuai ah a koih hi,” a cihna ah na khempeuh Khazih nuai‑a a koihpa Pasian kihel kha lo hi cih thu a kilang hi.
Tu in Pasian in na khempeuh ah a lianpen ahihna a kilat nadingin Tapa nuai ah na khempeuh a koih ciangin Tapa in zong na khempeuh ama nuai ah a koihpa ukna a mang ding hi.
Tua ahih manin misite thokik lo ding hi leh misite aa dinga kituiphumna in bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Banghang in misite aa dingin mite kituiphum ding uh ahi hiam?
Banghang in kote in zong tatsat loin lauhuaina thuakden nuam ding ka hi uh hiam?
I Topa Khazih Zeisu sungah note hong kisialhpih a ka gen in ah nisim in sihna ka thuak hi.

Misite a thokik lo ding hi in, mihing ngeina lel tawh Ephesus khua‑a gamsate tawh a kido hi leng, bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Misite thokik lo ding hileh, “Zingciang maha a si ding i hih teh ne in dawn ni!” i cih lel ding ahi hi.
Mite khemsa in om kei un. “Kholhpih hoihlo in gamtat hoih a susia hi.”
Thuman thutak ah khanglo unla, mawhna bawl nawn kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh note pawlkhat in Pasian na thei kei uh hi. Hih thu in note maizum nadinga kong gen ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mi pawlkhat in, “Misite koici bangin hong thokik ding uh a, bangci bang pumpi tawh hong tho ding uh ahi hiam?” na ci kha ding uh hi.
Mihaipa aw, na tuh khaici muat masa loin a po thei kei ding hi.
Khaici na tuh uh ciangin a hong po dingin a kung na tuh kei uh a, mangbuh tang ahi a, khaici dang khatpeuh ahi zongin a tang bek na tuh uh hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin khaici khempeuh sungah a kung ding a guan hi.
Sa nam khempeuh a kibang kei hi. Mihingte sa nam khat, innsate sa a tuamkhat, ngasate sa a tuamkhat, vasate sa a tuamkhat ahi hi.
Vantung pumpi a om mah bangin leitung pumpi zong a om hi. Ahih hangin vantung nate thupina nam khat hi a, leitung nate thupina a tuamkhat ahi hi.
Ni in thupina nam khat, kha in thupina a tuamkhat le aksite in zong thupina a tuamkhat a neiciat uh hi. Aksi khat le khat zong a thupina uh a kilamdang lai hi.
Misite thawhkikna zong tuamah bang ahi hi. A kituh pumpi a muatthei hi a, a muat theilo in kithosak hi.
Vang nei loin kituh a, vangliatna tawh kithosak hi. Thanemna tawh kituh a, thahatna tawh kithosak hi.
Leitung pumpi in kituh a, kha pumpi in kithokiksak hi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a om hi.
Lai Siangtho ah, “A masa Adam in a nungta mi khat a hong suak hi,” ci in a kigelh hi. A nunung Adam in nuntakna a pia kha ahi hi.
Ahi zongin kha pumpi a om masa hilo a, leitung pumpi om masa in tua khit ciangin kha pumpi a om pan hi.
A masa mi in leitung pana piang leivui tawh kibawl hi a, a nihna mi in vantung pana hong pai Topa ahi hi.
Leivui pana kibawl mite in leivui pan a piang mipa tawh kibang uh a, vantung tawh kipawl mite in van pana hong pai mipa tawh a kibang uh hi.
Eite in leivui pana piang mipa mel i puak mah bangin van pana hong pai mipa mel zong i pua ding hi.
Tu in sanggamte aw, si le sa in Pasian kumpigam a luah thei kei hi. Tuamah bangin a muattheite in muattheihlohna a luah thei kei hi cih thu kong gen hi.
Ngai un, thusim khat kong gen ding hi. Eite khempeuh a ihmucip ding i hi kei a, i vekpi in i kikhel ding hi.

A nunung pengkul hong gin ciangin, mitphiat kal tomkha sungin i kikhel ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh pengkul hong ging dinga, misite a muatthei nawnlo in kithosak ding uh a, eite zong i kikhel ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh hih a muatthei pumpi in muattheihlohna silhin hih a sithei pumpi in sihtheihlohna a silh ding hi.
Tua bangin hih a muatthei pumpi in muattheihlohna silh a, hih a sithei pumpi in sihtheihlohna a silh ciangin, “Zawhna sungah sihna a kivalhtum zo hi.”
“Sihna aw, na gu koilai ah om ahi hiam? Hadesɠ aw, na gualzawhna koilai ah om ahi hiam?” ci a, Lai Siangtho sunga kigelhsa thu a tangtung ding hi.
Sihna gu in mawhna hi a, mawhna thahatna in thukham ahi hi.
Ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu Khazih tungtawn a gualzawhna hong pia Pasian tungah lungdam i ko hi.

Tua ahih manin kong it ka sanggamte aw, Topa sunga hanciamtak in na nasepna uh a mawkna suak lo hi cih thei na hih manun kiptak in ding un. A kilok zolo dingin om unla, Topa nasepna ah hanciam tawntung un.
Tu in misiangthote huh nading tawh kisai in Galatia gam pawlpite tunga ka thupiakte na zui un.
Mi khempeuh in na ngahna uh tawh kizui in pawlkhat na khenkhia unla, nipi kal khat sunga ni masa pen ni in na koihkhawm un. Tua hi leh kong tun ciangin kaihkhop tawmtawm kul nawnlo ding hi.
Kong tun ciangin tua na citpiakte uh Jerusalem khuapi ah a puak dingin na muan uh mite sawlin lai tawh ka paisak ding hi.
Kei pai ding a kul leh amaute in keimah tawh a paikhawm ding uh hi.
Tu in Macedonia gam nawk in paisawm ka hih manin tua gam ka kantan khit ciangin, note kiangah kong pai ding hi.
Ka paina khat peuhpeuh ah nong khaksawn theih nadingun note kiangah tawlkhat tamin, phalbi sungteng bang kong omthei kha ding hi.
Tutung in note kiangah hong lambang pak a i kimuh ding ciang bek ka ut kei hi. Topa in a hong awi leh note tawh tawmvei sung a omkhawm dingin ka kilamen hi.
Ahi zongin Pentecost ni dong Ephesus khua ah ka taam ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in lawhcingtak in na sep theih nading kongpi khat hong honsak zo a, hong langpan mi zong tampi a om hi.
Tu in note kiangah Timothy hong pai leh lauthawng lo a hong om theih nading na ngaihsun un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in keimah bangin Topa nasem ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin kuamah in amah neuhmuh kei un. Kei kianga nuamtak a hong ciahkik theih nadingin hong kha un. Amah i sanggam dangte tawh hong tonkhawm dingin ka na lamen ding hi.

Tu in i sanggampa Apollos tawh kisai in amah note kiang hong pai ciangin a dang sanggamte tawh hong tonkhawm dingin nakpi in ka hanthawn hi. Amah in tu in hong pai noploh hangin hunlem a sak ciangin hong pai ding hi.
Pilvang unla, na upna uhah kiptak in ding un. Hang unla, thahat un.
Na sep na bawl khempeuh uh itna tawh a kisem hi tahen.
Sanggamte aw, Stephanas‑te innkuan pen Achaia gama thu‑um masapente hi uh a, misiangthote a huh dinga a kipiakna uh na thei uh hi.
Tua bang mite makaihna le kote hong huh a nasep a hahkat mite hong makaihnate na mang un ci in kong hanthawn hi.
Stephanas, Fortunatus le Achaicus‑te hong tun uh ciangin note kisapna tengah hong huh thei uh ahih manin ka lungdam hi.
Amaute in keimah le note lungsim hong tawldamsak uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua bang mite na pahtawi un.
Asia gama om pawlpi mite in note hong hopih uh hi. Aquila le Priscilla‑te in zong amau inn sunga om pawlpi tawh Topa minin lungsim takpi tawh hong hopih uh hi.
Sanggamte khempeuh in zong note hong hopih uh hi. A siangtho kinapna tawh khat le khat kihopih un.
Keimah Paul in kong hopihna lai ka khut mahmah tawh ka gelh ahi hi.
Topa Zeisu Khazih a itlo mi a om leh hamsiatna thuak tahen. Topa aw, hong paita in!
I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen.
Kong itna in Khazih Zeisu sunga om note khempeuh tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
Pasian deihna hanga Zeisu Khazih sawltak a suak, keimah Paul le i sanggampa Timothy‑te in Corinth khua‑a om Pasian pawlpi le Achaia gama om misiangthote khempeuh kong hopih uh hi.
I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungmuanna note tungah om tahen.
Hehpihna hong pia i Pa le hehnepna khempeuh hong pia Pasian, i Topa Zeisu Khazih ii Pa le Pasian tungah phatna om tahen.
Tua Pasian in eite hong hehnepna mah bangin tua tawh eite in zong haksatna a thuak midangte i hehnep theih nadingin i thuak gimna khempeuh ah a hong hehnem hi.
Khazih hanga gimna tampi i thuak mah bangin Khazih tungtawn in hehnepna zong tampi i ngah hi.

Tu in, kote in gimna ka thuak uh leh note in hehnepna le hotkhiatna na ngah nading uh ahi hi. Tua in kote thuak gimnate mah zong note in a kibang in na thuak tentan zawh nading uh ahi hi. Kote in hehnepna ka ngah uh leh note aa dingin hehnepna le hotkhiatna ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note aa dingin ka lametna uh a kip hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note zong kote mah bangin gimna a thuakte na hihna uh ka thei uh a, tua mah bangin note in zong hehnepna a ngah na hi uh hi.

Sanggamte aw, Asia gam sunga ka thuak uh haksatnate thei loin na om ding uh ka deih kei hi. Thuak zawh ding zahval in gen zawhloh haksatna ka thuak uh a, a nungta zolo ding zahin ka lungneu mahmah uh hi.
Hi hi, a si dinga thukhenna a thuak i hi ta hi ka kici uh hi. Ahi zongin tua in ko le ko kimuang loin misite a thokiksak Pasian ka muan nading uh ahi hi.
Tua Pasian in a lauhuai sih theihna panin hong honkhia zo a, kote hong honkhia in amah muang ka hih manun hong honkhia lai ding hi.
Mi tampi in thu hong ngetsak uh a, kote tangin mi tampi in lungdam a koh theih nadingun thungetna tawh kote nong panpih uh hi.

Kote kisialhna in hih thu ahi hi. Ci le sa pilna a hilo Pasian hehpihna thupha hangin lungsim siangtho le cihtakna tawh leitung ah ka gamta uh a, a diakdiak in note mai ah lungsim kisuanna om loin teci ka pang uh hi.
Note kiangah thudang gelh loin na sim theih na tel theih ding uh thu bek kong gelh uh hi. Tu in note in a tawp dongin a thei dingin kong um uh hi.
Note in kote thu a cingin na thei nai kei uh hi. Topa Zeisu Ni ciangin note kisaktheihpih ding mi ka hih mah bangun note zong kote kisaktheihpih ding mite na hi uh hi.
Hih bang lungmuanna nei ka hih manin khatvei phattuamna na ngahkik theih nadingun note kiangah hawh ding ka ngaihsun hi.
Kong hawh ciangin Macedonia gam ka pai masa dinga, tua gam pan kong kilehkik ciangin note kiangah kong bang ding hi. Tua panin note in Judea gamah nong kha ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin hih banga ka gelna a mawkgel ka hi hiam? Ci le sa deihna zui a, hi mah e, hi kei e, ci themthum in a gel ka hi hiam?
Ahih hangin Pasian pen a citak ahihna tawh kizui in note kiangah thu kong gen uh ciangin hi mah hi, hilo hi ka ci themthum kei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Silvanus, Timothy‑te le keimah in kong hilh uh Pasian Tapa Zeisu Khazih in hi mah, hi kei cih themthum hilo in ama sungah, ahi mah hi tawntung hi.
Pasian hong kamciamte khempeuh in ama sungah, hi mah vive hi a, kote hangin Pasian min a kiphat theih nadingin Amen ahi hi.
Tu in Khazih sungah kote le note hong kipsak a, sathau hong nilhpa in Pasian ahi hi.
Amah in eite tungah ciaptehna hong khen zo a, kipsakna in i lungsim sungah Kha hong pia zo hi.
Tua thamlo in note hong dawm nuam ka hih manin Corinth khua ah hong pai nawnlo ka hihna Pasian in hong theihpih hi.
Hih bang ka cih ciangun note upna hong ukcip hilo in note lungdam nadinga note tawh a semkhawm ka hi zaw uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh upna tawh a dingkip na hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin note lungsim nasak ding bekin kong zin nawnloh nading ka lungsim ka khentat hi.
Note hong dahsak leng kei hong lungdamsak ding kua hi nawn ding ahi hiam? Kong dahsak note mah kei hong lungdamsak dingte hilo na hi uh hiam?
Kong pai ciangin kei hong lungdamsak ding ahi note in kei nong dahsak khakloh nadingun hih laikhak hong gelh ka hi hi. Note khempeuh kei tawh lungdam khawm dingin kong muang hi.
Tua ahih manin haksatna lianpi le lunggim mahmah kawmsa in khitui naptui tawh lai kong khak hi. Note kong dahsak nopman hilo in kong it mahmah lam na theih nadingun lai hong khak ka hi zaw hi.
Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in dah nading thukhat a piansak ciangin ka uang genna hilo in kei hong dahsakna sangin note hong dahsakna nasia zaw lai ding hi.
Mipi a tam zaw in tua bang mipa tunga gimna a piakteng uh kicing zo hi.
A taktak in ci lehang tua pa mawhna maisak a, tha na piak ding uh hi zaw hi. Tua hi kei leh khasialua in siatlawh zaw kha ding hi.
Tua ahih manin amah na it takpi lamuh na lahkik nadingun kong hanthawn hi.
Na khempeuh ah thu na mang takpi uh hiam cih kong ettelnop manin lai‑a hong khak ka hi hi.

Tu in mi khatpeuh a mawhna na maisak uh leh keimah in zong ka maisak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh a mawhna maisak ding om a, ka maisak leh note kong khualna tawh Khazih hanga ka maisak ahi hi.
Mawhna kimaisak kei lehang Satan in noptak hong sa ding ahih manin a kimaisak i hi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ama tup le ngimziate a theilo i hi kei hi.
Tua banah, Khazih lungdamna thu hilh dinga Troas khua ka pailai in Topa in kei aa dingin kong hong honsak hi.
Tua khua ah ka sanggampa Titus ka muh loh ciangin, ka lungnuam theilo ahih manin amaute mangpha khakin Macedonia gamah ka pai hi.
Tu in Khazih hangin gualzawhna hong ngahsak den a, kote tungtawn in mun khempeuh ah Khazih theihna gim namtui a kizelsak Pasian tungah lungdamna thu tung tahen.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote in hotkhiatna a ngah mite le a mangthang mite lakah Pasian aa dingin Khazih gimnamtui tawh a kibang ka hi uh hi.

Mi pawlkhat aa dingin sihna a piangsak sihna gimnamtui tawh ka kibang uh a, a dang pawlkhatte aa dingin ahih leh nuntakna a piangsak nuntakna gimnamtui tawh ka kibang uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang nasep a sem zo ding kua kilawm ahi hiam?

Banghang hiam cihleh midang tampite bang hilo in kote in Pasian thu summet bawlna in ka zang kei uh hi. Khazih sungah Pasian kiang pana kisawl mite bangin Pasian mai ah cihtakna tawh thu ka gen uh hi.

Tua bang ka cih ciangin ko le ko hong kiphatkik zel ka hi uh hiam? Mi pawlkhatte bangin thukimpihna lai note tunga lah ding ahi zongin note kiang pana thukimpihna lai lak ding ahi zongin kisam ding ka hi uh hiam?
Note pen mi khempeuh in sima a theih uh kote lungtang tunga kigelh kote laikhak na hi uh hi.

Laitui tawh kigelh hilo in a nungta Pasian Kha tawh a kigelh kote nasepna gah Khazih laikhak na hi uh hi cih teltak in a kilang zo hi. Suangpek tunga kigelh hilo in lungtang satak tunga kigelh laikhak na hi uh hi.
Kote in Khazih hangin Pasian mai‑a ka khamuanna uh tua bang ahi hi.
Ko le ko hi ka kisak nadingun ko sungah kicinna ka neihman uh hilo in kote kicinna in Pasian kiang pan ahi hi.

Amah in thuciam thak tawh kisai nasem dingin kote hong bawl zo hi. Hih in thukham laimal hang hilo in Kha hang ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham laimal in sihna piangsak a, Kha in nuntakna a piangsak hi.

Suangpek tungah kikhuak in a kigelh sihna a piangsak nasepna vanglian mahmah a, Moses maitang tangsak ahih manin Israel mite in Moses maitang a en zo kei uh hi. Ahi zongin tua a vang tang damdam in a mual hi.
Tua ahih leh Kha nasepna vanglian zaw loin om ding ahi hiam?
Mawhsakna a piangsak nasepna tua zahin vanglian ahih leh dikna a piangsak nasepna vanglian zawtham lai ding hi.
Hih a lianzaw vangliatna tawh tehna in a masa tua vangliatna a cihtak peuhmah kei hi.
Damdam in a mual pen vanglian ahih leh a kip tawntung pen vanglian zawtham ding hi.
Tua hi a, tua bang lametna nei ka hih manun hangtak in thu ka gen uh hi.
Israel mite in damdam in a mual Moses maitang a vangtang en zolo uh ahih manin Moses in a maitang a khuh bangin, kote in ka khuh kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute a lungsim uh kimialsak ahih manin tuni dongin Thuciam Lui a sim uh ciangin tua maikhuhna in a liahlai hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua maikhuhna Khazih hangin kilakhia khinzo hi.
Ahih hangin tuni dongin Moses laibu a sim uh ciangin tua maikhuhna in a lungsim uh a liahlai hi.
Ahi zongin, Topa lamah mi khatpeuh a kihei ciangin tua maikhuhna a kilakhia hi.
Tu in Topa in Kha ahi hi. Topa Kha omna munah suahtakna a om hi.

Eite khempeuh in maitang kikhuh nawnlo in limlang a ki‑et bangin Topa vangliatna i mu hi. Topa Kha in vangliatna ah ama lim le mel sun dingin hong khel a, minthanna khat panin minthanna sang zaw ah hong omsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kote in hehpihna ka ngahna uh tawh kizui in hih nasep ngah ka hih manun ka lungkia kei uh hi.

Tua hi a, a zumhuai simtham tatnate ka nusia uh hi. Thukawi tawh khemna ka zang kei uh a, Pasian thu ka kawikaih kei uh hi. Thuman thutak teltak in ka hilh uh a, mikim lungsim in a san theih dingun Pasian mai ah maantak in ka om uh hi.
Kote hilh lungdamna thu a kiliah ahih leh zong siatna a thuak ding mite aa ding bekin a kiliah ahi hi.
Pasian lim le mel Khazih vangliatna lungdamna thu khuavak a muh theihloh nadingun hih leitung pasian in a umlo mite lungsim a mialsak hi.
Kote in komau thu a hilh hilo in Khazih Zeisu in Topa ahi hi cih thu le Zeisu hangin note sila ka hihna uh ka hilh uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh khuamial sung panin khuavak tangkhia hen ci a, thu a piapa in Pasian ahi hi. Tua Pasian in Zeisu Khazih maitang a om Pasian vangliatna hong theisak in kote lungsim sungah khuavak bangin hong tangsak zo hi.
Ahih hangin tua a lian mahmah vangliatna in kote aa hilo in Pasian aa ahihlam a kilat nadingin leibel tawh a kibang kote pumpi sungah a manpha mahmah tua vangliatna ka nei uh hi.
Mun tuamtuam panin netcipna ka thuak uh hangin ka kisia kei uh hi. Ka lungman uh hangin ka lungsim uh a bei kei hi.
Hong kibawlsiat hangin hong kinusia kei hi. Hong kisattuk hangin hong kisusia zo kei hi.
Kote pumpi ah Zeisu nuntakna a kilatkhiat theih nadingin Topa Zeisu sihna kote pumpi ah ka pua kawikawi uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a sithei kote pumpi ah Zeisu nuntakna a kilatkhiat theih nadingin Zeisu hangin sihna ah a nungta kote a kipia ngitnget ka hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin sihna in kote sungah na sem a, note sungah ahih leh nuntakna in na a sem hi.
Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh, “Um ka hih manin ka gen hi,” a cih bangin upna nei ka hih manun um in ka gen uh hi.
Topa Zeisu a thokiksakpa in kote zong tua Zeisu tawh hong thokik khawmsak in note tawh ama kiang hong tunkhawm ding hi cih ka thei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh note phattuam nading ahi hi. Tua in mi tampi tungah a kicing hehpihna thupha a kizelh ciangin Pasian minthan nadingin lungdamkohna zong a dimlet nading ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka lungkia kei uh hi. Ka pualam mi uh a kiam semsem hangin ka sunglam mi uh ni khat khit ni khat a thaksuak den hi.
Tawlkhat sung bek ka thuak uh a genthamlo haksatna in kote aa dingin a thupi zawtham tawntung vangliatna a piangsak hi.
A kimuthei nate mitsuan loin a kimu theilo nate ka mitsuan uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kimuthei nate tomkal sung bek om dinga, a kimu theilo nate ahih leh a om tawntung ding hi.
Eite teenna lei inn ahi hih buuk a kisuksiat leh mihing khut tawh a kibawl lo, Pasian kiang pan tawntung inn khat vantung ah i nei hi cih i thei hi.
Tua ahih manin vantung pana hong pai ding tua inn puan bangin hong kisilhsak ding hun ngaklah in hih leibuuk sungah khuisa in i om hi.
Tua banga hong kisilhsak ciangin guaktang a om tawh i kibang kei ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh hih leibuuk sungah i teen sungin vangik pua bangin khuisa in i om hi. Eite in guaktang a om nuam hilo in nuntakna in sihna a valhtum theih nadingin tua buuk hong kisilhsak ding i utman hi zaw hi.
Hih bang ahi ding maha eite hong bawl pen Pasian hi a, amah in kipsak nading Kha a hong piapa zong ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin lungmuangtak in i om tawntung hi. Hih pumpi sunga i om laiteng Topa tawh a omkhawm nailo hi hang cih i thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh muhna tawh kalsuan loin upna tawh i kalsuan hi.
Lungmuangtak in i om hi ka ci hi. Hi takpi hi. Pumpi tawh kikhen in Topa tawh omkhop ding i ut zaw hi.
Tua ahih manin hih leibuuk ah i om a, i om kei zongin Pasian lungdamsak ding i tupna ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih thukhenna tokhom mai ah eite khempeuh i ding dinga, khat ciatin i pumpi a i bawl a sia a pha tawh kituak in thaman i sang ding hi.
Topa a kihtakhuaina bang hiam cih kote in thei ka hih manun mite a zol ka hi uh hi. Pasian in kote hihna hong tel bangin note lungsim ah kote hong tel dingin zong ka hong um hi.

Note mai‑a hong kiphatkik zel ka hi kei uh a, kote nong kisialhpih theih nading uh hunhoih hong bawlsak ka hi zaw uh hi. Lungsim sung hilo in a tungtham teng a kisialhpih mite na dawnkik theih nading uh ahi hi.
Kote ka hai uh leh Pasian aa ding hi in, ka pil uh leh note aa ding ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh tangin mi khat si khinzo ahih manin, mi khempeuh zong a si ahi hi cih ka um taktak uh hi. Khazih itna in kote hong tawsawn hi.
Mi khempeuh tangin amah si khinzo ahih manin, a nungta mite in amau aa dingin nungta loin amaute tangin si a, a thokikpa aa dingin a nuntak ding uh ahi hi.
Tua hi a, tu a kipan in ci le sa tawh kuamah ka en nawn kei uh hi. Khazih zong ci le sa tawh ka theih ngei uh hangin, tu in tua bangin ka thei nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatin Khazih sungah a om leh mi thak a suak hi. En in, a lui nate bei in na khempeuh a thak a suakzo hi.
Tu in hih thu khempeuh Pasian kiang pan hi a, amah in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in amah le eite hong kilemkiksak pa ahi hi. Amah in tua kilemkikna nasep kote hong pia hi.
Tua kilemkikna thu in hih bang ahi hi. Pasian in leitung mite thu palsatnate ciamteh loin Khazih hangin amah tawh hong kilemkiksak a, tua kilemkikna thu kote hong pia hi.
Tua ahih manin tu in kote in Khazih tangmite ka hi uh a, Pasian in kote tungtawn in note hong thum ahi hi. Tuamah bangin kote in zong Pasian tawh kilemkik un ci in Khazih tangin kong thum uh hi.
Eite in Khazih sungah Pasian dikna i tanhtheih nadingin Pasian in mawhna a theilo Khazih eite tangin mawhna a suaksak hi.
Tua hi a, na sansa uh Pasian hehpihna thupha a mawkna na suahsak khakloh nadingun Pasian tawh na a semkhawm ka hihna uh tawh kizui in kong thum uh hi.
Amah in, “San theihna hunin nang kong dawng a, Hotkhiatna ni in nang kong huh hi,” a ci hi. En un, tu hunin san theihna hun hi a, tu hunin hotkhiatna ni ahi hi.
Kote nasepna kuamah in hong gensiat loh nadingin puk theih nading bangmah ka hih kei uh hi.
Pasian nasemte ka hihna uh lam tuamtuam panin lakin thuak keikaina, haksatna, kitangsapna, gentheihna,
vuak le satna, thongkiatna, khutlum thuakna, haksapi a nasepna, ihmut kipelhna, anngolhna,
sianthona, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Kha Siangtho huhna, itna maan,
thuman thutak genna, Pasian vangliatna, vei le takah dikna galhiam tawina,
hong kipahtawi ciang le hong kiselpho ciangin, hong kiphat ciang le hong kigensiat ciangin zong Pasian nasemte ka hihna uh thuman gen kimlai mi khemte ci a, hong kingawhna ah,
mi tampi theih hi napi kuama theih loh banga hong kibawlnate ah, si dekphial napi ka hin teitei nate uh, hong kisat hong kivua napi thahna ka thuak lohnate uh,
dah napi ka lungdam tawntungna uh, zawng napi ka hauhnate uh, bangmah neilo napi na khempeuh ka neihnate uh ah, Pasian nasemte ka hihna uh ka kilangsak uh hi.
Corinth mite aw! Note tungah siangtak in thu kong gen uh a, note aa dingin ka lungsim uh zaitak in ka hong uh hi.
Note tungah sit nei loin kong it uh a, note in na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh kote nong it kei uh hi.
Tu in, tate tunga thugen banga kong gen inah, kong itna uh nong thuhkik theih nadingun note in zong na lungsim uh kote aa dingin hong hon un.
Thu‑umlo mite tawh a kituaklo hakkol puakhawm kei un. Dikna le gitlohna kikhawl khawm thei ahi hiam? Khuavak le khuamial kipawl thei ahi hiam?
Khazih le Belial kithuhual thei ahi hiam? Thu‑um mi in thu‑umlo mi tawh bang neikhawm thei ahi hiam?

Pasian biakinnpi le milimte kithutuak thei ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh note in a nungta Pasian biakinnpi na hi uh hi. Pasian in a gensa mah bangin, “Amaute sungah teengin Amaute lakah ka vak kawikawi ding hi. Amaute Pasian ka hi dinga, Amaute in keima mite ahi ding uh hi.”
Tua ahih manin, Topa in, “Amaute lak pan paikhia in, A tuam in om unla, A siangtholo nate lawng kei un, Tua ciangin note kong sang ding hi,” ci hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in, “Note Pa ka hi dinga, Note zong ka tanu ka tapate, Na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kong itte aw, hih kamciamnate ngah khin i hih manin pumpi le lungsim a ninsak nate pan kisiansuah in sianthona tawh a kipawl Pasian kihtakna ah picing in om ni.
Kote hong sang un. Kuama tungah ka gamta khial kei uh a, kuamah ka siasak kei uh hi. Khemna tawh kuama neihsa ka laksak kei uh hi.
Hih bang ka cih ciangin note hong mawhsak ka hi kei hi. A beisa a kong genngei mah bangin note tawh sikhawm hingkhawm nuam zahin kote lungsim ah na om uh hi.
Note tunga thugen ding ka hang mahmah a, note hanga ka kisialhna zong a lian mahmah hi. Hehnepna tawh ka kidim a, kote haksatnate sung mahah zong ka lungdamna kigen zolo hi.
Macedonia gam ka tun uh ciangin ka kiheina peuh uhah bawlsiatna tuak ka hih manun ka pumpi uh a tawldam man kei hi. A pualam ah kidona omin a sunglam ah launa a om hi.
Ahi zongin a lungkia mite tha a guan Pasian in Titus hong paisakna tawh tha hong guan hi.
Ama hong paina hang bek hilo in note hanga ama tha ngahna in zong tha hong guan hi. Kei nong itna uh kei hanga na dahnate uh kei nong khual mahmah nate uh zong hong gen a, ka lungdam semsem hi.
Kong laikhak in note hong dahsak kha ngei ahih manin ka kisik ngei a, ahi zongin tu in ka kisik nawn kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua laikhak in tawmvei sung bek hong dahsak hi cih ka thei hi.

Tu in, note kong dahsak mana lungdam hilo in tua dahna in hong kisiksak ahih manin a lungdam ka hi zaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, Pasian deihna tawh kituak in a dah na hi uh a, kote hangin supna na nei kei uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna tawh a kituak dahna in kisikkikna piangsak a, tua kisikkikna in hotkhiatna a hong tun hi. Hotkhiatna a ngah mite kisik ngeilo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin, leitung vai‑a dahna in sihna a piangsak hi.

Pasian deihna tawh kituak a dahna in note sungah bang teng piangsak hiam cih en dih un. Tua in, kihahsiang nopna, hehna, lau theihna, lunggulh luatna, thalawpna le, khialhnate daanpiakna tawh puahphat nopna lungsim hong neisak hi. Hih thu ah note in na khempeuh tungah paubanna na neihlohna uh na lak khinzo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lai kong khak hangin khialhna a bawlpa aa ding le a thuakpa aa dingin hong gelh ka hi kei hi. Note kong khualna uh Pasian mai ah a kilat theih nadingin kong gelh uh hi zaw hi.
Tua ahih manin note in tha na ngah uh ciangin kote in zong tha ka ngah uh hi. Note khempeuh in Titus lungsim thakhauhsak na hih manun amah lungdam mahmah a, tua in kote hong lungdamsak sawnsawn hi.
Ama tunga note kong kisialhpihna zong nong maizumsak kei uh hi. Thu khempeuh ahi bangbang a kong gen mah bangun Titus tunga note kong kisialhpihna uh zong a maan mah ahi hi.
Note khempeuh in thu mangin launa le linna tawh amah na sanna uh a ngaihsutkik ciangin note a hong itna lian semsem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na khat peuhpeuh ah note kong muan theih manin ka lungdam hi.
Tua banah sanggamte aw, Pasian in Macedonia gam pawlpite tunga a piak hehpihna thupha na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Amaute in haksatna lianpi thuakkawmsa in lungdam mahmah uh a, a zawn mahmah uh hangin a piaknopna uh lian mahmah hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in a piakzawh zah ciang uh a piak ban ah a piakzawh zah uh sangin a tam zaw pia nuam uh hi cih ka thei hi.
Misiangthote huhna piakna ah amaute zong a kihel khak nadingun hong thum ngetngut uh hi.
Kote upmawh bang hilo in, Topa tungah kipia masa uh a, tua khit ciangin Pasian deihna tawh kituak in kote tungah hong kipia uh hi.
Tua ahih manin hih piakkhiat nasepna Titus in a patkhiat ahih mah bangin note lakah zong a hong sepsuak nadingin amah ka hanthawn uh hi.
Note in upna, thugenna, thutheihna, hahkatna, le kote nong itna uh a kipan na khempeuh ah na kicin mah bangun hih piakkhiatna lamah zong cinghtak in na pia un.
Hih bang ka cih ciangin a hong thatang sawl hilo in itna na nei taktak uh hiam cih midangte lawpna tawh hong ze‑et nuam ka hi zaw hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah hau napi note hangin mizawng hong suak i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha na thei uh hi. Tua in ama zawnna hangin note na hauh theih nading uh ahi hi.
Tu in note aa ding ngaihsutna khat kong pia nuam hi. Tu ma kum khat lai in piaknopna lungsim a nei masa le a pia masa pen na hihna uh in note hamphatna ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu in na piaknopna lungsim uh le na piakkhiat taktakna uh a kikim dingin tangtungsak unla, na hihzawh zahzah un pia un.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin a neih nailoh sung pan hilo in a neih khitsa sung pan piaknopna lungsim tawh a piak bangbang a kisang ahi hi.
Hihteng kong gen ciangin midangte van zangsak a, note vangik hong suatsawm ka hi kei uh hi.
Tu laitak a note neihna in amaute kisapna huhin, amaute in zong a neih uh ciangin note kisapna hong huhkik in, na kihuhtuah diamdiam theih nading uh ahi hi.
Hih in, “Tampi a kaikhawmpa aa vallo a, tawmkhat a kaikhawmpa aa zong kisam lo hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh bang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin kong khual bangun a hong khual dingin Pasian in Titus zong khualna lungsim a guat manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote sawlna hang bek hilo in ama utna tawh lawptak in a hong pai ahi hi.
Lungdamna thugenna ah pawlpi khempeuh in a phat mahmah uh sanggampa khat amah tawh kong sawl uh hi.

Tua sanggampa pen hih huhna letsong puakna ah kote tawh a zinkhawm dinga pawlpite in a teelkhiatpa ahi hi. Topa mahmah minthan nading le midangte na huhnopna uh a kilatkhiat nadingin hih huhna piak ding vai a hawmkhia ka hi uh hi.
Hih ka vaihawmna uh ahi citpiakna tawh kisai in paubanna ka neih khakloh nadingun ka kidawm uh hi.
Topa muhna bekah hilo in mihingte muhna mahmah ah zong a pahtakhuai in na ka sem uh hi.
Na khat peuhpeuh ah citak mahmah hi ci a, ka muh den uh sanggampa khat zong amaute tawh kong sawl uh hi. Amah in note hong muang mahmah ahih manin a citak semsem hi.

Titus tawh kisai mi khatpeuh in hong dot khak leh amah pen ka kikholhpihpa le note aa dinga ka naseppihpa ahi hi. A dang i sanggamte thu hong kidot le amaute in Khazih minthanna ahi pawlpite kamtaite ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin itna na neih takpi lam uh le note kong kisialhpihnate a maan takpi ahihlam amaute le pawlpite mai ah na lak un.
Tu in misiangthote huhna tawh kisai in lai kong khak hangin a valkhong hilel ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh huh nopna lungsim na neih lam uh ka thei hi. Tua hi a, Macedonia gam mite kiangah, Achaia gam mite zong tu ma kum khat laipek in a kiging khinzo uh hi, ci in note kong kisialhpih hi. Tua ciangin note lawpna in mi tampi a thalawpsak hi.
Ahi zongin hi banga kong kisialhpihna uh a mawkna a suah loh nadingin kong gensa mah bangin na kiginkholh theih nadingun sanggamte kong sawl hi.
Macedonia mite khatpeuh in kei hong zui henla, note a kigingsa in hong mu kei le uh (note cih thadah) ko mahmah zong muangtak a kong kisialhpihna teng uh hangin ka maizum ding uh hi.

Tua ahih manin tu ma‑a na kamciamsa uh huhnate a kaikhawmkhol dingin sanggamte hong paikholh ding uh genpihhuai ka sa hi. Piak dinga na kamciamsa bangun a baihsa in na om le uh cin it pipi a sawl zawh thu tawh na piak uh hilo in phaltak a na piak uh ahihlam hong kilang ding hi.
Tu in kong cih in ah khaici tawmkha a vawh mi in tawmkha bek at dinga, tampi a vawh mi in tampi a at ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in a lungsim sunga piak dingin a sehsa bangin pia tahen. It pipi le piak loh phamawh hi cihna tawh pia kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in lungkimtak a a pia mite bek a pakta hi.
Note in na khempeuh kicingtak in nei tawntung in nasep hoih khempeuh nasep zawh nadingun hehpihna thupha khempeuh dimtak in a hong pia theipa in Pasian ahi hi.
Tua in, “Amah in hawmkhia in, Mizawngte pia a, Ama dikna a kip tawntung hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
Tu in, khaici vawhpa tungah a vawh ding khaici a piak banah a nek ding an a piapa in na vawhsa khaici hong piak khit banah hong pungsak dinga, note dikna gah zong a khangsak ding hi.
Lungkimtak in na piakzawh nadingun na khempeuh hong neisak a, tua in kote tungtawn in Pasian tungah lungdamkohna a piangsak hi.
Hih na citpiakna un misiangthote kisapna teng a huh banah Pasian tungah lungdamkohna zong tampi a piangsak hi.
Khazih lungdamna thu mangin na zuihna uh ahi zongin amaute le midang khempeuh tunga na cit na siamna uh ahi zongin hih huhna tawh na lahkhiat uh ciangin amaute in Pasian min a phat uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in note hong piak a kicing hehpihna thupha hangin amaute in note hong ngai uh a, thu hong ngetsak uh hi.
Kam tawh a kigen zolo Pasian letsong hangin ama tungah phatna om tahen!
Note kianga kong om ciangin kiniamkhiat in kong omkhop loh ciangin a hangpa keimah Paul in tu in Khazih lungnemna le nunnemna tawh kong thum hi.
Ci le sa tawh a kalsuan banga hong ngawh mi pawlkhatte tungah han ka sawm bangin note tawh kong om ciangin han a kul loh nadingin kong thum hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote in ci le sa tawh ka nuntak uh hangin ci le sa tawh gal ka do kei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote galhiamte in ci le sa galhiamte hilo in kulhpite a cimgawpsak a vanglian Pasian galhiamte ahi hi.
Pasian theihna tawh a kilehbulh ngaihsutna le kipilsakna khempeuh tua galhiamte tawh ka phukpai uh a, lungsim gelna khempeuh zong Khazih thumang dingin salkaih bangin ka kai uh hi.
Note khempeuh in thu na man khit uh ciangin, thu a manglo mite khempeuh daan a pia dingin a kigingsa in ka om uh hi.
Na khat peuhpeuh a puatham bek en na hi uh hiam? Mi khatpeuh in Khazih mi ka hi hi a cih leh amah bangmah in kote zong Khazih mi ka hih lam uh phawk hen.
Banghang hiam cihleh note kisiat nading hilo in na kip nadingun Topa in thuneihna hong pia a, tua thuneihna tawm bang ka kisialhpih khak leh zong ka kisuang tuan kei ding hi.
Kong laikhakte tawh note hong lauthawngsak ka suah ding ka ut kei hi.
Mi pawlkhatte in, “A laikhakte thuthuk in bun mahmah napi amah taktak a hong om ciangin a zawngkhalpi hi a, a thugente zong bangmah pi hilo hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Ko mau pumpi kong om loh uh ciangin laikhak sunga kong gen bangbang un komau pumpi ka hong om uh ciangin hong gamta takpi ding ka hihna uh tua mite in theita uh hen.
Amau le amau a kiphat mite tawh kipawl khat ding le kitehkak ding ka ut kei uh hi. Amau le amau khat le khat kiteh in a ki‑etkakte in mi pillo ahi uh hi.
Ahi zongin, kote in a khengval in kisial loin Pasian hong ciangtansakna sung bekah ka kisial ding uh hi. Tua ciangtanna in note zong hong huam phadeuh hi.
Note omna ciangdong hong banlo bangin, kote in khengin a sem ka hi kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih lungdamna thu hilh dingin note omna dongin kong tung zo uh hi.
A khengval in kisial loin midangte sepsa peuh zong ka kisialhpih kei uh hi. Note upna a khanna tawh kizui in, kote nasepna huang zong nakpi in khangin tangzai ding hi cih ka lamen uh hi.
Tua hi leh note gam khengin lungdamna thu ka tangko thei ding uh hi. Midangte huang sunga a sepsa teng uh ka kisialhpih kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin “a kisial mi in Topa hang bekin kisial tahen.”
Banghang hiam cihleh amah le amah a kiphat mite kisang lo a, Topa in a phat mite bek a kisang hi.
Ka haina tawmno khat hong thuak zo le uh teh ka ut a, zong nong thuak zo khin uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian tawh kipawl hazatna tawh kei zong note kong haza hi. Nungak siangtho khat bangin Khazih tungah kong piak theih nadingin pasal khat tawh a kiteeng dingin kong kham zo hi.
Gulpi in zuauthu tawh Eve a khem bangin lam khatpeuh tawh note zong hong khem a, Khazih sunga na neih uh a citak le a siangtho na lungsim uh hong suksiatsak khak ding ka lauthawng hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh hong pai in kote in kong hilhsa uh a hilo a tuamdang Zeisu khat hong hilh henla, na ngahsa uh a hilo kha dang khat ngahin na san ngeisa uh a hilo, a dang lungdamna thu khatpeuh sang le uh teh phamawh na saktuak kei uh hi!
Ahih hangin sawltak lianpite sangin a neuzaw in ka kingaihsun peuhmah kei hi.
Thugen ka siam loh hangin theihna lamah tua bang ka hi kei hi. Hih thu note lakah ka sepsa khempeuh uh tawh siangtak in kong lak khinzo uh hi.
Note kong lapsang theih nadingin keimah kiniamkhiat in Pasian lungdamna thu a khawnkhong in kong hilh hi. Tua banga ka hihna a khial ka hi hiam?
Note lakah na kong sep theih nadingin pawlpi dangte kiang pan thaman la ka hih manin amaute sum a sut ka suak hi.

Note kianga ka omlai in kisapna pawlkhat ka neih hangin kuama tungah vangik kong suan kei hi. Macedonia gam pana hong pai sanggamte in ka kisapna teng hong sik uh hi. Na khatpeuh ah note aa ding vangik ka suah loh nadingin ka kidawm a, ka kidawm lai ding hi.
Ka sungah Khazih thuman thutak a om mah bangin Achaia gam sunga ka kisialhna uh kuamah in a hong kham zo kei ding hi.
Banghang ahi hiam? Note kong it loh man ahi hiam? Pasian in thei hi!
Thu nei nuam mite in thuneihna a ngah loh nading ahi zongin amaute in kote banga nasem hi ci a,, a kisaktheih loh nadingin tu a ka hih bangin ka hihlai ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang mite in a manlo sawltakte hi uh a, Khazih sawltak banga a kibawltawm mi a khem nasemte ahi uh hi.
Hih thu a lamdang hilo hi! Banghang hiam cihleh Satan nangawn khuavak vantungmi bangin kibawltawm thei hi.
Tua ahih manin ama nasemte zong dikna nasemte bangin a kibawltawm uh ciangin a lamdang hilo hi. Amaute in a gamtatna bangun a thuak ding uh hi.
Khatvei kong cihkik in ah, kuamah in mihai bangin hong ngaihsun kei hen. Tua banga hong ngaihsun teitei a om leh tawm ka kisialh beh theih nadingin mihai bangin hong sang hen.
Hih bang ka cih ciangin Topa thugen bangin a gen hilo in, mihai bangin kimuangtak in a hong kisial ka hi hi.
Mi tampi in ci le sa a ahihna kisialhpih uh ahih leh kei zong kong kisial ding hi.
Note mipil na hih manun mihaite lungdamtak in na thuakzo uh hi.
Sila bangin hong kibawl in hong kinetum a, na neihsa uh hong kilaksak ciangin, mi khatpeuh amah le amah hong kithupisak in na pang uh a hong kibet ciangin na thuakzo uh hi.
Kote ka hih uh leh tua bang hi zolo ka hih manun ka maizum uh hi! Ahih hangin mihai banga kong gen in ah mi khat a hanna ah kei zong ka hang hi.
Amaute Hebrew mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Israel minam ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Abraham suante ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi.

Amaute Khazih nasemte ahi uh hiam? Mihai banga kong gen in ah kei ka hi zawkan hi. Amaute sangin nakpi in na ka sem zaw hi. Sim zawhloh ding zahin hong kisat hi. Thong sungah hong kikhiamun mahmah hi. Sih theih nading tamveipi ka thuak hi.
Jew mite satna 40 pana khat a kiam ngavei ka thuak hi.
Ciangpum tawh thumvei hong kisat in suang tawh khatvei hong kideng hi. Tembaw siatna thumvei ka tuaka, tui tungah sun khat le zan khat ka omngei hi.

Khual ka zinmun mahmah hi. Tui tunga sih theihna, misuamte hanga sih theihna, keima mipihte hanga sih theihna, Gentile‑te hanga sih theihna, khuapi sung le gamlak a sih theihna, tuipi tunga sih theihna, sanggam banga kibawl mite hanga sih theihnate ka tuak hi.
Nakpitak na semin ka gim mahmah hi. Ka ihmut theihloh hun a tam mahmah hi. Gilkialna le dangtakna ka thuakngei hi. An ka ngawlmun mahmah hi. Silh ding nei loin khuadam ka thuak hi.
Hihteng banah pawlpi khempeuh aa dinga ka lung hihmawhna lianpi in nisim in hong vukcip hi.
Mi khat a thanem ciangin thanempih hilo ka hi hiam? Mi khat a kipuk ciangin dahin na sakpih hilo ka hi hiam?
Kisialh loh phamawh ahih leh ka ginatlohna teng mah ka kisialhpih ding hi.
Zuaugen ka hih lohna phatna a ngah tawntung i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa le Pasian in a hong thei hi.
Kumpipa Aretas khutnuai‑a Damascus gam ukpa in kei a hong mat nop manin galkap honkhat Damascus khuapi a cingsak hi.
Ahi zongin bawm khat tawh kulhpi vang panin a pua lamah hong khaisuk uh a, ama khut pan ka suakta hi.
Ka kisialh hangin phattuamna om lo hi ta leh kong kisial lai dinga, Topa hong lah mangmuhna le kilakna kong genbeh ding hi.
Khazih sunga om ka theih mi khat tuma kum sawm le kum li lai in vantung thuap thumna ah a kilato hi. A pumpi tawh ahi hiam hilo ahi hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian in a thei hi.
Ahi zongin tua pa ken ka thei hi. A pumpi tawh kilato hiam, kilato lo hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian bekin a thei hi.
Amah Paradise ah kilato a, mihingte genkhiat theihloh le genkhiat dinga zong a kiphallo thute a za hi.
Tua bang mipa ka kisialhpih dinga, kei ka hih leh ka ginat lohna teng lobuang ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.

A kisial nuam hi leng thuman a gen ka hih manin mihai ka suak tuan kei ding hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in kei hong muhna le keima thu a zakna zah sangin a thupi zaw in a hong ngaihsut khakloh nadingin kisial loin ka om zaw hi.
A thupi mahmah Topa hong kilaknate hangin a khengval a ka kisaktheih loh nadingin ka pumpi tungah ling khat a hong kipia hi. Tua lingin kei hong sun niloh Satan sawltak ahi hi.
Tua ling hong lakkhiatsak nadingin Topa tungah thumvei ka thum hi.

Ahih hangin amah in, “Ka hehpihna thupha in nang aa dingin a kicing hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keima thahatna in thanem ciangin thahatna a piangsak hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ahih manin ka tungah Khazih vangliatna a om tawntung theih nadingin ka ginat lohna teng lungdamtak in ka kisialhpih zaw ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Khazih hangin zawngkhalna, simmawhna kitangsapna, bawlsiatna le haksatnate ka thuak ciangin ka lungdam zaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka thanem ciangin ka tha a hat hi.
Kisial lo theilo dingin hong bawl na hih manun kisialhna tawh mihai ka suak hi. Bang mahpi ka hih loh hangin sawltak lianpente ka phak lohna om tuanlo ahih manin nong phat ding uh ka kilawm hi.
Sawltak khat ka hih lam na theih nadingun thuakzawhna limlamdangte, nalamdangte le nalamdang lianpite tawh kiteltak in kong lak khinzo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note aa dingin vangik kong suahlohna simloh pawlpi dangte sanga na neu zawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Hih ka khialh khakna pen hong maisak un!

Tu in note kiangah a thumveina hong hawh dingin ka kithawi zo hi. Note neihsa a deih hilo in note mahmah hong deih ka hih manin note aa dingin vangik kong suak kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tate in nu le pa aa dingin neih le lam a kholsak ding hilo a, nu le pa in tate aa dingin a kholsak ding uh hi zaw hi.
Note kong itna a liat semsem ciangin kei nong itna uh neu semsem phial ta leh ka neih bangbang note aa dingin lungdamtak ka zang dinga, kei mahmah zong kong kizang lai ding hi.
Ahi zongin vangik kong suan kei hi. Bangbang ahi zongin in kei pen ngiankawi zangin note a hong manin nong ngaihsun uh hi!
Kong paisak mite khatpeuh tungtawn in note tungah a met a hong zong ka hi hiam?

Note kiangah hong pai ding Titus ka hanthawn a, i sanggampa khat zong kong zuisak hi. Titus in note tungah a met hong zong ngei ahi hiam? Lungsim kikhat a kalsuan hilo ka hi uh hiam? Kalsuan kibang in a paikhawm hilo ka hi uh hiam?
Ko le ko a kiphelhphelh hong sa na hi uh hiam? Kong itte aw, Khazih hangin Pasian mai ah thu ka gen uh a, ka sep khempeuh uh note kilamkip nading bek ahi hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ka hong tun ciangin note in keima lungsim bang hilo in kei zong note lungsim bang kong hih loh khak ding ka lauthawng hi. Note sungah kiselna, kihazatna, kihehsuahna, angsungkhualna, kigensiatna, kisuktuahna, kiphatsakna le buainate a om khak ding ka lauthawng hi.

A kihhuai gamtatna, numei pasal mawhna bawl in a paktatnate uh pan a kisikkiklo mi a om khak ding ka patau hi. Kong paikik ciangin tua mite hangin ka Pasian in note mai ah kei hong maizumsak in amaute hanga ka khitui a luan khak ding ka lauthawng hi.
Tu‑a kong hawh ding pen a thumvei nading hita hi. “Mi nih bang thum bang teci panna kam tawh thu khempeuh kikipsak ding hi.”

Tuma in kong genkhol khinzo a, tu in zong note tawh ka omkhop loh hangin a nihveina a omkhawm lai mah bangin ka kingaihsun a, mawhna a bawl mite le a dang khempeuhte zong kong paikik ciangin kong koihkhong kei ding hi ci in laikhak tawh a hong gen ka hi hi.
Note tungah thanemlo in a thahat Khazih in kei tungtawn in thu gen hi cih kipsak nading nong kal lailai uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh tua Khazih in thanemtak in khailupna a thuak hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh a nungta hi. Tua hi a, kote zong ama sungah ka thanem uh hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh note aa dingin amah tawh ka nungta khawm ding uh hi.

Thu upna sungah a omtakpi mah na hi uh hiam no le no ki‑entel unla, kisittel un. Note sungah Zeisu Khazih a om lam no le no kithei lo na hi uh hiam? Santak a cing zolo na hih kei uh leh na kithei ding uh hi.
Kote ka hih uh leh santak cinglo ka hih loh lam uh hong thei dingin kong lamen hi.

Tu in siatna khatpeuh na bawl khakloh nadingun kote hong sanna thu mite mai ah a kilat nading hilo in kote santak ka cing kei uh zongin note in hoihtak in na gamtat theih nadingun Pasian kiangah thu a ngen ka hi uh hi.
Thuman thutak tawh a kilehbulh bangmah sem theilo ka hih manun thuman thutak bek ka sem uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote thanem in note na thahat uh ciangin ka kipak uh hi. Na picin nadingun zong thu kong ngetsak uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note siat nading hilo in na kilamkip theih nadingun Topa in thuneihna kei hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin ka pumpi tawh kong om ciangin thu kong khauh gen khakloh nadingin kong om loh sungin hih thute lai‑a hong khak ka hi hi.

Sanggamte aw, a tawpkhakna a kong gennop in ah na ci damta un. Picing unla, lungmuangtak in om un. Lungsim kituak in, kilem in om un. Tua hi leh itna le lungmuanna a hong pia Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
A siangtho kinapna tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
Mi siangthote khempeuh in note hong hopih uh hi.
Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha, Pasian hong itna le Kha Siangtho tawh kilawmtakna in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
Mihingte kiang pan le mihing tungtawn in a kisawl hilo, Zeisu Khazih le misite lak pan amah a thokiksak Pa Pasian hanga sawltak a suak keimah sawltak Paul le,
ka ompih sanggamte khempeuh in Galatia gama om pawlpite lai kong khak uh hi.
Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hong pai hehpihna thupha le lungmuanna in note tungah om tahen.
Tua Zeisu in Pa Pasian deihna tawh kizui in a gilo tuhun khang panin eite hong hotkhiat nadingin i mawhnate hangin amahmah a kipia hi.
I Pa Pasian tungah minthanna om tawntung tahen. Amen.
Khazih hehpihna thupha sunga hong sampa taisan in lungdamna thu tuamdang khatah hun tomkal sungin na kiheikhiat uh lamdang kong sa hi.
Tua lungdamna thu tuamdang khatin lungdamna thu taktak hilo in Khazih lungdamna thu a siasak nuam mi pawlkhat in note hong buaisakna uh ahi hi.

Ahih hangin kote mahmah ka hi uh a, vantung pana hong pai vantungmi khat ahi zongin kote hong hilhsa lungdamna thu a hilo, lungdamna thu tuamdang khat peuhpeuh hong hilh a om leh, tua mi in hamsiatna thuak tahen.
Na sansa uh lungdamna thu a hilo lungdamna thu tuamdang khat hong hilh a om leh tua mi in hamsiatna thuak tahen kong cih khitsa bangun tu in ka cikik hi.
Hih bangin mite maipha a zong ka hi hiam? Ahih keileh Pasian maipha a zong ka hi zaw hiam? Mite lungdam nading a zong ka hi hiam? Mite lungdam nading a zong ka hih leh Khazih sila ka hi kei ding hi.
Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, note kong hilh lungdamna thu pen mihing phuahtawm hilo hi cih kong theisak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh hih kong hilh lungdamna thu mihing tung pana ka ngah hilo in, mihing hong hilh zong hilo a, Zeisu Khazih hong kilakna tungtawn a ka ngah ahi hi.
Judah biakna ka zuih lai a ka gamtatzia le gen zawhloh zah dongin Pasian pawlpi bawlsia in suksiat ding ka hanciamna thute na zazo uh hi.
Ka mipihte lak ka khangualte sung panin zong Judah biakna tawh kisai in a madawkpen khat ka hi a, tanglai ka pu ka pate ngeinate gumin ka naklet mahmah hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in pha a sak hunin ka nu gil sunga ka omlai in hong teeltuam khinzo in, ama hehpihna thupha tawh a hong sam a,
ama Tapa thu Gentile‑te ka hilh theih nadingin keima sungah a Tapa hong kilangsak hi. Tua ciangin kei zong kuamah tawh kikum loin,
keima hun ma‑a sawltak a suak khinsa mite omna Jerusalem ah zong pai tuanlo in Arabia gamah ka pai hi. Tua panin Damascus khua ah ka ciahkik hi.
Tua zawh kum thum khit ciangin Peter tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem khuapi ah ka paito a, amah tawh ni sawm le ni nga sung ka omkhawm hi.
Ahih hangin Topa sanggampa James longal sawltak dangte khat beek tualai ah ka mu kei hi.
Tu in, hih kong thugelhte zuauthu hi peuhmah lo hi cih Pasian in hong theihpih hi.
Tua khit ciangin Syria gam le Cilicia gamah ka pai hi.
Khazih sunga om Judea gam pawlpi mite in ka melin hong thei lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin, “Nidang lai‑a eite hong bawlsia ngeipa in khatvei lai‑a suksiat a sawm upna thu tu in hilhta hi,” cih bek a na za uh hi.
Tua ahih manin keima hangin Pasian min a phat uh hi.
Tua zawh kum sawm le kum li khit ciangin Barnabas tawh Jerusalem ah ka paitokik a, Titus zong ka tonpih hi.

Pasian hong kilakna tawh kizui in a paito ka hi hi. Ahi zongin ka sepsa teng le ka seplai dingte a mawkna a suah loh nadingin Gentile‑te tunga ka hilh lungdamna thu gentelna khat a makai zawdeuhte kiangah a tuamin ka neihpih hi.
Tua ahih manin ka tonpih Titus zong Greek mi hi napi vunat dingin a hahsawl nawn kei uh hi.

Ahih hangin eite laka hong lutsim sanggam kineih mi pawlkhat in vunat ding a hahbawl uh hi. Amaute in Khazih Zeisu sunga i neihsa suahtakna paikhia in, sila hong suaksakkik nuamin a hong lutsim uh ahi hi.
Thuman thutak lungdamna thu note sungah a kip tawntung theih nadingin amaute thu nai khat sung nangawn ka mang kei uh hi.

Ahih hangin mi thupi a kingaihsunte zong bangbang ahi uh zongin kei aa dingin a kilamdanna om lo hi. Pasian in maitang zahtak tuam a nei kei hi. Tua mi thupite in kei thugen valkan bangmah a gen tuan kei uh hi.
Tua sangsik in vunat mite tungah lungdamna thu gen nading thu Peter tungah a kipiak mah bangin vunatlo mite tungah lungdamna thu gen nading thu kei tungah a hong kipia hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vunat mite sawltak ahi Peter tungah khauhtak a na a sempa mahin Gentile‑te sawltak keima tungah zong na a hong sem hi.

Khuampi bang ahi James, Cephas le John‑te in kei hong kipia hehpihna thupha a theih uh ciangin vunat mite kiangah amaute pai in Gentile‑te kiangah Barnabas le kei a pai dingin kilawmtakna taklam khut hong khakin ka kilen uh hi.
Mizawngte na phawk un cih thu khat bek hong vaikhak uh a, kei zong tua thu mah ka tuppen ahi hi.
Tu in Antioch khua ah Peter a hong pai ciangin mawhsak nading thu khat om ahih manin ama mai mahmah ah ka taii hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh James kiang panin a hong pai mi pawlkhat hong tunma un Peter in Gentile‑te tawh an a nekhawm hi. Ahi zongin tua mite hong tun uh ciangin vunat mite a kihtak manin Peter kihemkhia in a tuam om hi.
A dang Judah mite in zong Peter cingtaklohna zui uh a, Barnabas nangawn a kihel kha hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in lungdamna thu tawh kipawl thuman thutak tangtak in a zuihlohna uh ka muh ciangin amaute khempeuh mai ah Peter ka taii a, “Nang Judah mi hi napi Judah mite ngeina zui loin Gentile‑te ngeina zui na hih leh Gentile‑te in Judah mite ngeina a zuih nadingun banghang in hahbawl na hi hiam?
I pianna panin Judah mi ahi Gentile mikhialte a hilo eite in,

thukham zuihna tawh diktansakna kingah lo a, Zeisu Khazih upna bek tawh kingah hi cih thu i thei hi. Tua ahih manin thukham zuihna tawh hilo in Khazih upna tawh diktansakna i ngah nadingin Khazih Zeisu i umzo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zuihna hangin kuamah in diktansakna a ngah kei ding hi.
“Khazih sunga diktansakna i zon laitak in mawhnei i hih lam hong kilangkhia ahih leh Khazih pen mawhna tha a piapa a lehsuah ding hiam? Suak peuhmah lo ding hi!
Banghang hiam cihleh ka suksiatsa tua nate ka lamkik leh, kei le kei thupalsatpa a suak ka hi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian lamah ka nuntak theih nadingin thukham tungtawn in thukham ka sihsan khin hi.

Khazih tawh kikhailum khawm khin ka hih manin kei a nungta hi nawnlo in kei sungah Khazih a nungta ahi hi. Pumpi sunga om tulaitak a ka nuntakna in kei hong it in keima tanga amahmah a hong kipia Pasian Tapa ka upna tungtawn in a nungta ka hi hi.
Pasian hong hehpihna thupha ka pampaih kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham zuihna tawh dikna kingah hi leh, Khazih sihna in a mawkna a suak ding hi,” ka ci hi.
Galatia mihaite aw! Zeisu Khazih note muh mahmah a hong kikhailum bangin na tel theih nadingun kong hilh khitsa hi napi tua thuman thutak na up loh nadingun kua in hong bumhai ahi hiam?
Thukham zuihna hanga Kha a ngah na hi uh hiam? Ahih keileh upna thu zakna hanga a ngah na hi zaw uh hiam cih thu khat bek note kiang pan ka thei nuam hi.
Hi zahtak in hai lawmlawm ding na hi uh hiam? Kha tawh kipan khin napi in tu in ci le sa tawh picin sawm na hi uh hiam?
Haksatna tampi na thuaksate uh a mawkna suaksak ding na hi uh hiam? A mawkna suak zawzen ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin Kha hong pia in note lakah nalamdangte hong sempa in thukham na zuih manun hong sem ahi hiam? Ahih keileh upna thu na zak manun hong sem ahi hiam?
Abraham ngaihsun un. “Amah in Pasian um a, tua a upna pen ama dikna in a kisimsak hi.”
Tua ahih manin upna a nei mite bek Abraham tate ahi hi cih thu na thei un.

Upna tungtawn in Pasian in Gentile‑te diktangsak nuam hi cih thu Lai Siangtho in a mukhol hi. Tua ahih manin Abraham kiangah, “Nangma hangin minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah ding uh hi,” ci in lungdamna thu a hilhkhol hi.
Tua ahih manin upna a nei mite in thu‑um Abraham tawh thupha a ngahkhawm uh hi.

Thukham zuihna a suang mi khempeuh in hamsiatna nuai‑a om ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Thukham laibu sunga kigelh thute a vekpi in a zuisuaklo mi in hamsiatna a thuak ahi hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hi.
“Midik in upna tawh a nungta ding hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh manin thukham zuihna tawh kuamah in Pasian mai ah diktansakna ngah lo hi cih teltak in a kimu hi.
“Thukham a zuimi in tua thukham zuihna hangin a nungta ding hi,” ci in kigelh ahih manin thukham le upna a kisai kha kei hi.

Khazih in eite tangin hamsiatna a suahna tawh thukham hamsiatna panin eite hong tankhia zo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Singkhuam tunga kikhai mi peuhmah in hamsiatna a thuak ahi hi,” ci in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi.
Eite khempeuh in upna tungtawn in hong kikamciamsa Kha i ngah theih nading le Gentile‑te in Abraham ngah thuphate Khazih Zeisu sungah a ngah nadingun amah in eite a hong tankhia hi.
Sanggamte aw, mihingte thugen banga kong gen in ah mihing khat thuciamna nangawn a kikipsak khit ciangin kuamah in phiat theilo in, zong behlap theilo hi.
Tu in Abraham le ama suanpa tungah kamciam kipia zo hi. “Na suan na khakte,” ci in mi tampi gen loin, “Na suanpa tungah,” ci in mi khat bekin a gen hi. Tua mi in Khazih ahi hi.
Ken kong cih in ah Pasian in Khazih sunga a kipsaksa kamciamna pen tua zawh kum 430 khit ciangin a kipia thukham in a susia thei nawn kei hi. Tua bang hi leh kamciamna a mawkna a suak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh gamhluahna le thukham kisai hi leh, kamciamna tawh kisai nawnlo ding hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in Abraham tungah kamciamna tawh tua gamhluahna a pia zo hi.

Tua ahih leh bang dinga thukham hong kipia ahi hiam? Thupalsatna a om manin hong kipiakthuah ahi hi. Pasian in thukham pen Abraham Suanpa hong tun masiah a kimang dingin vantungmite tungtawn in palai khat tungtawn in hong piak ahi hi.
Tu in palai nasepna a langkhat bek tawh kisem theilo ahih mah bangin Pasian in a langkhat ahi hi.

Tua ahih leh thukham in Pasian hong kamciamte langpan ahi hiam? Langpan peuhmah lo hi! Banghang hiam cihleh nuntakna hong ngahsak thei dinga thukham hong kipia hi leh diktansakna zong thukham zuih zawhna tawh kingah thei ding hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu Khazih upna tungtawn a kibawl kamciamna a um mite in a ngah theih nadingin Lai Siangtho in mawhna sungah mi khempeuh a khumcip hi.
Ahi zongin upna thu hong tun mateng thukham tawh thongkia bangin hong kicing a, a nungciang a hong kilang ding upna i neih theih nadingin a hong kikhumcip hi.
Tua ahih manin upna tawh diktansakna i ngah theih nadingin thukham in Khazih kiangah hong kha naucingpa bang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin upna thu hong tun ciangin tua naucingpa khut nuai ah i om nawn kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note khempeuh in Khazih Zeisu na up manun Pasian tate na hi uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih sunga phumna a ngah note khempeuh in Khazih na silh uh hi.
Note khempeuh in Khazih Zeisu sungah pumkhat na hih manun Judah mi, Greek mi, sila le silalo, numei le pasal cih zong na om kei uh hi.
Khazih aa na hih uh leh Abraham suan le khakte na hi uh a, hong kamciamna bangin innluahte na hi uh hi.
Tu in ken kong cih in ah innluahpa in na khempeuh a neipa ahih hangin naupang ahih laiteng sila tawh kilamdang lo hi.
A pa in a seh hun a tun mateng a cingte le neihsa kemte khut nuai ah a om hi.
Tuamah bangin eite zong naupang i hihlai in leitung thumawlte nuai ah saltang in i om hi.
Ahih hangin a hun a cin ciangin numei sung panin thukham nuai‑a hong suak dingin Pasian in ama Tapa hong paisak hi.
Eite in tapa za i luah theih nadingin thukham nuai‑a om eite hong tankhia dingin a Tapa hong paisak ahi hi.
Tapate na hih manun Pasian in a Tapa Kha note lungsim sungah hong sawl a, “Abbaɠ, Pa aw!” na ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin sila hi nawnlo in tapa na hih leh Khazih tungtawn in Pasian innluahpa na hi hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian na theihma un a pianlim in pasian a hilo nate na bia uh hi.
Ahi zongin tu in Pasian na thei khin uh a, Pasian in zong note a hong thei khinzo hi. Tua khit nungin a thazawm kimanna a neilo thumawlte lamah kiheikik in tuate sila suakkik nuam na hi uh hiam?
Note in nite, khate, khuahunte le kumte peuh na tang uh hi.
Note aa dingin gimpi a ka sepna teng a mawkna a suahkhak ding ka lauthawng hi.
Sanggamte aw, note banga kong om bangin note zong kei bangin hong om un ci in kong thum hi. Kei tungah gamtat khialhna bangmah na nei peuhmah kei uh hi.
A masa lai in pumpi cidam lopi in note kiangah lungdamna thu kong hilhlam na thei uh hi.
Ka pumpi damlohnate simmawhna le nialna in nong nei tuan kei uh a, ahi zongin Pasian vantungmite khat zah le Khazih Zeisu mahmah bangin nong sang uh hi.
Tualai a na lungdamna teng uh tu in bang suak peuhmah ahi hiam? Hi thei hi leh na mittang nangawn uh khelkhia in nong piak nop lamtak uh ka thei hi.
Tua hi a, thuman thutak kong gen manin note gal hong suak zawsop ka hi hiam?
Amaute in note a hong itbawl uh hangin, a hoihlam ahi kei hi. Hi hi, note in amaute na it nadingun note a hong khenkhiat sawm uh ahi hi.
Keimah in note tawh ka oma ka om kei zongin na hoih khat peuhpeuh ah na thalawp ding uh a hoih hi.
Ka taneute aw, note sung pan Khazih lim hong piankhiat theih mateng in nausuak ding bangin gimna ka thuak hi.
Note hong lunghimawh mahmah ka hih manin tu laitak note kiangah hong omin ka kampauzia hong khel leng ka ut hi.
Thukham nuai‑a a omkik nuam mite aw, thukham in bang gen hiam cih thei lo na hi uh hiam hong gen dih un.
Abraham in tapa nih a nei hi. Khat pen a sila numei tawh a neih hi a, a dang khat pen sila a hilo numei tawh a neih ahi hi ci in kigelh hi.
Sila numei tawh a neih a tapa pen ci le sa hanga piang hi a, sila a hilo numei tawh a neih a tapa in kamciamna hanga piang ahi hi.
Tua nihte in genteh nadingin a piang hi a, thuciamna nihte a lak uh hi. Hagar in Sinai muala hong kipia sila suahna thu ahi hi.
Hih Hagar in Arabia gama om Sinai mual hi a, a tate tawh sila a suak tu laitak a om Jerusalem khuapi tawh a kibang hi.
Ahih hangin tunglam a om Jerusalem khuapi in eite khempeuh nu ahi sila a hilo numei ahi hi.

Banghang hiam cih leh, “Nang, a tasel numei aw, Lungdam in! Nausuak gimna a thuak ngeilo numei aw, Awng inla kiko in! Banghang hiam cihleh pasal a nei numei sangin Kuama deihloh numei in ta a hau zaw hi,” ci in a kigelh hi.
Tu in sanggamte aw, eite in Isaac bangin kamciamna tate i hi hi.
Ahih hangin ci le sa hanga piang tapa in Kha hanga piang tapa tua hun lai a a bawlsiat mah bangin tu in zong a bawlsia hi.
Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho in bang gen ahi hiam? “Sila numei le a tapa hawlkhia in. Banghang hiam cihleh silanu tapa in sila a hilo numei tapa tawh gamh luahkhawm theilo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin sanggamte aw, eite in silanu tate hilo in sila a hilo numei tate i hi hi.
Khazih in eite hong suaktasak khin ahih manin tua suahtakna ah kiptak in ding unla, sila suahna hakkol kisuankik nawn kei un.
En un, keimah Paul in kong gen in ah vun na ki‑at uh leh Khazih in note aa dingin a mawkna a suak ding hi.
Vunat mi khatpeuh tunga teci kong pankik in ah thukham khempeuh zuih khit ding na leiba ahi hi.
Thukham zuihna hanga diksakna a ngah nuam mite aw, note in Khazih tawh kikhenkhia in hehpihna panin na puk khin uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh upna hanga thuman thutak tawh kipawl lametna thu Kha tungtawn in lawptak in i ngak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vunatna ahi a, vunatlohna ahi zongin, Khazih sungah kimanna nei loin itna hanga upna tawh nasepna in kimanna a nei hi.
Limtak in a tai khinsa na hi uh a, thuman thutak zuihna panin kua in hong khaktan ahi hiam?
Hi banga note a hong kizolna in note hong samkhiapa Pasian kiang pan ahi kei hi.
Silngo tawmcik in annel lomkhat a tawkzo hi.
Lungsim dang a neilo dingin Topa sungah note kong muang hi. Ahih hangin note hong buaisak mi peuhmah in thukhenna a thuak ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, vunatna thu a hilh lai hi leng banghang in bawlsiatna thuak lai ding ka hi hiam? Tua hi leh singlamteh thu hanga buaina zong a om nawn kei ding hi.
Note a hong buaisak mite in amau vunciat tankhia le uh ka ut hi.
Sanggamte aw, a suakta dingin a hong kisamkhia mite na hi uh hi. Ci le sa deihna zuih nadingin tua suahtakna zang kei unla, itna tawh khat le khat na kihuh un.
Banghang hiam cihleh, “Nang le nang na ki‑it bangin na vengpa na it in,” a cihna thukhat sungah thukham khempeuh a kicing khin hi.
Ahih hangin khat le khat kitawng kisel in na om uh leh na maimang khakloh nadingun na kidawm un.
Ken kong cih in ah Kha sungah na gamta un. Tua hi leh ci le sa lunggulhna na zui kei ding uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ci le sa lunggulhna in Kha deihna tawh kituak lo a, Kha deihna in ci le sa lunggulhna tawh kituak lo hi. Na gamtat nop bangun na gamtat theihloh nadingun tua nihte khat le khat a kilehbulh den hi.
Ahi zongin Kha na kimakaihsak uh leh thukham nuai ah na om kei uh hi.
Tu in, ci le sa gamtatnate a kitel mahmah hi. Tuate in angkawmna, numei pasal mawhna, a kihhuai gamtatna, paktatna,
milim biakna, dawi‑ai tawina, kimuhdahna, kitotna, kihazatna, kihehsuahna, angsungkhualna, kikhenna, upna maanlo neihna,
ki‑eenna, mithahna, zukhamna, gualnop uangtatnate a kipan tua bang namte ahi hi. Tua banga a gamtate in Pasian kumpigam a luah kei ding uh hi ci a, kong genngei bangin tu in zong kong genkik hi.
Ahih hangin Kha gahin ki‑itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna,
lungnemna, pumpi ki‑ukzawhna cihte ahi hi. Tua thute tawh a kituaklo thukham a om kei hi.
Khazih mite in ci le sa deihna le lunggulhna teng a khailum khinzo uh hi.
Kha sunga nungta i hih leh Kha deihna bangin gamta ni.
Kiphasak loin khat le khat kiphin loin ki‑eeng loin om ni.
Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh mawhna sungah a pukkhak leh a khami note in lungnemna tawh na phong un. Ze‑etna sungah na puk khakloh nadingun kidawm un.
Khat le khat van kipuakpih unla, tua bangin Khazih thukham na kicingsak un.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh bangmah hi hetlo napi a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah le amah a kikhem ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuhin ama gamtatnate sittel hen. Tua hi leh midangte tawh kitehkak kul loin amah lungdam thei pah ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kuamah peuhin ama van ciat mah a puak ding uh ahi hi.
Pasian thu a kihilh mipa in a hilh mipa tawh na hoih a neih khempeuh zangkhawm tahen.
Kuamah kikhemsak kei un. Pasian ciamnuih bawl theih ding hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh in ama vawh bangin a gah a at ding hi.
Ama ci le sa lunggulhna a vawh mi in ci le sa hanga muatna a at ding hi. Kha deihna a vawh mi in Kha hanga nuntak tawntungna a at ding hi.
Na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin sem lehang a hun a tun ciangin a gah i at ding hi.
Tua ahih manin hun hoih i ngah simin mi khempeuh tung le a diakdiak in upna sunga i innkuanpihte tungah na hoih sem ni.
Keima khut mahmah tawh note aa dinga kong gelh laimal golpipite en dih un!
Amaute pumpi tawh kipawl minthanna a deih mite in Khazih singlamteh hangin bawlsiatna a thuak khakloh nading bek un note vunat dingin hong nak sawl ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vunat ahi amaute nangawn in zong thukham zui lo napi in note vunatna a kisialhpih nop manun vunat ding a hong deih uh ahi hi.

Kei ka hih leh i Topa Zeisu Khazih singlamteh longal bangmah thu ah ka kisial kei ding hi. Tua Topa tungtawn in leitung in kei aa dingin kikhailum khin a, kei zong leitung aa dingin ka kikhailum khin hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vunatna le vunatlohna in Khazih Zeisu sungah kimanna a nei kei hi. Mi thak suahna bekin kimanna a nei hi.
Hih thu bangin a gamta mite khempeuh tung le Pasian mi ahi Israel mite tungah lungmuanna le hehpihna thupha om tahen.
Ka pumpi ah Topa Zeisu hong ciaptehnate pua ka hih manin tu‑a kipan in kuamah in hong nawngkaisak nawn kei hen.
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note lungsim ah hong om tahen. Amen.
Pasian deihna hanga Zeisu Khazih sawltak keimah Paul in Ephesus khua‑a om Khazih Zeisu sunga thu‑um mi, misiangthote kiangah lai kong khak hi.
I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin a hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
Khazih sunga om vantung khalam thupha khempeuh eite a hong pia i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa, Pasian kiphat tahen.
Ama mai ah a siangtho le mawhsakna om lo dingin leitung pianma in ama sungah eite a hong teel zo hi.
Tuamah bangin ama lungkimna le ama deihna tawh kizui in Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in ama tate a suak dingin itna tawh eite hong sehkhol khinzo hi.
Tua in a vanglian ama hehpihna a kiphat theih nading hi a, tua hehpihna hangin ama Itpa sungah eite a hong sang zo hi.
A kicing mahmah ama hehpihna thupha tawh kizui in ama sisan hanga tatkhiatna ahi mawh maisakna ama sungah i ngah hi.
Amah in tua hehpihna thupha ahi ciimna le pilvanna namkim eite tungah kicingtak in hong pia zo hi.
Ama lungkimna bangin amahmah in a ngimsa ama deihna thusim eite a hong theisak zo hi.
Tua in a gelsa hunte a kicin ciangin vantung le leitung a om nate khempeuh Khazih nuai ah koih theih nading ahi hi.
Ama deihna le a ngimna zui in na khempeuh a sempa in ama ngimna tawh kizui in eite hong sehkhol khin ahih manin tua Khazih sungah gamhluahna i ngah zo hi.
Tua in Khazih a um masa kote hangin ama minthanna a kiphat theih nading ahi hi.
Note in zong note hotkhiatna lungdamna thu ahi thuman thutak na zak khit uh ciangin amah na up manun hong kamciamsa Kha Siangtho tawh ciaptehna a hong khen hi.
Pasian neihsa eite a hong kitatkhiat mateng tua Kha Siangtho in eite luahna kipsakna malep ahi hi. Tua in ama minthanna kiphat theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa Zeisu na upna uh le misiangthote khempeuh na itna uh ka zak ni a kipan,
ka thungetna ah na min uh loin note aa dingin lungdam ka ko den hi.
Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih Pasian, a vanglian Pa in amah na theihtel nadingun khalam lungpilna le kilakna a hong piak nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
Na lungsim mit uh hong kivaksak a, note a hong sapna hanga lametna in bang hi a, misiangthote sunga ama neihsa kicing zihziahte bang hiam cih na theih nading uh leh,
a thahat mahmah ama vangliatna tawh na a sep bangin a um eite aa dingin ama vangliatna bangzah in khauh hiam cih na theih nading uh zong thu kong ngetsak hi.
Amah in tua vangliatna tawh Khazih sungah nasem in misite lak pan a thawhkiksak khit ciangin vantung ama taklam ah a tusak hi.
A zalianpente, thuneite, vangliatna neite, ukna a neite khempeuh le tuhun bek hilo in a hong tung ding hunah a kiphuak lai ding min khempeuh sangin a lianzaw thamin a koih hi.
Na khempeuh ama khenuai ah koihin pawlpi aa dingin amah na khempeuhte lutang a suaksak hi.
Pawlpi in ama pumpi hi a, na khempeuhte na khempeuh mah tawh a kidimsakpa kicinna ahi hi.
Nidanglai in note in thupalsatnate le mawhnate sungah a si na hi uh hi.
