Tu laitak a thu a manglo mite sungah na a sem kha huihlak a thuneipa deihna bangin hih leitung paizia zui in na nungta ngei uh hi.
Eite khempeuh zong a beisa hunin tua mite bangmah in ci le sa lunggulhna le ngaihsutnate zui in, ci le sa lunggulhnate i tangtungsak hi. Midangte mah bangin i pianlim in hehna tate i hi hi.
Ahih hangin hehpihna kicing a nei Pasian in itna lianpi tawh eite a hong it hi.
Tua ahih manin mawhna sungah si a, i om laitak nangawn in Khazih tawh hong hing khawmsak a (hehpihna thupha hangin hotkhiatna na ngah uh hi),
Pasian in amah tawh hong tho khawmsak in Khazih Zeisu sungah vantung ah amah tawh a hong tu khawmsak hi.
Tua in Khazih Zeisu sunga ama migitna tawh a hong lahkhiat gen zawhloh a kicing ama hehpihna thupha a hong tung ding hunte ah a hong lah theih nading ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh hehpihna thupha hangin upna tawh hotkhiatna na ngah uh hi. Note thu in hotkhiatna a ngah na hi kei uh hi. Hih in Pasian letsong ahi hi.
Kuamah a kisialh khakloh nadingin sepnate hang hilo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite sep dinga a koihsa na hoihte a sem dingin Khazih Zeisu sunga hong piansak ama bawlsate i hi hi.
Tua ahih manin nidanglai in ci le sa lamah Gentile‑te na hih lam uh le a pumpi vuntep uh a khut tawh a tan mite in vunatloh mi a hong cih mite na hih lam uh kiphawk un.
Tua hun lai in note in Khazih na nei kei uh a, Israel mipawl na hi kei uh hi. Kamciam tawh kipawl thuciamnate in hong huam kha loin, leitung ah lamet bei in Pasian nei loin na om uh hi.
Ahih hangin nidanglai in a gamlapi a om note tu in Khazih Zeisu sungah na om uh a, Khazih sisan in a naina munah hong tunzo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in eite kilemna ahi hi. Amah in minam nihte kikal a a hong khen kidalna kawm phelkhia in minam khat a hong suaksak hi.
Amah in ei minam nihte ama sungah mi thak khat a hong suahsak nadingin eite a hong kigalbawlsak thukham sunga om thupiakte le thukhunte ama pumpi tawh paikhia in kilemna a hong bawlsak hi.
Tua ciangin tua minam nihte pumpi khat sungah Pasian tawh a hong kilemkiksak theih nadingin Khazih singlamteh tungtawn in tua kigalbawlna a sisak hi.
Gamlapi a om note le a nai‑a om amaute kiangah amah hong pai in kilemna thu a hong hilh khinzo hi.
Tua ahih manin ei minam nihte in ama tungtawn in Kha khat bek tawh Pa kiang i naih theita hi.
Tua ahih manin tu in khualmi le gamdang mi na hi nawn kei uh hi. Misiangthote tawh gam mi khat hikhawm in Pasian innkuanpihte na hi uh hi.
Tua innkhuam bulpi ahi sawltakte le kamsangte tungah note hong kilam a, innkiusuang in Zeisu Khazih ahi hi.
Tua inn buppi Khazih sungah kilemkhawm in khangto a, Topa sunga a siangthopen biakinnpi ahi hi.
Kha tungtawn a Pasian teenna a suak dingin note zong tua Topa sungah a kilamkhawm na hi uh hi.
Hih thu hangin keimah Paul in Khazih Zeisu hangin no Gentile‑te aa dingin thongkia ka hi hi.
Pasian in ama hehpihna thupha tawh kipawl nasepna note aa dingin kei a hong piakna thu na zaksa uh,
Pasian in tua thusim ka tungah pulak in hong theihsakna tawh kizui in (nunglam a lai tomno khat kong gelh mah bangin,
tua lai na sim uh ciangin Khazih tawh kisai tua thusim ka theihtel lam na thei ding uh hi),
tua thusim in a siangtho ama sawltakte le kamsangte tungah Kha tawh tu‑a a pulak bangin hundang a mihing tate tungah a kipulak ngei kei hi.
Tua thusim in Gentile‑te in Israelte tawh gamh luahkhawm in pumpi khat suakkhawm uh a, Pasian in Khazih sunga a kamciam lungdamna thu tungtawn in a ngahkhawmte ahih nading uh ahi hi.
Ama vangliatna tungtawn in a tuam vilvel a Pasian in ama hehpihna thupha letsong kei hong piakna tawh kizui in tua lungdamna thu a gen nasempa khat ka suak hi.
Misiangtho khempeuh laka a neupen sanga a neuzaw lai keima tungah Pasian in hih hehpihna thupha hong pia zo hi. Tua in a kimukhia zolo Khazih hauhna thu Gentile‑te ka hilh theih nading ahi hi.

Tua banah ama gelna thusim bang hiam cih mi khempeuh ka theihsak nading zong ahi hi. Tua thusim pen a kipatcil a kipan na khempeuh Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in a piangsakpa Pasian sungah a kiselsuak ahi hi.
Vantung lama om a zalianpente le a vangliante tungah tu huna Pasian pilna tampite, pawlpi in a theihsak theih nading deihna ahi hi.
Hih in i Topa Khazih Zeisu sunga Pasian in a zawhsa, a tawntung a ama ngimna bangin a piang ahi hi.
Amah upna tungtawn in eite in hangtak le lungmuangtak in Pasian kiang i zuan thei hi.
Tua ahih manin note minthanna ahi note aa dingin ka thuak gimnate ah na lungkiat loh nadingun kong thum hi.
Hih thu hangin i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa kiangah khukdin in thu ka ngen hi.
Ama tungtawn in leitung le vantung a om innkuan buppi min kipia a,
ama vangliatna tawh kizui hauhna hong piak theih nading ama Kha tungtawn in note sunglam mi thahatna tawh hong thakhauhsak nading,
upna tungtawn in note lungsim sungah Khazih hong teengin, itna ah note zung hong khasak a, hong kiphuhkip nading,
ama hong itna a zaizia, a sauzia, a thukzia, le a sanziate, misiangtho khempeuh in a theih banga na theihtel nading uh le,
a kithei khin zolo Khazih hong itna thei in Pasian kicinna khempeuh tawh na kidim nadingun thu kong ngetsak hi.
Tu in eite sunga nasem ama vangliatna tawh kizui in i ngetna le i ngaihsutna sangin a zah tampi a semthei pa tungah
minthanna, pawlpi sungah Khazih Zeisu hangin a khang a khang in om tawntung tahen. Amen.
Pasian hong sap mite na hih manun tua sapna tawh a kilawm a kituak in na gamtat nadingun Topa hanga thongkiapa ahi keimah in kong thum hi.
Na khempeuh ah kiniamkhiat un. Thunem in lungduai unla, itna tawh khat leh khat kithuak keikai un.
Kilemna tawh Kha hanga kipumkhatna na letkip nadingun na hanciam un.
Lametna khat bek sunga hong kisam na hih manun pumpi khat, Kha khat,
Topa khat, upna khat, tuiphumna khat bek a om hi.
Na khempeuh tunga a om, na khempeuh a zel a tawk, note khempeuh sunga a om, mi khempeuh Pa, Pasian khat bek a om hi.
Khazih hong hawmsak letsong tawh kizui in eite khat ciat tungah hehpihna thupha hong kipia zo hi.
Tua ahih manin amah in, “A sang munah a kahtoh ciangin Sal honpi paipih a, Mite tungah letsongte a pia hi,” a ci hi.
(Amah kahto hi a cih ciangin leinuai tawngah kumsuk masa hi a cihna hilo ahi hiam?
A kumsukpa in na khempeuh a kicingsak dingin vantungte khenga a kahtopa mah ahi hi.)
Tua hi a, amah in mi pawlkhatte sawltak ding, mi pawlkhatte kamsang a thu a hilh ding, mi pawlkhatte lungdamna thu a tangko ding, mi pawlkhatte pawlpi sia le thuhilh sia dingin a suaksak hi.
Pasian na a sep theih nadingun misiangthote kigingkholsak in Khazih pumpi a lamkip theih nading uh ahi hi.
Eite khempeuh in upna le Pasian Tapa theihtelna ah pumkhat suakin picing a, Khazih kicinna zah i tun mateng,
mite in khemna tawh lam hong khialhsak theih nadingin khelpilna tawh a gel uh thuhilhnate in huih bangin a sukmut a tomut theih naupangte bang i hi nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lutang ahi Khazih sungah na khempeuh ah i khantoh nadingin ki‑itna tawh thuman thutak gen ni.

Tua lutang panin pumpi na a tuamtuamte in kituaktak in kizom a, amaute limtak in a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau sep ding ciat a sep uh ciangin ki‑itna ah pumpi khangin a cingtak a suak thei hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa mina kong gen le kong thum thu in Gentile‑te in a haihuai amau lungsim ngaihsutna uh zui in a gamtat bangun note na gamta nawn kei un.
Amaute lungsim mialcipna le amaute awlmawhlohna hangin Pasian hong piak nuntakna tawh kikhen uh a, amaute theihtheihna a mialcip hi.
Amaute in zumtheihna nei nawnlo uh a, a kihhuai namkim tawh kidiah in numei pasal thangtatna lamah a uang semsem dingin a kipumpiak uh hi.
Ahih hangin note in Khazih na theihzia uh tua bang ahi kei hi.
Zeisu sunga a om thuman thutak hong kihilhsa le na zaksa uh mah bangin,
khemna tawh kidim lunggulhna hanga kisia, nidang a na mi lui gamtatnate uh suahkhia in,
na lungsim uh thaksak unla,
Pasian in dikna le sianthona taktak tawh amah banga a piansak mi thak na silh un.
Tua ahih manin zuauthu gen loin “i veng i pamte tungah thuman gen ciat ni.” Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi tunga om nate i hi ciat hi.
“Na heh uh zongin khial kha kei un.” Na hehna uh dam loin, ni tumsak kei unla,
Dawimangpa mun na pia kei un.
A guta mi in gu nawnlo in kisapna a nei mite a piakzawh nadingin nasep hoih khatpeuh a khut tawh semin hanciam hen.
Note kam sung panin kam hoihlo pusuaksak kei unla, a za mite a phatuamsak ding amaute kilamkipna a piangsak ding thuhoih bek gen un.
Tatkhiatna ni dong note a hong kiciaptehna ahi Pasian Kha Siangtho na dahsak kei un.
Kilungsim neihna, thangpaihna, hehna, kitot kiselna, kigensiatna le kisiatsak nopna lungsim khempeuh paikhia un.
Khat le khat na kihehpih un, lungnemna tawh na kiho unla, Pasian in Khazih hanga note mawhna a hong maisak bangin note zong khat le khat mawhna na kimaisak un.
Tua ahih manin it tate bangin Pasian tatzia etteh un.
Khazih in eite a hong it manin eite aa dingin amahmah a kipiak bangin itna tawh gamta un. Eite aa dingin namtui biakpiak nading amahmah biakpiakna le gangawh biakpiakna in Pasian tungah a kipia hi.
Numei pasal mawhna, a siangtholo na khat peuhpeuh ahi a, huaihamnate ahi zongin misiangthote tawh kituak lo ahih manin note sungah genin zong nei kei un.
A kilawmlo kampau, a haihuai kampau, ciamnuih thanghuaite ahi zongin zat ding kilawm lo ahih manin zang loin lungdamkohna kamte na zang zaw un.

Banghang hiam cihleh numei pasal mawhna a bawl mi, a siangtholo a a gamta mi, milim bia ahi, a huaiham mipa khat beekin Khazih le Pasian kumpigam sungah bangmah a luah kei ding uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
Thu ginalo tawh mi khemsa in om kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang thute hangin thu a manglo mite tungah Pasian hehna a tung hi.
Tua ahih manin tua bang mite tawh na kipawl kei un.
Nidanglai in khuamial sungah na om uh hangin tu in khuavak sungah na om uh hi. Tua ahih manin khuavak tate bangin gamta un.
(Banghang hiam cihleh Kha gahin hoihna, dikna le thuman khempeuh ahi hi.)
Topa lungkimna in bang ahi hiam ci in zong un.
Phattuamna a om lo khuamial gamtatnate tawh kipawl loin tua gamtatnate a hoihlohna na pholakkhia zaw un.
Banghang hiam cihleh a simtham in a gamtatnate uh kam a gen ding nangawn in zong a zumhuai hi.
A kilangkhia khempeuh khuavak in a kilatsak ahih mah bangin a kipholak khempeuh zong khuavak in a pholak ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin amah in, “A ihmu mi aw, khanglo inla, Misite lak pan thokhia in. Tua hi leh nang tungah Khazih hong tang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mihai bangin gamta kei unla, mipil bangin pilvangtak in gamta un.
Hun le nite sialua ahih manin hun hoihte khahsuah kei un.
Tua ahih ciangin mihai bangin om kei unla, Topa deihna bang ahi hiam ci in theitel un.
Hong uangtatsak thei lenggahzu kham kei unla, Kha tawh kidim zaw un.
Pasian phatna late, biakna late le khalam late tawh khat le khat na kipaih unla, note lungsim sungah Topa phatin lasa un.
Na khempeuh ah i Topa Zeisu Khazih min tawh Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko tawntung un.
Pasian kihtakna lungsim tawh khat le khat thu na kimang un.
Zite aw, Topa thu na man mah bangun na pasalte uh thu na mang un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih in pawlpi lutang hi a, pumpi a Honpa ahih mah bangin pasal zong a zi lutang ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin pawlpi in Khazih thu a man bangin zite in zong thu khempeuh ah a pasalte uh thu a man ding uh ahi hi.
Pasalte aw, Khazih in pawlpi it a, pawlpi aa dingin amahmah a kipumpiak bangin note in zong na zite uh na it un.
Thu tawh tui a sawp bangin Khazih in pawlpi sawpsiang a, a sianthosak theih nadingin,
kawkbanglo, hemna le hoihlohnate khat beek a omlo, a siangtho le mawhsakna omlo, a minthang pawlpi, amah le amah a kipiak theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin pasalte in amau pumpi banglianin a zite uh it uh hen. A zi a it mi in amahmah a ki‑it ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kuamah in ama pumpi a mudah ngei kei hi. Topa in pawlpi vakin a kep a huai bangin mihing in zong ama pumpi vakin a kem hi.
Eite in ama pumpi nate ama sa le a guh a tangte i hi hi.
“Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, Amaute gel pumkhat sakhat a suak ding uh hi.”
Hih in thusim lianpi hi a, Khazih le pawlpi tawh kisai a gen ka hi hi.
Ahi zongin note khatpeuh in amah le amah a ki‑it bangin a zi it henla, a zi in zong a pasal zahtak hen.
Tate aw, Topa sungah na nu na pate uh thu na mang un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in thuman ahi hi.
“Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cih thu in kamciam tawh a kithuahkhawm thupiak masa pen hi a,
“na nu na pa zahtak lecin leitung ah nuamsa in na khansau ding hi.”
Pate aw, na tate uh a heh nadingun phin kei un. Topa thu tawh hilhin pantah unla, khansuah un.
Silate aw, Khazih thu na man mah bangun ci le sa a na tote uh thu zong lau le ling kawmsa in lungsim takpi tawh na mang un.
Mihing mai‑et in amaute hong muh sung beka thumangte hilo in, lungsim takpi tawh Pasian deihna a zui Khazih silate bangin nasem un.
Mihingte nasem bang hilo in Topa nasem bangin deihsakna tawh na sem un.
Sila ahi a, silalo ahi zongin a hoih a sem mi khempeuh Topa in a hoih pia ding hi cih thu na thei uh hi.
Tote aw, note in zong na silate uh tungah tua bangin bawl un. Note Topa zong vantung ah om a, amah in kuamah deidan neilo hi cih thu thei unla, na silate uh lausak in tawnbawl kei un.
A nunungpen in sanggamte aw, Topa le a vanglian ama hatna sungah thakhauh un.
Dawimangpa hong sawmnate na nanzawh nadingun Pasian hong piak galvante a kimin na silh un.
Banghang hiam cihleh si le sa tawh kido i hi kei a, a zalianpente, a thuneite, tulai leitung khuamial a ukte le van lam a dawigilo honpite tawh a kido i hi hi.
Tua ahih manin hunsiate nang zo in na khempeuh zo a, na dinkip zawh nadingun Pasian hong piak galvante a kimin silh un.
Tua ahih manin thuman thutak kawnggak gak unla, dikna sik awmdal bulhin,
kilemna tawh kipawl lungdamna thu kiginkholhna khedap bulh unla, dingkip un.
Tua galvan khempeuh banah gilopa hong kapna meikuang thaltang khempeuh a mitsak zo ding upna lum na tawi un.
Hotkhiatna sik lukhu khu unla, Pasian kammal ahi Kha namsau tawi un.
Kha sungah a tawntung in thungetna nam khempeuh le deih ngetnate na ngen un. Hih bangin pilvangtak in omden unla, misiangthote khempeuh aa ding tatsat loin thungetsak un.
Kei aa dingin Pasian in ka gen ding thute hong pia a, a kiselcip ahi lungdamna thu hangtak a ka genngam nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna thu hangin tangmi khat ka hihna hangin mat le hen ka thuak hi. Hih bangpi mah in ka gen dinga kilawm bangbang hangtak in ka gen theih nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
Ka vai teng le ka nasepzia teng na theih nadingun Tychicus in hong gen ding hi. Amah pen Topa nasem muanhuai ka it sanggampa khat ahi hi.
Ka vai teng uh na theih nading uh le amah in note tha hong piak theih nading ngimna tawh amah kong paisak ahi hi.
Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih in sanggamte tungah lungmuanna le upna tawh kipawl ki‑itna hong pia tahen.
Lungsim takpi tawh i Topa Zeisu Khazih a it mi khempeuh tungah hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen. Amen.
Zeisu Khazih sila keimah Paul le Timothy in Philippi khua‑a om Khazih Zeisu sunga misiangtho khempeuh le pawlpi siate le pawlpi upate lai kong khak uh hi.
I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pan hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
Note kong phawksim in ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Thu ka ngetsim in note khempeuh aa dingin lungdamtak in kong ngetsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a kipat a kipan tuni dongin lungdamna thu ka hilhna ah nong panpih uh hi.
Note sungah nasep hoih hong pankhiapa in Zeisu Khazih ni dongin kicingtak in hong zomsuak ding hi ci in ka lungmuang hi.

Ka lungsim sungah om den na hih manun na vekpi un tua banga kong ngaihsut ding mah na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mat le hen ka thuakna le lungdamna thu ka hutna le ka kipsaknate ah kei tawh kibang in hehpihna thupha a ngahkhawm na hi uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu Khazih in hong it mah bangin kei zong note kong it mahmahna Pasian in ka teci ahi hi.
Note itna in thu theihna le thu khentel theihna khempeuh ah a khan semsem nading,
Khazih ni dongin a hoihpen nate muhtel theih nading, a siangtho le kawkbanglo a na om nading,
Zeisu Khazih tungtawn a dikna gahte tawh na kidim theih nading uh le Pasian vangliatna a kiphat theih nadingin thu kong ngetsak hi.
Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, ka tunga thupiangte in lungdamna thu kizelsak zaw hi cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Khazih hanga mat le hen ka thuakna kumpi inncing galkapte khempeuh le midangte in zong a theitel uh hi.
Mat le hen ka thuak manin Topa sunga sanggamte a tam zaw in zong thangahna in nei uh a, Pasian thu gen ding lau loin a hang semsem uh hi.
Mi pawlkhat in midangte eenna le dem nopna tawh Khazih thu hilh uh a, pawlkhat in lungsim maan tawh a hilh uh hi.
Hih a masate pawlin lungsim takpi tawh hilo angsungkhualna bek tawh ka thuak gimnate a kibehlap nading ngimna tawh Khazih thu a hilh uh hi.
Ahih hangin a nunungte pawlin lungdamna thu a hu dingin kei hong kiseh ahihlam thei uh ahih manin itna tawh Khazih thu a hilh uh hi.
A phatmawhna bang om ahi hiam? Kineih tawmna tawh ahi a, lungsim taktak tawh ahi zongin lam khatpeuh tawh Khazih thu a kihilh nak leh ka lungdam veve a, ka lungdam lailai ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nong thungetsakna uh le Zeisu Khazih Kha in a hong huhna hangin tua thute in keima suahtak nading hong suak ding hi cih ka thei hi.
Maizumna bangmah nei loin ka hansan ngei bangin ka hangsan lai dinga, ka si a ka hing zongin ka pumpi tawh Khazih minthansak ding lunggulh in ka lamen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nungta hi leng Khazih aa ding hi a, si hi leng a met zaw ka hi hi.
Ahih hangin ka pumpi nungta lai leh na tampi sem thei ding ka hih manin ka teel zawk ding ka thei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu nihte kikal ah ka cih nading ka thei kei hi. Khazih tawh omkhop ding ka ut a, tua in kei aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
Ahi zongin hih pumpi tawh ka nuntak lai ding note aa dingin a kisam zaw hi.
Tua ahih manin upna sunga na khantoh nading uh le na kipah nadingun ka dam lai dinga, note khempeuh tawh ka omkhawm lai ding hi ci in ka lungmuang hi.
Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong paikik ciangin Zeisu Khazih sunga na lungdamna uh keima hangin a hong tam zaw ding hi.

Khazih lungdamna thu tawh kilawm kituak in na nungta un. Tua hi leh note kiangah hong pai in kong mu a, na thu uh ka galzak ahi zongin lungsim khat bekah dingkip in, lungdamna thu tawh kipawl upna thu ah ngaihsutna kikhat in na hanciamkhopna uh ka za thei ding hi.
Note hong langpan mite hangin na lau peuhmah kei un. Note laulohna in amaute kisiatna lahna hi a, ahih hangin note aa dingin Pasian kiang pana hong pai hotkhiatna lahna ahi hi.
Khazih a um dingte bek hilo in ama hanga a thuak dingin zong Khazih min tawh note tungah thu hong kipia hi.
Tua ahih manin na muh khitsa uh le tu laitak in na zak uh keima thuak bangbang a thuak na hi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Khazih sungah tha kipiakna, itna tawh kihehnepna, Kha tawh kilawmtakna, lungnemna le lainatnate khat peuhpeuh na neih uh leh,
ka lungdamna a kicin nadingin na ngaihsutna uh kituaksak unla, a kibang itna nei in lungsim kihual le tupna kibang in om un.
Angsungkhualna le kisialh nopna tawh bangmah hih kei un. Na lungsim uh niamkhiat unla, no sangin midangte a thupi zaw in ngaihsun un.
No met nading bek ngaihsun loin midangte aa ding zong ngaihsutsak un.
Khazih Zeisu lungsim puak bang note sungah om tahen.
Amah in Pasian taktak hi napi Pasian tawh kikimna let tentan dingin ngaihsun loin,
bangmah lo bangin a hong kikoih hi. Sila bangin hong om a, mihing bangin a hong pai hi.
Mihing mel hong pua in hong kiniamkhiat a, sih dongin thumang in singlamteh tungah sihna a hong thuak hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in amah a sangpen munah lamto a, min khempeuh sangin a thupi zaw min a pia hi.
Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung le leinuai‑a om mi khempeuh in Zeisu min pahtawi in khukdin ding uh a,
Zeisu Khazih in Topa ahi hi ci in leii khempeuh in pulak in Pa Pasian min a thangsak ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin kong itte aw, note kianga ka omlai a thu na man tawntung mah bangun tu a kong om loh ciangin zong thu na mang zaw kan unla, na ngahsa uh hotkhiatna lau le lingkawm in na lakkhia un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian a lungdamsak nate na sepnop nading uh le na sep theih nadingun note sunga na a hong sempa in Pasian ahi hi.
Na khempeuh phun lo kisel loin sem un.
Tua hi leh a kawkbanglo a siangtho khialhna a neilo Pasian tate na suak ding uh hi. Lungsim kawi in lam a khial tulai khang mite sungah note in leitung ah khuavak bangin na tang ding uh hi.
A mawknapi a a taii le a mawknapi a nasem hilo in Khazih ni ciangin ka lungdam theih nadingin nuntakna thu ka lenkip hi.
Hi hi, note in upna tawh na nasepna hangun tuibuah biakpiakna banga ka nuntakna a kibuak hangin note khempeuh tawh kipak in ka lung a dam veve hi.
Tuamah bangin note zong nuamin kei tawh lungdamkhawm un.
Ahih hangin note omdan teng thei a, tha ka ngah nadingin note kiangah Timothy hong paisak thei pah ning ci in Topa Zeisu sungah lametna ka nei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keima hong deihsak banga note hong deihsak taktak ding amah longal midang kuamah ka nei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in Khazih Zeisu tawh kisai nate zong loin amau angsung ding bek a zong uh hi.
Ahi zongin Timothy mihoih ahihlam na theihsa uh hi a, lungdamna thu ah kei tawh pata banga nasemkhawm mi ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin ka vai ding khat peuhpeuh a kitel ciangin amah hong sawlthei pah dingin ka kilamen hi.
Ahi zongin kei mahmah zong a sawtlo in hong paithei dingin Topa sungah khamuanna ka nei hi.
Note kamtai le kei hong huh dinga nong sawl uh kei tawh na a semkhawm gal a hong dopih ka sanggampa Epaphroditus, note kiangah kong ciahsakkik ding kisam ka sazaw hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a cinatna na zak uh ciangin amah in note hong lunggulh in a lunghimawh mahmah hi.
Amah si dektak in a cinat hangin Pasian in a hehpih hi. Amah bek hehpih hilo in ka dahna a kibehlap loh nadingin kei mahmah zong hong hehpih ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin amah na muhkik uh ciangin na lung uh dam dinga, keima dahna a noptuam theih nadingin amah kong paisak pah ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa min tawh lungdamtak in amah na sang unla, tua bang mite na thupibawl un.
Banghang hiam cihleh kei aa dingin nong sepsak theihloh tenguh aman hong sepsak in sih ding zong phamawh salo in Khazih na a sep manin a si dektak ahi hi.
A tawpna ah sanggamte aw, Topa sungah lungdam un. Hih thute kong gelh kikkik pen a cimtakhuai hilo in note kip nading hi zaw hi.
Uite na pel un, a hoihlo nasemte na pel unla, vunat ding a ci teitei mite na pel un!
Banghang hiam cihleh eite in Kha tawh Pasian a biate le ci le sa suang loin Khazih Zeisu sungah a lungdam vunatte i hi hi.
Ci le sa a suang nuam hi leng midangte sangin ka suan ding a tam zaw hi.
Ni giat ka phak ni in vun a ki‑atpa, Israel minam, Benjamin suan ka hi hi. Hebrew mite lak panin Hebrew mi khat ka hi a, thukham zuihna lamah Pharisee pawl ka hi hi.
Hanciamna lamah genleng pawlpi a bawlsiapa ka hi a, thukham tawh kisai dikna lamsang ah mawhsak nading a omlo mipa ka hi hi.
Ahi zongin keima metna khempeuh Khazih hangin supna in ka ngaihsun zaw hi.

Ka Topa ahi Khazih Zeisu ka theihna sanga thulian zaw om lo ahih manin thudang khempeuh supna hi ci in ka ngaihsun hi. Khazih a meta ka ngah theih nadingin na khempeuh ka tan zaw a, tua nate ninbulom bangin ka ngaihsun hi.
Tua Topa sunga ka om theih nadingin, thukham zuihna hangin dikna bangmah ka ngah kei a, Khazih upna tungtawn a kingah, Pasian in upna hanga hong piak dikna bek ka ngah hi.
Hih in Khazih mahmah le amah a thokiksak vangliatna ka theih theih nading, ama thuak banga gimna thuakin ama sih banga ka sih theih nading leh,
misite lak pan thawhkikna ka ngah hamtang theih nading ahi hi.
Tuate ngah khinzo ing, picing khinzo ing a ci ka hi kei hi. Khazih Zeisu in tuate a ngah dinga kei hong mat bangin kei zong tuate ka mat zawh nadingin a delhdelh ka hi hi.
Sanggamte aw, tuate a ngah khinzo in a kingaihsun ka hi kei hi. Ahi zongin ka hih khat om a, ka nunglam a om nate mangngilh in ka mailam a om nate ka zam hi.
Tunglam pana Pasian in Khazih Zeisu sunga hong sapna ahi pahtawina ka ngah nadingin kunglam ah ka tai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a picing khinsa mi peuhmah in tua bang lungsim neiciat ni. Note ngaihsutna tawh a kituaklo thu a om leh Pasian in hong theitelsak ding hi.
Bangbang hi ta leh i ngah khitsa thute, zui in lungsim kituak in omciat ni.
Sanggamte aw, kei hong etteh un. Na etteh ding uh kote ka hih manun kote banga a nungta midangte zong na etteh un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih singlamteh galin a do mi tampite gamtatzia kong gen ngei zel bangin tu in zong khitui luangin kong genkik hi.
Amaute in a tawpna ah siatna a thuak dingte ahi uh a, amaute pasian in a gilpi uh ahi hi. A maizum nading teng uh kisialhna in nei zawsop uh a, leitung nate bek a ngaihsunte ahi uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite in vantunggam mi i hi a, tua gam panin Honpa ahi Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai ding lawptak in i ngak hi.
Amah in na khempeuh ama thuneihna nuai‑a a koih a vangliatna tawh kizui in a ginalo i pumpite a minthang ama pumpi bangin hong khelsak ding hi.
Tua ahih manin kong it kong ngaih mahmah sanggamte aw, note in ka lungdamna le ka kumpi lukhu na hi uh hi. Kong itte aw, Topa sungah kiptak in na ding un.
Euodia le Syntyche‑te aw, Topa sungah khat le khat lungsim kituak in na om nadingun kong thum hi.

Ka naseppih, ka lawm taktak nangmah in zong lungdamna thu ah kei tawh nakpi in na a semkhawm hih numeite na huh nadingin kong thum hi. Amaute in Clement a kipan Nuntakna Laibupi sunga a min uh a kigelh a dang ka naseppihte tawh zong a semkhawmte ahi uh hi.
Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un. Khatvei kong genkik in ah lungdam un!
Na lungnemna uh mi khempeuh tungah kilangsak un. Note kiangah Topa a om hi.
Bangmah thu ah lung himawh loin na khempeuh ah lungdam ko kawmsa in thungen unla, na kisapnate uh Pasian tungah pulak in na ngen un.
Tua hi leh mite tel zawhloh Pasian hong piak lungmuanna in Khazih Zeisu tungtawn in note lungsim le ngaihsutnate hong cin hong kepsak ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, a tawpkhakna a kong gen in ah thudik le a pahtawihuai thute, a thuman, a siangtho, a ithuai thu le thu hoihte, gamtat hoih le a phathuai thute ngaihsutpen in na nei un.
Keima kiang pana na sinsa, na ngahsa, na zaksa uh le na muhsa uh thute na zui un. Tua hi leh lungnopna Pasian in, note hong ompih ding hi.

Tu in a nunung pen in kei nong khualna uh hong kilangsakkik na hih manun Topa sungah ka lungdam mahmah hi. Nidanglai in zong nong khual mahmah uh a, ahi zongin na lahkhiat nading uh hun hoih a ngah lo na hi uh hi.
Huhna ka kisap manin hih thu a hong gen ka hi kei hi. Bangci bangin om taleng a lungkim dingin ka kisin khinzo hi.
Cihmawhna ka thei a, cihtheihna zong ka thei hi. Gilkialna le gilvahna, kicinna le kisapnate zong, mun khempeuh ah na khempeuh panin ka sinzo hi.
Kei hong thahatsakpa Khazih hangin na khempeuh ka hih thei hi.
Bangbang hi ta leh ka haksatna hong thuakpih na hih manun na nasepna uh hoih mahmah hi.

Lungdamna thu kong gencil lai in Macedonia gam pan ka ciah ciangin piakna le ngahna lamah note longal kei tawh a kizom pawlpi dang om lo hi cih thu tu in no Philippi khua mite in na theihsa uh ahi hi.
Thessalonica khua‑a ka omlai nangawn in ka kisapnate nong huhna uh khatvei bek hilo in nihveitak nong khak uh hi.
Hih bang ka cih ciangin letsong ka deihna hilo in, gahpha na gah semsem nading uh kong deihsakna hi zaw hi.

Na khempeuh kicingtak in ka nei taktak hi. Nong na khakte uh Epaphroditus tung pan ka ngah a, ka kisapna teng kicing ta hi. Tuate pen Pasian in a san theih amah a lungdamsak mahmah, a namtui biakpiakna ahi hi.
Ka Pasian in Khazih Zeisu sunga ama thupina tawh kituak hauhna tawh na kisapna khempeuh uh hong pia ding hi.
Tu in i Pa Pasian in minthanna ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
Khazih Zeisu sunga misiangthote khempeuh na hopihsak un. Kei tawh a omkhawm sanggamte in zong note hong hopih uh hi.
Misiangtho khempeuh a diakdiak in Caesar kumpipa inn sunga omte in note hong hopih uh hi.
I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.
Pasian deihna hanga Zeisu Khazih sawltak keimah Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in,
Colosse khua‑a om, Khazih sunga misiangthote le a citak sanggamte lai kong khak uh hi. I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah hong om tahen.
Kote in i Topa Zeisu Khazih Pa, Pasian tungah note aa dingin thu kong ngetsak sim un lungdam ka ko den uh hi.
Khazih Zeisu na upna uh le misiangthote khempeuh na itna uh thu ka zak man uh ahi hi.
Pasian in note aa dingin vantung ah lametna hong koihsak zo a, thuman thutak ahi lungdamna thu panin tua thu na zazo uh hi.
Tua lungdamna thu leitung mun khempeuh ah hong gahkhia in a khan mah bangin Pasian hehpihna thupha maantak za in na theih ni uh a kipan note kiangah zong a hong tungzo hi.
Kote naseppih ka it mahmah uh Epaphras tung panin tua thu na zazo uh hi. Amah in note septang in Khazih nasem mi muanhuai ahi hi.
Amah in Kha sunga na ki‑itna uh kote tungah a hong gen hi.
Hih thu hangin ama deihna theitel in khalam pilna le khalam thutheihna khempeuh tawh na kidim nadingun hih thu ka zak ni uh a kipan tatsat loin thu ka hong ngetsak uh hi.
Topa tawh a kilawm gamtatna nei in na khempeuh ah amah lungdamsak in, nasep hoih khempeuh ah gahsuah in Pasian theihna ah na khan semsem nadingun thu kong ngetsak uh hi.
Lungduai in kipak a na thuak zawh nadingun, a vanglian ama thahatna tawh kizui in vangliatna khempeuh tawh note hong kithakhauhsak hen.
Khuavak sunga om mi siangthote luah ding, a ngah dinga kilawm mi a hong suaksak, i Pa tungah lungdam ka ko uh hi.
Amah in khuamial ukcipna panin eite hong honkhia in, a it a Tapa kumpigam sungah a hong tunzo hi.
Ama sisan hanga tatkhiatna ahi mawh maisakna, tua Tapa sungah i ngah hi.
Tua Tapa in a kimu theilo Pasian lim le mel hi a, a kipiangsak khempeuh lak pan a masa pen ahi hi.

Vantung le leitung a om, a kimu thei le a kimu theilo, kumpi tokhomte ahi a, uknate ahi a, zaliatnate le thuneihnate ahi zongin tua Tapa tungtawn in a kipiangsak ahi hi. Na khempeuh in ama tungtawn le ama aa dingin a kipiangsak ahi hi.
Na khempeuh a omma in amah om a, ama sungah na khempeuh a om hi.
Amah in pumpi, pawlpi Lutang ahi hi. Amah na khempeuh ah a lianpen ahih nadingin a kipatna le a bul hi a, misite lak panin a thokik masa pen ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama kicinna khempeuh Tapa sunga a om ding le,

Tapa tungtawn in leitung le vantung a om na khempeuh, amahmah tawh a kilemkik ding a deih hi. Tua ahih manin ama singlamteh tung pana hong luangkhia a sisan tungtawn in na khempeuh tawh kilemna a bawl zo hi.
Khatvei lai in Pasian tawh na kikhen uh a, note sep gitlohnate hangin na lungsim sung uhah Pasian galte na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin tu in amah in hong kilemkiksak zo hi.
Tua in Khazih in pumpi sihna a thuakna hang hi a, Pasian mai ah mawhsak nading omlo, a kawkbanglo, a siangtho in note a hong piak theih nading ahi hi.

Tua bang a hih theih nadingin upna ah kip in, zung kha in, kiptak in ding unla, na zaksa na lamet uh lungdamna thu panin kihei kei un. Tua lungdamna thu in van nuai‑a om khempeuh tungah a kihilh thu hi a, keimah Paul zong tua thu a gen nasem mi khat ka hi hi.

Tu in, note aa dingin gimna ka thuak manin ka lungdam hi. Tua banah Khazih in a thuak khitloh a kisam lai gimnate ka pumpi tawh thuaka ka kicinsak theih manin ka nuam hi. Tua ka thuakna in Khazih pumpi ahi pawlpi aa ding ahi hi.
Pasian in tua pawlpi aa dingin neihsa kem za hong piakna tawh kizui in, nasem khatin hong koihzo a, Pasian thu a bukim in kong hilh theih nading ahi hi.
Tua thusim khang tampi le hun sawtpi sung kiselcip a, ahi zongin tu in ama misiangthote tungah a hong lakkhia ta hi.
Hih thu kiselsim vangliatna kicinna in bang hiam cih Gentile‑te lakah a kitheih nadingin Pasian in a deih hi. Tua a kiselsim thu in Khazih note sunga om, vanglian lametna pen ahi hi.
Khazih Zeisu sungah mi khempeuh a picing a suah theih nadingun pilna namkim tawh mi khempeuh thu ka hilh uh a, kidophuai thute zong theisak in Khazih thu ka tangko uh hi.
Tua bang a pian theih nadingin amah in keima sungah thakhauhtak in na a hong sep mah bangin kei zong nakpitak in na ka sem hi.
Note le Laodicea khua mite a kipan ka mel a hong mu ngeilo mi khempeuh aa dingin ka hanciam tentanna na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Na lungsim uh thahat in, itna tawh khat le khat kikhihkhawm in, thu theitel in, Pa le Khazih tawh kisai a kisel Pasian thusimte cingtak a, na theih sinsen nading uh ka tupna ahi hi.
Tua Khazih sungah a manpha pilna le theihna khempeuh kisel in a om hi.
Tu in kuamah in kamsiam tawh note a hong khem zawhloh nadingin hih thu kong gen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note lakah ka pumpi tawh kong om theihloh hangin ka lungsim tawh kong om a, hoihtak a na omzia uh le Khazih na upzia uh a kipna ka muh manin ka lungdam mahmah hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa Khazih Zeisu na san khit mah bangun ama deihna bangin gamta un.
Ama sungah zung kha in kilamkip un. Hong kihilhna sa a om bangin upna ah kip unla, lungdamkohna na hat semsem un.
Mite ngeina le leitung tawh kipawl thuguipite in Khazih hong hilh thute tawh kituak lo ahih manin mihing ngaihsut pilna le kimanna omlo thu tawh kuamah in a hong khem zawhloh nadingin na kikem un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian pianzia khempeuh Khazih pumpi sungah hong om hi.
Note in zaliatna le thuneihna khempeuhte lutang ahi tua Khazih sungah kicing in na om uh hi.
Khazih hong vunatna hangin ci le sa mawhna pumpi paikhia in khut tawh a ki‑atlo vunatna tawh ama sungah vun ki‑atte na hi uh hi.
Tuiphumna ah amah tawh kivuikhawm in misite lak pan amah a thokiksak Pasian vangliatna, na upna uh tungtawn in amah tawh na thokik zo uh hi.
Note in mawhna sungah si in ci le sa a vunatlote na hih laitak un Pasian in amah tawh hong hing khawmsak zo a, na mawhna khempeuh uh hong maisak zo hi.
Amah in eite a hong langpan a hong lehdo, khut tawh a kigelh thukhunte phiatmai in lakhia a, singlamteh ah a kilhcip khinzo hi.
Amah in zaliatnate le thuneihnate susia in tuate tungah a gualzawhna mipi muhin singlamteh tungah a lakkhia hi.
Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn a kipan, biakna pawi, khadet pawi le sabbath nite tawh kisai in note tungah kuamah thu kikhensak kei un.
Tuate in a hong pianglai ding nate lim hi a, a taktak pen Khazih ahi hi.
Kiniamkhiatna maanlo nuam a sate, vantungmi a biate, a muh ngeilohpi uh a mawk gengente, ci le sa lungsim tawh a kisathei mite, na thaman uh kisutkhiasak kei un.
Tua mite in Lutang ahi Khazih tawh a kizom kei uh hi. Tua Lutang panin pumpi buppi in guh le tangte le thaguite tawh kizomkhawm in thahatna ngah a, Pasian in a khansak bangbang in a khangto hi.
Tua ahih manin note in leitung thuguipite na zuihna panun Khazih tawh sikhawm khinzo na hih uh leh banghang in leitung ah a nungta laite bangin,
“Lawng kei in, ciam kei in, len kei in,”
cih thukhunte banghang in zui lailai na hi uh hiam? Tuate in mihingte thukham le thuhilhna bek hi a, tuate zuihna in sihna a piangsak hi.
Tuate in pilna maan tawh a kibat hangin phuahtawm biakna ahi hi. Kiniamkhiatna maanlo le pumpi gawtna hi a, ci le sa deihna kham nadingin kimanna a nei kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in Khazih tawh note hong thosak khinzo ahih leh Pasian taklam, Khazih tutna mun ahi tunglam a om nate na zong un.
Tunglam a om nate lunggulh unla, leitung a om nate lunggulh kei un.
Banghang hiam cihleh a si khin na hi uh a, note nuntakna in Pasian sungah Khazih tawh kiselkhawm in a om hi.
I nuntakna ahi Khazih hong kilat ciangin, note zong amah tawh minthang in na kilangkhawm ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin leitung pumpi deihna ahi numei pasal thangtatna, a siangtholo gamtatna, iiplahna, a hoihlo lunggulhna le huaihamnate ahi milim biaknate sisak un.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua mawhnate hangin a thumanglo mite tungah Pasian hehna a tung hi.
Note zong nidanglai in tua mawhnate sungah bual in na nungta ngei uh hi.
Ahih hangin tu in hehna, thangpaihna, midangte siatsak nopna, gensiatna le a kihhuai kampaunate paikhia un.
Khat le khat na kikhem kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh note in mi lui le mi lui gamtatna teng na paikhia khin uh a,
mi thak a piangsakpa in ama lim le mel tawh kituak in theihna lamah a kithaksuaksak mi thak na silh khin uh hi.
Tua bawlthakna sungah Greek mi, Judah mi, vunat mi, vunatloh mi, Greek mi a hilo, Scythia mi, sila mi, silalo mi cih a om kei hi. Khazih in na khempeuh hi a, na khempeuh sungah a om hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian teel mite, a siangtho le itna a ngah mite na hih manun hehpihna, migitna, kiniamkhiatna, lungnemna le lungduainate na silh un.
Khat le khat kithuak zo unla, mawhna kimaisak un. Kilungkim lohna na neih uh leh Khazih in note mawhna a hong maisak bangin na kimaisak un.
Tuate khempeuh banah note pumkhat a hong suaksak ki‑itna na silhthuah un.
Pasian kiang pana hong pai lungnopna in na lungsim uh hong uk tahen. Pasian in tua bang dingin pumpi khat sungah a hong sap mite na hih manun na lungdam un.

Khazih thu in note sungah pilna namkim tawh dimtak in hong teeng henla, phatna late a kipan, biakna late, kha tawh kipawl late tawh khat le khat thu kihilh tha kipia in na lungsim uhah lungdamtak in Topa na phat un.
Na kampauna uh ahi a, na gamtatna uh ahi zongin nasep na bawl khempeuh uh Topa Zeisu minin sem unla, ama tungtawn in Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko un.
Zite aw, na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Tua in Topa sungah a kilawm thu ahi hi.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah gamhtat kei un.
Tate aw, na khempeuh ah nu le pa thu na mang un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in Topa a lungkimsak hi.
Pate aw, na tate uh phin kei un. Amaute lungkia kha ding uh hi.
Silate aw, na khempeuh ah ci le sa a na tote uh thu na mang un. Maipha ngahpak nadingin amaute hong muh sung bek a thumangte hilo in Pasian kihta in lungsim takpi tawh thu na mang un.
Mihingte nasem bangin kingaihsun kei unla, Topa nasem bangin kingaihsun in na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh sem un.
Topa Khazih nasem na hih manun, ama tung pan pahtawina in gamhluahna na ngah ding uh hi cih thei un.
Ahih hangin amah in khialhna a bawl khempeuh kuamah deidan tuam nei loin a khialhna tawh kituak in a thukkik ding hi.
Tote aw, note in zong vantung ah Topa khat na neih lam uh phawk unla, na silate uh thuman le a kilawm bangin bawl un.
Lungdamna tawh kikem kawm in thunget hahkat tawntung un.
Sikkhau bulh ka thuaklawhna ahi, a kiselsim Khazih thuthukpi ka gen theih nadingin Pasian in kong hong honsak nading thu hong ngetsak un.
Gen dinga kilawm bangin teltak a thu ka lahkhiat theih nadingin zong thu hong ngetsak un.
A pualam mite tawh na kizop uh ciangin pilvangtak in gamta unla, hun hoihte khahsuah kei un.
Mi khatpeuh hong hopihnate maantak in na dawnkik theih nadingun note kampauna khempeuh ah ci bangin a al kamhoih na zang un.
Topa na ka sepkhoppih, a muanhuai nasempa ahi ka it sanggampa Tychicus in ka omzia khempeuh a hong gen ding hi.
Note omzia teng a thei ding le note lungsim tha a hong pia dingin amah kong paisak hi.
Note mipih khat ahi, a muanhuai le ka it sanggampa Onesimus zong amah tawh kong paikhawmsak hi. Hihlai a thupiang khempeuh amaute in hong gen ding uh hi.
Ka thongkiatpih Aristarchus le Barnabas tupa Mark in note hong hopih uh hi. Mark tawh kisai kong gensa thute thei khin na hih manun note kiangah a hong pai leh amah na sang un.
Justus a kici Zeisu in zong note hong hopih hi. Pasian kumpigam aa dingin vunat mite sung pan na ka seppih le tha hong pia amauteng bek ahi hi.
Note mipih ka lawmpa khat ahi Khazih sila Epaphras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian deihna khempeuh zui in picingtak a na dinkip theih nadingun amah in hanciam in nakpitak in thu hong ngetsak den hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note aa ding, Laodicea khua mite aa ding le Hierapolis khua mite aa dingin hanciamtak in na a sem hi cih thu keimah in ka theihpih hi.
Ka it mahmah siavuanpa Luke le Demas in zong note hong hopih uh hi.
Laodicea khua‑a sanggamte, Nymphas le a inn sunga kikhawm thu‑umte na hopihsak un.
Tu in hih laikhak na sim khit uh ciangin Laodicea khua pawlpite zong na simsak unla, tua mah bangin Laodicea khua pawlpite ka laikhak zong na sim un.
Archippus kiangah, “Topa hong piak nasep na tangtun zawh nadingin limtak ngaihsun in,” ci in na gensak un.
Keimah Paul in hih hopihna lai keima khut mahmah tawh ka gelh ahi hi. Kolbulh khaukhih ka thuakna thu na phawk un. Pasian hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen. Amen.

Paul, Silvanus, le Timothy‑te in Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih sunga om Thessalonica khua pawlpi mite lai kong khak uh hi. I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hong pai hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
Thu ka nget uh ciangin na min uh loin note khempeuh hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko den uh hi.
Upna tawh na nasepna uh, itna tawh na hanciamna uh le i Topa Zeisu Khazih sungah lametna hangin lungduaitak a na thuak keikainate uh i Pa Pasian mai ah kong phawk tawntung uh hi.
Kong it sanggamte aw, amah in note hong teel hi cih ka thei uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kianga ka omlai un note aa dinga ka nuntakzia uh na theihsa uh hi a, kong puak uh lungdamna thu zong a thu bek hilo in vangliatna, theihtel sinsenna le Kha Siangtho tawh na ngah uh ahi hi.
Haksatna tampi thuakin Topa thu na sang uh a, Kha Siangtho hong piak lungnopna nei in kote le Topa a hong ettehte na hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Macedonia gam le Achaia gam sunga om thu‑um mi khempeuhte etteh ding na suak uh hi.

Note tung panin Topa thu kizelkhia a, Macedonia gam le Achaia gamte bek hilo in mun khempeuh ah zong a kizel hi. Pasian na upna uh mun khempeuh ah thang khinzo ahih manin kong gen ding uh a kisam bangmah a om kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note kiang kong tunzia uh ahi zongin, na milimte uh nusia in a nungta le a maan Pasian bia dingin ama lama na kiheizia uh ahi zongin,

misite lak pana Pasian in a thawhkiksak ama Tapa vantung pan hong pai ding ngaka na omziate uh amaute in a hong gengen uh hi. Tua Tapa in hong tung ding Pasian hehna panin eite hong honkhiapa Zeisu ahi hi.
Sanggamte aw, note kianga kong paina uh a mawkna suak lo hi cih na thei uh hi.

Ahih hangin na theihsa uh bangin kote in Philippi khua ah gentheihna ka thuak uh a, a zumhuaipi in hong kibawlsiat khit nangawn in hong kilehdona tampi kawmkal panin note kiangah Pasian lungdamna thu kote Pasian sungah hangtak in kong gen veve uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thumanlo, lungsim maanlo, le khembawlna tawh ahi zongin note a hong hansuah ka hi kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in ama hoihsakna bangin, lungdamna thu hong apna tawh kizui in thu ka gen uh a, mihingte lungkim nading a gen hilo in ka lungsim uh hong sittel Pasian lungkim nadingin ka gen uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nong theihsa bangun kimaitang phatna kamte ka zang kei uh a, a simtham huaihamna ka neih loh lam uh zong Pasian in kote teci ahi hi.
Khazih sawltakte ka hihna uh tawh note tungah huhna kong nget theih uh hangin note kiang pan ahi a, midang khatpeuh kiang pan ahi zongin phatna le pahtawina ka zong kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin nute in a tanote hoihtak a a kep a khoi bangin note lakah lungnemtak in kong om uh hi.
Tua hi a, hong it hong ngai ka hih manun Pasian lungdamna thu bek hilo in note in zong kote hong it na hih manun, ka nuntakna nangawn uh piak ding kote lungkimna ahi hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh sanggamte aw, nakpitak in nasem a ka hanciamna uh na thei uh hi. Pasian lungdamna thu kong hilh manun note khatpeuh aa dingin vangik ka suah loh nadingun sun le zanin nakpi in na ka sem uh hi.
Thu‑um note lakah ka nuntakna uh siangtho in, dik in, kawkban nading a om loh lam ka teci uh note le Pasian ahi hi.
Pate in a tate uh thu a hilh bangun note hong hanthawn in tha hong pia in thu kong hilh uh hi cih na thei uh hi.
Tua in ama kumpigam le a minthanna sunga note hong sam Pasian tawh kilawm kituak in na gamtat theih nading uh ahi hi.

Hih thu hangin Pasian tungah tatsat loin kote in zong lungdam ka ko den uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kote hong gen Pasian thu na zak uh ciangin mihing hong gen banglel in sang loin Pasian hong gen taktak bangin na sang uh hi. Tua thu in thu‑um note sungah muibuntak in na hong sem hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Khazih Zeisu a um Judea gama Pasian pawlpite in Judah mite bawlsiatna a thuak bangun sanggamte aw, note in zong nomau mipihte bawlsiatna thuak na hih manun amaute tawh kibang in a gamtate na hi uh hi.
Tua Judah mite in Topa Zeisu le amaute kamsangte that uh a, kote zong hong bawlsia uh hi. Amaute in Pasian lungdamsak lo uh a, mi khempeuh zong a langbawl uh hi.

Gentile‑te in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun thu ka hilh ding uh amaute in hong kham tawntung uh hi. Amaute in tua bangin a mawhnate uh behlap tawntung uh ahih manin tu in amaute tungah Pasian thangpaihna a buuk a bek in a tungzo hi.
Sanggamte aw, ka pumpi uh note tawh tawmvei sung a kikhen hangin ka lungsim uh note tawh a omkhawm hi. Note kong mu nuam mahmah uh a, kong muh theih nadingun nakpitak in ka hanciam uh hi.
Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong pai nuam mahmah uh a, keimah Paul tektek zong nihveitak pai kong sawm hangin Satan in kote hong khaktan den hi.
Tua ahih leh kote lamet ding, nuam nading, lungdamna lukhu in bang ahi hiam? I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai ciangin ama mai‑a ka angtanpih ding uh note hilo na hi uh hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh note in kote angtanna le lungdamna na hi uh hi.
Tua hi a, lung himawhna hong lian ahih manin ko guak bek Athens khuapi ah omsuak ding hoih ka sa uh hi.
Upna ah note tha hong pia a, a hong kipsak dingin Khazih lungdamna thu tangkona ah Pasian nasem kote naseppih, i sanggampa Timothy note kiangah kong sawl uh hi.
Kote pen hih haksatnate a thuak ding maha hong kisehsa ahihlam na theihsa uh ahih manin hih gimna thuaknate hangin kuamah na patauh loh nadingun amah in note tha hong pia ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note kianga kong omlai un a sawtlo in gimna ka thuak ding uh hi ci a, kong gensa bangun a piantakpi lam tu in na thei uh hi.

Hih thu hangin hong ze‑etpa in lam khatpeuh tawh note hong ze‑et in ka sepsa khempeuh uh a mawkna a suah ding lunghimawh in om muangthei nawnlo ka hih manun na upna uh a thei dingin amah kong sawl hi.

Tu in note kiang panin Timothy hong tungkik zo hi. Upna le itna na neihna uh tawh kisai in a lungdamhuai thu hong puak hi. Kote nong phawk mahmahna uh ahi zongin note kong muhnop mahmah bangun note in zong nong muhnop mahmah nate uh hong gen hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, gimthuakna le cihmawhna ka thuak laitak un note upna in kote hong thakhauhsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa sungah kiptak in ding na hih manun tu in ka nungta uh hi.
Kote Pasian mai ah note hanga ka lungdamnate uh Pasian tungah lungdamkoh khit zawh ding hilo hi.
Na maitang uh kong muhkik nading uh le upna thu ah na kisapnate uh kong kicinsak theih nadingun sun le zanin nakpitak in thu ka ngen uh hi.
Tu in i Pa Pasian mahmah le i Topa Zeisu Khazih in note kiangah kong pai theih nading uh lampi hong honsak tahen.
Kote in note kong it mah bangun Topa in zong note khat le khat hong ki‑itsak semsem henla, mi khempeuh zong hong it theisak semsem tahen.
Topa Zeisu Khazih in ama misiangthote khempeuh tawh a hong pai ciangin i Pa Pasian mai ah sianthona ah kawkban nading om loin amah in na lungsim uh hong kipsak tahen.

Sanggamte aw a tawpkhakna a kong gennop in ah na nuntakzia ding uh le Pasian na lungdamsak zia ding uh kote kiang panin na thei khinzo uh hi. Tua bangin na khangto semsem un ci in Topa Zeisu sungah hong thumin kong hanthawn uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu tungtawn a kong piak uh thupiakte note in na thei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh na siantho nadingun numei pasal thangtatna na pelh un. Tua in Pasian deihna ahi hi.
Na pumpi uh a siangtho le a pahtawihuai dingin kemciat un.
Pasian a theilo Gentile‑te in numei le pasal kilunggulh luatna a neih bangun na om kei un.
Kong genkholh khitsa uh le kong theihsak khitsa bangun hih thute ah a khengval in kuamah gamta loin na sanggamte uh tungah gamta khial kei un. Topa in tua banga a gamta khempeuh a thukkikpa ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a thangtat dinga hong sap hilo in a siangtho dinga hong sap ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin hih thu a nialte in mihing thu a nial hilo in ama Kha Siangtho hong pia Pasian thu a nial uh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin sanggam ki‑itna tawh kisai lai kong gelh ding na kisam kei uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khat le khat na ki‑it nadingun Pasian mahmah in note hong hilh khinzo hi.
Macedonia gam a sanggamte khempeuh zong na it takpi uh hi. Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, itna na neih semsem nadingun kong hanthawn uh hi.
Thu kong piak khitsa uh bangin midangte tawh kilem in om hithiat unla, nomau vaiciat semtek un. Na khut uh tawh na semin hanciam un.
Tua hi leh kisapna bangmah nei loin a pualam mite muhna ah zong a kilawm a kituak in na nungta thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite a dah bangin na dah loh nadingun a ihmu khinsa mite thu thei lo a na om ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu si in thokik hi ci in i up mah bangin ama sunga a ihmu khinsa mite Pasian in Zeisu tawh hong tonkhawmsak ding hi ci in i um hi.
Topa hong pai dongin a nungta lai eite in a ihmu khinsa mite i makhelh peuhmah kei ding hi, ci in Topa kammal tawh kizui in kong gen uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Topa mahmah in vantung panin kikona tawh, vantungmi mangpa kikona tawh, Pasian pengkul ging tawh hong kumsuk ding hi. Tua ciangin Khazih sunga a sisa mite hong tho masa ding uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin a nungta lai eite in amaute tawh huihlak ah Topa dawn dingin meiipi tungah hong kilato ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi.
Tua ahih manin hih thute tawh khat leh khat tha na kipia un.
Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, a ni le a hun tawh kisai in note kiangah lai kong gelh ding a kisam kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh gutate zankim a a hong pai bangin Topa Ni hong tung ding hi cih teltak in na thei uh hi.

Mite in, “Lungmuanna om hi Launa omlo hi!” a cih laitak un thakhat in suksiatna a thuak ding uh hi. Naupaai numeite tungah nausuah natna a tun vat bangin thakhat in siatna amaute tungah tung dinga, a suakta kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin sanggamte aw, note na hih uh leh khuamial sungah om lo na hih manun tua Ni in guta bangin hong bingphawn lo ding hi.
Note khempeuh in khuavak tate le sunlai tate na hi uh hi. Eite in zanlai tate le khuamial tate i hi kei hi.
Tua ahih manin midangte a ihmut bangin ihmu loin pilvangtak in omin pumpi kikhalna nei ni.
Banghang hiam cihleh a ihmu mite zan ciangin ihmu uh a, zukhamte zong zan ciangin a kham uh hi.
Ahi zongin sunlai tate ahi eite in pumpi kikhalna nei ni. Upna le itna sik awmdal bulh ni. Hotkhiatna lametna sik lukhu khu ni.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama thangpaihna a thuak dinga hong koihte hilo in i Topa Zeisu Khazih hangin hotkhiatna a ngah dinga hong koihte ihi a,
amah in eite aa dingin a sipa ahi hi. Tua hi a, eite i si a, i hing zongin amah tawh i nuntakkhop theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu laitak a na hihna bangmah un khat le khat tha kipia in na kikipsak un.
Tu in, sanggamte aw, note lakah nasep a hahkatte le Topa sungah note hong makaih a, thu hong hilh mite na zahtak nadingun kong thum uh hi.
Amaute nasepna hangin itna tawh na thupi ngaihsut mahmah un. Note zong khat le khat na kilem un.
Tu in, sanggamte aw, a thumanglo mite thu na hilh un. A lungkiate tha na pia un. A thanemte na huh un. Mi khempeuh tungah thuakzawhna na nei un ci in kong hanthawn uh hi.
Thusiate thusia tawh thukkik kei un. Note aa ding le mi khempeuh aa dingin a hoih nate hanciam tawntung un.
Lungdam tawntung un.
Thungen tawntung un.
Na khempeuh ah lungdam na ko un. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in Khazih Zeisu sungah note aa dinga Pasian hong deihsak ahi hi.
Kha meikuang na mitsak kei un.
Thuhilhnate na simmawh kei un.
Na khempeuh na sittel unla a hoihte na lenkip un.
A hoihlo a kici khempeuh na pel un.

Tu in lungmuanna hong pia Pasian mahmah in na sung na pua uh hong siangthosak tahen. Na kha uh, na lungsim uh le na pumpi uh, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai ni ciangin kawkbanna a om lo dingin amah in hong kembit tahen.
Note hong sampa muanhuai ahih manin tua bangin hong sem ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, kote aa dingin thu hong ngetsak un.
A siangtho kinapna tawh sanggamte khempeuh na hopihsak un.
Hih laikhak a siangtho sanggamte khempeuh zak dingin na sim un ci in Topa min in thu kong pia hi.
I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note hong ompih tahen. Amen.
Paul, Silvanus le Timothy‑te in i Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih sunga om, Thessalonica khua pawlpi mite tungah lai kong khak uh hi.
I Pa Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah om tahen.
Sanggamte aw, na upna uh nakpitak in khang a, khat le khat na ki‑itna uh zong khang mahmah ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding uh a kiphamawh thu ahi hi.
Na thuak uh bawlsiatna le haksatna khempeuh sungah upna le thuakzawhna nei na hih manun Pasian pawlpite lakah note kong kisialhpih uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh in Pasian thukhenna a maan ahihna hong lak a, Pasian kumpigam aa dingin thuak na hih mah bangun tua kumpigam a luah dinga kilawmte na hihna uh zong hong lak hi.
No hong bawlsiate Pasian in gimna tawh a thuhkik ding pen a thuman ahi hi.
Topa Zeisu vantung pana a thahat ama vantungmite tawh hong kilat ciangin bawlsiatna a thuak note le kote tawldamna hong piakhawm ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin amah in Pasian a theilo mite le i Topa Zeisu Khazih lungdamna thu a umlo mite meikuang tawh a thukkik ding hi.
Tua mite pen Topa omna le a vangliatna huam sung panin kihawlkhia dinga, tawntung kisiatna daan a thuak ding uh hi.
Ama misiangthote hangin minthanna ngah ding le note laka ka teci panna uh a ki‑up manin thu‑um mite lakah pahtawina a ngah dingin tua Ni ciangin hong pai ding hi.

Tua ahih manin ama hong sapna tawh a kilawm banga Pasian in hong ngaihsut theih nadingin na tup uh a hoih khempeuh le na upna uh hanga piang nasep khempeuh ama vangliatna tawh hong tangtunsak nadingin thu kong ngetsak den uh hi.
I Pasian le Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha tawh kizui in note sungah i Topa Zeisu Khazih kipahtawi a, ama sungah zong note hong kipahtawi theih nadingin thu kong ngetsak uh hi.
Tu in, sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong pai nading thu le ama kianga i kikaihkhop nading thu tawh kisai a kong thum nopna uh hih bang ahi hi.
Khazih ni hong tung khinzo hi ci a, thusuak genna, thuhilhna le kote gelh bang khata a kibawltawm laikhakte hangin na lungsim uh patausak kei unla buaipih kei un.

Thu khat peuhpeuh tawh kuamah kikhem zosak kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a masa pen in mite in upna maan pan hong puk ding uh a, tua Ni khit ciangin mawhna a piangsakpa hong kilang ding hi. Amah pen siatna tapa ahi hi.
Amah in Pasian le Pasian biakna kici khempeuh langpan in tuate tungah amah hong kitawisang ding hi. Amah in Pasian biakinnpi sungah Pasian bangin tu in amah le amah Pasian kici hi.
Note kianga kong omlai in hih thute kong gen khit lam phawk nawnlo na hi uh hiam?
Tua pa a hun a tun ciang beka hong kilatkhiat theih nadingin tu laitak in bangin khaktan hiam cih na thei uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a kiselsim siatna in na a sem khinzo hi. Tua a khaktanpa a lakkhiat khit mateng amah in khaktan phot dinga,
tua khit ciangin siatna bawlpa hong kilangkhia pan ding hi. Topa hong pai ciangin ama kamsung pana pusuak a huu tawh tua siatna bawlpa sumang in ama hong kilatna vangtang tawh a susia ding hi.
Satan nasepna tawh kizui in tua siatna bawlpa hong kilangkhia dinga, ama vangliatna namkim tawh a maanlo limlamdangte le nalamdang lianpite piangsak in,
siatna a thuak ding mite in hotkhiatna a ngah theih nadingun thuman thutak deihna neilo uh ahih manin thumanlo khemna namkim a thuak ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute in zuauthu a up theih nadingun Pasian in amaute tungah khemna lianpi a tungsak ding hi.
Tua in thuman thutak um nuamlo a, thumanlohna ah nuam a sa, tua mite khempeuh tungah Pasian in thu a khen theih nading ahi hi.

Ahi zongin Topa hong it sanggamte aw, Kha in a hong siansuahna le thuman thutak na upna uh tungtawn in hotkhiatna a ngah dingin Pasian in a kipatcil a kipan note hong teel ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh tawntung ding uh a phamawh ahi hi.
Note in i Topa Zeisu Khazih minthanna na ngah theih nadingun kong hilh uh lungdamna thu tungtawn in amah in note a hong samzo hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, kiptak in ding unla kam tawh ahi a, laikhak tawh ahi zongin kong piak uh thuhilhnate na lenkip un.
Tu in i Topa Zeisu Khazih mahmah le eite hong it a, a hehpihna thupha tawh a tawntung hehnepna le lametna pha hong pia i Pa Pasian in,
na lungsim uh hong hehnem henla kampau le gamtatpha namkim ah hong kipsak tahen.
Sanggamte aw, a tawpna a kong gennop in ah, note laka hong tun mah bangin Topa thu kizel mengmeng in a kipahtawi theih nading kote aa dingin thu hong ngetsak un.
Mihoihlote le migilote khut sung panin hong kihotkhiat theih nadingin zong thu na ngen un. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh thu‑um mi ahi khin kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Topa in citak ahih manin gilopa vangliatna pan hong kemin hong kipsak ding hi.
Kong thupiakte uh tu‑a na zuih mah bangun a zuisuak dingin i Topa sungah kong muang uh hi.
Tu in, Pasian na it nading uh le Khazih banga na thuakzawh nadingun Topa in note lungsim sungah lam hong lak tahen.
Sanggamte aw, kote kiang pana na ngah uh thuhilhna a zui nuamlo a thadah sanggamte tawh na kithuah kei un, ci in i Topa Zeisu Khazih minin thu kong pia uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note kianga ka omlai un thadah loin note etteh theih dingin ka om lamtak uh na thei uh hi.
Kuama an a mawkna in ka ne kei uh a, note khatpeuh aa dingin vangik ka suah khakloh nadingun sun le zanin hanciam in na ka sem uh hi.
Note tung pan huhna ngah theih nading thu ka neih loh man uh hilo in note zuih ding limpha kong lahna uh hi zaw hi.
Note kianga ka omlai nangawn un nasem nuamlo mi in an zong ne kei hen ci in thu kong pia zo uh hi.
Nasep thadah in sepmel neilo a, midangte vaiteng tawh a kitaklah mi pawlkhat note lakah om hi cih thu ka za uh hi.
Tu in tua bang mite in na sem tangtang in amau sepsa mah a nek nadingun i Topa Zeisu Khazih minin hanthawn in thu kong pia uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, note na hih uh leh a pha bawl ding cimtak kei un.
Hih laikhak sunga kong thupiakte uh a manglo mi a om leh ciamteh unla a maizum theih nadingin na kithuahpih kei un.
Ahi zongin gal bangin na ngaihsun kei unla, sanggam bangin thu na hilh un.
Tu in nopna hong pia Topa in nopna namkim hong pia tawntung tahen. Topa in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen.
Keimah Paul in hih a nunung hopihna keima khut mahmah tawh kong gelh ahi hi. Ka laikhak khempeuh sungah hih bangin keima khut lam tawh gelhin ciaptehna ka nei hi.
I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha in note khempeuh tawh hong om tahen. Amen.
Eite hong Honpa Pasian le i lamet Topa Zeisu Khazih hong thupiakna hangin Zeisu Khazih sawltak ahi keimah Paul in,
upna lama ka tapa taktak Timothy tungah lai kong khak hi. I Pa Pasian le i Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang pana hong pai hehpihna thupha, hehpihna, le lungnopnate nangma tungah om tahen.
Macedonia gam ka pailai a kong vaikhak mah bangin Ephesus khua ah na omlai inla, mi pawlkhatte in upna maanlo thute hilh loin,
phuahtawm tangthute le a bei theilo khangthu sutnate a buaipih nawnloh nading uh na hilh in. Tua thute in upna thu ah Pasian deihna banga kilamkipna piangsak loin kinialna piangsak zaw hi.
Tu in hih banga thu kong piakna in lungsim siangtho le lungsim tawnga kisuanna a omlo upna taktak panin a hong piang itna na neih theih nading ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhatte hih thu panin lampial uh a, thu ginalo teng genin a om uh hi.
A kampaute uh le hangtak a a gen uh thute bang hiam cih nangawn a theilopi mahin thukham hilh siate a suak nuam uh hi.
Ahi zongin thukham pen ahi ding bangin kizang leh a hoih hi ci in i thei hi.

Thukham in midikte aa dingin a kibawl ahi kei hi. Ahih hangin thukham a palsatte le a lehdote, Pasian a thusimlote le mawhneite, a siangtholote le a kihhuaite, a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a thatte le tual thatte,
numei pasal mawhna a bawlte le pasal le pasal a mawhte, mihing gu‑a a zuakte, zuaugente le a maanlopi a kiciamte a kipan thu upna maan tawh kilehbulh a a gamta mite aa dingin a kibawl ahi hi.
Tua upna maanin kei tunga hong ki‑ap a phattak Pasian neihsa a thupi mahmah lungdamna thu tawh kituak ahi hi.
Hih nasep a sem dingin muanhuai sa in hong seh a, sep zawh nading tha hong guan i Topa Khazih Zeisu tungah ka lungdam hi.
Nidang in Zeisu a kosiapa, pawlpi a bawlsiapa le a gamhtatpa ka hi ngei a, ahi zongin uplohna le theihlohna tawh ka hih ahih manin, Pasian hehpihna thupha ka ngah veve hi.
I Topa hehpihna thupha kei tungah a dimlet in hong kisung a, Khazih Zeisu sunga om upna le itna zong hong neisak hi.
Khazih Zeisu in mawhneite honkhia dingin leitung ah hong pai hi cih thu a muanhuai le a sanhuai thu ahi hi. Tua mawhnei mite lakah keimah in a mawh penpa ka hi hi.
Tua hi a, hih thu hangin Zeisu Khazih in amah uma nuntak tawntungna a nei ding mite etteh ka suah theih nadingin keimah hong hehpih a, a masa pen in kei tungah lungduaina namkim a hong lakzo hi.
Tu in tawntung Kumpipa, a si theilo, a kimu theilo, amah bek a pil Pasian in pahtawina le minthanna ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.
Ka tapa Timothy aw, khatvei lai in nang tawh kisai genkholhna a kigente tawh kizui in a pha galdona na do theih nading le,
upna lenkip in lungsim tawng kisuanna om lo a na om theih nadingin hih thute hilhin kong pia hi. Mi pawlkhatte in tua thute nial uh ahih manin a upna uh tembaw kisia tawh a kibangsak uh hi.
Tua mite lakah Hymenaeus le Alexander‑te a kihel uh hi. Pasian kosiatna thu a hoihlohna a theih nadingun amaute Satan khut ah ka piakhia hi.
Tua ahih manin a masa pen a kong hanthot nop thu in deihngetna, thungetna, thumsakna le lungdamkohnate mi khempeuh aa dingin,
Pasian mi hihna le cihtakna tawh nungta in nuamtak le lungmuangtak a i om theih nadingin kumpite le thuneite khempeuh aa dingin zong thu na ngetsak in.
Tua bang hihna pen thu hoih hi a, eite hong Honpa Pasian santheih thu ahi hi.
Tua Pasian in mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngahin thuman thutak a theih ding uh a deih hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian le mite kikal ah Palai khat bek a om hi. Tua pa in mihing ahi Khazih Zeisu ahi hi.
Tua Khazih Zeisu in mi khempeuh tat nadingin amahmah a kipia zo hi. Hih in a hun a cin cianga hong kipia teci panna ahi hi.
Tua teci panna thu a tangko ding le sawltak khat dingin kei hong kiseh zo hi. Zuauthu gen loin Khazih sungah thuman kong gen in ah Gentile‑te tungah upna le thuman a hilh dingin a kisehpa ka hi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuh a om pasalte in hehna le lunghianna om loin a khut siangthote uh lamto in thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.

Tuamah bangin numeite zong nikteen puansilh a kilawm a kituak in kizem uh hen. A khelkhel sam bawldan tawh ahi a, kham le ngun, kep manphate le nikteen puansilh manpha pipite tawh ahi zongin kizem kei uh hen.
Pasian ka zahtak hi a ci numeite aa dingin a kilawm penpen kizepna in gamtat hoihna ahi hi.
Numeite in na khempeuh ah kiniamkhiatna tawh dai hithiat in thuman ding kisin uh hen.
Numeite in pasalte tungah thu hilh ding ahi a, thu a neih ding uh ahi zongin ka phal kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin pau loin om uh hen.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in Adam bawl masa a, tua khit ciangin Eve a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin khemna a thuakpen Adam hilo in numei hi a, thukham a palsat hi.
Ahi zongin numei in upna, itna le a kilawm nuntakna tawh sianthona a neih leh nausuahna ah hutna a ngah ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in pawlpi kem sia a lunggulh leh nasep hoih a deih ahi hi cih thu in thuman thutak ahi hi.
Pawlpi kem siapa in kawkban nading a omlo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, pumpi ki‑uk zo mi, lungsim ciimna a nei mi, a zahtakhuai mi, zindo a siam mi, thu a hilh thei mi hi ding hi.
Zu a dawnlo mi, lungtomlo mi, nunnem mi, kitot a hatlo mi, sum iplahlo mi, hazatna lungsim a neilo mi hi ding hi.
A tate in zahtakna le kiniamkhiatna tawh a thu a man, a innkuan sung hoihtak in a uk zo mi hi ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatin a innkuan sung a ukzia ding a theih kei leh bangci bangin Pasian pawlpi kem thei ding ahi hiam?
Thu‑um thak mi zong hilo ding hi. Tua hi kei leh kiliansak in Dawimangpa bangin thukhenna a thuak kha ding hi.
Tua thamlo in a kigensiat loh nading le Dawimangpa thangah a awk loh nadingin a pualam mite in a thupisim mi hi ding hi.
Tuamah bangin pawlpi upa dingte zong a zahtakhuai mi, thu a lehgen kawikawilo mi, lenggah zu a khamlo mi, sum a iplahlo mi,
upna thugilte lungsim siangthotak in a lenkip mi hi ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin pawlpi upa dingte kisinsak masa inla, mawhsak nading a om kei leh pawlpi upa sem pan uh hen.
Tuamah bangin a zite uh zong zahtakna a ngah mi, mi a gensialo mi, a lungsim a uk zo mi, na khempeuh ah a muanhuai mi hi ding uh hi.
Pawlpi upate in zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate le a innkuan sung hoihtak in a ukzo mi hi ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh pawlpi nasep hoihtak in a sem upate in minphatna le Khazih Zeisu sunga om upna ah hansanna a ngah uh hi.
Nang kiangah a sawtlo in kong pai ding ka lamen a, ahi zongin hih thute kong gelh veve hi.
Ahi zongin kong zekai khak zenzen leh Pasian inn sunga na gamtatzia ding teng na theih dingin lai kong khak hi. Tua Pasian inn in thuman thutak khuampi le bulpi ahi, a nungta Pasian pawlpi ahi hi.

Nial nading a omlo Pasian mi hihna thuthuk lianpi in, Pasian mahmah pumpi tawh hong kilang a, Kha in amah diktangsak in, Vantungmite in amah mu a, Gentile‑te lakah ama thu kihilh in, Leitung mite in ama thu uma, Thupitak in amah kilato hi, cih thu ahi hi.
Tu in Kha in teltak a hong gen in ah hun nunung lam ciangin mi pawlkhatte in thu‑upna pan pialkhia ding uha zuau thei khate khemna le dawite thuhilhna a zui ding uh a,
a lungsim uh siksa a bik tawh a kibang kineihkhemna tawh zuauthu gen in,
kipi kiteen ding kham uh a, an pawlkhatte zong nek loh dingin thu a pia uh hi. Tua ante pen thu‑umte le thuman a thei mite in lungdam ko in a nek dingun Pasian in a bawl ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian piansak na khempeuh a hoih vive hi a, lungdamkohna tawh kisang peuh leh nial ding khat beek a om kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian kammal le thungetna in tuate a siangsak hi.
Hih thute sanggamte tungah na hilh leh pilvangtak in na zuihsa upna le thuhilhna maan tawh a kipantah Zeisu Khazih nasem hoih khat na suak ding hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian thu tawh kituaklo, pitekte gen theih phuahtawm tangthute nial inla, biakna mi na hih theih nadingin kisin in.

Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi kisek a kisinna ah phattuamna tawmkha a om hi. Ahi zongin biakna mi hihna in na khempeuh aa dingin phattuamna piangsak a, tua in tu laitak nuntakna le hong tung ding nuntakna aa dingin a kipsak hi.
Hih in thuman thutak le a sanhuai thu ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a nungta Pasian sungah lametna nei i hih manin nakpi in na i sem a, zahkona zong tampi i thuak hi. Tua Pasian in mi khempeuh Honpa hi a, a diakdiak in a um mite aa ding ahi hi.
Hih thute a zuih nadingun sawl inla hilh in.
Khangno na hihna kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in. Kampauna, gamtatna, itna, lungsim ngaihsutna, upna le sianthonate ah thu‑um mite etteh dingin om in.
Kong pai mateng Lai Siangtho simna, hanthotna le thuhilhnate na hahkat in.
Pawlpi makaite khutngakna le kamsangte thugenna tawh nang hong kipia na sunga om letsong thudon loin om kei in.
Mi khempeuh in na khantohna a hong muh theih nadingin hih thute hoihtak in lungngai inla, limtak in zui in.
Na gamtatna le thu‑upna thupi ngaihsut in. Tua bangin hihsuak leteh nang bekthamlo in na thugen a za mite zong na honkhia ding hi.
A khangham papite taii giapgiap kei inla, pa bangin ngaihsun in hanthawn zaw in. A khangno lai pasalte, sanggamte bangin ngaihsun in.
A khangham numeite nute bangin ngaihsun in. A khangno lai numeite lungsim siangtho tawh sanggamte bangin ngaihsun in.
Meigong taktakte na zahtak in.

Ahih hangin tu le ta a nei meigongte ahih leh a tu a tate in Pasian a zahtakna uh a innkuan sungah a lah theih nading sin masa in nu le pa, pi le pute itna thukkik uh hen. Tua in Pasian mai ah a hoih le a sanhuai thu ahi hi.
Meigong taktakte in amau kia bek omin Pasian muang uh a, thumna le thungetna sun le zanin a nei dente ahi uh hi.
A paktat meigongte ahih leh a nuntak uh hangin a si ahi uh hi.
Tua bang meigongte in kawkbanna a neih loh nadingin thuhilh in.
Mi khatpeuh in ama tanaute a diakdiak in ama innkuanpihte a vak nop kei leh amah in upna thu a nial hi a, thu‑umlote sangin a sia zaw lai hi.
Kum 60 a pha nailo le, pasal khat sanga a tam zaw a nei ngei meigongte meigong sazian sungah na khum kei in.

Gamtat hoih hi ci a, pahtakna a ngah mi, a tate hoihtak in a kem mi, zindo a siam mi, misiangthote khe a silsak mi, micimawhte a huh mi, gamtat hoih khempeuh ahih zawh zahin a hanciam mi ahih leh meigong sazian ah na khum in.
A khanglai meigongte sazian sungah khum kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute ci le sa lunggulhna in Khazih tunga a kipiakna uh a zawh ciangin pasal a neikik nuam uh hi.
Amaute in a kiciamna masa uh palsat uh ahih manin mawhsakna a thuak uh hi.

Tua thamlo in amaute thadah uh a, inn khat khit inn khatah a kawi vakvak uh hi. Tua bek zong hilo in mi gensiat hatin midangte thuteng ah kitaklah uh a, gen dingin a kilawmlo thute a gen kawikawi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin a khanglai meigongte in pasal neikik in tanu tapa nei in innsung makaih in galpa in a gensiat theih nadingin hunhoih bangmah pia kei le uh ka deih hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a khanglai meigong pawlkhatte lampial in Satan nung a zui khin uh hi.
Pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin thu‑um mi khatin a inn ah meigong a neih leh, amau mahin kem uh henla, pawlpi tungah vangik suan kei uh hen. Tua hi leh pawlpi in meigong taktakte a kem thei ding hi.
Hoihtak a pawlpi a makaih makaite, a diakdiak in thugen le thuhilh nasep hanciamtak in a semte in pahtawina a zah nih a ngah ding uh a kilawm hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Lai Siangtho in, “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitak in a muuk hencipsak kei in. Na a sem mi in thaman a ngah ding kilawm hi,” a ci hi.
Pawlpi makai khat a kimawhmat ciangin teci nih bang thum bang a om kei leh sang kei in.
Midangte in zong a lau theih nadingun mawhna a bawl mite mipi mai ah na taii in.
Hih thute ah teeltuam, paihtuam, angvantuam nei loin na zuih nadingin Pasian mai, Topa Zeisu Khazih mai le a kiteel vantungmite mai ah thu kong pia hi.
Mi khatpeuh tungah na khut nga mengmeng kei in. Mi dangte mawhna tawh kisawh kha kei in. Siangthotak in na kikem in.
Na gilpi hang le na cinat theih zelzelna hangin tuisiang bek dawn loin lenggahtui zong tawmtawm na zang in.
Mi pawlkhatte a mawhna uh teltak in kilang pah a, thu a kikhenma nangawn in kithei hi. Ahih hangin mi pawlkhatte thu a kikhen khit ciang bekin a mawhna uh kilangpan hi.
Tuamah bangin mi pawlkhatte a gamtat hoihna uh teltak in kilang pah a, teltak in a kilangkhia pahlo gamtat hoihte zong a kiselcip zo kei hi.
Sila suahna hakkol nuai‑a omte khempeuh in Pasian min le thuhilhnate a kigensiat loh nadingin a tote uh a kilawm a kituak in zahtak uh hen.

A tote uh thu‑um mi ahih leh sanggam khat hilel hang ci in zahtak bawl lo tuan kei uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute nasepna hanga phattuamna a ngah a tote un thu‑um mi le a ki‑itpihte uh ahih manin hanciam zawkan in na a sep ding uh ahi hi. Hih thute hilh inla hanthawn in.
Biakna paizia tawh a kituaklo thuhilhna le i Topa Zeisu Khazih thuhilhna maan taktak tawh a kituaklo thuhilhna mi khatpeuh in a hong hilh leh,
a kiphasak, bangmah theilo, thu kheldot le kam kinial ding bek ut mi ahi hi. Tua bang thute in ki‑eenna, kitot kiselna, kigensiatna, kimuanmawhna le,
lungsimsia pana hong piang kimanna neilo kampau, thuman thutak thei theilo in Pasian biakna pen hauh theih nading lampi in a ngaihsunte ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite kiang panin na kihemkhia in.
Tu in, lungkimtak a Pasian mi hihna in hauhna lianpi ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh leitung ah bangmah keng loin i suak a, bangmah keng loin i paikhia ding hi cih i theitel hi.
Tua ahih manin annek ding, puansilh ding i neih zahzah tawh lungkim ni.
Ahih hangin a hau nuam mite in ze‑etna thang sungah awk uh a, a haihuai le a lauhuai lunggulhna tampite sungah a awk uh hi. Tuate in siatna le manthanna sungah amaute a tumsuksak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh sum deihluatna in siatna nam khempeuhte bulpi khat ahi hi. Sum deihluatna hangin mi pawlkhatte upna panin lampial uh a, lunggimna tampi a kisuan uh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian mipa aw, nang na hih leh tuate taisan in. Diktatna, Pasian deihna banga nuntakna, upna, itna, thuakzawhna le lungnemnate na delh in.
Upna thu tawh kipawl a pha galdona na do in. Nang zong teci tampite mai ah hoihtak a na pulak khitsa ahi Pasian hong sapna tawh na ngah nuntak tawntungna na lenkip in.
Pontius Pilate mai ah hoihtak in teci a pang Khazih Zeisu le, na khempeuh nuntakna a pia Pasian mai ah thu kong piak inah,
i Topa Zeisu Khazih hong kilat mateng ninbanglo, kawkbanglo dingin hih kong thupiak na zui in.
Ama hun a tun ciangin amah hong kilang ding hi. Tua Pasian in thupha a ngah amah bek a lianbel Ukpa, kumpite Kumpipa le tote Topa ahi hi.
Amah bek a si theilo hi a, a kineh theilo khuavak sungah a teengpa ahi hi. Kuamah in a muhngeiloh, kuamah in a muhtheihloh, tua Topa tungah pahtawina le a tawntung vangliatna om tahen. Amen.
Tu laitak a mihaute tungah hih thute hilh in. Amaute kiphasak kei uh hen. A kiplo hauhna muang loin nuamtak a i zat ding, na khempeuh kicingtak in a hong pia, a nungta Pasian muang zaw uh hen.
Na sep hoih tampi a neih theih nadingun na hoih sem uh hen. Cingh uh henla, piakkhiat nopna lungsim nei in,
a hong tung ding hunah bulkip muanhuai ahi dingin amaute aa ding khol uh hen. Tua hi leh nuntak tawntungna a lenkipte ahi ding uh hi.
Timothy aw! Na kep dinga hong kipia thute hoihtak in kem in. A kihhuai, mawk paupaunate le, pilna takpi a kisa kha thu kinialnate pel in.
Mi pawlkhatte in tua bangte zui kha uh ahih manin upna panin a pial uh hi. Hehpihna thupha nang tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
Khazih Zeisu sunga om a hong kikamciam nuntakna tawh kizui in Pasian deihna tawh Zeisu Khazih sawltak khat a suak keimah Paul in,
kong it ka tapa Timothy lai kong khak hi. I Pa Pasian le i Topa Khazih Zeisu kiang pana hehpihna, hehpihna thupha le lungnopnate nang tungah om tahen.
Sun le zanin ka thungetna ah nang kong phawk den hi. Tua banga kong phawkna ah lungsim tawngah kisuanna om hetlo ka pu ka pate mah bangin a na ka sepsak Pasian tungah lungdam thu ka ko hi.
Na khitui luannate ka phawk a, ka lung a nop theih nadingin nang kong mu nuam mahmah hi.
Nang sungah upna maan a om lam ka thei hi. Tua upna na pi Lois le na nu Eunice‑te in nei masa a, nang zong tua bang upna mah na neih lam ka thei hi.
Tua ahih manin nang tunga ka khutngakna tawh na ngah Pasian hong piak letsong na satsuah nadingin kong phawksak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in launa lungsim hong pia hilo in hanna, itna, ki‑ukzawhna hong guan hi.
Tua ahih manin i Topa thu teci na pan ding maizum kei inla, ama hanga ka thongkiatna zong hong maizumpih kei in. Lungdamna thu hanga ka thuaknate Pasian thahatna tawh hong thuakpih zaw in.

Tua Pasian in eite hong honkhia a, a siangtho sapna tawh hong sam hi. Amah in eite gamtatna hang hilo in ama ngimna le a hong hehpihna thupha hangin hong sam ahi hi. Amah in leitung a pianma pekin tua hehpihna Khazih Zeisu sunga a hong piak khitsa ahi hi.

Ahi zongin tu in i Honpa Zeisu Khazih hong kilatna tawh tua thu a hong kitheisak zo hi. Tua Zeisu Khazih in sihna beisak a, lungdamna thu tungtawn in nuntakna le sih theihlohna thu khuavak bangin hong tangsak zo hi.
Tua lungdamna thu Gentile‑te tungah a tangkopa, sawltakpa le thuhilh siapa a suak dingin Pasian in kei hong sehzo hi.
Hih thu hangin hih gimnate ka thuak a, ahih hangin ka maizum kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka uppa ka thei a, amah ka piak khitsate, tua Ni dongin kem zo ding hi cih ka theitel hi.
Kei tung pana na zaksa a maan thuhilhnate Khazih Zeisu sunga om upna le itna tawh lenkip in.
Nang tunga hong kipiaksa na hoih, eite sunga a teeng Kha Siangtho tha tawh na kem in.
Asia gama om mi khempeuh in kei hong nusia khin uh hi cih na thei hi. Tuate lakah Phygellus le Hermogenes‑te zong a kihel uh hi.
Topa in Onesiphorus‑te innkuan thupha pia tahen. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in tam veipi tha hong guan a, mat le hen ka thuakna zong, a hong maizumpih kei hi.
Amah in Rome khuapi a hong tun ciangin kuhkaltak in kei hong zonga, hong mukhia hi.
Topa in tua Ni ciangin amah hehpihna pia tahen. Amah in Ephesus khua ah lam tuamtuam tawh kei hong huh mahmah hi cih na thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka tapa aw, Khazih Zeisu sunga om hehpihna thupha hangin thahat in om in.
Teci tampite mai‑a ka thugen na zaksa thute, midangte zong a hilhsawn thei dingin mi muanhuaite tungah na pia in.
Zeisu Khazih galkap hoih bangin haksatnate na thuak keikai in.
Galkap a sem mi peuhmah in amah galkap a suaksakpa a lungdamsak nadingin ama nuntak nading vaite tawh a kikai‑awksak kei hi.
Tai kidemna ah a tai mite in zuih ding ngeinate zui in a tai kei uh leh pahtawina lukhu a ngah kei ding uh hi.
Hahkattak in lo a khopa in lo panin a piang a gahte a ngah masak ding kilawm hi.
Hih kong gen thute ngaihsun inla, Topa in a vekpi in hong theitelsak tahen.
Ka hilh lungdamna thu in misite lak panin a kithokiksak, David suan Zeisu Khazih thu hi a,
tua lungdamna thu hangin gimna ka thuak a, migilo khat bangin sikkhau kikhih zah dongin ka om hi. Ahi zongin Pasian thu ahih leh sikkhau a kikhih thei kei hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian teelsa mite in hotkhiatna ahi Khazih Zeisu sunga om, tawntung minthanna a ngah theih nadingun gimna namkim ka thuak hi.
Hih thu in thuman thutak ahi hi. Amah tawh i sihkhop leh, Amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi.
Gimna i thuak leh, Amah tawh i mangkhawm ding hi. Amah i nial leh, Amah in zong eite hong nial ding hi.
Eite in i cihtak loh hangin, Amah citak veve hi. Amah le amah kinial theilo hi.
Kam kinialna in phattuamna piangsak lo a, a za mite siasak zaw ahih manin kam a kinial loh nadingun Topa mai ah thupia inla phawksakkik in.
Maizum nading a omlo thuman thutak a khentel siam Pasian in a san theih nasempa na suah theih nadingin hanciam in.
A kihhuai le kimanna neilo thute pel in. Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang thute in biaknamisak lo semsem hi.
Amau thugente in cancer bangin kizel ding hi. Hymenaeus le Philetus‑te zong tua bang mite lakah a kihel uh hi.
Amaute thuman thutak pan pialkhia uh a, thawhkikna pen a beisa thu hi ci uh ahih manin mi pawlkhatte upna a siasak uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian khuambulpi in kiptak in dinga, a tungah hih bangin a kiciamteh hi. “Topa in ama mite a thei hi,” cihleh “Khazih min a lo mi peuhmah siatna panin kiheikhia tahen,” cih thu ahi hi.
Ahih hangin inn lianpi khat sunga vanzat ahi um le bel‑te, kham le ngun bek tawh kibawl hi khin lo hi. Sing le lei tawh kibawl um le bel zong a om hi. Pawlkhatte thupi a, pawlkhatte thupilo hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatin a thupilo nate panin a kisiansuah leh a kizatna a thupi, a kisianthosak le a Neipa in a zat theih ding na hoih khat peuhpeuh a sem dinga a kizang thei vanzat a suak ding hi.
Khangno lunggulhna hoihlote taisan in. Lungsim siangthotak a Topa min a lote tawh diktatna, upna, itna le kilemnate delh in.
A haihuai le theitel lopi a kiselnate in kitotna piangsak hi cih thei na hih manin na pel in.
Topa nasempa in kuamah tawh kitawng lo dinga, mi khempeuh tungah thudik in thu zong hilh thei dinga, thuakzawhhatna zong nei in,
amah a langpan mite lungnemtak in thu a hilh ding hi. Pasian in amaute lungsim kikhelsak leh amaute in thuman thutak thei ding uh a,
tua ciangin amaute in hong phawkin Dawimangpa thang panin a hong suakta ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in ama deih bangbang in a sawl theih dingin a mat mite ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin hih thu ciamteh in. Ni nunung ni ciangin hun haksa hong tung ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mite in amau le amau bek a ki‑it, sum a duh, a kisial, a kiphasak, mi kosiat hat, nu le pate thu a manglo, a lungdam theilo, a siangtholo,
itna a neilo, mi dangte mawhna a maisak nuamlo, mi a gensia, amau pumpi ki‑uklo, a gamhtat, thuhoih a deihlo,
thuciamna a palsat, lungtang a khauh, a kihisak, Pasian it ding sangin noptat ding ut zaw ding uh a,
Pasian mi bangin kibawl in, ahi zongin a vangliatna nial ding uh hi. Tua bang mite na pel in!
Tua mite in midangte inn ah va lut khiankhian uh a, lunggulhna tuamtuam zui in, mawhna tawh a kidim numei ginalote a thuzawh ding uh hi.
