A beisa hunin Gentile‑te gamtatna mah bangin numei pasal paktatna, a hoihlo lunggulhna, zukhamna, gualnop pawibawlna, zunek pawikhamnate le a kihhuai milim biakna sunga i kidiahnate in a simphat khin mahmah hi.
Tu in tua noptatnate sungah amaute banga na bual loh uh ciangin lamdangsa in hong gensia uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in a nungta le a si mite tungah thukhen dingin a om gigepa tungah amaute thu ciat a puak ding uh hi.
Tua thu hang mahin misisate tungah lungdamna thu a kitangko khin hi. Tua in amaute a leitung pumpi uh thu kikhen in, Pasian deihna bangin a kha uh a nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
Na khempeuh a bei ding hun hong nai zo hi. Tua ahih manin thu na nget theih nadingun na pumpi uh hoihtak uk unla, na pilvang un.
A dang khempeuh sangin khat le khat na ki‑it mahmah un. Banghang hiam cihleh itna in mawhna tampi a sel hi.
Phun loin khat le khat zin na kido un.
Pasian hehpihna thupha tampi a kem neihsa kemsiamte bangin kha letsong na ngah bang uh zangtek unla khat le khat tha kipia un.

Minthanna le ukzawhna a nei tawntung Zeisu Khazih tungtawn in na khempeuh ah Pasian min a than theih nadingin thugen mi peuhmah in Pasian kammal tektek mah bangin gen henla, nasem mi peuhmah in Pasian in a piak a hih theihna zah tawh sem hen. Amen.
Kong itte aw, meikuang bangin a sa ze‑etna haksa na thuak uh ciangin thu lamdangpi khat hong tung bangin ngaihsun in lamdangsa kei un.
Ahi zongin ama minthanna hong kilat ciangin nuamna lianpi tawh na kipah theih nadingun Khazih thuakna a thuakpih na hih manun lungdam un.

Khazih min hangin zahkona na thuak uh leh mihampha na hi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh minthanna Kha le Pasian Kha note tungah hong om ahi hi. Amaute in Khazih a kosiat uh hangin note in na pahtawi uh hi.
Note, kuamah in mithahna, guktakna, tatsiatna, midangte thu ah kitaklahna thute hangin bangmah thuaklawh kei un.
Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in Christian ahih manin gimna a thuak leh maizum kei henla, tua min a puak manin Pasian phat zaw hen.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian innkuan sung panin thukhenna a kipat ding hun hong tungzo hi. Eite in thukhenna thuak masa ding i hih leh Pasian lungdamna thu a sanglo mite a tawpna ah bang suak ding uh ahi hiam?
Tu in, “Midikte nangawn in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh haksa ahih leh, Pasian a thusim lote le mimawhte bangci ding uh ahi hiam?”
Tua ahih manin Pasian deihna tawh kizui in gimna a thuakte in gamtat hoih zomsuak uh henla, a muanhuai a Piangsakpa tungah a nuntakna uh ap hen.
Note bangmah a makai khat ka hih banah Khazih thuak gimnate teci a pangpa khat ka hihna le a hong kilang ding vangliatna a ngahpa khat ka hihna tawh kizui in,

note laka om makaite kong hanthot nop thu in note laka om Pasian tuuhonte vak unla cing un. Sep loh phamawh hi cihna tawh hilo zaw in sepnopna lungsim tawh sem un. A maanlo a sum ngahnopna tawh hilo in lawpnatak tawh sem un.
Pasian in note hong ap tuuhonte tungah ukcip gawp kei unla, amaute hong etteh theih dingin om zaw un.
Tua hi leh Tuucing Mangpa hong kilat ciangin a tul theilo minthanna lukhu na ngah ding uh hi.

Tuamah bangin khangnote aw, makaite thu mang un. Note khat le khat thu kimang unla, kiniamkhiatna silh un. Banghang hiam cihleh, “Pasian in a kiphasakte langpan a, A kiniamkhiatte hehpihna thupha a pia hi.”
Tua ahih manin Pasian in a hun a tun ciangin a hong lapsang theih nadingin a thahat Pasian khut nuai ah kiniamkhiat un.
Amah in note hong lung himawh ahih manin na lung hihmawhna khempeuh uh amah suan un.
Na galpa uh Dawimangpa in a valhtum ding mi zong in humpi nelkai hawk bangin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua ahih manin pumpi ki‑uk unla, kigingsa in omden un.
Leitung mun tuamtuam a om na sanggamte un zong tua bangin thuak uh hi cih thei unla, Dawimangpa dal in upna tawh dingkip un.

Khazih Zeisu sunga tawntung minthanna sungah eite hong sampa in hehpihna thupha khempeuh a neipa Pasian ahi hi. Note in tawmvei sung gimna na thuak khit uh ciangin amah in hong picingsak in hong kipsak henla, hong thakhauhsak in hong phutkip tahen.
Tua Pasian in minthanna le ukzawhna nei tawntung tahen. Amen.
A tomno a kong gelh hih laikhak, a muanhuai i sanggampa Silvanus kong puasak hi. Hih thute Pasian hong hehpihna thupha taktak hi cih teci pangin kong hanthawn hi. Hih thute ah na kip un.
Note mah tawh teelna a ngahkhawm Babylon khuapi a om numei in note hong hopih hi. Ka tapa Mark in zong hong hopih hi.
Itna kinapna tawh khat le khat kihopih un. Khazih Zeisu sunga om note khempeuh tungah nopna om tahen. Amen.
Zeisu Khazih sila le sawltak khat ahi keimah Simon Peter in i Pasian le Honpa Zeisu Khazih dikna hanga kote tawh a manpha mahmah upna a ngahkhawm mite lai kong khak hi.
Pasian le i Topa Zeisu na theihna uh tungtawn in note tungah hehpihna thupha le lungnopna hong khang semsem tahen.
Ama vangliatna le ama hoihna tawh eite hong sampa i theihna tungtawn in nuntakna le Pasian sutna tawh kisai na khempeuh Pasian ahihna vangliatna tawh eite hong pia zo hi.

Amah in a thupi mahmah le a manpha mahmah kamciamnate tua vangliatna mah tawh hong pia zo hi. Tua kamciamte tungtawn in a hoihlo lunggulhnate hanga a piang hih leitung siatna tawh kipelh in Pasian pianzia na ngah theih nading uh ahi hi.
Hih thu hang mahin upna tungah hoihna, hoihna tungah thutheihna,
thutheihna tungah pumpi deihna khamna, pumpi deihna khamna tungah thuakzawhna, thuakzawhna tungah Pasian sutna,
Pasian sutna tungah sanggam banga kikhualna, sanggam banga kikhualna tungah itna a neihthuah dingin na hanciam un.
Banghang hiam cihleh hihte nei in khangsak le uh teh Topa Zeisu Khazih theihtelna ah kimanna neilo le gahsuah loin na om kei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin hihte a neilo mi ahih leh a mit mangin naicik bek muthei a, a mawhna luiteng kisilsiangsak khinzo ahihlam zong a mangngilh mi ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note a hong kisapna le a hong kiteelna a kiciat sinsen nadingin hanciam semsem un. Tua hi leh na puk ngei kei ding uh a,
i Topa le Honpa Zeisu Khazih tawntung kumpigam sung luttheihna thu note a kicing in hong kipia ding hi.
Hih thuman thutak thei in a kip khinsa na hi uh zongin hih thute mah kong phawksakkik nuam lai hi.
Hi hi, hih buuk sungah ka teen laiteng hih thute kong phawksak ding hoih ka sa hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh i Topa Zeisu Khazih in a hong lahsa mah bangin hih ka buuk ka suahkhia baihta ding hi ci in ka thei hi.
Tua thamlo in ka sih khit ciangin zong hih thute na phawk tawntung theih nadingun ka hanciam nuam hi.

I Topa Zeisu Khazih hong paina thu le ama vangliatna thu kong gen uh ciangin pilna tawh a kiphuak tawm tangthu a hong gen ka hi kei uh a, mittang mahmah tawh ka muhsa uh ama thupina hong gen ka hi zaw uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh a thupi mahmah vanglian kiang panin, “Hihpa in hong lungdamsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa ahi hi,” a ci aw khat ama tungah a hong ginkhiat in amah in Pa Pasian pahtawina le vangliatna a ngah hi.
Amah tawh mual siangtho tunga ka omkhop laitak un vantung panin a hong ging hih aw kote in ka za uh hi.

Tua banah a kip a kho zaw kamsangte thugente i nei hi. Note lungsim sungah, zingsang khua hong vak in zingsol hong suah mateng khuamial laka meitang bangin hih thute lim ngaihsut le uh teh note aa dingin a hoih mahmah hi.
Nadang khempeuh sangin hih thu na thei masa un. Lai Siangtho sunga om genkholhna thute khat beek kamsangpa theih tawmna tawh a hong piang ahi kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh genkholhna thute in mihing deihna banga hong piang hilo in Pasian misiangthote in Kha Siangtho sawl bangbang in a gen uh ahi hi.

Ahi zongin Israel mite lakah kamsangzuaute a om ngei mah bangin note lakah zong thuzuau hilhte a hong om ding hi. Amaute in a hong siasak thei upna maanlote hong lutpih sim ding uh a, amaute a lei Topa nangawn nial uh ahih manin amaute tung mahah siatna tung pah ding hi.
Mi tampi in tua mite siatna lampite zui ding uh a, amaute hangin thuman thutak lampi a zahko ding uh hi.
Amaute duhhop huaiham mahmah uh ahih manin zuauthu tawh note nek zonna in hong nei ding uh hi. Tanglai a kipan in Pasian in amaute thukhen zo a, a sawtlo in kisiatna a thuak ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna a bawl vantungmite nangawn Pasian in koihkhong loin hell sungah khia a, thukhenna thuak dingin khuamial sungah sikkhau tawh a khihcip hi.
Tanglai leitung mite zong koihkhong loin Pasian a thusimlo tua mite tungah tuiciin tungsak a, dikna thu a hilh Noah tawh a kisim mihing giatte a honkhia hi.
A nung ciangin Pasian a thusimlo mite tungah a piang ding thu a lahna in Sodom le Gomorrah khuate thukhen in susia a, vut le vai a suaksak hi.
Ahih hangin migilote kihhuai gamtatnate hangin lunggimna a thuak midikpa Lot a honkhia hi.
(Banghang hiam cihleh amaute laka a teeng tua midikpa in amaute tatsiatna teng nisim in mu in a kampau tenguh zaza ahih manin a dik ama lungsim a gimsak mahmah hi.)
Tua hi a, Pasian a kihta mite ze‑etna pan a hotkhiat zia ding le thukhen ni cianga daanpiak dingin migilote a koihzia,

a diakdiak in a kihhuai lunggulhna tawh ci le sa deihna a zui mite le ukna a thusimlo mite daan a piak dingzia Topa in a thei hi. Tua mite haihan in amau thu bek thusa uh a, tunglam a thuneite nangawn a gensia ngam uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute sanga a vanglian zaw le a thahat zaw vantungmite nangawn in Topa mai ah tuate zahko loin zong a mawhsak kei uh hi.

Hih mite in amaute theihloh peuhpeuh gensia uh a, ngaihsutna a neilo thah ding le suksiat ding bek a ngak ganhing gilo tawh a kibang uh hi. Ganhing gilote mah bangin amaute zong a mangthang ding uh hi.

Amaute in diktatlohna thaman a sang ding uh hi. Amaute nopsakna in sun tangpi in noptat a omna ahi hi. Note tawh ankuang hong um uh ciangin a tatsialo bangin a kigualnop bawl uh hangin a nin le a kawkbang a suak uh hi.
Angkawm nopna lungsim tawh a mit hah uh kidim a, mawhna bawl loin om theilo uh ahih manin lungsim palau mite a zol uh hi. Huaihamna lamah siam mahmah uh a, hamsiatna a ngah mite ahi uh hi.
Amaute in lampi maan nusia in lampial khin uh a, Beor tapa Balaam lampi a zui uh hi. Tua Balaam in thumanlohna thaman a deihpa ahi hi.
A pau theilo laa khat mihing bangin pau in tua kamsangpa gamtatna maanlo taii a, kamsangpa haitatna a kham hi.
Tua mite in tui omlo tuikhuk le huihpi mut mang meiilum tawh a kibang uh hi. Amaute aa dingin a mial bikbek tawntung khuamial a kikoihkhol zo hi.
Amaute in kimanna neilo kiphatsakna kam pau uh a, khialhna sunga a om mite lak panin a suakta mite, ci le sa lunggulhna zui in a paktat dingin a zol uh hi.
Ka hong suaktasak ding uh hi ci in midangte kamciam a piak uh hangin amaute mahmah siatna sila ahi uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na khatpeuh in mi khat a thuzawh leh, tua mipa in tua sila ahi hi.

Topa le Honpa ahi Zeisu Khazih thei in, a thanghuai leitung nuntakna pan a suahtak khit uh ciangin tua thanghuai leitung nuntakna sungah awkkik a, a guallelh uh leh, tua mite pianzia in a patna sangin a tawpna a sia zaw hi.
Amaute in a kipia a siangtho thupiakna thei khin uh a, a nungngatsan uh sangin tua thuman lampi a thei kha lo uh hi leh amaute aa dingin a hoih zaw hi.
Ahih hangin, “Ui in a luak a nekik hi. Vok in a kisil khit ciangin buan lakah a bualkik hi,” a kici paunak bang tektek in amaute tungah a piang hi.
Kong itte aw, tu‑a kong laikhak a nihveina ahi hi. (Hih laikhak nihte in ngaihsutna gina na neihna uh kong phawkkiksakna ahi hi.)
A siangtho kamsangte in nidang a a gen uh thute Topa le Honpa in sawltakte tungtawn a hong piak thute na phawkkik ding uh ka deih hi.
A masa pen in hih thu na thei un. Hun nunung ciangin amaute lunggulhna hoihlo zui in a gamta, mi a zahko thei mite hong piang ding uh hi.
Amaute in, “Ama hong paikik nading kamciamna koi ah omta hiam? I pu i pate si zota uh a, na khempeuh a kipiansak cil a bangbang in omlai hi,” ci in a gen ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tanglai in Pasian in a kammal tawh vantung nate piangsak in leitung zong tui in a tup pawl le tui tunga a dawkkhia pawl a omsak thu thei gige napi a kitheihmawh bawl uh hi.
Tua hun lai a om leitung zong tui in tummang in kisia hi cih thute amaute in a kimangngilh bawl uh hi.
Tua thamlo in Pasian in a kammal mah tawh tu laitak a a om vantung nate le leitung zong thukhen ni le Pasian a thusimlo mite a kisuksiat ni cianga meikuang tawh haltum dingin a kikoih khol ahi hi.
Ahi zongin kong itte aw, Topa aa dingin ni khat in kum 1,000 bang hi a, kum 1,000 zong ni khat mah bang ahi hi cih thu mangngilh kei un.

Mi pawlkhat in zekai hi a cih bangun Topa in ama kamciamna a tangtunsak nadingin a zekai kei hi. Eite khat zong kisialo in i vekpi in mawhna i kisikkik ding hong deih manin lungduaitak in hong ngak ahi hi.

Ahi zongin Topa Ni in zan laitak a hong pai guta bangin hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin vantung nate ginngaih mahmahsa in a mangthang ding uh a, a sunga om nate zong salua in a tuimang ding hi. Leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh zong a kangtum ding hi.
Tua bangin na khempeuh tuimang ding ahih manin note bangci bang mi hi dingin kilawm cih ngaihsun un. Pasian sutna le siangtho nuntakna ah gamta unla,

Pasian Ni hong tun ding kal ngaklah in lametna tawh na om ding uh kilawm hilo ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh tua ni ciangin vantung kuangin tuisuak dinga, a sunga om na khempeuh zong salua in a tuimang ding hi.
Ahih hangin eite in ama hong kamciamna bangin midikte a teenna van thak le lei thak i lamen hi.
Tua ahih manin kong itte aw, tuate lamen na hih manun ama mai ah lungmuangtak in na om theih nadingun a ninbanglo, mawhsakna a omlo dingin om un.
I it mahmah i sanggampa Paul in zong amah a kipia pilna tawh kizui in lai sunga hong gelh mah bangin lungduaitak a Topa hong ngakna in hotkhiatna ngah theih nading ahi hi ci in na ciamteh un.

Amah in a laikhak dang khempeuh ah zong tua thute mah a gen hi. Tua laikhakte sungah a telhak thu pawlkhat om a, bangmah theilo mite le lungsim kiplo mite in tua thute a lehkaih uh hi. Lai Siangtho sunga om a dang thute zong tuamah bangin lehkaih uh ahih manin siatna a thuaklawh uh hi.
Tua hi a, kong itte aw, hih thute theikhol khin na hih manun migilote in lammaanlo ah hong pialkhiatpih in na dinna uh munkip pan na puk khakloh nadingun kikem un.
I Topa le Honpa Zeisu Khazih hehpihna thupha le amah theihtelna ah na khangto un. Tua Topa tungah tu le a tawntung in minthanna om tahen. Amen.
A kipat cil a kipan in a om khinsa kote in ka zak uh, mit tawh en in ka muh uh le, khut tawh ka lawn uh tua nuntakna Thu tawh kisai note kiangah kong tangko uh hi.
Tua nuntakna hong kilang in kote in ka mu uh a, teci pangin note kiangah kong gen uh hi. Tua nuntak tawntungna in Pa tawh a omkhawm hi a, tu in ahih leh kote kiangah a hong kilang zo hi.
Kote in Pa le a Tapa Zeisu tawh ka kipawlkhop takpi mah bangun note zong kote tawh nong kipawlkhop theih nadingun ka muhsa ka zaksa uh tua thu note kiangah kong pulakkhia uh hi.
Na lungdamna uh a kicin nadingin hih thute kong gelh uh hi.
Ama tung pan ka zak khit uh ciangin note tungah kong pulakkhiat uh thu in Pasian in khuavak hi a, ama sungah khuamial a om kei hi cih thu ahi hi.
Amah tawh ka kipawlkhawm hi ci napi in khuamial sungah i gamtat leh zuau thugen i hi a, thuman thutak a zui lo i hi hi.
Ahi zongin amah khuavak sungah a om mah bangin eite zong khuavak sungah i kalsuan leh, khat le khat a kipawlkhawm i hi a, a Tapa Zeisu Khazih sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin a hong sawpsiang hi.
Mawhna ka nei kei hi i cihleh ei le ei a kikhem i hi a, eite sungah thuman thutak a om kei hi.
I mawhnate pulak lehang i mawhnate hong maisak in i diktatlohna khempeuh pan hong sawpsiang dingin amah muanhuai in a dik hi.
Mawhna ka bawl kei hi i cihleh amah zuaugen i suaksak a, eite sungah ama thu a om kei hi.
Ka taneute aw, mawhna na bawl khakloh nadingun hih thute kong gelh hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in mawhna a bawl leh Pa tawh a omkhawm Sitni khat i nei a, amah in midikpa Zeisu Khazih ahi hi.
Amah in eite aa ding bek hilo in, leitung mi khempeuh mawhna aa dingin zong amahmah thoihdamna a hong hi hi.
Tu in ama hong thupiakte i zuih leh amah a theitel i hi hi.
“Amah ka thei hi,” ci napi in a thupiakte a zuilo mi in zuaugen hi a, ama sungah thuman thutak a om kei hi.
Ahih hangin ama thu a zui mi sungah Pasian itna a kicing in a om hi. Hih thu tawh ama sungah i om lam i thei hi.
Ama sungah ka om hi a ci mi peuhmah in ama gamtat bangin a gamta ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, note kiangah thupiak thak kong gelh kei a, a cil a kipan na ngahsa uh thupiak lui mah kong gelh hi. Tua thupiak lui pen a cil a kipan na zak khitsa uh ahi hi.
Thupiak thak khat note tungah kong gelhkik hi. Tua thu in ama sung le note sungah a om takpi thu ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh khuamial hong bei in khuavak taktak a hong tangzo hi.
Khuavak sungah ka om hi ci napi in a sanggam a mudah mi in khuamial sungah a omlai ahi hi.
A sanggam a it mi in khuavak sungah om ahih manin a puk nading thu a om kei hi.
Ahi zongin a sanggam a mudah mi ahih leh khuamial sungah omin khuamial sunga lampai ahi hi. Khuamial in a mittawsak ahih manin a paina mel a thei kei hi.
Ka taneute aw, Pasian in ama min hangin na mawhnate uh hong maisak ahih manin lai kong khak hi.
Pate aw, a kipat cil a kipan a ompa thei na hih manun lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, gilopa zo khin na hih manun lai kong khak hi. Ka taneute aw, Pa thei khin na hih manun lai kong khak hi.
Pate aw, a kipat cil a kipan a ompa thei khinzo na hih manun lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, na thahat uha Pasian thu note sungah om in gilopa zo khin na hih manun lai kong khak hi.
Leitung ahi a, leitunga om na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin iplah kei un. Mi khatpeuh in leitung a iplah leh Pa itna ama sungah a om lo ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh leitunga om nate in, ci le sa lunggulhna, mittang iplahna le nuntak kiphatsak pihnate hi a, tuate in Pa kiang pana hong pai hilo in leitung pan hong pai ahi hi.
Leitung le leitunga om lunggulhnate a beibei hita a, ahi zongin Pasian deihna a zui mite a om tawntung ding hi.
Ka taneute aw, tuhun in hun nunung ahi hi. Anti‑khazih hong piang ding hi ci a, na zaksa bangun tu in zong anti‑khazih tampi hong piangzo hi. Tua ahih manin tuhun in hun nunung ahi hi cih i thei hi.

Amaute in eite tawh kipawl hilo uh ahih manin eite kiang panin a paikhia uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite tawh kipawl hi le uh eite tawh a omkhawm suak ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute khat beek eite tawh hong kipawllohna uh a kilat nadingin eite kiang panin a paikhia uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin Siangthopa in note sathau hong nilh khinzo ahih manin na khempeuh na thei uh hi.
Note in thuman thutak na theih loh manun lai hong khak ka hi kei hi. Thuman thutak na theih man uh leh thuman thutak panin zuauthu piang lo ahih manin lai hong khak ka hi zaw hi.
Zuaugen mi kua ahi hiam? Zeisu pen Khazih hi cih thu a nial mi hilo ahi hiam? Pa le Tapa a nial mi in anti‑khazih ahi hi.
Tapa a nial mi peuhmah in Pa zong a nei kei hi. Tapa a sang mi in Pa zong a nei hi.
Tua ahih manin a cil a kipan na zaksa uh thu note sungah omsak un. A cil a kipan na zaksa uh thu note sungah a om leh Pa le Tapa sungah note zong na om ding uh hi.
Ama hong kamciamsa thu in nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
Note hong khem nuam mite tawh kisai in hih thute kong gelh hi.

Pasian sathau nilhna note sungah om khin ahih manin kuama thuhilh ding na kisam kei uh hi. Tua sathau nilhna in thu khempeuh hong hilh hi. Tua sathau nilhna pen zuauthu hilo in thuman thutak ahih manin hong hilh bangbang in ama sungah omsuak un.
Tu in, ka taneute aw, ama sungah omsuak un. Tua hi leh amah a hong kilat ciangin i lungmuang dinga, a hong pai ciangin zong ama mai ah i maizum kei ding hi.
Amah dik hi ci in na theih uh leh a dika gamta mi peuhmah zong ama sung panin a piang ahi hi cih na thei uh hi.
Pasian tate cihna i ngah theih nadingin Pa in eite tunga hong piak itna bangzahtak in lian ahi hiam! Leitung mite in amah thei lo uh ahih manin eite zong a hong thei kei uh hi.

Kong itte aw, tu in Pasian tate i hi hi. Tua hi a, tunung cianga i omzia ding ahih leh a kilang nai kei hi. Ahi zongin amah a hong kilat ciangin amah tawh i kibang ding hi cih i thei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ahihna bangbang in amah i mu ding hi.
Hih bang lametna a nei mi khempeuh in Pasian a siantho bangin amah le amah a kisiangthosak ahi hi.
Mawhna a bawl mi in thukham neilo banga gamta mi ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham neilo banga gamtatna in mawhna ahi hi.
I mawhnate a lakhia dingin Zeisu hong kilang hi cih thu na thei uh hi. Ama sungah mawhna kici a om kei hi.
Ama sunga a om mi in mawhna a bawl kei hi. Mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah in amah a mu nailo a thei nailo ahi hi.
Ka taneute aw, kuamah kikhemsak kei un. A dika gamta mi in Khazih a dik mah bangin midik a suak hi.

Mawhna a bawl mi in Dawimangpa kiang pan ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Dawimangpa in a kipat cil mahin mawhna a bawlpa ahi hi. Tua ahih manin Dawimangpa nasepte a susia dingin Pasian Tapa hong kilang zo hi.
Pasian panin a piang mi peuhmah ama sungah Pasian khaici om ahih manin mawhna a bawl kei hi. Amah Pasian panin a piang mi ahih manin mawhna a bawlthei kei hi.
A dika a gamtalo mi le, a sanggam a itlo mi peuhmah Pasian mi ahi kei hi. Hih bangin Pasian tate le Dawimangpa tate a kikhentel thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh khat le khat ki‑it ni cihna thu in a kipat cil a kipan na zak khitsa uh thu ahi hi.
Cain bangin om kei ni. Amah mi gilopa mi hi a, a sanggampa a thatpa zong ahi hi. Banghang in a sanggampa that ahi hiam? Ama gamtatna sia in a sanggampa gamtatna a dik hang ahi hi.
Sanggamte aw, leitung mite in note hong muhdah uh leh lamdangsa kei un.
Sihna pan nuntakna ah galkah khinzo i hihna thu i sanggamte i itna panin i theithei hi. A sanggam a itlo mi in sihna sungah a omlai ahi hi.
A sanggam a mudah mi in mithat hi a, mi thatpa sungah nuntak tawntungna a om kei hi cih na thei uh hi.
Zeisu Khazih in eite aa dingin ama nuntakna hong piakna hangin itna in bang ahi hiam cih i thei hi. Eite in zong i sanggamte aa dingin nuntakna i piak ding a kilawm hi.
Ahi zongin leitung neih le lam a hau mi khatin a sanggampa khat kitangsapna mu napi in a hehpih nop kei leh bangci bangin ama sungah Pasian itna om thei ding ahi hiam?
Ka taneute aw, a thu bekin ki‑it kei ni. Kam le muk bek tawh zong ki‑it kei ni. Sepkhiat bawlkhiatna le thuman thutak tawh ki‑it ni.
Hih thu hangin thuman thutak tawh a kipawl i hihna thei in, ama mai ah lungmuang in i om ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh i lungsim in hong mawhsak leh i lungsim sangin Pasian lianzaw a, amah in na khempeuh a thei hi.
Kong itte aw, i lungsim in hong mawhsak kei leh Pasian mai ah lungmuanna i nei hi.
Ama hong thupiakte zui in ama mai ah ama lungdam nading i sep leh ama tung pan i nget peuhpeuh i ngah ding hi.
Ama hong thupiak in hih ahi hi. Ama hong thupiak mah bangin ama Tapa Zeisu Khazih min i up ding le khat le khat i ki‑it ding thu ahi hi.
Tu in ama hong thupiakte a zui mi in ama sungah oma amah zong tua mi sungah a om hi. Amah in eite sungah hong om hi cih thu ama hong piak Kha hangin i thei hi.
Kong itte aw, kha khempeuh um kei un. Khate in Pasian kiang pan ahi hiam ahi kei hiam sittel un. Banghang hiam cihleh zuaugen kamsang tampi leitung ah hong paikhia khinzo hi.
Pasian Kha na theih nading uh hih bang ahi hi. Zeisu Khazih mihing in hong piang hi ci in a pulak kha khempeuh Pasian kha hi a,
a pulaklo kha khempeuh Pasian kha ahi kei hi. Tua kha in hong piang ding hi ci a, na zak khitsa bangun tu in leitung ah a om khinzo anti‑khazih kha ahi hi.
Ka taneute aw, note in Pasian mite na hi uh a, tua khate na zozo uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note sunga a ompa in leitung a a ompa sangin a lianzaw hi.
Amaute in leitung mi ahih manun leitung thu gen uh a, leitung mite in zong amaute thu a ngai uh hi.
Eite in Pasian mi i hi hi. Pasian a thei mite in eite thugen ngai uh a, Pasian mi a hilote in eite thugen a ngai kei uh hi. Hih bangin a maan kha le a maanlo kha i khentel thei hi.
Kong itte aw, khat le khat ki‑it ni. Banghang hiam cihleh ki‑itna in Pasian kiang pan ahi hi. Itna a nei mi in Pasian kiang pana piang hi a, amah in Pasian a thei hi.
Itna a neilo mi in Pasian a thei kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ki‑itna ahi hi.
Ama hangin i nuntak theih nadingin Pasian in khat bek a neih a Tapa leitung ah a hong sawlna tawh Pasian in eite hong itna a hong lakzo hi.
Eite in Pasian i it man hilo in Pasian in eite hong it manin i mawhnate thoihdam nadingin a Tapa hong sawlna in a hong itna ahi hi.
Kong itte aw, Pasian in hihzahtak in eite hong it ahih leh eite zong khat le khat i ki‑it ding a kilawm hi.
Kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Ahi zongin eite khat le khat i ki‑it leh eite sungah Pasian hong omin, eite sungah ama itna a hong picingsak hi.
Ama Kha eite hong pia khinzo ahih manin ama sungah eite i om a, eite sungah amah a hong om hi cih thu i thei hi.
Pa in leitung mite Honpa dinga a hong sawl a Tapa ka mu zo uh a, ama thu teci ka pang uh hi.
Zeisu in Pasian Tapa hi ci in a pulak mi peuhmah sungah Pasian om a, tua mi zong Pasian sungah a om hi.
Pasian in eite hong itna eite in thei in i umzo hi. Pasian in itna ahi hi. Itna sunga a om mi in Pasian sungah a om hi a, Pasian zong tua mi sungah a om hi.
Leitung ah amah bangin nungta in thukhen ni ciangin hangtak a i om theih nadingin amah in itna sungah eite hong picingsak hi.
Itna sungah launa a om kei hi. A cingtak itna in launa a beisak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh launa in gawt ding kihtakna hi a, a lau mi in itna cingtak a neilo ahi hi.
Amah in eite hong it masa ahih manin eite in amah i it hi.
Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” a cih hangin a sanggampa a muhdah leh zuaugen ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a muh theih a sanggampa a itlo mi in a muh theihloh Pasian bangci it theih ding ahi hiam?
Pasian a it mi in a sanggampa zong a it hi cih thupiakna ama tung panin i ngah hi.
Zeisu in Khazih ahi hi, ci in a um mi peuhmah in Pasian kiang pana piang ahi hi. A Piangsakpa a it mi in a piansak mi zong a it hi.
Pasian it in ama hong thupiakte i zuih ciangin Pasian tate a it i hihlam i kithei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a hong it manin a thupiakte a zui i hi hi. Ama hong thupiakte zong a zuihhak ahi kei hi.
Pasian kiang pana piang mi peuhmah in leitung a zo khin ahi hi. Eite upna in leitung a zo gualzawhna ahi hi.
Zeisu in Pasian Tapa ahi hi, ci in a um mi simloh leitung a zo mi kua om ahi hiam?

Tui le sisan tawh a hong paipa in Zeisu Khazih ahi hi. Tui bek tawh hilo in tui le sisan tawh amah a hong pai hi. Hih thu teci a pangpa in Kha ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Kha in thuman thutak ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vantung ah teci a pang thum om a, tuate in Pa, Thu, le Kha Siangtho ahi hi. Hih thumte in pumkhat ahi hi.
Leitung ah zong teci a pang thum mah a om hi. Tuate in Kha, tui, le sisan hi a, hih thumteng in thukhat in a luang uh hi.
Eite in mite teci panna sang i hih leh Pasian teci panna in a lianzawtham hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih in Pasian in a Tapa thu teci a panna hang ahi hi.
Pasian Tapa a um mi in ama lungsim sungah tua teci panna a nei hi. Pasian a umlo mi in Pasian in a Tapa thu teci a panna um lo ahih manin Pasian zuaugen a suaksak hi.
Tua teci panna in Pasian in nuntak tawntungna hong pia a, tua nuntakna in Tapa sungah a om hi.
Tapa a nei mi in nuntakna a nei hi. Pasian Tapa a neilo mi in nuntakna a nei kei hi.
Pasian Tapa min a um note in nuntak tawntungna na neih lam uh na theih nading uh le Pasian Tapa min na upsuak theih nadingun hih thute kong gelhzo hi.
Tu in ama deihna tawh kituak in na khat peuhpeuh i nget leh amah in i ngetna hong za hi cih lungmuanna ama sungah i nei hi.
Amah in i nget peuhpeuh hong za hi cih i theih leh ama tung pana i nget peuhpeuh i ngah ding hi cih zong i thei hi.

A sanggam khatin sih nading a hilo mawhna khatpeuh bawl hi cih mi khatin a theih leh thungetsak hen. Sih nading a hilo mawhna a bawl mi, Pasian in a nungtasak ding hi. Sih nading mawhna a om hi. Tua bang mawhna a bawl mite aa dingin thungetsak hen hong ci ka hi kei hi.
Thumanlo gamtatna khempeuh in mawhna hi a, ahi zongin sih nading a hilo mawhna a om hi.
Pasian kiang panin a piang mi in mawhna a bawl kei hi cih i thei hi. Pasian kiang panin a piang mi in amah le amah kikem ahih manin gilopa in a khoih kei hi.
Eite in Pasian tate i hihlam i kithei a, leitung buppi ahih leh gilopa khutnuai‑a om ahihlam i thei hi.

Pasian Tapa hong paizo a, Pasian taktak i theih nadingin pilna hong pia zo hi cih zong i thei hi. Eite in Pasian taktak ahi, ama Tapa Zeisu Khazih sungah i om hi. Zeisu Khazih in Pasian taktak le nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
Ka taneute aw, milimte panin na kikem un. Amen.
Thuman thutak sunga kong it, teelna a ngah, a zahtakhuai numei le na tate tungah makaipa in lai kong khak hi. Kei bek hilo in thuman thutak a thei mi khempeuh in zong hong it uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite sunga a teeng le a hong ompih tawntung ding tua thuman thutak hangin ka hong it hi.
Pa Pasian le Pa Tapa, Topa Zeisu Khazih kiang panin hehpihna thupha, hehpihna, le lungnopna in thuman thutak le itna sungah note hong ompih tahen.
Pa kiang panin i ngah thupiakna bangin na tate pawlkhat in thuman thutak a zuih uh ka muh ciangin ka lungdam mahmah hi.
A zahtakhuai numei aw, tu in kong gen in ah thupiakna thak kong gelh tuan kei a, a cil a pat a kipan i ngahsa ahi khat le khat ki‑it ni cih thu kong gelhkik hi.
Ama thupiakte banga zuihna in itna ahi hi. Hih in a kipat cil a na zaksa uh na zuih ding uh thupiak ahi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu Khazih in mihing bangin hong piang hi cih thu a sanglo zuauthu a gen mi tampi leitung ah a hong piangzo hi. Tua banga a gen mi in mikhem hi a, anti‑khazih ahi hi.
I sepsate tan loin thaman kimtak in i ngah theih nadingin na kikem un.
Khazih thuhilhna ah kip loin a palsat mi peuhmah in Pasian neilo ahi hi. Khazih thuhilhna ah a kip mi in, Pa le Tapa a nei ahi hi.
Hih thuhilhna a lenlo mi khatpeuh note kiangah a hong pai leh inn ah na tungsak kei unla, na hopih kei un.
Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang mi khat a hopih mi in tua mipa siatna ah a kihel ahi hi.
Thu tampi kong gelhnop hangin laidal le laitui tawh ka gelh nuam kei hi. I lungdamna a kicin nadingin note kiangah hong hawhin maitang kituah in i kiho ding ka lamen hi.
Teelna a ngah na sanggamnu tate in note hong hopih uh hi. Amen.
Thuman thutak sunga kong it Gaius tungah makaipa in lai ka hong khak hi.
Kong it aw, khalam thu ah na daupai mah bangin na pumpi zong dam a, na khempeuh ah na daupai nadingin thu kong ngetsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nang kianga hong zin sanggamte in na sungah thuman thutak a omna le, thuman thutak na zuihna hong gen uh ciangin ka lungdam mahmah hi.
Ka tate in thuman thutak zui uh hi cih thu ka zak ciangin hih thu sangin a lianzaw lungdamna ka nei kei hi.
Kong it aw, sanggamte na theih ngeiloh mi vive ahih uh hangin na limbawl mahmah hi.
Itna tawh na bawlnate amaute in pawlpite mai ah teci a pang uh hi. Amaute khualzinna ah Pasian deihna tawh kilawm kituak in na huh leh, nasep hoih a sem na hi ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Pasian min hangin kuankhia uh a, Gentile‑te kiang panin bangmah a la kei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin thuman thutak aa dingin nasem khawmte i suah theih nadingin tua bang mite i san ding a kilawm hi.
Pawlpi ah lai ka khak hangin amaute laka a lianpen a utpa Diotrephes in kote hong sang kei hi.

Tua ahih manin kong pai ciangin ama gamtatna teng ka phawkkiksak ding hi. Amah in kote siat nading deihin thusia tampi a gen hi. Tua tawh zong lungkim zo nai loin sanggamte na sang lo a, a sang nuam midangte zong kham in pawlpi pan a hawlkhia hi.
Kong it aw, thusiate ciing kei inla, thuhoihte na ciing in. A hoih a gamtate Pasian aa hi a, a sia in gamtate ahih leh Pasian a mu ngei nailote ahi uh hi.
Demetrius pen mi khempeuh in phat uh a, thuman thutak in zong tua thu teci a pang hi. Kote in zong tua mah bangin teci ka pang uh a, kote teci panna maan hi cih na thei uh hi.
Thu tampi kong gelhnop hangin laikung le laidal tawh kong gelh nuam kei hi.

A sawtlo in nang tawh kimu dingin ka kilamen a, tua ciangin maitang kituah in i kiho ding hi. Nangma tungah nopna hong tung tahen. Hihlai a om sanggamte in nang hong hopih uh hi. Tualai a om i lawmte zong a mimal in na hopihsak in.
Zeisu Khazih sila khat le James sanggampa ahi keimah Judah in Pa Pasian in a hong sap, a hong sianthosak le Zeisu Khazih sunga a hong kep note lai kong khak hi.
Note tungah hehpihna, lungnopna le itna‑te khang semsem tahen.

Kong itte aw, a kibang a i ngahkhop hotkhiatna thu tawh kisai thute gelhin lai kong khak ding ka hanciam mahmah laitak in a kimang suak dingin misiangthote tunga khatvei bek a hong kipia upna hu a, nakpi in a pang dingin hanthotna lai kong gelh ding kisam ka sa hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh mawhsakna thuak dingin tanglai peka ciaptehna a ngah khinsa mi pawlkhat note lakah hong lutsim khin uh hi. Amaute in Pasian thusim loin i Pasian hehpihna thupha numei pasal paktat theih nading suaksak uh a, khat bek i neih hong Neipa Pasian le eite Topa Zeisu Khazih a nial mite ahi uh hi.
Topa in Israel mite Egypt gam pan a hotkhiat khit ciangin a umlo mite a nungah susia hi cih thu na theih khitsa uh ahih hangin tu in kong phawkkiksak nuam hi.
Tua banah amaute dinmun masa kemsuak loin a teenna munuh a nusia vantungmite zong tawntung sikkhau tawh khih in ni thupi ni a thukhen dingin khuamial sungah a khumcip hi.

Tua mah bangin Sodom, Gomorrah khuate le a kimnai a khua mite zong numei pasal thangtat in a khelkhel in ci le sa deihna zui in gamta uh ahih manin tawntung meikuangpi tawh gawtna a thuak ding mite hilhkholhna a suaksak hi.
Tua mah bangin hih lungsim zaulen mite in amaute pumpi ninsak in ukna thu nialin tunglam thuneite a gensia uh hi.
Ahih hangin vantungmite laka a lianpen Michael nangawn in Dawimangpa tawh Moses luanghawm a kituh lai un zahko in mawhsak ngamlo a, “Topa in nang hong taii tahen!” a ci bek hi.
Tua hi napi in hih mite in amaute theihtelloh thute a gensia uh hi. A theih sunsunte uh zong ganhingte bangin pianpih theih tawm teng bek hi a, tuate mah in amaute a leh suksiat hi.
Amaute in gimna thuakta uh hen! Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Cain lampi a zui uh hi. Metna ngah nadingin huaihamtak in Balaam khialhna zui in delh uh a, Korah bangin langpanna tawh a kisia uh hi.

Amaute in note ki‑itna ankuangte hong um uh ciangin zumna mel nei loin amaute gilvah nading bek a ngaihsun uh hi. Amaute in huih in a mut kawikawi, guahtui kihello meii, tuk hun bei donga a gahlo singkung, nihvei a si, a kibulkalh singkung tawh a kibang,
tuipi tunga kihot tuihualpite, amaute zumhuaina teng mah a pulak khiakhia, a leng kawikawi aksite tawh kibang in amaute aa dingin a mial bikbek tawntung khuamial a kikoihkhol zo hi.
Tu in Adam panin a khang sagihnapa Enoch in zong tua mite thu hih bangin a genkhol hi. “En un, mi khempeuh tungah thu a khen dingin ama misiangtho tulsawm tampite tawh Topa hong pai hi.

Mi khempeuh tungah thukhen ding le amaute laka om Pasian a thusimlo mite in Pasian thusimlo sa in a gamtatnate uh le a bawl uh mawhnate ahi a, Pasian a thusimlo tua mite in amah langpan a kamkhauh a pauna khempeuh uh ahi zongin amah in a pholak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mite in a phunhatte, lungkimna a nei theilote, amaute lunggulhna zui in a gamtate ahi uh hi. Kisaktheihna kamte pau in amaute met nadingin midangte a maitang phat thei uh hi.
Ahi zongin kong itte aw, i Topa Zeisu Khazih sawltakte in nidang in a hong gen uh thute phawkkik un.
Amaute in hun nunung ciangin Pasian deihna tawh a kituaklo, amaute lunggulhna zui a, midangte a zahko mite hong piang ding uh hi ci in a gen uh hi.
Tua mite in ci le sa deihna a zuite, kikhenna a piangsakte le Kha a neilo mite ahi uh hi.
Ahi zongin kong itte aw, note na hih uh leh a siangtho mahmah note upna tungah kilam unla Kha Siangtho sungah thungen un.
Nuntak tawntungna hong puak ding i Topa Zeisu Khazih hehpihna na ngakkawm un Pasian hong itna sungah kikem un.
Lungheinei mite na hehpih un.
Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte meikuang sung pan dokkhia un. Ci le sa gamtatna hangin a kihhuai a puansilhte nangawn uh muh thadahhuai sa unla lauthawng kawm in honkhia un.
Tu in na puk loh nadingun a hong kem zopa le mawhsak nading om lo a, lungdamna lianpi tawh ama vangliatna mai ah note a hong tunzopa,
amah bek a pil i Honpa Pasian tungah minthanna, thupina, ukzawhna, vangliatna‑te tu le a tawntung in om tawntung tahen. Amen.

Hih in Zeisu Khazih kilakna, Pasian in a nasemte tunga a lah dinga amah a piak, a sawtlo in pello a a hong piang ding thute ahi hi. Zeisu Khazih in ama vantungmi sawlin a nasempa John tungah tua thute a lak hi.
John in Pasian thu, Zeisu Khazih teci panna le a muhsa thu khempeuh teci a pang hi.
Hih genkholhna thute a sim a za mi le hih laibu sunga kigelh thute a zui mi in mihampha ahi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a hun hong nai zo hi.

Keimah John in Asia gama om pawlpi sagihte lai kong khak hi. A om ngei khin, a om laitak, hong pailai ding pa amah le ama kumpi tokhom mai‑a om Kha sagihte kiang pana hehpihna thupha le lungnopna note tungah hong om tahen.
Zeisu Khazih in a muanhuai teci, misite lak pana a thokik masapa le leitung kumpite a ukpa ahi hi. Amah in eite hong it in i mawhnate ama sisan tawh hong sawpsiangsak a,
Pasian le a Pa aa dingin kumpite le siampite a hong suaksakpa ahi hi. Amah in minthanna le vangliatna nei tawntung tahen. Amen.
En un, meii tung tuangin amah hong pai ding hi. Mittang khempeuh le amah a dawtlum mite in zong mu ding uh a, ama hangin leitung minam khempeuh a kap ding uh hi. Tua bangin piang tahen, Amen.
Topa in, “A om ngei khin, a om laitak le hong pailai ding, Vanglianpenpa, Alpha le Omegaɠ, a Kipatna le a Tawpna ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Keimah John in haksatna, kumpigam, le Zeisu Khazih sikdona ah note tawh a kipawlkhawm na sanggampa uh ka hi hi. Pasian thu le Zeisu Khazih thu teci ka panna hangin Patmos a kici tuikulh ah ka om hi.
Topa Ni in keimah in Kha sungah ka om a, tua laitak in ka nunglam panin pengkul ging tawh a kibang awging lianpi khat ka za hi.

Tua awging in, “Keimah in Alpha le Omega, a Masapen le a Nunungpen ka hi hi. Na muh khempeuh laibu sungah gelh inla, Asia gama om pawlpi sagihte ahi Ephesus khua pawlpi, Smyrna khua pawlpi, Pergamos khua pawlpi, Thyatira khua pawlpi, Sardis khua pawlpi, Philadelphia khua pawlpi, le Laodicea khua pawlpi‑te khak in,” a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei a hong hopih awging en dingin ka kihei hi. Tua bangin ka kihei leh kham tawh a kibawl meivak tunna sagih ka mu hi.
Tua meivak tunna sagihte laizang ah Mihing Tapa tawh a kibang mi khat ka mu hi. Amah in a khepek dong a ban puantualpi silhin a awmah kham awmgak a gak hi.
A lutang le a samte tuumul bangin kang a, vuk bangin pakin a mittangte meikuang tawh a kibang hi.
A khepekte in meikhuk sunga a kihalsiang khin sumngo hoih mahmah tawh kibang a, a awging pen tui tampi luang zaizai bangin a ging hi.
A taklam khutah aksi sagih tawi in a kam sung panin langnih a hiam namsau khat a pusuakkhia hi. A maitang in a tangpha mahmah nitang tawh kibang hi.
Amah ka muh ciangin a si bangin a khe phungah ka puksuk a, ahih hangin amah in ka tungah a taklam khut hong nga in, “Lau kei in, a Masapen le a Nunungpen ka hi hi.
Kei in a nungtapa ka hi hi. Ka sihngei hangin tu in a tawntung in ka nungta hi. Amen. Hadesɠ le Sihna tawhtang zong ka kem hi.
Na muhsa thute, tu laitak a piang thute le tuate khit cianga a hong pianglai ding thute laibu sungah gelh in.

Ka taklam khut sunga na muh aksi sagihte le kham tawh kibawl meivak tunna sagihte tawh kisai thusimte in hih bang ahi hi. Aksi sagihte in pawlpi a kem vantungmi sagihte hi in, na muh meivak tunna sagihte in pawlpi sagihte ahi uh hi.
“Ephesus khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘A taklam khutah aksi sagih tawi in kham tawh kibawl meivak tunna sagihte laizang ah a vak kawikawipa in kong gen inah,
“Na gamtatna, na hanciamna, na thuakzawhna le mihoihlote na koihkhong lohna kong thei hi. Sawltak hilo napi amau le amau sawltak a kici mite sittel in a zuau genna teng uh na mukhia hi.
Kuhkalna le thuakzawhna na nei a, ka min hangin bah loin na hanciamna zong ka thei hi.
“Ahih hangin nong itna masa nusia khin na hih manin hih thu ah kong mawhsak hi.
Tua ahih manin na kiatma a na dinmun phawk in. Na mawhna kisikkik inla, a cil lai a na nasepte semkik in. Na kisik kei leh manlangtak in kong pai dinga, na meivak tunna ka hemkhia ding hi.
Ahih hangin hoihna khat na nei a, tua in ka muhdah Nicolas pawlte gamtatna na muhdahna ahi hi.
“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil nei mi in za tahen. A gualzo mipa in Pasian Paradise laizang a nuntakna singkung pan a nek theih nading thu ka pia ding hi.” ’
“Smyrna khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘A Masapen le a Nunungpen ahi ka sihngei hangin tu in a nungtapa in kong gen inah,
“Na gamtatnate, haksatna lianpi na thuaknate le na zawnna ka thei hi. (Ahih hangin na hau hi.) Judah minam a kicih uh hangin Judah mi a hilo Satan pawlte in hong gensiatna zong ka thei hi.

A sawtlo a na thuak dingte lau peuhmah kei in. Note hong ze‑et dingin Dawimangpa in pawlkhat thongah hong khia dinga, ni sawm sung gentheihna na thuak ding uh hi. Sihna na thuak dongin citak in. Tua hi leh nuntakna lukhu kong pia ding hi.
“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil nei mi in za tahen. A gualzo mipa in nihvei sihna a thuak peuhmah kei ding hi.” ’
“Pergamos khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘Langnih a hiam namsau a tawipa in kong gen inah,

“Na gamtatna le Satan tokhom a omna muna a teeng na hih lam ka thei hi. Satan a teenna note lakah, keima aa dingin citak in sihna tawh teci a pangpa Antipas a kithah lai nangawn in ka min na lenkip a, kong piak upna zong na nial kei hi.
“Ahi zongin kong mawhsak nading thu tawm ka nei hi. Israel tate in milim biakna sa ne in, numei pasal thangtatna a bawl nadingun Balak tunga thu a hilhpa ahi Balaam thuhilhna a zui mi na om uh hi.
Tua bangin ka muhdah Nicolas pawlte thuhilhna a len mi pawlkhat zong na nei hi.
Na mawhna kisikkik in. Na kisikkik kei leh na kiangah manlangtak in kong pai dinga, ka kam sung panin a pusuak namsau tawh tua mite ka vat ding hi.

“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil neimi in za tahen. A gualzo mipa in a kisel manna pawlkhat a nek theih nadingin ka pia ding hi. Tua ciangin a ngah mi simloh kuamah in a theihloh min thak a kigelhna suangpak zong ka pia ding hi.” ’
“Thyatira khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang in a khepekte a kinawt kilkel sumngo tawh a kibang Pasian Tapa in kong gen inah,
“Na gamtatna, na itna, na nasepna, na upna le na thuakzawhnate ka thei hi. A nunung lama na gamtatnate in a masalai sangin hoih zaw hi cih zong ka thei hi.

“Ahi zongin, kong mawhsak nading thu tawm ka nei hi. Amah le amah kamsangnu ka hi hi a kici Jezebel na awizam kha hi. Tua nu in ka nasemte khemin numei pasal thangtat ding le milim biakna sa ne dingin a hilh hi.
Numei pasal a thangtatna a kisikkik nadingin hun ka piak hangin a kisikkik tuan kei hi.
Tua ahih manin amah cina in lupna ka ngaksak dinga, amah tawh ang kikawm in mawhna a bawl mite zong a gamtatna uh a kisik kik kei uh leh gimna lianpi ka thuaksak ding hi.
Tua numeinu tate ka thatmang dinga, tua ciangin pawlpi khempeuh in kei pen lungsim tawng a zongtelpa ka hihna a thei ding uh hi. Na gamtatna uh tawh kizui in note khat ciat kong thuk ding hi.
“Ahih hangin hih thuhilhna a sanglo Satan thu thukpi a cihte uh a theilo nang le hih Thyatira khua sunga om midangte tungah kong gen in ah note tungah vangik dang kong suan kei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kong pai dongin na neihsa teng uh na lenkip un.
A gualzo mipa le keima gamtatnate a tawp dongin a zui mi tungah minamte uk nading thuneihna ka pia ding hi.
Keimah in ka Pa kiang panin ukna thu ka ngah bangin, ‘Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minamte uk dinga, Belsekpa belte bangin a kitamzan ding uh hi.’
“Zingsol zong amah ka pia ding hi.
“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil nei mi in za tahen.” ’

“Sardis khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘Pasian kha sagihte le aksi sagihte a neipa in kong gen in ah, “Na gamtatnate ka thei hi. A hing min na puak hangin a si na hihlam ka thei hi.
Kigingsa in om inla, a si dekdek a kiplai teng tha khauhsak in. Banghang hiam cihleh na gamtatnate Pasian mai ah cingtak zolo hi cih ka mu hi.
Tua ahih manin na zaksa le na sansa thute lungngaikik in lenkip inla na mawhna kisik in. Kigingsa in na om kei leh guta bangin kong pai dinga, na kianga kong tun ding hun na thei kei ding hi.
A puansilh uh a buahbangsaklo mi tawmkha Sardis khua pawlpi sungah na nei hi. Amaute in puanpak silhin kei tawh a kithuah ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua bang dingin amaute a kilawm uh hi.
A gualzo mipa puanpak ka silhsak dinga, a min zong Nuntakna Laibupi sung pan ka phiat ngei kei ding hi. Ka Pa mai le ama vantungmite mai ah ama min ka pulak ding hi.
“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil nei mi in za tahen.” ’

“Philadelphia khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘ “David tawhtang a kempa, ama honte kuamah in a khak zawhloh, a khakte zong kuamah in a hon zawhloh,” a siangtho a thumanpa in kong gen inah,
“Na gamtatnate ka thei hi. En in, na mai ah kongvang khat kong honsak a, kuamah in a khak zo kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thahatna tawmkha na nei a, ka thu mangin ka min na nial kei hi.
Judah mi hilo napi Judah mi ka hi hi ci a, zuauthu a gen, Satan pawlte kong paisak dinga nang kong itna a theih nadingun na khephung ah kong biasak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thuak kenkan in ci a, kong thupiakna zui na hih manin leitang tunga teeng mite sittel nadingin leitung bup ah a hong tung ding haksatna hun panin nang kong kem ding hi.
En in, kong pai pah ding hi! Na ngah ding pahtawina lukhu kuamah in hong suh loh nadingin na neihsa teng uh lenkip un.

A gualzo mipa ka Pasian biakinnpi khuampi khatin ka bawl dinga, tua mun panin a paikhia nawn kei ding hi. Ama tungah ka Pasian min le ka Pasian khuapi min ka gelh ding hi. Tua khuapi in ka Pasian omna vantung pana hong paisuk Jerusalem Khua Thak ahi hi. Keima min thak zong tua mi tungah ka gelh ding hi.
“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil nei mi in za tahen.” ’
“Laodicea khua pawlpi a kempa tungah hih bangin lai khak in. ‘A Muanhuai le a Thuman Teci, Pasian piansak khempeuh a Pankhiapa ahi Amen in kong gen inah,
“Na gamtatnate ka thei hi. Sa lah salo, votlah votlo in na om a, na vot leh votvet, na sat leh sa vet lecin kong deih hi.
Tu in ahih leh sa lah salo, vot lah vot lo, lum milmial bek na hih manin ka kam sung panin kong siakhia ding hi.
Nangmah in, ‘Mihau ka hi a, cithei mahmah ka hih manin bangmah ka kisam kei hi,’ na ci hi. A genthei, a hehpihhuai, a zawng, a mittaw le guaktang a om na hih lam na kithei kei hi.

Tua ahih manin na hauh theih nadingin mei tawh a kihalsiang sa kham, kei kiang pan hong lei in. A zumhuai guaktangpi a na om loh nadingin na silh ding puanpak hong lei inla, khua na muh theih nadingin na mit zong mitza hong nuh in.
Keimah in ka itte khempeuh taii in daan zong ka pia thei hi. Tua ahih manin na lungsim kiciansak inla na mawhna kisik kik in.
Ngai in, kongkhak gei ah dingin kong ka kiu hi. Mi khatpeuh in ka aw za a, kong a hong hon leh ama sungah ka lut dinga, amah tawh an nekhawm in amah in zong kei tawh an a nekhawm ding hi.
Keimah gualzo in ka Pa tawh ama tokhom ah ka tutkhop bangun a gualzo mi zong keimah tawh ka tokhom ah a tutkhop theih nading thu ka pia ding hi.
“Kha in pawlpite tunga a gen thu, bil nei mi in za tahen.” ’ ”

Hihteng khit ciangin ka en a, en in, vantung ah kongkhak khat a kihongsa in a om ka mu hi. Ka zak masak awging in kei a hong hopih pengkul ging tawh kibang a, “Hih lamah hong paito in. Hihteng khit ciangin pello in a hong piang ding thute kong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin thakhat in Kha sungah ka om a, en in, vantung ah kumpi tokhom khat kikoih in tua tungah a tu Khat a om ka mu hi.
Tua kumpi tokhom tunga a tupa a mel jasper suangmanpha le sardius suangmanpha tawh a kibang hi. Tokhom kimkot ah sakhi tuihup khat om a, emerald suangmanpha tawh a kibang hi.
Tua kumpi tokhom kimah tokhom 24 om a, tuate tungah upa 24te tu in a om uh ka mu hi. Amaute in puanpak tualpi silhin kham tawh kibawl kumpi lukhu a khu uh hi.
Kumpi tokhom panin khuaphialep hong tangkhia a, van nakpi in hong gingin a gamlum henhan hi. Kumpi tokhom mai ah meivak sagih a kuangsa in om a, tuate in Pasian Kha sagihte ahi uh hi.
Kumpi tokhom mai ah crystal suangmanpha banga a siang limlang tuipi a om hi. Kumpi tokhom laizang le a kimkot ah ganhing li om a, amaute mailam le nunglam ah mittang bekbek a dim hi.
Ganhing a khatna in humpi nelkai tawh kibang a, a nihna pen bawngno tawh a kibang hi. A thumna ganhing maitang in mihing mai tawh kibang a, a lina pen muvanlai leng tawh kibang hi.

Tua ganhing lite in kha gukciat nei uh a, a khate uh a kimkot leh a sung lamah mittang bekbek a dim hi. Amaute in sun le zan tatsat loin, “A om ngei khin, a om laitak le hong pailai ding, Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in, Siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi!” a ci uh hi.
Ganhing lite in kumpi tokhom tunga a tu, a nungta tawntungpa tungah minthanna le pahtawina pia in lungdamna a koh sial un,
upa 24te in kumpi tokhom tunga a tupa mai ah boksuk in, a nungta tawntungpa bia uh a, amaute pahtawina lukhute kumpi tokhom mai ah ngasuk in,

“Topa aw, minthanna, pahtawina le vangliatna a ngah dingin na kilawm hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh nangma piansak hi a, Tuate nangma deih bangin a kipiangsak le nangma deih banga a om ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa in a taklam khutin a tawi laizial khat ka mu hi. Tua laizial a sunglam le a pualam ah kigelh a, ciaptehna sagih tawh a kiciamteh hi.
Tua ciangin a thahat vantungmi khat ka mu a, amah in, “Ciaptehnate phelkhia in laizial a hong dingin kua kilawm ahi hiam?” ci in a ngaih mahmah aw tawh a kiko hi.
Tua laizial a hong zo ding le a enthei ding mi, leitung leinuai le vantung ah kuamah a om kei hi.
Tua laizial hongkhia in a sim ding le a en dingin a kilawm kuamah om lo ahih manin nakpi in ka kap hi.
Tua ciangin upate khat in, “Kap kei in. En in, Judah nam panin a piang, Humpi Nelkai ahi David Zung in tua ciaptehna sagihte phelkhia in tua laizial a hongkhia dingin a gualzo khin hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin ka et leh, en in, thahna a thuakngei tawh a kibang Tuuno khat ka mu hi. Tua Tuuno in kumpi tokhom, ganhing lite le upate laizang ah dingin a om hi. Amah in kii sagih le mittang sagih nei a, tuate in leitung buppi ah a kisawlkhia Pasian Kha sagihte ahi uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Tuuno hong pai in kumpi tokhom tunga a tupa taklam khuta om laizial a la hi.

Tu in amah in tua laizial a lak khit ciangin ganhing lite le upa 24te in harp lasakna khat ciat le paknamtui tawh a kidim khamhai khat ciat tawi in Tuuno mai ah a bok uh hi. Tua paknamtuite in misiangthote thungetna ahi hi.

Amaute in la thak khat sa uh a, “Nang in laizial a la ding le, Ciaptehnate a phelkhia dingin na kilawm hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thahna na thuak ngei zo a, Minam khempeuh, paunam khempeuh, Mi khempeuh le gam khempeuh lak panin, Pasian aa dingin nangma sisan tawh kote nong tan khin hi.
Kote, Pasian aa dingin kumpite le siampite, Hong suaksak zo na hih manin leitung ka uk ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin ka et leh kumpi tokhom, ganhing lite le upate kimkot a om vantungmite awging ka za hi. Amaute a tultul, a thenthen in om ziahzuah uh hi.
Amaute in, “Thahna a thuak Tuuno in Vangliatna, hauhna, pilna, hatna, Pahtawina, minthanna le Thupha ngah dingin a kilawm hi!” ci in ngaihtak in a kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung le tuate sunga om Pasian piansak khempeuhte awging zong ka za hi. Amaute in, “Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa le Tuuno in Thupha, pahtawina, minthanna, Vangliatna ngah tawntung tahen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin ganhing lite in zong, “Amen!” a ci uh hi. Upa 24te zong boksuk in a nungta tawntungpa a bia uh hi.
Tu in Tuuno in ciaptehna sagihte lakah khat a hon ka mu hi. Tua ciangin ganhing lite lak a khat in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” hong cihna vanging tawh a kibang aw khat ka za hi.
Tua ciangin ka et leh, en in, sakol kang khat ka mu hi. A tunga tuangpa in thalpi khat tawi a, kumpi lukhu khat a kipia hi. Amah in a gualzo le a gualzo lai dingin a kuankhia hi.
Tuuno in ciaptehna nihna a hon ciangin ganhing lite a nihna pen in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” hong cih ka za hi.

Tua ciangin sakol san mahmah khat hong paikhia hi. Tua sakol tunga tuangpa tungah leitung mite khat le khat a kithah theih nading leitung pan kilemna a lakkhiat theih nading thuneihna a kipia hi. Namsau lianpi khat zong amah a kipia hi.
Tuuno in ciaptehna thumna a hon ciangin, ganhing thumna in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” hong cih ka za hi. Ka et leh, en in, sakol vom khat ka mu a, a tunga a tuangpa in tawikhaina khat a tawi hi.

Tua khit ciangin ganhing lite laizang pana hong gingkhia aw khatin, “Mangbuh haiɠ khatin denariusɠ khat man a, mangbuhham hai thum in zong denarius khat mah a man hi. Ahi zongin sathau le lenggahzute susia kei in,” a cih ka za hi.
Tuuno in ciaptehna lina a hon ciangin ganhing a lina in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” hong cihna awging ka za hi.

Tua ciangin ka et leh, en in, sakol puang khat ka mu hi. A tunga tuangpa min Sihna hi a, Hadesɠ in a zui hi. Tua nihte in leitung mi sehli suah sehkhat namsau tawh, kialpi tawh, sihna tawh, gamsate tawh thah theih nading thu a ngah uh hi.
Tuuno in ciaptehna ngana a hon ciangin amaute in a letkip uh Pasian thu le a teci panna hangun thahna a thuak mite khate biaknatau nuai ah a om ka mu hi.
Amaute aw lianpi tawh kiko uh a, “A siangtho, a thuman Topa aw, leitung a a teeng mite tungah thu khen loin kote sisan phula loin bang tanvei sawtlai ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute puantual kang khat ciat kisilhsak a, amaute mah bangin thahna a thuak lai ding na a sepkhoppihte uh le a sanggamte uh a kim khit dong, tawlkhat sung a ngaklai nadingun a kigen hi.
Tuuno in ciaptehna gukna a hon ciangin ka en a, en in, nakpitak in zin a ling hi. Ni in samul tawh a kigan puan bangin vom a, kha zong sisan tawh a kibang hi.
Huihpi in theikung a mut cianga a sanghte a pulhkhiat bangin vana aksite lei ah a kia uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin laizial kizial bangin vantung kizialkhia a, mualte le tuikulh khempeuh zong a kikhinkhia uh hi.
Leitung kumpite, miliante, mihaute, galkap mangteɠ, mi thahatte, sila le sila a hilo a suakta mi khempeuh leihawm sung le mualtung a suanghawmte sungah a bu uh hi.
Amaute in mualte le suangte kiangah, “Kote tungah hong cim un. Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa maitang ka muh khakloh nading uh ahi zongin Tuuno hehna ka thuak loh nading uh ahi zongin hong vukmang un!
Banghang hiam cihleh ama hehna ni lianpi hong tungzo ahih manin kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Hihteng khit ciangin leitung, tui tung le singkung khat peuhpeuh tungah huih a nun loh nadingin leitung huihmong lite lenin leitung kiuli‑a a ding vantungmi lite ka mu hi.

Tua khit ciangin a nungta Pasian na ciaptehna a tawi, a dang vantungmi khat nisuahna lampan hong kahto ka mu hi. Amah nakpitak kiko in leitung le tuipite suksiat theih nading thu a ngah vantungmi lite a gal hopih hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Eite Pasian na a semte taltang ah ciaptehna ka khet khit mateng un leitung, tuipi le singkungte susia nai kei un,” a ci hi.
Ciaptehna a kikhen mite a phazah ka za a, Israel suan beh khempeuh lak panin mi 144,000 ahi hi. Tuate in,
Judah beh panin 12,000, Reuben beh panin 12,000, Gad beh panin 12,000,
Asher beh panin 12,000, Naphtali beh panin 12,000, Manasseh beh panin 12,000,
Simeon beh panin 12,000, Levi beh panin 12,000, Issachar beh panin 12,000,
Zebulun beh panin 12,000, Joseph beh panin 12,000, Benjamin beh panin 12,000‑te tungah ciaptehna a kikhen hi.

Hihteng khit ciangin ka et leh, en in, sim zawhloh ding zahin a tam mihonpi ka mu hi. Amaute gam tuamtuam, beh tuamtuam, minam tuamtuam le paunam tuamtuam pan ahi uh hi. Kumpi tokhom le Tuuno mai ah ding uh a, puanpak tualpi silhin nisuh hiang a tawi uh hi.
Aw lianpi tawh amaute kiko uh a, “Hotkhiatna in kumpi tokhom tunga a tu, eite Pasian le Tuuno aa ahi hi!” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin kumpi tokhom, upate le ganhing lite kimkot ah a ding vantungmi khempeuh, kumpi tokhom mai ah bokin Pasian a bia uh hi.
Amaute in, “Amen! Eite Pasian tungah Phatna, minthanna, pilna, lungdamkohna, pahtawina, Vangliatna le thahatnate om tawntung tahen. Amen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin upate khat in, “Puanpak tualpi tawh a kizem hualai a mite kuate hi a, koi pana hong pai uh ahi hiam?” ci in hong dong hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong, “Sia aw, nang na thei hi,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Gimna lianpi sung panin a hong pai mite ahi uh a, a puan uh Tuuno sisan tawh sawpin a paksak mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian tokhom mai ah omin ama biakinnpi sungah sun le zanin amah a bia mite ahi uh hi. Kumpi tokhom tunga a tupa zong amaute tawh a teengkhawm ding hi.
Amaute gilkial ngei nawnlo ding uh a, a dangtak ngei nawn kei ding uh hi. Nitang in amaute kap kha ngei nawnlo dinga, a sa na khatpeuh zong a thuak ngei nawn kei ding uh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kumpi tokhom laizang a Tuuno in tuu bangin amaute cing dinga, nuntakna tuinak ah amaute a kha ding hi. Pasian in amaute mit panin khitui khempeuh a nulsak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tuuno in ciaptehna sagihna a phel ciangin vantung ah nailang sung bang a dai khipkhep hi.
Pasian mai‑a a ding vantungmi sagihte zong ka mu a, amaute tungah pengkul sagih a kipia hi.

Tua khit ciangin vantungmi a dang khat hong pai in biaknatau ah hong ding hi. Amah in kham tawh kibawl paknamtui halna kuang khat a tawi hi. Ama tungah paknamtui tampi a kipia hi. Tuate le misiangthote thungetnate kumpi tokhom mai‑a om kham tawh kibawl biaknatau ah a piakkhop ding ahi hi.
Tua paknamtui khu in misiangthote thungetna tawh vantungmi khut panin Pasian mai ah a kahto hi.

Tua khit ciangin vantungmi in paknamtui halna kuang la in, a sungah biaknatau pana mei a dimin a luah khit ciangin, leitung ah a lawnsuk hi. Tua ciangin gamlumna hong om a, van hong gingin khua hong phia a, zin a ling hi.
Tua ciangin pengkul sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte in a pengkul uh mut dingin a kithawi uh hi.
A khatna vantungmi in a pengkul a mut ciangin sisan tawh a kihel gialpi le meikuangte leitung ah a kiasuk hi. Singkung sehthum suah sehkhat le lopa hing khempeuh a kangtum hi.
A nihna vantungmi in a pengkul a mut ciangin mual lianpi kuang zuahzuah tawh a kibang na khat tuipi sungah kilawnkhiasuk a, tuipi sehthum suah sehkhat sisan a suak hi.
Tuipi sunga om nuntakna a nei khempeuh sehthum suah sehkhat si uh a, tembaw zong sehthum suah sehkhat a kisia hi.
A thumna vantungmi in a pengkul a mut ciangin meilah kuang tawh a kibang aksi lianpi khat vantung pan hong kiasuk a, gunpite le tuinakte sehthum suah sehkhat tungah a kia hi.
Tua aksi a min Gamsai ahi hi. Tui sehthum suah sehkhat gamsai tui suak a, kha mahmah ahih manin a dawn mi tampi a si uh hi.

A lina vantungmi in a pengkul a mut ciangin ni sehthum suah sehkhat, kha sehthum suah sehkhat, aksi sehthum suah sehkhat su kha a, tuate sehthum suah sehkhat a mial hi. Sun hun sehthum suah sehkhat tang nawnlo a, zan hun zong tuamah bang ahi hi.

Tua khit ciangin ka et leh, van laizang ah a leng vantungmi khat ka mu hi. Amah in aw lianpi tawh kiko a, “Vantungmi thumte in a mutlai ding uh pengkulte hangin leitung mite tungah gimna, gimna, gimna a tung ding hi!” a ci hi.
A ngana vantungmi in a pengkul a mut ciangin vantung pan leitung ah aksi khat hong kiasuk ka mu hi. Taw neilo kuahawmpi tawhtang tua vantungmi a kipia hi.
Amah in taw neilo kuahawmpi a hon ciangin meiphualpi pana meikhu suak bangin tua sung panin meikhu a hong pusuakto hi. Tua kuahawmpi pana hong pusuak meikhu hangin ni le huih a mial hi.
Tua ciangin tua meikhu sung panin kauphete leitung ah hong pusuakkhia uh hi. Tua kauphete in thahatna nei uh a, leitung a om aikam thahatna tawh a kibang hi.
Amaute in lei a po lopate, lohingte le singkungte susia loin, amaute taltang ah Pasian ciaptehna a neilo mite suksiat nading thu a ngah uh hi.
Amaute in tua mite that loin kha nga sung bawlsiat theih nading thu a ngah uh hi. Amaute bawlsiatna pen aikam in mi a deh cianga a nat bangin a na hi.
Tua hun ciangin mite in sih theih nading a zon uh hangin a mu zo kei ding uh hi. Amaute a sihnop mahmah uh hangin sihna in amaute kiang panin a taikhia ding hi.
Tua kauphete lim le melin galsim dinga kithawi sakolte tawh kibang hi. Kham tawh a kibang lukhu khu uh a, a maitang uh mihing maitang tawh kibang hi.
A sam uh numeite sam tawh kibang a, a ha uh humpi nelkai ha tawh kibang hi.
Sik awmdal tawh a kibang awmdal bulh uh a, amaute kha zapna gingin galsim dinga a tai henhan sakolleng honpi ging tawh kibang hi.
A mei uh aikam mei tawh kibang a, a sungah gu a om hi. Amaute in kha nga sung mihingte bawlsiat theih nading thu a ngah uh hi.
Taw neilo kuahawmpi a uk vantungmi in amaute kumpipa ahi hi. Ama min Hebrew pau in Abaddon kici a, Greek pau in Apollyon ahi hi.
Gimna khatna a beizo hi. En in, hihteng khit ciangin gimna nih hong tung lai ding hi.
Tua khit ciangin a gukna vantungmi in a pengkul a mut ciangin kii li a nei Pasian mai‑a om kham biaknatau panin a hong gingkhia aw khat ka za hi.
Tua aw in pengkul a tawi a gukna vantungmi kiangah, “Euphrates gunpi‑a a kikhih vantungmi lite khahkhia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin leitung mi sehthum suah sehkhat a thah nading uh a kum, a kha, a ni, a nai bek ngakin kigingsa a om tua vantungmi lite a khahkhia hi.
Tu in, sakol galkap honpi a phazah hong kigen ka za a, awn 200 ahi hi.

Sakolte le sakol tunga tuangte ka muhzia hih bang ahi hi. Sakol tunga tuangte in a sanciip, a dumciip le kaat banga a naipak awmdalte a bulh uh hi. Tua sakolte a lutang uh humpi nelkai lutang tawh kibang a, a kam sung panun meikuang, meikhu le kaat khute a pusuak hi.
Amaute kam sung panin a pusuak hih gimna thumte ahi meikuang, meikhu le kaat khute in leitungmi sehthum suah sehkhat a sisak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute kam sung le a mei sungah thahatna a om hi. A mei un gul bangin lutang nei a, tua lutang tawh mi a liamsak uh hi.

Ahih hangin hih gimnate in a thah khakloh a omlai mite in amau khut tawh a bawlsa uh nate panin a kisikkik kei uh hi. Dawigilote le khua a mu theilo, khua a za theilo, lam a pai theilo kham, ngun, sumngo, sing, le suang milimte a biak uh zong a kisikkik tuan kei uh hi.
Mi a thahna uh, dawithu a zatna uh, numei pasal a thangtatna uh le a guktaknate uh zong a kisikkik tuan kei uh hi.
Meiipi in tuamin vantung pan a hong kumsuk a thahat vantungmi khat zong ka mu hi. A lu tungah sakhi tuihup khat om a, a maitang ni tawh kibang in a khete mei khuampite tawh a kibang hi.
Amah in a khut sungah laibu neu khat lemsa in a tawi hi. A taklam khe tuipi tungah nga in a veilam khe leitung ah a nga hi.
Humpi nelkai hawk bangin aw lianpi tawh kiko a, a kiko ciangin vanging sagihte gingin thu a gen uh hi.
Tu in vanging sagihte in a gen uh thute lai tawh gelh ka sawm leh vantung panin aw khat in, “Vanging sagihte thugente gelh kei inla iim in,” hong cih ka za hi.
Tuipi le leitang tunga a ding, ka muhsa vantungmi in vantung lamah a khut lamto in,
vantung le a sunga om nate, leitung le a sunga om nate, tuipi le a sunga om nate a bawl, a nungta tawntungpa min tawh kiciam a, “Hong zekai nawn peuhmah lo ding hi.
A sagihna vantungmi in pengkul mut dingin a kithawi laitak in, Pasian in ama nasem kamsangte tunga a gensa lungdamna thu tawh kipawl ama thusim a tangtungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin vantung panin a hong ging ka zaksa aw in hong hopihkik a, “Va pai inla, tuipi tung le leitunga a ding vantungmi khut sunga om a kizalsa laibu neu va la in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi kiangah va pai in, “Laibu neu hong pia in,” ka ci hi. Amah in, “La inla ne in. Na kam sungah khuaizu bangin khum dinga, na gil sungah a kha ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin vantungmi khut sunga laibu neu la in ka nek leh ka kam sungah khuaizu bangin khum a, ahi zongin ka nek khit phetin ka gil sungah a kha hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Minam kim, gam tuamtuam, paunam kim le kumpite tawh kisai na genkhia lai ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua khit ciangin vantungmi in tehna ciang tawh a kibang pumpeng tawn khat hong pia hi. A din kawmin hong gen in ah, “Pai in Pasian biakinnpi le biaknatau teh inla, tua muna Pasian a bia mite zong va sim in.
Ahih hangin biakinnpi pualam huang pen Gentile‑te aa dinga kipiasa ahih manin teh kei inla hawi in. Amaute in kha 42 sung khuapi siangtho a tuancil ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka teci nihte vangliatna ka pia dinga, ippipuan silhin ni 1,260 sung kamsang in thu a gen ding uh hi.”
Hih mi nihte in leitung Pasian mai‑a a ding, tanluan kung nih le meivak tunna nihte ahi uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh in amaute suksiat a sawm leh a kam sung panun meikuang pusuakkhia in a galte uh a kangtum ding hi. Amaute a susia nuam mi khatpeuh a om leh tua bangin thahna a thuak ding hi.

Amaute in kamsang a thu a gen hun sungin guah a zuk loh nadingin vantung khakcip theih nading vangliatna a nei uh hi. Tua banah tui sisan suahsak theih nading le a ut hunhun un gimna nam tuamtuam tawh leitung suksiat theih nading vangliatna zong a nei uh hi.
Amaute in teci a pan khit uh ciangin taw neilo kuahawmpi sung pan a hong paikhia sapi in amaute do in zo dinga, a that ding hi.
A luanghawm uh khuapi lian sunga lampi tungah a kisial ding hi. Tua khuapi in kha thu tawh kisai in Sodom le Egypt hi a, i Topa a kikhailupna mun zong ahi hi.
Tua ciangin minam kim, behnam kim, paunam kim le gam tuamtuam pana mi khempeuhte in ni thum le a lang sung amaute luang en ding uh a, hanah vui ding a phal kei ding uh hi.
Hih kamsang nihte in leitung mite bawlsia uh ahih manin amaute sihna hangin leitung mite kipak ding uh a, lungdam in khat le khat letsong a kikhak ding uh hi.
Tu in ni thum le a lang khit ciangin Pasian in nuntakna huu amaute guan dinga, a khe uh tawh a dingto ding uh hi. Amau a mu mite a lau mahmah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in vantung panin, “Hih lamah hong paito un,” a ci aw lianpi khat za uh a, a galte muh tangpi in vantung ah kahto in, meii lakah a tumto ding uh hi.
Tua hun sungin nakpitak zinling a, khuapi sehsawm suah sehkhat a cim hi. Tua zinling in mi 7,000 that a, a nungta lai mite lau mahmah in vantung Pasian min a phat uh hi.
Gimna nihna a beizo hi. En in, gimna thumna a manlang in hong tung ding hi.

Tua ciangin a sagihna vantungmi in ama pengkul a mut ciangin vantung panin aw ngaih mahmah khat hong ging a, “Hih leitung gamte in i Topa le ama Khazih gam suak khinzo a, amah in a tawntung in a uk ding hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian mai‑a kumpi tokhomte tunga a tu upa 24te boksuk in Pasian bia uh a,
“A om ngei khin, a om laitak le hong pailai ding, Vanglianpen Topa Pasian aw, Nang tungah lungdam kong ko uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na vangliatna lianpi zangin na ukta hi.

Minam tuamtuamte heh uh ahih manin Nang na lungso ta hi. A sisa mite tungah thu na khen ding hun hong tungzo a, Na nasem ahi kamsangte, na misiangthote, Nangma min a zahtak a neu a lian, Amau thaman na piak ding hun le, Leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun, Hong tungzo hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin vantung a om Pasian biakinnpi hong kihong a, ama biakinnpi sungah ama thuciamna singkuang a kimu hi. Tua khit ciangin khuaphia in, gamlum henhan a, vanging in gialpi kia a, zin a ling hi.
Tu in vantung ah lim lianpi khat hong kilang a, numei khatin ni silh in a khe tawh khapi sik a, aksi sawm le nihte tawh a kizem lukhu khat a khu hi.
Tua numei in naupaai a, nausuak nuam ahih manin nasa in a kiko hi.
Lim dang khat zong vantung ah hong kilang a, en in, lutang sagih le kii sawm a nei gulpisan khat ahi hi. Tua lutangte tungah kumpi lukhu sagih a om hi.
Tua gulpi in a mei tawh aksi sehthum suah sehkhat vatkhia in leitung ah a lawnsuk hi. Nau a suakkuan numei mai ah tua gulpi dingin nau a suahlian leh naungek a valhtum pah dingin kigingsa in a om hi.
Tua numei in minam khempeuh sik ciangkhut tawh a uk ding ta pasal khat a nei hi. Tua a tapa pen Pasian le ama kumpi tokhom ah a kilato hi.
Tua ciangin tua numei in Pasian bawlkholhsa gamlak mun khatah tai a, tualai ah amaute in amah an a vak theih nadingun ni 1,260 sung a kikem hi.
Tua ciangin vantung ah gal kidona om a, Michael le ama pawl vantungmite in gulpi a do uh hi. Tua ciangin gulpi le a pawlte in zong a lehdo uh hi.
Ahih hangin gulpi le ama pawlte in lel uh ahih manin vantung ah amaute om nading mun a om kei hi.
Tua ahih manin Dawimangpa le Satan a kici, leitung buppi a khem tanglai gulpi, a lian mahmah gulpi pen kilawnkhia hi. Leitung ah amah kikhiasuk a, a pawlte zong amah tawh kikhiasuk hi.

Tua ciangin vantung ah a ngaih mahmah aw khat ka za a, tua aw in, “Tu in, i Pasian hotkhiatna, ama hatna, ama ukna, ama Khazih thuneihna hong tungzo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh i Pasian mai ah sun le zanin i sanggamte a mawhsakpa a kikhiasuk zo hi.
Amaute in Tuuno sisan le a teci panna uh tawh Satan zo uh a, a si ngam zah dongin a nuntakna uh a it kei uh hi.

Tua ahih manin vantung le a sunga teengte aw, lungdam un! Leitung le tuipi tunga teengte aw, gimna na thuak ding uh hi! Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Dawimangpa hong tuaksuk hi. Amah in hun tomcik bek neilai ahihlam thei ahih manin lungsosa in a hong tuaksuk ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu in gulpi in amah leitung ah kikhiasuk zo hi cih a theih ciangin tapa a nei numei a bawlsia hi.

Ahih hangin tua numei ama om nading mun gamlak ah a len theih nadingin a lian mahmah muvanlai kha nih a kipia hi. Gulpi sukkhak theihlohna tua munah numeinu hun khat, hun nih le hun lang sung a kikem hi.
Tua ciangin gulpi in tua numei a taimang dingin a kam sung panin tua nu nungah tuikhang bangin tui a luangsak hi.
Ahih hangin leitang in numei huh a, leitang kikak in gulpi kam sung panin a luangkhia tua tuikhang a valhmang hi.
Tua ciangin numei tungah gulpi heh mahmah a, a omlai numei suan le khakte a sim dingin a kuankhia hi. Tua mite in Pasian thupiakte le Zeisu Khazih teci panna a zui mite ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin tuipi gei sehnel tungah ka dinga, tuipi sung pan hong paikhiato sapi khat ka mu hi. Tua sapi in lutang sagih le kii sawm nei a, a kiite tungah kumpi lukhu sawm khu in a lutangte tungah Pasian kosiatna min a om hi.

Tu in ka muh tua sapi in kamkei tawh kibang a, a khete vompi khe tawh kibang in a kam pen humpi nelkai kam tawh a kibang hi. Gulpi in ama vangliatna, a kumpi tokhom, le ama thuneihna lianpi tua sapi a pia hi.
A lutangte khat pen sihpih ding zah a a liam khin bangin ka mu hi. Ahih hangin tu in sihzawh nading tua a liamma dam khin ahih manin leitung buppi in lamdangsa in tua sapi nung a zui uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tua sapi tunga thuneihna a pia gulpi a bia uh hi. Sapi zong bia uh a, “Sapi tawh a kibang kua om ahi hiam? Amah a do zo ding kua om ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua sapi tungah kiphatsakna kampau nading le kosiat nading kam khat kipia in, a thuneihna a zat hun ding kha 42 sung kipia hi.
Tua ciangin sapi in Pasian, ama min, ama biakbuuk le vantung a a teengte ahi zongin a kosia hi.
Misiangthote do in a zawh nadingin ama tungah thuneihna a kipia hi. Minam khempeuh, pau khempeuh le gam khempeuh zong a uk theih nading thuneihna a kipia hi.
Leitung piancil a thahna a thuak Tuuno Nuntakna Laibupi sunga min a kigelh lo, leitunga a teeng mi khempeuh in tua sapi a bia ding uh hi.
Bil nei mi in hih thu za tahen.
Mi khatpeuh salin a kaite sal mahin kikai dinga, namsau tawh mi a thatte namsau mah tawh kithatkik ding hi. Hih thu ah misiangte in upna le thuakzawhna a neih ding uh kisam hi.
Tua khit ciangin leisung pana hong paikhiato a dang sapi khat ka mu hi. Tua sapi in tuuno kii tawh a kibang kii nih nei a, gulpi bangin kam a pau hi.
Amah in a khatna sapi muhna ah tua sapi thuneihna khempeuh zangin leitung le leitang tunga a teeng mi khempeuh tua sapi a biasak hi. Tua sapi in a liamma a damkik sapi pen ahi hi.
Tua sapi in a lian mahmah na lamdangte bawl a, mite muhin van panin leitung ah meikuang a kiasak hi.

Amah in sapi mai‑a ama lah theih ding a ngah na lamdangte tawh leitunga a teeng mite khem a, tua mite tungah sapi lim a bawl nadingun zong a sawl hi. Tua sapi in namsau tawh a liam khit hangin tu in a nungta lai pen ahi hi.
Amah in tua sapi lim, nuntakna huu a piak theih nadingin vangliatna a ngah hi. Tua bangin sapi lim pauthei dinga, tua sapi lim a bialo khempeuh thah theih nading thu a ngah hi.
A neu a lian, a zawng a hau, sila le silalote a kipan mi khempeuh, a taklam khut, ahih keileh a taltang ah ciaptehna khat a neisak ding hi.
Tua hi a, ciaptehna, sapi min le ama min nambat a neilo peuhmah in bangmah lei theilo in zuak theilo ding uh hi.
Hih thu ah pilna a kisam hi. A ngaihsun thei mi in sapi nambat sim tahen. Hih in mihing nambat hi a, 666 ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ka et leh, en in, Zion Mual tunga a ding Tuuno ka mu hi. A taltang tungah a Pa min a kigelh mi 144,000te zong tua Tuuno tawh a dingkhawm uh hi.
Tuipi ging le a ngaih mahmah vanging tawh a kibang aw khat vantung ah a ging ka za hi. Harp lasakna tum in la a sa mite awging zong ka za hi.
Amaute in la thak tawh a kibang la khat kumpi tokhom, ganhing lite le upate mai ah a sa uh hi. Leitung panin a kitankhia 144,000te simloh kuamah in tua la a sa thei kei uh hi.
Tuate in numei tawh a thangtatlo misiangte hi uh a, Tuuno paina peuhpeuh ah a zui kawikawite, mihingte lak pan a kitankhiate, Pasian le Tuuno aa dingin a gah masate ahi uh hi.
Amaute kamsung panin zuauthu gingkhia ngeilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Pasian tokhom mai ah kawkban nading khat beek a neilote ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin van laizang a a leng kawikawi, a dang vantungmi khat ka mu hi. Amah in leitunga a teeng gam khempeuh, minam kim, paunam kim le mi khempeuh tungah tawntung lungdamna thu a tangko ding ahi hi.
Amah in, “Pasian thukhenna hun hong tungzo hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Vantung, leitung, tuipi le tuinakte a bawlpa bia un,” ci in a kiko hi.
Tua ciangin a dang vantungmi khatin zui a, “Tua khuapi in ama angkawmna hangin hehna lenggahzu minam khempeuh dawnsak ahih manin a lian Babylon khuapi a pukzo hi, a pukzo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin a thumna vantungmi in amaute zui in aw lianpi tawh kiko a, “Mi khatpeuh in sapi le ama lim a bia, a taltang ah, ahih keileh a khutah sapi ciaptehna a ngah leh,

hai sunga kisung Pasian hehna, khauh theihtawp in a khauh, ama hehna lenggahzu amah kidawnsak ding hi. A siangtho vantungmite mai le Tuuno mai ah kaat le meikuang tawh amah in bawlsiatna a thuak ding hi.
Sapi le ama lim bia a, ama min ciaptehna a ngah mite in sun le zan tawlngak hun neilo ding uh a, amaute a kibawlsiatna meikhu a tawntung in a khu den ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihlai ah Pasian thupiakte zui a, Zeisu upna a lenkip misiangte in a thuak zawh keikai ding uh kisam hi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin awging khatin ka kiangah, “ ‘Tu‑a kipan, Topa sunga a si mite mihampha ahi uh hi,’ ci in gelh in,” a hong ci hi. Kha in zong, “Hi mah hi, tua mite in a nasep gimna panin tawlnga ta ding uh a, amau nasepte in amaute a zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh, en in, meiingo khat ka mu a, tua meii tungah Mihing Tapa tawh a kibang mi khat a tu hi. Amah in kham lukhu khat khu a, a hiam mahmah phiaukawi khat a tawi hi.

Tua ciangin a dang vantungmi khat biakinnpi sung pan hong pusuak a, meiipi tunga tupa kiangah, “Leitung ante min khin ta a, anlak ding hun hong tungzo ahih manin na phiaukawi khia inla at in,” ci in aw lianpi tawh kiko in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin meiipi tunga tupa in leitung ah a phiaukawi a khiat leh, leitung ante atsa a suak hi.
Tua ciangin vantung a om biakinnpi panin a dang vantungmi khat a hong paikhia leuleu hi. Amah in zong a hiam mahmah phiaukawi khat a tawi hi.

Tua ciangin meikuang tunga thu a nei a dang vantungmi khat biaknatau panin hong paikhia a, a hiam mahmah phiaukawi a tawipa kiangah, “Leitung a lenggahte min khin ahih manin a hiam na phiaukawi khia inla, leitung lenggah bawkte khawm in,” ci in aw lianpi tawh a kiko hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in a phiaukawi leitung ah khiasuk in leitung a lenggah teng khawm a, Pasian hehna lenggahcilna phualpi ah a lawn hi.
Tua lenggahte khuapi pualam a om lenggahcilna phualpi sungah a kicil hi. Tua pana a luangkhia sisan in sakol kamkaih ciang banin tai 200 dong a luang hi.

Tua ciangin a lian mahmah le a lamdang mahmah nalamdang khat vantung ah ka mu hi. Tua in a nunung pen gimna nam sagihte a tawi vantungmi sagihte ahi hi. Tua gimnate in Pasian hehna a tawpkhakna ahi hi.

Tua ciangin meikuang tawh a kihel limlang tuipi tawh a kibang khat ka mu hi. Amaute in sapi tungah a gualzote, ama lim tungah a gualzote, ama kiciaptehna le ama min nambatte tungah a gualzo mite hi uh a, Pasian harp lasaknate tawi in tua limlang tuipi gei ah a ding uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian nasempa Moses le Tuuno la sa uh a, “Vanglianpen Topa Pasian aw, Na nasepte lianin, Lamdang mahmah hi! Misiangthote Kumpipa aw, Na gamtatnate thutang in a maan hi!

Topa aw, Kua in nang hong kihta loin, Na min phatlo thei ding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh, A siangtho nangmah bek na hih manin, Minam khempeuh hong pai in, Na mai ah hong bia ding uh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, Na thukhennate na kilangkhiasak zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hihteng khit ciangin ka et leh, en in, vantung a teci panna buuk, biakinnpi honsa in a om ka mu hi.
Biakinnpi sung panin gimna nam sagih a tawi vantungmi sagih hong pusuakkhia a, a pak pha mahmah saihadial puan silhin kham kawnggak tawh a awm a gak uh hi.
Tua ciangin ganhing lite laka khatin vantungmi sagihte khamhai khat ciat a pia hi. Tua haite sungah a nungta tawntung Pasian lungsona a dimtak in a om hi.
Pasian minthanna le ama vangliatna hangin biakinnpi sungah meikhu a dim hi. Tua hi a, vantungmi sagihte tawi gimna nam sagihte a kibuak khit masiah biakinnpi sungah kuamah a lut thei kei hi.
Tua ciangin biakinnpi panin vantungmi sagihte kiangah, “Pai unla, Pasian hehna haite leitung ah va bua un,” ci in aw lianpi khat tawh a gen ka za hi.
Tua ciangin a khatna vantungmi pai in ama hai leitung ah a bua hi. Tua ciangin sapi ciaptehna a nei mite le ama lim a bia mite tungah a nasia mahmah a kihhuai meima a piang hi.
A nihna vantungmi in tuipi tungah a hai a buak ciangin tuipi pen misite si tawh a kibang sisan suak a, tuipi sunga om nuntakna a nei khempeuh a si uh hi.
A thumna vantungmi in gunte le tuinakte tungah a hai a buak ciangin tui khempeuh sisan a suak hi.
Tua ciangin tui a uk vantungmi in, “A om laitak, a om ngei khin le, hong pailai ding, Topa aw, Hih bangin thu khen na hih manin, Nang na dik hi.
Amaute in misiangte le kamsangte sisan luangsak uh ahih manin, Amaute dawn dingin sisan na pia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh, sisan a dawn ding bek mah in, Amaute a kilawm uh hi,” ci in a gen ka za hi.
Biaknatau panin zong a dang awging khatin, “Vanglianpen Topa Pasian aw, hi mah hi, na thukhennate thuman in a dik hi,” a cih ka za hi.
A lina vantungmi in ama hai ni tungah bua a, tua ciangin ni in mihingte meikuang tawh hal theih nading thuneihna a nei hi.
Tua meikuang salua mahmah ahih manin mihingte kanggawp a, amaute in tua gimnate tunga thunei Pasian min a kosia uh hi. Amaute kisik nuamlo in Pasian zong a pahtawi kei uh hi.
A ngana vantungmi in sapi tokhom tungah a hai a buak ciangin, sapi gam sung khempeuh ah khua a mial hi. Amaute in nasalua in a kha uh a pet uh hi.
A meimate uh nasalua uh ahih manin vantung Pasian kosia uh a, amaute gamtatnate a kisik kik tuan kei uh hi.
A gukna vantungmi in Euphrates gunpi tungah ama hai a buak ciangin nisuahna lam kumpite hong pai nading lampi a kihon nadingin tua gunpi a kang hi.
Tua khit ciangin gulpi kam sung, sapi kam sung le kamsang zuaupa kam sung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang dawigilo thum a hong pusuakkhia ka mu hi.

Tua dawigilote in nalamdang a bawlthei kha gilote ahi uh hi. Tua dawite in leitung bupa om kumpite khempeuh kiangah va pai uh a, Vanglianpenpa ahi Pasian ni lianpi ni‑a galsim dingin gal kidona phual ah hong pai nadingun a va kaikhawm uh hi.
“En un, guta bangin kong pai ding hi. Guaktang in om a, maizumna a thuak loh nadingun kigingsa a puansilhsa in a om mi in mihampha ahi hi.”
Amaute in Hebrew pau in Armageddon a kici munah kumpite a kaikhawm uh hi.
A sagihna vantungmi in ama hai huih lakah a buak ciangin vantung biakinnpi a om kumpi tokhom panin aw lianpi khat hong gingkhia a, “Kiman khinzo hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin gamlumna hong om a, khua hong phia in van zong ging a, zin nakpi in a ling hi. Leitung ah mihing a om zawh tua zah a a khauh le a nasia zinling a om ngei kei hi.
