Tu in a lian mahmah khuapi phelthum kisuah a, minamte khuapite zong a cim hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in a lian mahmah Babylon mangngilh lo a, a lauhuai mahmah ama hehna lenggahzu a dawnsak hi.
Tua ciangin tuikulh khempeuh lengmang a, mualte zong a kimu nawn kei hi.
Tua ciangin talentɠ khat bang a gik gialpite van panin mihingte tungah kia a, tua gialpi hanga gimna nasialua ahih manin mite in Pasian a kosia uh hi.

Tua ciangin hai sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte khat ka kiangah hong pai in hong hopih a, “Hihlai ah hong pai in. Tuipi tunga a tu a paktat mahmah numei kizuaknu tunga Pasian thukhenna kong lak ding hi.
Leitung kumpite in tua numei KILAALNA tawh thangtat uh a, leitung a a teeng mite in tua nu thangtatna lenggahzu a kham uh hi,” a hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Kha tawh gamlak ah kei hong paipih hi. Tua ciangin lutang sagih le kii sawm a nei sapi san tungah a tuang numei khat ka mu hi. Tua sapi pum tungah Pasian kosiatna min a dimtak in a om hi.

Tua numei in a dupsan le a ausan puante silh a, kham, suangmanpha le kepsuangmanphate tawh a kizem hi. A khut ah khamhai khat tawi a, tua sungah ama bawl a kihhuai le numei pasal mawhna ninte a dimin a om hi.
A taltang tungah min khat kigelh a, tua min in, A KISEL THUSIM, A LIAN BABYLON, NUMEI KIZUAKTE NU LE, LEITUNG A OM A KIHHUAI NATE NU, ahi hi.
Tua numei in misiangthote sisan le Zeisu hanga thahna a thuak mite sisan dawnin a om ka muh ciangin lamdang ka sa hi.
Ahih hangin vantungmi in, “Banghang in lamdangsa na hi hiam? Hih numeinu tawh kisai thusim le lutang sagih le kii sawm a nei tua numeinu tuanna sapi tawh kisai thusim kong hilh ding hi.

Na muh sapi in a om khinsa, ahi zongin tu laitak a a omlo, taw neilo kuahawmpi panin a hong paikhiato ding le suksiatna a thuak ding pen ahi hi. Leitung piancil a kipan Nuntakna Laibupi sungah min kigelh lo, leitung a teeng mite in tua a om ngeizo, tu laitak a a omlo, a hong omkik ding tua sapi a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah ding uh hi.
“Hih thu ah lungpilna kisam hi. Lutang sagih in numeinu tutna mual sagihte ahi hi.
Kumpi sagih zong hi a, kumpi nga bei khin in kumpi khat a om laitak ahi hi. A dang kumpi khat a hong piang nai kei hi. A hong pian ciangin tawlkhat sung bek a kip ding hi.
A om ngeizo, tu laitak a a omlo sapi in a giatna kumpi zong hi a, kumpi sagihte lakah khat ahi hi. Amah in suksiatna a thuak ding hi.
“Na muh kii sawmte in kumpigam a ngah nailo kumpi sawmte ahi hi. Amaute in sapi tawh kumpi suakkhawm ding uh a, nai khat sung thuneihna a ngahkhawm ding uh hi.
Tua kumpite a ngimna uh kibang dinga, sapi tungah amaute vangliatna le thuneihna a ap ding uh hi.

Tua kumpite in Tuuno tawh kido ding uh a, ahi zongin Tuuno in amaute a zo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Tuuno in tote Topa, kumpite Kumpipa ahi hi. Amah tawh a omkhawm mite in a kisamte, a kiteelte le mi citakte ahi uh hi,” a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “A kizuak numei tutna ahi na muh tuite in minam kim, mihonpi, gam khempeuh le paunam kimte ahi uh hi.
Sapi lu tunga na muh kii sawmte in a kizuak numei mudah ding uh a, hawmsuaksak in a guaktang in a koih ding uh hi. A sa ne in meikuang tawh a hal ding uh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian gensa thute a tangtun khit mateng in ama ngimna a tangtun nadingin Pasian in amaute lungsim sungah guan a, kumpite lungsim kipumkhat in sapi khut sungah amau kumpigam a ap ding uh hi.
Na muh numei in leitung kumpite a uk, a lian khuapi ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
Hihteng khit ciangin vantung panin a hong kumsuk vantungmi a dang khat ka mu hi. Amah in thuneihna lianpi nei a, ama vangin leitung a tan hi.

Amah in nakpi in aw lianpi tawh kiko a, “A lian Babylon khuapi a cimzo hi, a cimzo hi! Dawigilote teenna, a kihhuai kha khempeuh a kikhumna thonginn, a kihhuai le a muhdahhuai vasate a kikhumna mun a suakzo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ama angkawmna hangin hehna lenggahzu minam khempeuh in a kham uh hi. Leitung kumpite in amah tawh angkawm uh a, leitung a sumbawlte in zong ama noptat luatna teng a hauhlawh uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin awging dang khat ka za hi. Tua aw in, “Ka mite aw, ama mawhna bawlna kihel kha loin, ama thuak gimnate na thuak khakloh nadingun ama kiang panin hong paikhia un.
Banghang hiam cihleh ama mawhna in vantung dong tung khin a, ama tatsiatna teng Pasian in a ciamteh zo hi.
Amah in note a hong bawl bangin ama tungah bawl un. Ama gamtatna tawh kizui in a zah nih in thukkik unla, ama tawi hai sungah a zah nih in a khauh in helsak un.

Amah le amah a kipahtawina zah le a noptatna zahin bawlsiatna le gentheihna pia un. Banghang hiam cihleh a lungsim sungah, ‘Meigongnu hilo in kumpinu ka hi a, gentheihna ka phu kha kei ding hi,’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin ni khat thu in gimna thuak dinga, sihna, kahna le gilkialna a thuak ding hi. Ama tunga thu a khen Topa Pasian thahat ahih manin meikuang tawh amah a haltum ding hi.
“Tua numei tawh mawh in a noptat leitung kumpite in amah a kihalna meikhu a muh uh ciangin tamlo in a kap ding uh hi.
Tua numei a kibawlsiatna hangin lau ding uh a, a gamlapi panin, ‘Tazen aw, tazen aw, a vanglian Babylon khuapi aw! Nai khat sungin na kisiatna hong tungzen maw,’ ci in a kiko ding uh hi.
“Leitung sumbawlte vante kuamah in lei nawnlo ahih manin amaute in khitui luangin tua khuapi a kah ding uh hi.

Sumbawlte zuak vante in kham le ngun, suangmanpha le kepsuangmanpha, puanpak le puan dupsan, naipuan le puansan, sing manpha nam khempeuh, saiha tawh a kibawl van nam khempeuh, sing manphapente tawh a kibawl van nam khempeuh, sumngo le sik, suangpak tawh a kibawl van nam khempeuh,
thaksing le paknamtui, sathau namtui le libanos paknamtui, lenggahzu le sathau, mangbuhtang le mangbuhnel, tuu, bawng, sakol le sakollengte, mihingte pumpi le khate ahi hi.
Na lunggulh mahmah singgahte in nang hong nusia hi. Na hauhna le na vangneihna zong mangthang khin a, tuate na mu kha ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Hih nate zuak in tua numei hanga mihau a suak sumbawlte in tua khuapi a kibawlsiatna hangin lau in a gal panin tamlo in kap in a humham ding uh hi.
Amaute in, ‘Tazen aw, tazen aw, puanpak, puan dupsan le puan ausante silhin, kham, suangmanpha le kepsuangmanpha tawh a kizem a lian khuapi aw!

Hih zahtak a na hauhna teng nai khat sunga beimang tazen maw,’ a ci ding uh hi. “Tembaw hawlte, tembaw tawh khual a zinte, tembaw nasemte le tuipi tungah sumbawl a khualzin khempeuh zong gamlapi ah dingin,

amah a kihalna meikhu a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hih khuapi lian tawh a kibang 18:13 libanos paknamtui: Greek ah “libanos” kici a, zatui leh biakpiakna a kizang khawm paknamtui nam khat ahi hi. khuapi om ahi hiam?’ ci in a kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute lutung ah leivui kibuak in, ‘Tazen aw, tazen aw, ama hauhna tawh tembaw a neite khempeuh mihau a suaksak a lian khuapi! Nai khat sung bekin na hawmsuak tazen hi,’ ci in kapin humham in a kiko uh hi.
“Tua ciangin Pasian in tua numeinu tungah phu hong laksak khin ahih manin vantung le a siangtho sawltakte a kipan kamsangte aw, tua numei hangin lungdam un!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a thahat vantungmi khatin a lian mahmah an gawina suang tawh a kibang suangtum khat la in tuipi sungah khiasuk a, “A lian Babylon khuapi, hih bangin kikhia dinga, a kimukik ngei nawn kei ding hi.

Na sungah harp tawh la a sate, tumtheih tuamtuam a tumte, tamngai tumte le pengkul a mutte awging a kiza ngei nawn kei ding hi. Khutsiam mi khat beek kimu ngei nawnlo dinga, an sukna sum ging zong a kiza nawn kei ding hi.

Na sungah meivak kivak ngei nawnlo dinga, mopipa awging le mothaknu awging zong a kiza nawn kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na sumbawlpihte leitung miliante hi a, dawi aisanna tawh minam khempeuh na khem hi.
Kamsangte, misiangthote le leitunga thahna a thuak khempeuh sisan zong hih khuapi sungah a kimu hi,” a ci hi.
Hihteng khit ciangin vantung ah a ngaih mahmah mihonpi awging khat ka za a, tua aw in, “Hallelujah! Hotkhiatna, minthanna, pahtawina le vangliatna in Topa eite Pasian aa ahi hi!

Banghang hiam cihleh numei pasal mawhna tawh leitung a susia a paktat mahmah numei kizuaknu tungah thu a khen zo hi. Ama thukhennate thuman in dika, Pasian nasemte sisan a luansakna hangin tua numei tungah phu a lazo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hallelujah! Tua numei a kihalna meikhu, a khu tawntung hi!” a cikik uh hi.
Tua ciangin upa 24te le ganhing lite boksuk in kumpi tokhom tunga a tu Pasian bia uh a, “Amen! Hallelujah!” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin kumpi tokhom panin aw khatin, “Amah a kihta a nasemte le a neu a lian khempeuh aw, i Pasian phat un!” a ci hi.

Tua khit ciangin mihonpi awging tawh a kibang tui tampi luang zuahzuah awging tawh a kibang le a ngaih mahmah vanging tawh a kibang awging khat ka za hi. Tua aw in, “Hallelujah! Banghang hiam cihleh Vanglianpen Topa Pasian a maangta hi!
Lungdam kipak in amah phat ni. Banghang hiam cihleh Tuuno zipi hun hong tungta a, a zi zong kigingsa in a omzo hi,” a ci hi.
A siangtho le a pak pha mahmah puankang Tuuno zi silh dingin a kipia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh puanpak in misiangthote gamtat hoihna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “ ‘Tuuno mopawi sim dinga sapna a ngah mite mihampha ahi uh hi!’ ci in gelh in,” hong ci hi. Tua banah amah in, “Hih thute Pasian hong gen taktak ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah bia dingin a khe phungah ka boksuk hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Hong bia kei in! Kei pen Zeisu teci panna a lenkip na sanggamte le nangmah banga nasem khat ka hi hi. Pasian bia in! Kamsangte thugente in Zeisu thu teci panna ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
Tu in vantung hong kihong a, en in, sakol a kang khat ka mu hi. Tua sakol tunga tuangpa min in Muanhuai le Thuman ahi hi. Amah in thuman tawh thukhen in thuman tawh gal a do hi.
A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang a, kumpi lukhu tampi a khu hi. Amah longal kuamah in a theihloh min khat ama tungah a kigelh hi.
Amah in sisan sunga a kidiahsa puantualpi silhin, ama min pen Pasian Thu ahi hi.
Vantung galkap honpite in zong sakol tung tuangin amah a zui uh hi. Amaute in a siangtho, a kang, puanpak a silh uh hi.

Tu in tua pa kam sung panin minamte a susia dingin a hiam mahmah namsau khat a pusuakkhia hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minamte a uk ding hi. Vanglianpen Pasian hehna lenggahcilna phual ah amah in lenggah a cil hi.
A puantualpi tung le a phei tungah, KUMPITE KUMPIPA LE TOTE TOPA, ci in min a kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin ni sungah dingin a om vantungmi khat ka mu hi. Amah in vana leng vasa khempeuh kiangah, “A lian Pasian nitak an a ne dingin hong kikhawm un.
Kumpite, galkap mangteɠ, mi thahatte, sakolte le sakol tung tuangte, sila le sila lote a kipan a neu a lian le mi khempeuhte sa hong ne un,” ci in aw lianpi tawh a kiko hi.
Tua ciangin sapi, leitung kumpite le amaute galkap honpite in sakol tunga tuangpa le ama galkap honpite sim dingin a kikaihkhop uh ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin sapi le amah tawh a kithuah kamsang zuaupa a kiman hi. Hih kamsang zuaupa in sapi muhna ah nalamdangte bawl in sapi ciaptehna a sang ama lim a bia mite a khempa ahi hi. Amaute gel kaat le meilipi sungah a hingtang in a kikhiasuk hi.
A omlai teng ahih leh sakol tunga tuangpa in ama kamsung panin a pusuakkhia namsau tawh a that hi. Vasate khempeuh in amaute sa gilvahtak in a ne uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin a hong kumsuk vantungmi khat ka mu hi. Amah in taw neilo kuahawmpi tawhtang le sikkhau lianpi khat a tawi hi.
Tua vantungmi in tanglai gulpi manin kum 1,000 sung a hencip hi. Tua gulpi in Dawimangpa hi a, Satan zong a kici hi.

Vantungmi in taw neilo kuahawmpi sungah amah khiasuk in kuahawmpi a kalh khit ciangin a tungah ciaptehna khat a khetnelh hi. Tua ahih manin kum 1,000 a cin masiah minamte a khem thei nawn kei hi. Ahih hangin kum 1,000 a cin ciangin tawmvei sung a kikhahkhia ding hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi tokhomte le a tunga tu mite ka mu hi. Amaute in thukhen theih nading thu a ngah uh hi. Zeisu thu teci panna le Pasian thu hanga ngawng tanna a thuak mite khate zong ka mu hi. Amaute in sapi hi ta leh ama lim hi ta leh bia loin amaute taltang ah ahi a, amaute khutah ahi zongin sapi ciaptehna a neilo mite ahi uh hi. Amaute nungta in Khazih tawh kum 1,000 sung a maangkhawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin misi dangte ahih leh kum 1,000 a cin mateng in a nungtakik nai kei uh hi. Hih in thawhkikna masa ahi hi.

Thawhkikna masa sunga a kihel mite in a siangtho le a hampha mite ahi uh hi. Nihvei sihna in tua mite tungah thu a nei kei hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Pasian le Khazih aa ding siampite suakin amah tawh kum 1,000 sung a mangkhawm ding uh hi.
Tu in kum 1,000 a cin khit ciangin Satan a kikhumna panin a kikhahkhia ding hi.
Amah kuankhia dinga, Gog le Magog ahi leitung kiuli a om mite khem in galsim dingin tua mite a kaikhawm ding hi. Tua mite tuipi gei‑a sehnel zahin a tam uh hi.
Amaute leitung maitang dimin hong kuan ding uh a, misiangthote omna, Pasian it khuapi a umcih ding uh hi. Tua ciangin vantung a om Pasian kiang panin meikuang hong kiasuk in amaute a valhtum ding hi.
Sapi le kamsang zuaupa omna kaat le meilipi sungah amaute a khem Dawimangpa zong a kikhiasuk hi. Amaute in sun le zan a tawntung in bawlsiatna a thuak ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a lian a kang tokhom khat le a tunga tupa ka mu hi. Ama mai panin lei le van lengmang in a kimu nawn kei hi.

Tua ciangin a sisa milian mineute Pasian mai ah dingin a om uh ka mu hi. Laibute zong lemsa in om a, Nuntakna Laibupi ahi laibu dang khat zong a kilem hi. A sisa mite in laibute sunga a kigelh amaute gamtatna bangin thukhenna a thuak uh hi.
Tuipi in ama sunga om misite puak in Sihna le Hadesɠ in zong amaute sunga om misite a puak uh hi. Tua mite in amaute gamtatna tawh kizui in thukhenna a thuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Sihna le Hadesɠ zong meilipi sungah a kikhiasuk hi. Hih in nihvei sihna ahi hi.
Nuntakna Laibupi sunga min kigelhlo mi peuhmah meilipi sungah a kikhiasuk hi.
Tu in, van thak le lei thak ka mu hi. A masa van le lei beimang khin a, tuipi zong a om nawn kei hi.
Tua ciangin keimah John in Pasian kiang, vantung panin a hong kumsuk a siangtho Jerusalem Khua Thak ka mu hi. Tua in a pasal aa dingin kizemsa a om mothaknu tawh a kibang hi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin aw ngaih mahmah khat ka za a, tua aw in, “En in, Pasian biakbuuk mite lakah om dinga, Pasian zong mite tawh teengkhawm in amaute Pasian ahi ding hi. Amaute in zong Pasian mite ahi ding uh hi.
Pasian in amaute mit panin a khitui khempeuh uh a nulsak ding hi. A lui na khempeuh bei khinzo ahih manin sihna, dahna, kahna le natna thuakna khempeuh a om nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tokhom tunga tupa in, “En in, na khempeuh a thakin ka bawl zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua banah amah in, “Hih thute thuman le a muanhuai thu ahih manin lai sungah gelh in,” a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kiman khinzo hi! Keimah in Alpha le Omegaɠ, a Kipatna le a Tawpna ka hi hi. A dangtak mi khempeuh, nuntakna tuinak pana tui, manngen loin ka pia ding hi.
A gualzo mi in na khempeuh luah dinga, ama Pasian ka hi ding hi. Amah zong keima tapa ahi ding hi.

Ahih hangin a meidawite, a umlote, a kihhuaite, mi a thatte, numei pasal tawh a thangtatte, dawi aisante, milim a biate le zuauthu a gente om nading mun in kaat le meilipi sung ahi hi. Hih in nihvei sihna ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a nunung pen gimna nam sagihte a dimtak in a omna hai sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte lakah khat ka kiangah hong pai in hong hopih a, “Hong pai in. Tuuno zi ahi, a kipi mo kong lak ding hi,” a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a lian mahmah mualsangpi khat tungah Kha tawh hong paipih a, Pasian omna vantung panin a hong kumsuk a lian a siangtho Jerusalem khuapi a hong lak hi.
Tua khuapi in Pasian vang tawh a tang hi. A manphapen jasper suangmanpha bangin tang a, limlang suang bangin a tedeldel hi.
A kulhpi zong lianin a sang mahmah hi. Kulhpi ah kongpi sawm le nih om a, tua kongpite ah vantungmi sawm le nih a om hi. Tua kongpite tungah Israel suan minam sawm le nihte min a kigelh hi.
Nisuahna lamah kongpi thum, leilu lamah kongpi thum, leitaw lamah kongpi thum, nitumna lamah kongpi thum a om hi.
Tu in tua khuapi kulhpi in nuaiphah sawm le nih nei a, tuate tungah Tuuno sawltak sawm le nihte min a kigelh hi.
Kei a hong hopih vantungmi in khuapi kongpite le kulhpite a teh nadingin kham tawh kibawl tehna ciang khat a tawi hi.
Khuapi in kiuli nei in a dung a vai a kikim hi. Vantungmi in tua ciang tawh khuapi a teh ciangin tai 1,500 pha a, a dung, a vai le a sanna a kikim hi.
Tua ciangin kulhpi teha, pasalte tong tawh a kikim vantungmi tongin tong 144 a sang hi.
Tua kulhpi in jasper suangmanpha tawh a kibawl ahi hi. Khuapi zong kham taktak hi a, limlang bangin a te deldel hi.
Khuapi kulhpi tawphah zong suangmanpha nam tuamtuam tawh a kizem hi. A masa pen jasper suangmanpha, a nihna sapphire suangmanpha, a thumna chalcedony suangmanpha, a lina emerald suangmanpha,

a ngana sardonyx suangmanpha, a gukna sardius suangmanpha, a sagihna chrysolite suangmanpha, a giatna beryl suangmanpha, a kuana topaz suangmanpha, a sawmna chrysoprase suangmanpha, a sawm le khatna jacinth suangmanpha, a sawm le nihna amethyst suangmanpha‑te ahi hi.
Kongpi sawm le nihte in kepsuang pekpi sawm le nih hi a, kongpi khat ciangin kepsuang pekpi khat tek ahi hi. Khuapi kongzingte kham taktak hi a, a pailet a kimu limlang tawh a kibang hi.
Ahi zongin tua khuapi sungah biakinn ka mu kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a Vanglianpen Topa Pasian le Tuuno in tua khuapi biakinnpi ahi hi.
Pasian vangin tua khuapi tan a, Tuuno in tua khuapi meivak ahih manin nitang le khatang a kisam kei hi.
Hotkhiatna a ngah minamte tua khuapi vangtang sungah vak ding uh a, leitung kumpite in amaute minthanna le a ngah uh pahtawinate tua khuapi ah a paipih ding uh hi.
Khuapi kongpite sunlai in kikhak lo ding hi. Zan khuamial zong a om kei ding hi.
Amaute in minamte minthanna le a ngah uh pahtawinate tua khuapi ah a paipih ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua khuapi sungah a siangtholo mi, a kihhuai mi, zuauthu a gen mi khat beek lut theilo dinga, Tuuno Nuntakna Laibupi sunga a min a kigelhte bek a lut thei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in a siang silsel nuntakna tui a luanna gunpi khat a hong lak hi. Tua tui in Pasian le Tuuno tokhom pana hong luangkhia hi a, limlang suang bangin a tedeldel hi.
Lam lianpi laizang le gunpang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, khasim in gah ahih manin sawm le nihvei a gah hi. Tua singkung a tehte zong minamte cidam nading ahi hi.
Tua munah hamsiatna a om nawn kei ding hi. Pasian le Tuuno tokhom om dinga, ama nasemte in ama na a sem ding uh hi.
Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, amaute taltang ah ama min a kigelh ding hi.
Tua munah zan khuamial a om kei ding hi. Topa Pasian vangin tan ding ahih manin meivak ahi a, nitang ahi zongin a kisam kei ding hi. Amaute in a tawntung in a maang ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Hih thute thuman in muanhuai hi,” a hong ci hi. A siangtho kamsangte Topa Pasian in ama vantungmi sawlin a sawtlo in a hong piang pelmawh ding hih thute ama nasemte a hilhsak hi.
Amah in, “En in, kong pai pah ding hi! Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a zui mi in mihampha ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
Tu in keimah John in hih nate mu in a za pa ka hi hi. Ka muh khit ka zak khit ciangin hih thute a hong lak vantungmi a bia dingin a khe phungah ka boksuk hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Hong bia kei in. Keimah in na sanggam kamsangte, hih laibu sunga a kigen thute a zui mite le nangma naseppihpa ka hi hi. Pasian bia in,” a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A hun hong naita ahih manin hih laibu sunga a kigelh genkholhna thute iimcip kei in.
A thumanlo mi, thumanlo in omsuak tahen. A gamtatsia mi, gamtatsia in omsuak tahen. A dik mi in a dik in omsuak tahen. A siangtho mi in a siangtho in omsuak tahen,” a hong ci hi.
“En in, a manlang in kong pai dinga, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui in ka piak ding thaman kong pua ding hi.
Keimah in Alpha le Omegaɠ, a Kipatna le a Tawpna, a Masapen le a Nunungpen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Ama thupiakte a zui mite in mihampha ahi uh hi. Amaute in nuntakna singkung pan nek theih nading le kongpite tawnin khuapi sungah lut theih nading thu a ngah ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin, a pualam ah uite, dawi aisante, numei pasal a thangtatte, mithatte, milim biate, zuauthu gen nuam a sate a om uh hi.
“Pawlpite tungah hih thute teci a pang dingin keimah Zeisu in ka vantungmi kong paisak zo hi. Keimah in David Zung le ama Suan a Tang Zingsol ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Kha le monu in zong, “Hong paita in!” a ci uh hi. A za mi in zong, “Hong paita in!” ci tahen. A dangtak mi hong pai henla, a dawnnuam mi in nuntakna tui man pia loin hong dawn tahen.
Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thu a za mi khempeuh tunga hilhkholh nop in ah, mi khatpeuh in hih thute a behlap leh hih laibu sunga a kigelh gimnate, Pasian in ama tungah a tungsak ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a lakkhiat leh Pasian in hih laibu sunga kigen Nuntakna Singkung le khuapi siangtho panin ama ngah ding khempeuh a lakkhiatsak ding hi.
Hih thute teci a pangpa in, “Kong paibaih taktak ding hi,” a ci hi. Amen. Tua bang hi tahen. Topa Zeisu aw, hong pai ta in!
Eite Topa Zeisu Khazih hong hehpihna thupha note khempeuh tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
